_ jyānim jīyate ātmanā _ jīvati pradhinā agāt iti eva āhuḥ atha trayaḥ vāva
lokāḥ _ lokaḥ _ lokaḥ _ lokaḥ iti saḥ ayam _ lokaḥ putreṇa eva jayyaḥ na anyena
karmaṇā karmaṇā _ lokaḥ vidyayā _ lokaḥ _ lokaḥ lokānām śreṣṭhaḥ tasmāt vidyām
praśaṃsanti atha atas samprattiḥ _ praiṣyan manyate atha putram āha tvam brahma
tvam yajñaḥ tvam lokaḥ iti saḥ putraḥ pratyāha aham brahma aham yajñaḥ aham
lokaḥ iti yat vai kiṃca anūktam tasya sarvasya brahma iti _ tā ye vai ke ca
yajñāḥ teṣām sarveṣām yajñaḥ iti _ tā ye vai ke ca lokāḥ teṣām sarveṣām lokaḥ
iti _ tā etāvat vai idam sarvam etat mā sarvam san ayam itas bhunajat iti tasmāt
putram anuśiṣṭam lokyam āhuḥ tasmāt enam anuśāsati saḥ _ evaṃvid asmāt lokāt
praiti atha ebhiḥ eva prāṇaiḥ saha putram āviśati saḥ _ anena kiṃcid akṣṇayā
kṛtam bhavati tasmāt enam sarvasmāt putraḥ muñcati tasmāt putraḥ nāma saḥ
putreṇa eva asmin loke pratitiṣṭhati atha enam ete devāḥ prāṇāḥ amṛtāḥ āviśanti
pṛthivyai ca enam agneḥ ca daivā vāc āviśati sā vai daivā vāc yayā yat yat eva
vadati tat tat bhavati divaḥ ca enam ādityāt ca daivam manaḥ āviśati tat vai
daivam manaḥ yena ānandī eva bhavati atho na śocati adbhyaḥ ca enam candramasaḥ
ca daivaḥ prāṇaḥ āviśati saḥ vai daivaḥ prāṇaḥ yaḥ saṃcaran ca a saṃcaran ca na
vyathate atho na riṣyati saḥ eṣa evaṃvid sarveṣām bhūtānām ātmā bhavati yathā
eṣā devatā evam saḥ yathā etām devatām sarvāṇi bhūtāni avanti evam ha evaṃvidam
sarvāṇi bhūtāni avanti yat u kiṃca imāḥ prajāḥ śocanti amā eva āsām tat bhavati
puṇyam eva amum gacchati na ha vai devān pāpam gacchati atha atas _ mīmāṃsā
prajāpatiḥ ha karmāṇi sasṛje tāni sṛṣṭāni anyonyena aspardhanta vadiṣyāmi eva
aham iti vāc dadhre drakṣyāmi aham iti cakṣuḥ śroṣyāmi aham iti śrotram evam
anyāni karmāṇi yathākarmam tāni mṛtyuḥ śramaḥ bhūtvā upayeme tāni āpnot tāni
āptvā mṛtyuḥ avārundha tasmāt śrāmyati eva vāc śrāmyati cakṣuḥ śrāmyati śrotram
atha imam eva na āpnot yaḥ ayam madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ tāni jñātum dadhrire ayam vai
naḥ śreṣṭhaḥ yaḥ saṃcaran ca a saṃcaran ca na vyathate atho na riṣyati _ asya
eva sarve rūpam bhavāma iti te etasya eva sarve rūpam abhavan tasmāt ete etena
ākhyāyante prāṇāḥ iti tena ha vāva tat kulam ācakṣate yasmin kule bhavati yaḥ
evam veda yaḥ u ha evaṃvidā spardhate anuśuṣyati anuśuṣya ha eva antatas mriyate
iti adhyātmam atha adhidaivatam jvaliṣyāmi eva aham iti agniḥ dadhre tapsyāmi
aham iti ādityaḥ bhāsyāmi aham iti candramāḥ evam anyāḥ devatāḥ yathādevatam saḥ
yathā eṣām prāṇānām madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ evam etāsām devatānām vāyuḥ mlocanti hi
anyāḥ devatāḥ na vāyuḥ sā eṣā an astamitā devatā yat vāyuḥ atha eṣa ślokaḥ
bhavati _ ca udeti sūryaḥ astam _ ca gacchati iti tam devāḥ cakrire dharmam saḥ
eva adya saḥ u śvas iti prāṇāt vai eṣa udeti prāṇe astam eti yat vai ete amurhi
adhriyanta tat eva api adya kurvanti tasmāt ekam eva vratam caret prāṇyāt ca eva
apānyāt ca na id mām pāpmā mṛtyuḥ āpnavat iti _ u caret samāpipayiṣet tena u
etasyai devatāyai sāyujyam salokatām jayati trayam vai idam nāma rūpam karma
teṣām nāmnām vāc iti etat eṣām uktham atas hi sarvāṇi nāmāni uttiṣṭhanti etat
eṣām sām etat hi sarvaiḥ nāmbhiḥ samam etat eṣām brahma etat hi sarvāṇi nāmāni
bibharti atha rūpāṇām cakṣuḥ iti etat eṣām uktham atas hi sarvāṇi rūpāṇi
uttiṣṭhanti etat eṣām sām etat hi sarvaiḥ rūpaiḥ samam etat eṣām brahma etat hi
sarvāṇi rūpāṇi bibharti atha karmaṇām ātmā iti etat eṣām uktham atas hi sarvāṇi
karmāṇi uttiṣṭhanti etat eṣām sām etat hi sarvaiḥ karmabhiḥ samam etat eṣām
brahma etat hi sarvāṇi karmāṇi bibharti tat etat trayam sat ekam ayam ātmā ātmā
u ekaḥ san etat trayam tat etat amṛtam satyena channam prāṇaḥ vai amṛtam _ rūpe
satyam tābhyām ayam prāṇaḥ channaḥ janakaḥ ha vaidehaḥ _ dakṣiṇena yajñena īje
tatra ha _ pañcālānām brāhmaṇāḥ abhisametāḥ babhūvuḥ tasya ha janakasya
vaidehasya vijijñāsā babhūva kaḥ svid eṣām brāhmaṇānām anūcānatamaḥ iti saḥ ha
gavām sahasram avarurodha daśa daśa pādāḥ ekaikasyāḥ śṛṅgayoḥ ābaddhāḥ babhūvuḥ
tān ha uvāca brāhmaṇāḥ bhagavantaḥ yaḥ vaḥ brahmiṣṭhaḥ saḥ etāḥ gāḥ udajatām iti
te ha brāhmaṇāḥ na dadhṛṣuḥ atha ha yājñavalkyaḥ svam eva brahmacāriṇam uvāca
etāḥ saumyaiḥ udaja sāmaśravaḥ iti tāḥ ha udācakāra te ha brāhmaṇāḥ cukrudhuḥ
katham nu naḥ brahmiṣṭhaḥ bruvīta iti atha ha janakasya vaidehasya hotā aśvalaḥ
babhūva saḥ ha enam papraccha tvam nu khalu naḥ yājñavalkyaiḥ brahmiṣṭhaḥ asi
iti saḥ ha uvāca namaḥ vayam brahmiṣṭhāya kurmaḥ go kāmāḥ eva vayam smaḥ iti tam
ha tatas eva praṣṭum dadhre hotā aśvalaḥ yājñavalkyaiḥ iti ha uvāca yat idam
sarvam mṛtyunā āptam sarvam mṛtyunā abhipannam kena yajamānaḥ mṛtyoḥ āptim
atimucyate iti hotrā _ agninā vācā vāc vai yajñasya hotā tat yā iyam vāc saḥ
ayam agniḥ saḥ hotā sā muktiḥ sā atimuktiḥ yājñavalkyaiḥ iti ha uvāca yat idam
sarvam ahar rātrābhyām āptam sarvam ahar rātrābhyām abhipannam kena yajamānaḥ
ahar rātrayoḥ āptim atimucyate iti adhvaryuṇā _ cakṣuṣā ādityena cakṣuḥ vai
yajñasya adhvaryuḥ tat yat idam cakṣuḥ saḥ asau ādityaḥ saḥ adhvaryuḥ sā muktiḥ
sā atimuktiḥ yājñavalkyaiḥ iti ha uvāca yat idam sarvam _ aparapakṣābhyām āptam
sarvam _ aparapakṣābhyām abhipannam kena yajamānaḥ _ aparapakṣayoḥ āptim
atimucyate iti udgātrā _ vāyunā prāṇena prāṇaḥ vai yajñasya udgātā tat yaḥ ayam
prāṇaḥ saḥ vāyuḥ saḥ udgātā saḥ muktiḥ sā atimuktiḥ yājñavalkyaiḥ iti ha uvāca
yat idam antarikṣam an ārambaṇam iva kena ākrameṇa yajamānaḥ svargam lokam
ākramate iti brahmanā _ manasā candreṇa manaḥ vai yajñasya brahmā tat yat idam
manaḥ saḥ asau candraḥ saḥ brahmā saḥ muktiḥ sā atimuktiḥ iti atimokṣāḥ atha
sampadaḥ yājñavalkyaiḥ iti ha uvāca katibhiḥ ayam adya ṛgbhiḥ hotā asmin yajñe
kariṣyati iti tisṛbhiḥ iti katamāḥ tāḥ tisraḥ iti puronuvākyā ca yājyā ca śasyā
eva tṛtīyā kim tābhiḥ jayati iti yat kiṃca idam _ bhṛt iti yājñavalkyaiḥ iti ha
uvāca kati ayam adya adhvaryuḥ asmin yajñe āhutīḥ hoṣyati iti tisraḥ iti katamāḥ
tāḥ tisraḥ iti yāḥ hutāḥ ujjvalanti yāḥ hutāḥ atinedanti yāḥ hutāḥ adhiśerate
kim tābhiḥ jayati iti yāḥ hutāḥ ujjvalanti _ lokam eva tābhiḥ jayati dīpyate iva
hi _ lokaḥ yāḥ hutāḥ atinedante _ lokam eva tābhiḥ jayati atīva hi _ lokaḥ yāḥ
hutāḥ adhiśerate _ lokam eva tābhiḥ jayati adhas iva hi _ lokaḥ yājñavalkyaiḥ
iti ha uvāca katibhiḥ ayam adya brahmā yajñam dakṣiṇatas devatābhiḥ gopāyati iti
ekayā iti katamā sā ekā iti manaḥ eva iti anantam vai manaḥ anantāḥ viśvāḥ devāḥ
anantam eva saḥ tena lokam jayati yājñavalkyaiḥ iti ha uvāca kati ayam adya
udgātā asmin yajñe stotriyāḥ stoṣyati iti tisraḥ iti katamāḥ tāḥ tisraḥ iti
puronuvākyā ca yājyā ca śasyā eva tṛtīyā katamāḥ tāḥ yāḥ adhyātmam iti prāṇaḥ
eva puronuvākyā apānaḥ yājyā vyānaḥ śasyā kim tābhiḥ jayati iti _ lokam eva
puronuvākyayā jayati _ lokam yājyayā dyu lokam śasyayā tatas ha hotā aśvalaḥ
upararāma atha ha enam kaholaḥ kauṣītakeyaḥ papraccha yājñavalkyaiḥ iti ha uvāca
yat eva sākṣāt aparokṣāt brahma yaḥ ātmā _ antaraḥ tam me vyācakṣva iti eṣa te
ātmā _ antaraḥ katamaḥ yājñavalkyaiḥ _ antaraḥ yaḥ _ pipāse śokam moham jarām

upararāma atha ha vācaknavī uvāca brāhmaṇāḥ bhagavantaḥ _ aham imam dvau praśnau
prakṣyāmi tau _ mama vivakṣyati na vai jātu vaḥ imam kaścid brahmodyam jetā iti

yājñavalkyaiḥ _ mām śādhi iti saḥ ha uvāca yathā vai samrāj mahantam adhvānam

āḍhyaḥ san _ vedaḥ _ upaniṣatkaḥ itas vimucyamānaḥ kva gamiṣyasi iti na aham tat
bhagavan veda _ gamiṣyāmi iti atha vai te aham tat vakṣyāmi _ gamiṣyasi iti
bravītu bhagavān iti indhaḥ ha vai nāma eṣa yaḥ ayam dakṣiṇe akṣan puruṣaḥ tam
vai etam indham santam indraḥ iti ācakṣate parokṣeṇa eva _ priyāḥ iva hi devāḥ _
dviṣaḥ atha etat vāme akṣaṇi _ rūpam eṣā asya patnī virāj tayoḥ eṣa saṃstāvaḥ
yaḥ eṣa antar hṛdaye ākāśaḥ atha enayoḥ etat annam yaḥ eṣa antar hṛdaye _ piṇḍaḥ
atha enayoḥ etat prāvaraṇam yat etat antar hṛdaye jālakam iva atha enayoḥ eṣā

etābhiḥ vai etat āsravat āsravati tasmāt eṣa praviviktāhārataraḥ iva bhavati

pratyañc diś pratyañcaḥ prāṇāḥ udañc diś udañcaḥ prāṇāḥ ūrdhvā diś ūrdhvāḥ
prāṇāḥ avāñc diś avāñcaḥ prāṇāḥ sarvāḥ diśaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ saḥ eṣa na iti na iti
ātmā a gṛhyaḥ na hi gṛhyate a śīryaḥ na hi śīryate a saṅgaḥ na hi sajyate a
sitaḥ na vyathate na riṣyati abhayam vai janakaiḥ prāptaḥ asi iti ha uvāca

satyam madhyatas anṛtam tat etat anṛtam ubhayatas satyena parigṛhītam _ bhūyam
eva bhavati na evam vidvasam anṛtam hinasti tad yat tat satyam asau saḥ ādityaḥ
yaḥ eṣa etasmin maṇḍale puruṣaḥ yaḥ ca ayam dakṣiṇe akṣiṇi puruṣaḥ tau etau
anyonyasmin pratiṣṭhitau raśmibhiḥ eṣa asmin pratiṣṭhitaḥ prāṇaiḥ ayam amuṣmin
saḥ _ utkramiṣyan bhavati śuddham eva etat maṇḍalam paśyati na enam ete raśmayaḥ

evam veda yaḥ ayam dakṣiṇe akṣiṇi puruṣaḥ tasya bhūḥ iti śiraḥ ekam śiraḥ ekam
etat akṣaram bhuvar iti bāhū dvau bāhū dve ete akṣare svar iti pratiṣṭhā dve

manasā dhyātum _ bhūyam vai prāṇāḥ bhūtvā eva ekaikam etāni sarvāṇi
prajñāpayanti iti vācam vadatīm sarve prāṇāḥ anuvadanti cakṣuḥ paśyat sarve
prāṇāḥ anupaśyanti śrotram śṛṇvat sarve prāṇāḥ anuśṛṇvanti manaḥ dhyāyat sarve
prāṇāḥ anudhyāyanti prāṇam prāṇantam sarve prāṇāḥ anuprāṇanti evam u ha etat iti
ha indraḥ uvāca asti tu eva prāṇānām niḥśreyasam iti jīvati _ apetaḥ mūkān hi
paśyāmaḥ jīvati _ apetaḥ andhān hi paśyāmaḥ jīvati _ apetaḥ badhirān hi paśyāmaḥ
jīvati _ apetaḥ bālān hi paśyāmaḥ jīvati _ chinnaḥ jīvati _ chinnaḥ iti evam hi
paśyāmaḥ iti atha khalu prāṇaḥ eva _ ātmā idam śarīram parigṛhya utthāpayati
tasmāt etat eva uktham upāsīta iti sā eṣā prāṇe sarvā āptiḥ yaḥ vai prāṇaḥ sā
prajñā yā vai prajñā saḥ prāṇaḥ tasya eṣā eva dṛṣṭiḥ etat vijñānam _ etad
puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnam na kaṃcana paśyati atha asmin prāṇaḥ eva ekadhā bhavati
tad enam vāc sarvaiḥ nāmbhiḥ saha apyeti cakṣuḥ sarvaiḥ rūpaiḥ saha apyeti
śrotram sarvaiḥ śabdaiḥ saha apyeti manaḥ sarvaiḥ dhyānaiḥ saha apyeti saḥ _
pratibudhyate yathā agneḥ jvalataḥ sarvāḥ diśaḥ visphuliṅgāḥ vipratiṣṭheran evam
eva etasmāt ātmanaḥ prāṇāḥ yathāyatanam vipratiṣṭhante prāṇebhyaḥ devāḥ
devebhyaḥ lokāḥ saḥ eṣa prāṇaḥ eva _ ātmā idam śarīram parigṛhya utthāpayati
tasmāt etat eva uktham upāsīta iti sā eṣā prāṇe sarvā āptiḥ yaḥ vai prāṇaḥ sā
prajñā yā vai prajñā saḥ prāṇaḥ tasya eṣā eva siddhiḥ etat vijñānam _ etad
puruṣaḥ ārtaḥ mariṣyan ābalyam etya sammoham eti tam āhuḥ udakramīt cittam na
śṛṇoti na paśyati na vācā vadati na dhyāyati atha asmin prāṇaḥ eva ekadhā
bhavati tad enam vāc sarvaiḥ nāmbhiḥ saha apyeti cakṣuḥ sarvaiḥ rūpaiḥ saha
apyeti śrotram sarvaiḥ śabdaiḥ saha apyeti manaḥ sarvaiḥ dhyānaiḥ saha apyeti
saḥ _ asmāt śarīrāt utkrāmati saha eva etaiḥ sarvaiḥ utkrāmati agnim īḍe
purohitam yajñasya devam ṛtvijam hotāram ratna dhātamam agniḥ pūrvebhiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ
īḍyaḥ nūtanaiḥ uta sa devāṁ ā iha vakṣati agninā rayim aśnavat poṣam eva dive
dive yaśasam vīravattamam agne yam yajñam adhvaram viśvatas paribhūḥ asi saḥ id
deveṣu gacchati agniḥ hotā kavi kratuḥ satyaḥ citraśravastamaḥ devaḥ devebhiḥ ā
gamat yat aṅga dāśuṣe tvam agne bhadram kariṣyasi tava id tat satyam aṅgiraḥ upa
tvā agne dive dive doṣāvastar dhiyā vayam namaḥ bharantaḥ ā imasi rājantam
adhvarāṇām gopām ṛtasya dīdivim vardhamānam sve dame sa naḥ pitā iva sūnave agne
su upāyanaḥ bhava sacasvā naḥ svastaye vāyo ā yāhi darśata ime somāḥ araṃkṛtāḥ
teṣām pāhi śrudhi havam vāyo ukthebhiḥ jarante tvām acchā jaritāraḥ suta somāḥ
ahar vidaḥ prapṛñcatī vāyo tava prapṛñcatī dhenā jigāti dāśuṣe urūcī soma pītaye
indra vāyū ime sutāḥ upa prayobhiḥ ā gatam indavaḥ vām uśanti hi vāyo indraḥ ca
cetathaḥ sutānām vājinī vasū tau ā yātam upa dravat vāyo indraḥ ca sunvataḥ ā
yātam upa niṣkṛtam makṣū itthā dhiyā narā mitram huve pūta dakṣam varuṇam ca
riśādasam dhiyam ghṛtācīm sādhantā ṛtena mitrāvaruṇau ṛtāvṛdhau ṛta spṛśā kratum
bṛhantam āśāthe kavī naḥ mitrāvaruṇā tuvi jātā uru kṣayā dakṣam dadhāte apasam
ketum kṛṇvan aketave peśaḥ maryāḥ apeśase sam uṣadbhiḥ ajāyathāḥ devayantaḥ
yathā matim acchā vidadvasum giraḥ mahām anūṣata śrutam ā indra ūtaye bhara yaḥ
kukṣiḥ soma pātamaḥ samudraḥ iva pinvate urvīḥ āpaḥ na kākudaḥ eva hi asya
sūnṛtā virapśī gomatī mahī pakvā śākhā na dāśuṣe vṛṇīmahe indra somam piba ṛtunā
tvā viśantu indavaḥ matsarāsaḥ tad okasaḥ marutaḥ pibata ṛtunā potrāt yajñam
punītana yūyam hi sudānavaḥ abhi yajñam gṛṇīhi naḥ gnāvas neṣṭar piba ṛtunā tvam
hi ratna dhāḥ asi agne devāṁ iha ā vaha sādaya yoniṣu triṣu pari bhūṣa piba
ṛtunā brāhmaṇāt indra rādhasaḥ piba somam ṛtūṃr anu tava id hi sakhyam astṛtam
yuvam dakṣam dhṛta vrata mitrāvaruṇa dūḍabham ṛtunā yajñam āśāthe draviṇaḥ dāḥ
draviṇasaḥ grāva hastāsaḥ adhvare yajñeṣu devam īḍate draviṇaḥ dāḥ dadātu naḥ
vasūni yāni śṛṇvire deveṣu tā vanāmahe draviṇaḥ dāḥ pipīṣati juhota pra ca
tiṣṭhata neṣṭrāt ṛtubhiḥ iṣyata yat tvā turīyam ṛtubhiḥ draviṇaḥ daḥ yajāmahe
adha sma naḥ dadiḥ bhava aśvinā pibatam madhu dīdi agnī śuci vratā ṛtunā yajña
vāhasā gārhapatyena santya ṛtunā yajñanīḥ asi devān devayate yaja ā tvā vahantu
harayaḥ vṛṣaṇam soma pītaye indra tvā sūra cakṣasaḥ imāḥ dhānāḥ ghṛtasnuvaḥ harī
iha upa vakṣataḥ indram sukhatame rathe indram prātar havāmahe indram prayati
adhvare indram somasya pītaye upa naḥ sutam ā gahi haribhiḥ indra keśibhiḥ sute
hi tvā havāmahe sa imam na stomam ā gahi upa idam savanam sutam gauraḥ na
tṛṣitaḥ piba ime somāsaḥ indavaḥ sutāsaḥ adhi barhiṣi tāṁ indra sahase piba ayam
te stomaḥ agriyaḥ hṛdispṛś astu śantamaḥ athā somam sutam piba viśvam id savanam
sutam indraḥ madāya gacchati vṛtrahā soma pītaye sa imam naḥ kāmam ā pṛṇa gobhiḥ
aśvaiḥ śatakrato stavāma tvā su ādhyaḥ idam viṣṇuḥ vi cakrame tredhā ni dadhe
padam samūḍham asya pāṃsure trīṇi padā vi cakrame viṣṇuḥ gopāḥ adābhyaḥ atas
dharmāṇi dhārayan viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi paśyata yatas vratāni paspaśe indrasya yujyaḥ
sakhā tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ divi iva cakṣuḥ ātatam tat
viprāsaḥ vipanyavaḥ jāgṛvāṃsaḥ sam indhate viṣṇoḥ yat paramam padam indra vāyū
manaḥ juvā viprāḥ havante ūtaye sahasra akṣā dhiyas patī hata vṛtram sudānavaḥ
indreṇa sahasā yujā mā naḥ duḥśaṃsaḥ īśata viśvān devān havāmahe marutaḥ soma
pītaye ugrāḥ hi pṛśni mātaraḥ ā pūṣan citra barhiṣam āghṛṇe dharuṇam divaḥ ājā
naṣṭam yathā paśum yat cit hi te viśaḥ yathā pra deva varuṇa vratam minīmasi
dyavi dyavi mā naḥ vadhāya hatnave jihīḍānasya rīradhaḥ mā hṛṇānasya manyave vi
mṛḍīkāya te manaḥ rathīḥ aśvam na saṃditam gīrbhiḥ varuṇa sīmahi parā hi me
vimanyavaḥ patanti vasyaḥ iṣṭaye vayaḥ na vasatīḥ upa parā me yanti dhītayaḥ
gāvaḥ na gavyūtīḥ anu icchantīḥ uru cakṣasam ā naḥ barhiḥ riśādasaḥ varuṇaḥ
mitraḥ aryamā sīdantu manuṣaḥ yathā aśvam na tvā vāravantam vandadhyai agnim
namobhiḥ saṃrājantam adhvarāṇām yatra grāvā pṛthu budhnaḥ ūrdhvaḥ bhavati sotave
ulūkhala sutānām ava id u indra jalgulaḥ ā vaḥ indram krivim yathā vājayantaḥ
śatakratum maṃhiṣṭham siñce indubhiḥ śatam vā yaḥ śucīnām sahasram vā samāśirām
ā id u nimnam na rīyate sam yat madāya śuṣmiṇaḥ enā hi asya udare samudraḥ na
vyacaḥ dadhe indrasya nu vīryāṇi pra vocam yāni cakāra prathamāni vajrī ahan
ahim anu apaḥ tatarda pra vakṣaṇāḥ abhinat parvatānām ahan ahim parvate
śiśriyāṇam tvaṣṭā asmai vajram svaryam tatakṣa vāśrāḥ iva dhenavaḥ syandamānāḥ
añjas samudram ava jagmuḥ āpaḥ vṛṣāyamāṇaḥ avṛṇīta somam trikadrukeṣu apibat
sutasya ā sāyakam maghavā adatta vajram ahan enam prathama jām ahīnām yat indra
ahan prathama jām ahīnām āt māyinām amināḥ pra uta māyāḥ āt sūryam janayan dyām
tādītnā śatrum na kilā vivitse ahan vṛtram vṛtrataram vyaṃsam indraḥ vajreṇa
mahatā vadhena skandhāṃsi iva kuliśenā vivṛkṇā ahiḥ śayate upapṛc pṛthivyāḥ
ayoddhā iva durmadaḥ ā hi juhve mahā vīram tuvi bādham ṛjīṣam na atārīt asya
samṛtim vadhānām sam rujānāḥ pipiṣe indra śatruḥ a pād a hastaḥ apṛtanyat indram
ā asya vajram adhi sānau jaghāna vṛṣṇaḥ vadhriḥ pratimānam bubhūṣan purutrā
vṛtraḥ aśayat vyastaḥ nadam na bhinnam śayānam manoḥ ruhāṇāḥ ati yanti āpaḥ yāḥ
cit vṛtraḥ mahinā paryatiṣṭhat tāsām ahiḥ patsutaḥśīḥ babhūva nīcāvayāḥ abhavat
vṛtra putrā indraḥ asyāḥ ava vadhar jabhāra uttarā sūḥ adharaḥ putraḥ āsīt dānuḥ
śaye saha vatsā na dhenuḥ saha vatsā na a tiṣṭhantīnām a niveśanānām kāṣṭhānām
madhye nihitam śarīram vṛtrasya niṇyam vi caranti āpaḥ dīrgham tamaḥ āśayat
indra śatruḥ dāsa patnīḥ ahi gopāḥ atiṣṭhan niruddhāḥ āpaḥ paṇinā iva gāvaḥ apām
bilam apihitam yat āsīt vṛtram jaghanvāṁ apa tat vavāra aśvyaḥ vāraḥ abhavaḥ tat
indra sṛke yat tvā pratyahan devaḥ ekaḥ ajayaḥ gāḥ ajayaḥ śūra somam avāsṛjaḥ
sartave sapta sindhūn na asmai vidyut na tanyatuḥ siṣedha na yām miham akirat
hrādunim ca indraḥ ca yat yuyudhāte ahiḥ ca uta aparībhyaḥ maghavā vi jigye aheḥ
yātāram kam apaśyaḥ indra hṛdi yat te jaghnuṣaḥ bhīḥ agacchat nava ca yat
navatim ca sravantīḥ śyenaḥ na bhītaḥ ataraḥ rajāṃsi indraḥ rājā vajra bāhuḥ sa
id u rājā kṣayati carṣaṇīnām arān na nemiḥ pari tāḥ babhūva sam vajreṇa asṛjat
vṛtram indraḥ pra svām matim atirat śāśadānaḥ tris aśvinā sindhubhiḥ sapta
mātṛbhiḥ trayaḥ āhāvāḥ tredhā haviṣ kṛtam tisraḥ pṛthivīḥ upari pravā divaḥ
nākam rakṣethe dyubhiḥ aktubhiḥ hitam hvayāmi agnim prathamam svastaye hvayāmi
mitrāvaruṇau iha avase hvayāmi rātrīm jagataḥ niveśanīm hvayāmi devam savitāram
ūtaye ā kṛṣṇena rajasā vartamānaḥ niveśayan amṛtam martyam ca hiraṇyayena savitā
rathena ā devaḥ yāti bhuvanāni paśyan yāti devaḥ pravatā yāti udvatā yāti
śubhrābhyām yajataḥ haribhyām ā devaḥ yāti savitā parāvataḥ apa viśvā duritā
bādhamānaḥ tisraḥ dyāvaḥ savituḥ dvau upasthāṁ ekā yamasya bhuvane virāṣāṭ āṇim
na rathyam amṛtā adhi tasthuḥ iha bravītu yaḥ u tat ciketat aṣṭau vi akhyat
kakubhaḥ pṛthivyāḥ trī dhanva yojanā sapta sindhūn hiraṇya akṣaḥ savitā devaḥ
āgāt dadhat ratnā dāśuṣe vāryāṇi kad ha nūnam pitā putram na hastayoḥ dadhidhve
vṛkta barhiṣaḥ kva kad vaḥ artham ganta divaḥ na pṛthivyāḥ kva vaḥ gāvaḥ na
raṇyanti kva vaḥ sumnā navyāṃsi marutaḥ kva suvitā kva u viśvāni saubhagā yat
yūyam pṛśni mātaraḥ martāsaḥ syātana stotā vaḥ amṛtaḥ syāt vāśrā iva vidyut
mimāti vatsam na mātā siṣakti yat eṣām vṛṣṭiḥ asarji acchā vada tanā
brahmaṇaspatim agnim mitram na darśatam mimīhi ślokam āsye parjanyaḥ iva tatanaḥ
gāya gāyatram ukthyam vandasva mārutam gaṇam tveṣam panasyum arkiṇam asme
vṛddhāḥ asan iha ā vaḥ makṣū tanāya kam rudrāḥ avaḥ vṛṇīmahe gantā nūnam naḥ
avasā yathā purā itthā kaṇvāya bibhyuṣe asāmi ojaḥ bibhṛthā sudānavaḥ asāmi
dhūtayaḥ śavaḥ ṛṣi dviṣe marutaḥ parimanyavaḥ iṣum na sṛjata dviṣam kad rudrāya
pracetase mīḍhuṣṭamāya tavyase vocema śantamam hṛde yathā naḥ aditiḥ karat paśve
nṛbhyaḥ yathā gave yathā tokāya rudriyam yathā naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ yathā rudraḥ
ciketati yathā viśve sajoṣasaḥ yaḥ śukraḥ iva sūryaḥ hiraṇyam iva rocate
śreṣṭhaḥ devānām vasuḥ śam naḥ karati arvate sugam meṣāya meṣye nṛbhyaḥ
nāribhyaḥ gave asme soma śriyam adhi ni dhehi śatasya nṛṇām mahi śravaḥ tuvi
nṛmṇam yat devānām mitra mahaḥ purohitaḥ antaraḥ yāsi dūtyam sindhoḥ iva
prasvanitāsaḥ ūrmayaḥ agneḥ bhrājante arcayaḥ ayam vām madhumattamaḥ sutaḥ somaḥ
ṛtāvṛdhā tam aśvinā pibatam tiroahnyam dhattam ratnāni dāśuṣe tri vandhureṇa
trivṛtā su peśasā rathena ā yātam aśvinā ud u tyam jātavedasam devam vahanti
ketavaḥ dṛśe viśvāya sūryam apa tāyavaḥ yathā yanti aktubhiḥ sūrāya viśva
cakṣase adṛśram asya ketavaḥ vi raśmayaḥ janāṁ anu bhrājantaḥ agnayaḥ yathā
taraṇiḥ viśva darśataḥ jyotiṣkṛt asi sūrya viśvam ā bhāsi rocanam pratyaṅ
devānām viśaḥ pratyaṅ ud eṣi mānuṣān pratyaṅ viśvam svar dṛśe yenā pāvaka
cakṣasā bhuraṇyantam janāṁ anu tvam varuṇa paśyasi vi dyām eṣi rajas pṛthū ahā
mimānaḥ aktubhiḥ paśyan janmāni sūrya sapta tvā haritaḥ rathe vahanti deva sūrya
śociṣkeśam vicakṣaṇa ayukta sapta śundhyuvaḥ rathasya naptyaḥ tābhiḥ yāti sva
yuktibhiḥ ud vayam tamasas pari jyotiṣ paśyantaḥ uttaram devam devatrā sūryam
aganma jyotiḥ uttamam udyan adya ārohan uttarām divam hṛd rogam mama sūrya
harimāṇam ca nāśaya śukeṣu me harimāṇam ropaṇākāsu dadhmasi atha u hāridraveṣu
me harimāṇam ni dadhmasi ud agāt ayam ādityaḥ viśvena sahasā saha dviṣantam
mahyam randhayan mā u aham dviṣate radham tvam māyābhiḥ apa māyinaḥ adhamaḥ
svadhābhiḥ ye adhi śuptau ajuhvata tvam piproḥ nṛmaṇaḥ prārujaḥ puraḥ pra
ṛjiśvānam dasyu hatyeṣu āvitha tyam su meṣam mahayā svar vidam śatam yasya su
bhvaḥ sākam īrate atyam na vājam havanasyadam ratham ā indram vavṛtyām avase
suvṛktibhiḥ ā yam pṛṇanti divi sadma barhiṣaḥ samudram na su bhvaḥ svāḥ
abhiṣṭayaḥ tam vṛtra hatye anu tasthuḥ ūtayaḥ śuṣmāḥ indram avātāḥ ahrutapsavaḥ
sa śevṛdham adhi dhāḥ dyumnam asme mahi kṣatram janāṣāh indra tavyam rakṣā ca
naḥ maghonaḥ pāhi sūrīn rāye ca naḥ su apatyā iṣe dhāḥ eṣa tasya camriṣaḥ atyaḥ
na yoṣām ud ayaṃsta bhurvaṇiḥ dakṣam mahe pāyayate hiraṇyayam ratham āvṛtyā hari
yogam ṛbhvasam tam gūrtayaḥ nemanniṣaḥ parīṇasaḥ samudram na saṃcaraṇe
saniṣyavaḥ patim dakṣasya vidathasya nū sahaḥ girim na venāḥ adhi roha tejasā
devī yadi taviṣī tvāvṛdhā ūtaye indram siṣakti uṣasam na sūryaḥ yaḥ dhṛṣṇunā
śavasā bādhate tamaḥ iyarti reṇum bṛhat arhariṣvaṇiḥ nū cit sahaḥ jāḥ amṛtaḥ ni
tundate hotā yat dūtaḥ abhavat vivasvataḥ vi sādhiṣṭhebhiḥ pathibhiḥ rajaḥ mame
ā devatātā haviṣā vivāsati ā svam adma yuvamānaḥ ajaraḥ tṛṣū aviṣyan ataseṣu
tiṣṭhati atyaḥ na pṛṣṭham pruṣitasya rocate divaḥ na sānu stanayan acikradat
krāṇā rudrebhiḥ vasubhiḥ purohitaḥ hotā niṣattaḥ rayiṣāh amartyaḥ rathaḥ na
vikṣu ṛñjasānaḥ āyuṣu vi ānuṣak vāryā devaḥ ṛṇvati vi vāta jūtaḥ ataseṣu
tiṣṭhate vṛthā juhūbhiḥ sṛṇyā tuviṣvaṇiḥ tṛṣu yat agne vaninaḥ vṛṣāyase kṛṣṇam
te ema ruśat ūrme ajara tapuḥ jambhaḥ vane ā vāta coditaḥ yūthe na sāhvāṁ ava
vāti vaṃsagaḥ abhivrajan akṣitam pājasā raja sthātuḥ caratham bhayate patatriṇaḥ
dadhuḥ ṭvā bhṛgavaḥ mānuṣeṣu ā rayim na cārum su havam janebhyaḥ hotāram agne
atithim vareṇyam mitram na śevam divyāya janmane hotāram sapta juhvaḥ yajiṣṭham
yam vāghataḥ vṛṇate adhvareṣu agnim viśveṣām aratim vasūnām saparyāmi prayasā
yāmi ratnam acchidrā sūno sahasaḥ naḥ adya stotṛbhyaḥ mitra mahas śarma yaccha
agne gṛṇantam aṃhasaḥ uruṣyā ūrjaḥ napāt pūrbhiḥ āyasībhiḥ bhava varūtham gṛṇate
vibhāvaḥ bhavā maghavan maghavadbhyaḥ śarma uruṣya agne aṃhasaḥ gṛṇantam prātar
makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt vayāḥ id agne agnayaḥ te anye tve viśve amṛtāḥ
mādayante vaiśvānara nābhiḥ asi kṣitīnām sthūṇā iva janāṁ upamit yayantha mūrdhā
divaḥ nābhiḥ agniḥ pṛthivyāḥ athā bhavat aratiḥ rodasyoḥ tam tvā devāsaḥ
ajanayanta devam vaiśvānara jyotiḥ id āryāya ā sūrye na raśmayaḥ dhruvāsaḥ
vaiśvānare dadhire agnā vasūni yā parvateṣu oṣadhīṣu apsu yā mānuṣeṣu asi tasya
rājā bṛhatī iva sūnave rodasī giraḥ hotā manuṣyaḥ na dakṣaḥ svarvate satya
śuṣmāya pūrvīḥ vaiśvānarāya nṛtamāya yahvīḥ divaḥ cit te bṛhataḥ jātavedaḥ
vaiśvānara pra ririce mahi tvam rājā kṛṣṭīnām asi mānuṣīṇām yudhā devebhyaḥ
varivaḥ cakartha pra nū mahi tvam vṛṣabhasya vocam yam pūravaḥ vṛtra haṇam
sacante vaiśvānaraḥ dasyum agniḥ jaghanvāṁ adhūnot kāṣṭhāḥ ava śambaram bhet
vaiśvānaraḥ mahimnā viśva kṛṣṭiḥ bharadvājeṣu yajataḥ vibhāvā śātavaneye
śatinībhiḥ agniḥ puruṇīthe jarate sūnṛtāvān asmai id u stomam sam hinomi ratham
na taṣṭā iva tatsināya giraḥ ca girvāhase suvṛktī indrāya viśvaminvam medhirāya
asmai id u saptim iva śravasyā indrāya arkam juhvā sam añje vīram dāna okasam
vandadhyai purām gūrta śravasam darmāṇam asya id eva śavasā śuṣantam vi vṛścat
vajreṇa vṛtram indraḥ gāḥ na vrāṇāḥ avanīḥ amuñcat abhi śravaḥ dāvane sacetāḥ
asmai id u pra bhara tūtujānaḥ vṛtrāya vajram īśānaḥ kiyedhāḥ goḥ na parva vi
rada tiraścā iṣyan arṇāṃsi apām caradhyai tvam tyām naḥ indra deva citrām iṣam
āpaḥ na pīpayaḥ parijman yayā śūra prati asmabhyam yaṃsi tmanam ūrjam na
viśvadha kṣaradhyai akāri te indra gotamebhiḥ brahmāṇi oktā namasā haribhyām su
peśasam vājam ā bhara naḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt te jajñire divaḥ
ṛṣvāsaḥ ukṣaṇaḥ rudrasya maryāḥ asurāḥ arepasaḥ pāvakāsaḥ śucayaḥ sūryāḥ iva
satvānaḥ na drapsinaḥ ghora varpasaḥ yuvānaḥ rudrāḥ ajarāḥ abhoj hanaḥ vavakṣuḥ
parvatāḥ iva dṛḍhā cit viśvā bhuvanāni pārthivā pra cyāvayanti divyāni majmanā
citraiḥ añjibhiḥ vapuṣe vi añjate vakṣassu rukmāṁ adhi yetire śubhe aṃseṣu eṣām
ni mimṛkṣuḥ ṛṣṭayaḥ sākam jajñire svadhayā divaḥ naraḥ īśāna kṛtaḥ dhunayaḥ
riśādasaḥ vātān vidyutaḥ taviṣībhiḥ akrata duhanti ūdhar divyāni dhūtayaḥ bhūmim
pinvanti payasā parijrayaḥ pinvanti apaḥ marutaḥ sudānavaḥ payaḥ ghṛtavat
vidatheṣu ābhuvaḥ atyam na mihe vi nayanti vājinam utsam duhanti stanayantam a
kṣitam atyaḥ na ajman sarga prataktaḥ sindhuḥ na kaḥ īm varāte rayiḥ na citrā
sūraḥ na saṃdṛś āyuḥ na prāṇaḥ nityaḥ na sūnuḥ takvā na bhūrṇiḥ vanā siṣakti
payaḥ na dhenuḥ śuciḥ vibhāvā dādhāra kṣemam okaḥ na raṇvaḥ yavaḥ na pakvaḥ jetā
janānām ṛṣiḥ na stubhvā vikṣu praśastaḥ vājī na prītaḥ vayaḥ dadhāti citraḥ yat
abhrāṭ chvetaḥ na vikṣu rathaḥ na rukmī tveṣaḥ samatsu senā iva sṛṣṭā amam
dadhāti astuḥ didyut tveṣa pratīkā yamaḥ ha jātaḥ yamaḥ janitvam jāraḥ kanīnām
patiḥ janīnām tam vaḥ vayam vasatyā astam na gāvaḥ nakṣante iddham sindhuḥ na
kṣodaḥ pra nīcīḥ ainot navanta gāvaḥ svar dṛśīke pituḥ na putrāḥ kratum juṣanta
śroṣan ye asya śāsam turāsaḥ vedhāḥ a dṛptaḥ agniḥ vijānan ūdhar na gonām svādmā
pitūnām putraḥ na jātaḥ raṇvaḥ duroṇe vājī na prītaḥ viśaḥ vi tārīt uṣaḥ na
jāraḥ vibhāvā usraḥ saṃjñāta rūpaḥ ciketat asmai tmanā vahantaḥ duraḥ vi ṛṇvan
navanta viśve svar dṛśīke vi tvā naraḥ purutrā saparyan pituḥ na jivreḥ vi vedaḥ
bharanta upa pra jinvan uśatīḥ uśantam patim na nityam janayaḥ sanīḍāḥ svasāraḥ
śyāvīm aruṣīm ajuṣran citram ucchantīm uṣasam na gāvaḥ agnim viśvāḥ abhi pṛkṣaḥ
sacante samudram na sravataḥ sapta yahvīḥ na jāmibhiḥ vi cikite vayaḥ naḥ vidāḥ
deveṣu pramatim cikitvān devaḥ na yaḥ pṛthivīm upakṣeti hita mitraḥ na rājā
puraḥsadaḥ śarma sadaḥ na vīrāḥ anavadyā pati juṣṭā iva nārī tam tvā naraḥ dame
ā nityam iddham agne sacanta kṣitiṣu dhruvāsu kā te upetiḥ manasaḥ varāya bhuvat
agne śantamā kā manīṣā kaḥ vā yajñaiḥ pari dakṣam te āpa kena vā te manasā
dāśema ehi agne iha hotā ni ṣīda adabdhaḥ su puraetā bhava naḥ avatām tvā rodasī
viśvaminve yaja mahe saumanasāya devān pra su viśvān rakṣasaḥ dhakṣi agne bhava
yajñānām abhiśasti pāvā atha ā vaha soma patim haribhyām ātithyam asmai cakṛma
su dāvne prajāvatā vacasā vahniḥ āsā ca huve ni ca satsi iha devaiḥ veṣi hotram
uta potram yajatra bodhi prayantar janitar vasūnām yathā viprasya manuṣaḥ
havirbhiḥ devāṁ ayajaḥ kavibhiḥ kaviḥ san eva hotar satyatara tvam adya agne
mandrayā juhvā yajasva sa hi kratuḥ sa maryaḥ sa sādhuḥ mitraḥ na bhūt
adbhutasya rathīḥ tam medheṣu prathamam devayantīḥ viśaḥ upa bruvate dasmam ārīḥ
aśvāvati prathamaḥ goṣu gacchati su prāvīḥ indra martyaḥ tava ūtibhiḥ tam id
pṛṇakṣi vasunā bhavīyasā sindhum āpaḥ yathā abhitas vicetasaḥ āpaḥ na devīḥ upa
yanti hotriyam avas paśyanti vitatam yathā rajaḥ prācais devāsaḥ pra ṇayanti
devayum brahma priyam joṣayante varāḥ iva asāvi somaḥ indra te śaviṣṭha dhṛṣṇo ā
gahi ā tvā pṛṇaktu indriyam rajaḥ sūryaḥ na raśmibhiḥ indram id harī vahataḥ a
pratidhṛṣṭa śavasam ṛṣīṇām ca stutīḥ upa yajñam ca mānuṣāṇām ā tiṣṭha vṛtrahan
ratham yuktā te brahmaṇā harī arvācīnam su te manaḥ grāvā kṛṇotu vagnunā
pratvakṣasaḥ pratavasaḥ virapśinaḥ an ānatāḥ a vithurāḥ ṛjīṣiṇaḥ juṣṭatamāsaḥ
nṛtamāsaḥ añjibhiḥ vi ānajre kecid usrāḥ iva stṛbhiḥ rājñaḥ nu te varuṇasya
vratāni bṛhat gabhīram tava soma dhāma śuciḥ ṭvam asi priyaḥ na mitraḥ dakṣāyyaḥ
aryama iva asi soma soma rārandhi naḥ hṛdi gāvaḥ na yavaseṣu ā maryaḥ iva sve
okye yaḥ soma sakhye tava rāraṇat deva martyaḥ tam dakṣaḥ sacate kaviḥ uruṣyā
ṇaḥ abhiśasteḥ soma ni pāhi aṃhasaḥ sakhā su śevaḥ edhi naḥ ā pyāyasva sam etu
te viśvatas soma vṛṣṇyam bhavāḥ vājasya saṃgathe adhi peśāṃsi vapate nṛtūḥ iva
aporṇute vakṣaḥ usrā iva barjaham jyotiḥ viśvasmai bhuvanāya kṛṇvatī gāvaḥ na
vrajam vi uṣāḥ āvaḥ tamaḥ paśūn na citrā subhagā prathānā sindhuḥ na kṣodaḥ
urviyā vi aśvait a minatī daivyāni vratāni sūryasya ceti raśmibhiḥ dṛśānā imam
stomam arhate jātavedase ratham iva sam mahemā manīṣayā bhadrā hi naḥ pramatiḥ
asya saṃsadi agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava yasmai tvam āyajase sa sādhati
anarvā kṣeti dadhate su vīryam sa tūtāva nā enam aśnoti aṃhatiḥ agne sakhye mā
riṣāmā vayam tava ubhe bhadre joṣayete na mene gāvaḥ na vāśrāḥ upa tasthuḥ evaiḥ
sa dakṣāṇām dakṣa patiḥ babhūva añjanti yam dakṣiṇatas havirbhiḥ ud yaṃyamīti
savitā iva bāhū ubhe sicau yatate bhīmaḥ ṛñjan ud śukram atkam ajate simasmāt
navā mātṛbhyaḥ vasanā jahāti vaiśvānarasya sumatau syāma rājā hi kam bhuvanānām
abhiśrīḥ itas jātaḥ viśvam idam vi caṣṭe vaiśvānaraḥ yatate sūryeṇa pṛṣṭaḥ divi
pṛṣṭaḥ agniḥ pṛthivyām pṛṣṭaḥ viśvāḥ oṣadhīḥ ā viveśa vaiśvānaraḥ sahasā pṛṣṭaḥ
agniḥ sa naḥ divā sa riṣaḥ pātu naktam vaiśvānara tava tat satyam astu asmān
rāyaḥ maghavānaḥ sacantām tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ
pṛthivī uta dyauḥ go jitā bāhū amita kratuḥ simaḥ karman karman śatamūtiḥ
khajaṅkaraḥ arvāṅ ehi soma kāmam tvā āhuḥ ayam sutaḥ tasya pibā madāya jaṭhare ā
vṛṣasva pitā iva naḥ śṛṇuhi hūyamānaḥ tā hi adrī dhiṣaṇāyāḥ upasthe dyubhiḥ
aktubhiḥ pari pātam asmān ariṣṭebhiḥ aśvinā saubhagebhiḥ tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ
māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ idam śreṣṭham jyotiṣām jyotiḥ āgāt
citraḥ praketaḥ ajaniṣṭa vibhvā evā rātrī uṣase yonim āraik janaḥ yaḥ
mitrāvaruṇau abhidruh apaḥ na vām sunoti akṣṇayā druh svayam sa yakṣmam hṛdaye
ni dhatte āpa yat īm hotrābhiḥ ṛtāvā dṛﾱhā cit asmai anu duḥ yathā vide
tejiṣṭhābhiḥ araṇibhiḥ dāṣṭi avase agnaye dāṣṭi avase pra yaḥ purūṇi gāhate
takṣat vanā iva śociṣā sthirā cit annā ni riṇāti ojasā ni sthirāṇi cit ojasā
viśvāsām tvā viśām patim havāmahe sarvāsām samānam dampatim bhuje satya gir
vāhasam bhuje atithim mānuṣāṇām pituḥ pituḥ na na yasya āsayā amī ca viśve
amṛtāsaḥ ā vayaḥ havyā deveṣu ā vayaḥ yam tvam ratham indra medha sātaye apākā
santam iṣira praṇayasi pra anavadya nayasi sadyas cit tam abhiṣṭaye karaḥ vaśaḥ
ca vājinam sa śrudhi yaḥ smā pṛtanāsu kāsu cit dakṣāyyaḥ indra bhara hūtaye
nṛbhiḥ asi pratūrtaye nṛbhiḥ yaḥ śūraiḥ svar sanitā yaḥ vipraiḥ vājam tarutā tam
īśānāsaḥ iradhanta vājinam pṛkṣam atyam na vājinam ni su nama atimatim kayasya
cit tejiṣṭhābhiḥ araṇibhiḥ nā ūtibhiḥ ugrābhiḥ ugra ūtibhiḥ neṣi naḥ yathā purā
anenāḥ śūra manyase viśvāni pūroḥ apa parṣi vahniḥ āsā vahniḥ naḥ accha tvam naḥ
indra rāyā tarūṣasā ugram cit tvā mahimā sakṣat avase mahe mitram na avase
ojiṣṭha trātar avitā ratham kam cit amartya anyam asmat ririṣeḥ kam cit adrivas
ā indra yāhi upa naḥ parāvataḥ nāyam acchā vidathāni iva sat patiḥ astam astam
rājā iva sat patiḥ havāmahe tvā vayam prayasvantaḥ sute sacā putrāsaḥ na pitaram
vājasātaye vājasātaye maṃhiṣṭham vājasātaye pibā somam indra suvānam adribhiḥ
kośena siktam avatam na vaṃsagaḥ tātṛṣāṇaḥ na vaṃsagaḥ madāya haryatāya te
tuviṣṭamāya dhāyase ā tvā yacchantu haritaḥ na sūryam ahā viśvā iva sūryam
avindat divaḥ nihitam guhā nidhim veḥ na garbham parivītam aśmani anante antar
aśmani vrajam vajrī gavām iva siṣāsan aṅgirastamaḥ apāvṛṇot iṣaḥ indraḥ
parīvṛtāḥ dvāraḥ iṣaḥ parīvṛtāḥ dādṛhāṇaḥ vajram indraḥ gabhastyoḥ kṣadma iva
tigmam asanāya sam śyat ahi hatyāya sam śyat saṃvivyānaḥ ojasā śavobhiḥ indra
majmanā taṣṭā iva vṛkṣam vaninaḥ ni vṛścasi paraśvā iva ni vṛścasi tvam vṛthā
nadyaḥ indra sartave acchā samudram asṛjaḥ rathāṁ iva vājayataḥ rathāṁ iva itas
ūtīḥ ayuñjata samānam artham akṣitam dhenūḥ iva manave viśva dohasaḥ janāya
viśva dohasaḥ imām te vācam vasūyantaḥ āyavaḥ ratham na dhīraḥ su apāḥ atakṣiṣuḥ
sumnāya tvām atakṣiṣuḥ śumbhantaḥ jenyam yathā vājeṣu vipra vājinam atyam iva
śavase sātaye dhanā viśvā dhanāni sātaye bhinat puraḥ navatim indra pūrave
divodāsāya mahi dāśuṣe nṛto vajreṇa dāśuṣe nṛto atithigvāya śambaram gireḥ ugraḥ
avābharat dhanāni dayamānaḥ ojasā viśvā dhanāni ojasā indraḥ samatsu yajamānam
āryam prāvat viśveṣu śatamūtiḥ ājiṣu svarmīﾱheṣu ājiṣu manave śāsat avratān
tvacam kṛṣṇām arandhayat dakṣan na viśvam tatṛṣāṇam oṣati ni arśasānam oṣati
sūraḥ cakram pra vṛhat jātaḥ ojasā prapitve vācam aruṇaḥ muṣāyati īśānaḥ ā
muṣāyati yat parāvataḥ ajagan ūtaye kave sumnāni viśvā manuṣā iva turvaṇiḥ ahā
viśvā iva turvaṇiḥ sa naḥ navyebhiḥ vṛṣa karman ukthaiḥ purām dartar pāyubhiḥ
pāhi śagmaiḥ divodāsebhiḥ indra stavānaḥ vāvṛdhīthāḥ ahobhiḥ iva dyauḥ ahan
indraḥ yathā vide śīrṣṇā śīrṣṇā upavācyaḥ ā vām dhiyaḥ vavṛtyuḥ adhvarāṁ upa
imam indum marmṛjanta vājinam āśum atyam na vājinam teṣām pibatam asmayū ā naḥ
gantam iha ūtyā indra vāyū sutānām adribhiḥ yuvam madāya vāja dā yuvam ime vām
somāḥ apsu ā sutāḥ iha adhvaryubhiḥ bharamāṇāḥ ayaṃsata vāyo śukrāḥ ayaṃsata ime
ye te su vāyo bāhu ojasaḥ antar nadī te patayanti ukṣaṇaḥ mahi vrādhanta ukṣaṇaḥ
dhanvan cit ye anāśavaḥ jīrāḥ cit agira okasaḥ sūryasya iva raśmayaḥ
durniyantavaḥ hastayoḥ durniyantavaḥ pra hi tvā pūṣan ajiram na yāmani stomebhiḥ
kṛṇve ṛṇavaḥ yathā mṛdhaḥ uṣṭraḥ na pīparaḥ mṛdhaḥ huve yat tvā mayobhuvam devam
sakhyāya martyaḥ asmākam āṅgūṣān dyumninaḥ kṛdhi vājeṣu dyumninaḥ kṛdhi āt id
hotāram vṛṇate diviṣṭiṣu bhagam iva papṛcānāsaḥ ṛñjate rathaḥ na yātaḥ śikvabhiḥ
kṛtaḥ dyām aṅgebhiḥ aruṣebhiḥ īyate samiddhaḥ agne ā vaha devāṁ adya yata sruce
tantum tanuṣva pūrvyam suta somāya dāśuṣe sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyomani āvis agniḥ
abhavat mātariśvane asya kratvā samidhānasya majmanā pra dyāvā śociḥ pṛthivī
arocayat asya tveṣāḥ ajarāḥ asya bhānavaḥ su saṃdṛśaḥ su pratīkasya su dyutaḥ
bhā tvakṣasaḥ ati aktuḥ na sindhavaḥ agneḥ rejante a sasantaḥ ajarāḥ yam erire
bhṛgavaḥ viśva vedasam nābhā pṛthivyāḥ bhuvanasya majmanā agnim tam gīrbhiḥ
hinuhi sve ā dame yaḥ ekaḥ vasvaḥ varuṇaḥ na rājati na yaḥ varāya marutām iva
svanaḥ senā iva sṛṣṭā divyā yathā aśaniḥ agniḥ jambhaiḥ tigitaiḥ atti bharvati
yodhaḥ na śatrūn sa vanā ni ṛñjate kuvid naḥ agniḥ ucathasya vīḥ asat vasuḥ
kuvid vasubhiḥ kāmam āvarat ghṛta pratīkam vaḥ ṛtasya dhūrṣadam agnim mitram na
samidhānaḥ ṛñjate indhānaḥ akraḥ vidatheṣu dīdyat śukra varṇām ud u naḥ yaṃsate
dhiyam eti pra hotā vratam asya māyayā ūrdhvām dadhānaḥ śuci peśasam dhiyam abhi
srucaḥ kramate dakṣiṇa āvṛtaḥ yāḥ asya dhāma prathamam ha niṃsate tam īm
hinvanti dhītayaḥ daśa vriśaḥ devam martāsaḥ ūtaye havāmahe dhanoḥ adhi pravataḥ
ā saḥ ṛṇvati abhivrajadbhiḥ vayunā navā adhita mathīt yat īm viṣṭaḥ mātariśvā
hotāram viśvāpsum viśvadevyam ni yam dadhuḥ manuṣyāsu vikṣu svar na citram
vibhāvam dadānam id na dadabhanta manmā agniḥ varūtham mama tasya cākan juṣanta
viśvāni asya karmā upastutim bharamāṇasya kāroḥ nitye cit nu yam sadane jagṛbhre
praśastibhiḥ dadhire yajñiyāsaḥ pra su u nayanta gṛbhayantaḥ iṣṭau aśvāsaḥ na
rathyaḥ rārahāṇāḥ purūṇi dasmaḥ ni riṇāti jambhaiḥ āt rocate vane ā vibhāvā āt
asya vātaḥ anu vāti śociḥ astuḥ na śaryām asanām anu dyūn na yam ripavaḥ na
riṣaṇyavaḥ garbhe santam reṣaṇāḥ reṣayanti andhāḥ apaśyāḥ na dabhan abhikhyā
nityāsaḥ īm pretāraḥ arakṣan mahaḥ sa rāyaḥ eṣate patiḥ dan inaḥ inasya vasunaḥ
pade ā upa dhrajantam adrayaḥ vidhan id abhi dvi janmā trī rocanāni viśvā
rajāṃsi śuśucānaḥ asthāt hotā yajiṣṭhaḥ apām sadhasthe sa yaḥ vṛṣā narām na
rodasyoḥ śravobhiḥ asti jīva pīta sargaḥ pra yaḥ sasrāṇaḥ śiśrīta yonau ā yaḥ
puram nārmiṇīm adīdet atyaḥ kaviḥ nabhanyaḥ nā arvā sūraḥ na rurukvān śata ātmā
ayam sa hotā yaḥ dvijanmā viśvā dadhe vāryāṇi śravasyā martaḥ yaḥ asmai sutukaḥ
dadāśa pra dhiyāyate mahe śūrāya viṣṇave ca arcata yā sānuni parvatānām adābhyā
tasthatuḥ arvatā iva sādhunā bṛhat śarīraḥ vimimānaḥ ṛkvabhiḥ yuvā a kumāraḥ
prati eti āhavam pākaḥ pṛcchāmi manasā a vijānan devānām nihitā padāni vatse
baṣkaye adhi sapta tantūn vi tatnire kavayaḥ otavai u indram mitram varuṇam
agnim āhuḥ atho divyaḥ sa suparṇaḥ garutmān ekam sat viprāḥ bahudhā vadanti
agnim yamam mātariśvānam āhuḥ nityam na sūnum madhu bibhrataḥ upa krīḍanti
krīḍāḥ vidatheṣu ghṛṣvayaḥ nakṣanti rudrāḥ avasā namasvinam na mardhanti sva
tavasaḥ haviṣkṛtam joṣat yat īm asuryā sacadhyai viṣita stukā rodasī nṛmaṇāḥ ā
sūryā iva vidhataḥ ratham gāt tveṣa pratīkā nabhasaḥ nā ityā amyak sā te indra
ṛṣṭiḥ asme sanemi abhvam marutaḥ junanti agniḥ cit hi sma atase śuśukvān āpaḥ na
dvīpam dadhati prayāṃsi gāyat sāma nabhanyam yathā veḥ arcāma tat vāvṛdhānam
svarvat evā hi te śam savanā samudre āpaḥ yat te āsu madanti devīḥ viśvā te anu
joṣyā bhūt gauḥ sūrīn cit yadi dhiṣā veṣi janān asāma yathā su sakhāyaḥ enā su
abhiṣṭayaḥ narām na śaṃsaiḥ asat yathā naḥ indraḥ vandaneṣṭhāḥ turaḥ na karma
nayamānaḥ ukthā mā u su naḥ indra atra pṛtsu devaiḥ asti hi sma te śuṣmin avayāḥ
mahaḥ cit yasya mīḍhuṣaḥ yavyā haviṣmataḥ marutaḥ vandate gīḥ yathā pūrvebhyaḥ
jaritṛbhyaḥ indra mayaḥ iva apaḥ na tṛṣyate babhūtha tām anu tvā nividam
johavīmi vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum ā vām rathaḥ avaniḥ na pravatvān sṛpra
vandhuraḥ suvitāya gamyāḥ vṛṣṇaḥ sthātārā manasaḥ javīyān ahampūrvaḥ yajataḥ
dhiṣṇyā yaḥ uta syā vām ruśataḥ vapsasaḥ gīḥ tri barhiṣi sadasi pinvate vṛṣā vām
meghaḥ vṛṣaṇā pīpāya goḥ na seke manuṣaḥ daśasyan bhūrim dve a carantī carantam
padvantam garbham apadī dadhāte nityam na sūnum pitroḥ upasthe dyāvā rakṣatam
pṛthivī naḥ abhvāt upa vaḥ eṣe namasā jigīṣā samāne ahan vimimānaḥ arkam
viṣurūpe payasi sasmin ūdhan uṣāsānaktā su dughā iva dhenuḥ uta naḥ ahiḥ
budhnyaḥ mayaḥ kaḥ śiśum na pipyuṣī iva veti sindhuḥ yena napātam apām junāma
manaḥ juvaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ yam vahanti uta naḥ īm matayaḥ aśva yogāḥ śiśum na gāvaḥ
taruṇam rihanti tam īm giraḥ janayaḥ na patnīḥ surabhiṣṭamam narām nasanta uta
naḥ īm marutaḥ vṛddha senāḥ smat samanasaḥ sadantu pṛṣat aśvāsaḥ avanayaḥ na
rathāḥ riśādasaḥ mitra yujaḥ na devāḥ tam tvā vayam pito vacobhiḥ gāvaḥ na havyā
suṣūdima devebhyaḥ tvā sadhamādam asmabhyam tvā sadhamādam tvam agne dyubhiḥ
tvam āśuśukṣaṇiḥ tvam adbhyaḥ tvam aśmanas pari tvam vanebhyaḥ tvam oṣadhībhyaḥ
tvam nṛṇām nṛpate jāyase śuciḥ tava agne hotram tava potram ṛtviyam tava neṣṭram
tvam agnidh ṛtāyataḥ tava praśāstram tvam adhvarīyasi brahmā ca asi gṛhapatiḥ ca
naḥ dame tvam agne indraḥ vṛṣabhaḥ satām asi tvam viṣṇuḥ urugāyaḥ namasyaḥ tvam
brahmā rayi vid brahmaṇaspate tvam vidhartar sacase purandhyā tvam agne rājā
varuṇaḥ dhṛta vrataḥ tvam mitraḥ bhavasi dasmaḥ īḍyaḥ tvam aryamā sat patiḥ tvam
aṃśaḥ vidathe deva bhājayuḥ tvam agne tvaṣṭā vidhate su vīryam tava gnāvas mitra
mahas sajātyam tvam āśu hemā rariṣe su aśvyam tvam narām śardhaḥ asi purūvasuḥ
tvam agne rudraḥ asuraḥ mahaḥ divaḥ tvam śardhaḥ mārutam pṛkṣaḥ īśiṣe tvam
vātaiḥ aruṇaiḥ yāsi śaṅgayaḥ tvam pūṣā vidhataḥ pāsi nu tmanā tvam agne draviṇaḥ
dāḥ araṅkṛte tvam devaḥ savitā ratna dhāḥ asi tvam bhagaḥ nṛpate vasvaḥ īśiṣe
tvam pāyuḥ dame yaḥ te avidhat tvām agne dame ā viśpatim viśaḥ tvām rājānam
suvidatram ṛñjate tvam viśvāni su anīka patyase tvam sahasrāṇi śatā daśa prati
tvām agne pitaram iṣṭibhiḥ naraḥ tvām bhrātrāya śamyā tanūrucam tvam putraḥ
bhavasi yaḥ te avidhat tvam sakhā su śevaḥ pāsi ādhṛṣaḥ tvam agne ṛbhuḥ āke
namasyaḥ tvam vājasya kṣumataḥ rāyaḥ īśiṣe tvam vi bhāsi tvam viśikṣuḥ asi
yajñam ātaniḥ tvam agne aditiḥ deva dāśuṣe tvam vṛtra hāḥ vasu pate sarasvatī
tvam agne su bhṛtaḥ uttamam vayaḥ tava spārhe varṇe ā saṃdṛśi śriyaḥ tvam vājaḥ
prataraṇaḥ bṛhan asi tvam rayiḥ bahulaḥ viśvatas pṛthuḥ tvām agne ādityāsaḥ
āsyam tvām jihvām śucayaḥ cakrire kave tvām rātiṣācaḥ adhvareṣu saścire tve
devāḥ haviḥ adanti āhutam tve agne viśve amṛtāsaḥ adruhaḥ āsā devāḥ haviḥ adanti
āhutam tvayā martāsaḥ svadante āsutim tvam garbhaḥ vīrudhām jajñiṣe śuciḥ tvam
tān sam ca prati ca asi majmanā agne su jāta pra ca deva ricyase ye stotṛbhyaḥ
go agrām aśva peśasam agne rātim upasṛjanti sūrayaḥ asmān ca tān ca pra hi neṣi
vasyaḥ ā bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ yajñena vardhata jātavedasam agnim
yajadhvam haviṣā tanā girā samidhānam su prayasam svarṇaram dyukṣam hotāram
vṛjaneṣu dhūrṣadam abhi tvā naktīḥ uṣasaḥ vavāśire agne vatsam na svasareṣu
dhenavaḥ divaḥ iva id aratiḥ mānuṣā yugā kṣapaḥ bhāsi puru vāra saṃyataḥ tam
devāḥ budhne rajasaḥ su daṃsasam divaspṛthivyoḥ aratim ni erire ratham iva
vedyam śukra śociṣam agnim mitram na kṣitiṣu praśaṃsyam tam ukṣamāṇam rajasi sve
ā dame candram iva su rucam hvāre ā dadhuḥ pṛśnyāḥ pataram citayantam akṣabhiḥ
pāthaḥ na pāyum janasī ubhe anu sa hotā viśvam pari bhūtu adhvaram tam u havyaiḥ
manuṣaḥ ṛñjate girā hiriśipraḥ jarbhurat dyauḥ na stṛbhiḥ citayat rodasī anu sa
naḥ revat samidhānaḥ svastaye saṃdadasvān rayim asmāsu dīdihi ā naḥ kṛṇuṣva
suvitāya rodasī agne havyā manuṣaḥ deva vītaye dāḥ naḥ agne bṛhataḥ dāḥ
sahasriṇaḥ duraḥ na vājam śrutyai apā vṛdhi prācī dyāvāpṛthivī brahmaṇā kṛdhi
svar na śukram uṣasaḥ vi didyutaḥ saḥ idhānaḥ uṣasaḥ rāmyāḥ anu svar na dīdet
aruṣeṇa bhānunā hotrābhiḥ agniḥ manuṣaḥ su adhvaraḥ rājā viśām atithiḥ cāruḥ
āyave evā naḥ amṛteṣu pūrvya dhīṣ pīpāya bṛhat diveṣu mānuṣā duhānā dhenuḥ
vṛjaneṣu kārave tmanā śatinam puru rūpam iṣaṇi vayam agne arvatā vā su vīryam
brahmaṇā vā citayemā janāṁ ati asmākam dyumnam adhi pañca kṛṣṭiṣu svar na
śuśucīta duṣṭaram sa naḥ bodhi sahasya praśaṃsyaḥ yasmin su jātāḥ iṣayanta
sūrayaḥ yam agne yajñam upayanti vājinaḥ nitye toke dīdivāṃsam sve dame
ubhayāsaḥ jātavedaḥ syāma te stotāraḥ agne sūrayaḥ ca śarmaṇi vasvaḥ rāyaḥ puru
ścandrasya bhūyasaḥ prajāvataḥ su apatyasya śagdhi naḥ ye stotṛbhyaḥ go agrām
aśva peśasam agne rātim upasṛjanti sūrayaḥ asmān ca tān ca pra hi neṣi vasyaḥ ā
bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ huve vaḥ sudyotmānam suvṛktim viśām agnim atithim
su prayasam mitraḥ iva yaḥ didhiṣāyyaḥ bhūt devaḥ ādeve jane jātavedāḥ imam
vidhantaḥ apām sadhasthe dvitā adhuḥ bhṛgavaḥ vikṣu āyoḥ eṣa viśvāni abhī astu
bhūmā devānām agniḥ aratiḥ jīra aśvaḥ agnim devāsaḥ mānuṣīṣu vikṣu priyam dhuḥ
kṣeṣyantaḥ na mitram sa dīdayat uśatīḥ ūrmyāḥ ā dakṣāyyaḥ yaḥ dāsvate dame ā
asya raṇvā svasya iva puṣṭiḥ saṃdṛṣṭiḥ asya hiyānasya dakṣoḥ vi yaḥ bharibhrat
oṣadhīṣu jihvām atyaḥ na rathyaḥ dodhavīti vārān ā yat me abhvam vanadaḥ pananta
uśigbhyaḥ na amimīta varṇam sa citreṇa cikite raṃsu bhāsā jujurvāṁ yaḥ muhur ā
yuvā bhūt ā yaḥ vanā tātṛṣāṇaḥ na bhāti vār ṇa pathā rathyā iva svānīt kṛṣṇa
adhvā tapuḥ raṇvaḥ ciketa dyauḥ iva smayamānaḥ nabhobhiḥ sa yaḥ vi asthāt abhi
dakṣat urvīm paśuḥ nā eti svayuḥ a gopāḥ agniḥ śociṣmāṁ atasāni uṣṇan kṛṣṇa
vyathiḥ asvadayat na bhūma nū te pūrvasya avasaḥ adhītau tṛtīye vidathe manma
śaṃsi asme agne saṃyat vīram bṛhantam kṣumantam vājam su apatyam rayim dāḥ tvayā
yathā gṛtsamadāsaḥ agne guhā vanvanta uparāṁ abhi ṣyuḥ su vīrāsaḥ abhimātiṣāhaḥ
smat sūribhyaḥ gṛṇate tat vayaḥ dhāḥ dadhanve vā yat īm anu vocat brahmāṇi veḥ u
tat pari viśvāni kāvyā nemiḥ cakram iva abhavat sākam hi śucinā śuciḥ praśāstā
kratunā ajani vidvāṁ asya vratā dhruvā vayāḥ iva anu rohate tāḥ asya varṇam
āyuvaḥ neṣṭuḥ sacanta dhenavaḥ kuvid tisṛbhyaḥ ā varam svasāraḥ yāḥ idam yayuḥ
yadī mātuḥ upa svasā ghṛtam bharantī asthita tāsām adhvaryuḥ āgatau yavaḥ vṛṣṭī
iva modate antar hi agne īyase vidvān janmā ubhayā kave dūtaḥ janyā iva mitryaḥ
śreṣṭham yaviṣṭha bhārata agne dyumantam ā bhara vaso puruspṛham rayim mā naḥ
arātiḥ īśata devasya martyasya ca parṣi tasyāḥ uta dviṣaḥ viśvāḥ uta tvayā vayam
dhārāḥ udanyāḥ iva ati gāhemahi dviṣaḥ śuciḥ pāvaka vandyaḥ agne bṛhat vi rocase
tvam ghṛtebhiḥ āhutaḥ tvam naḥ asi bhārata agne vaśābhiḥ ukṣabhiḥ aṣṭāpadībhiḥ
āhutaḥ dru annaḥ sarpiḥ āsutiḥ pratnaḥ hotā vareṇyaḥ sahasas putraḥ adbhutaḥ
vājayan iva nū rathān yogāṁ agneḥ upa stuhi yaśastamasya mīḍhuṣaḥ yaḥ su nīthaḥ
dadāśuṣe ajuryaḥ jarayan arim cāru pratīkaḥ āhutaḥ yaḥ u śriyā dameṣu ā doṣā
uṣasi praśasyate yasya vratam na mīyate ā yaḥ svar ṇa bhānunā citraḥ vibhāti
arciṣā añjānaḥ ajaraiḥ abhi ā yaḥ svar ṇa bhānunā citraḥ vibhāti arciṣā añjānaḥ
ajaraiḥ abhi atrim anu sva rājyam agnim ukthāni vāvṛdhuḥ viśvāḥ adhi śriyaḥ
dadhe agneḥ indrasya somasya devānām ūtibhiḥ vayam a riṣyantaḥ sacemahi abhi
ṣyāma pṛtanyataḥ johūtraḥ agniḥ prathamaḥ pitā iva iḍaḥ pade manuṣā yat
samiddhaḥ śriyam vasānaḥ amṛtaḥ vicetāḥ marmṛjenyaḥ śravasyaḥ sa vājī śiriṇāyām
cit aktunā mahobhiḥ a parīvṛtaḥ vasati pracetāḥ śrudhi havam indra mā riṣaṇyaḥ
syāma te dāvane vasūnām imāḥ hi tvām ūrjaḥ vardhayanti vasūyavaḥ sindhavaḥ na
kṣarantaḥ uktheṣu id nu śūra yeṣu cākan stomeṣu indra rudriyeṣu ca tubhyā id
etāḥ yāsu mandasānaḥ pra vāyave sisrate na śubhrāḥ indraḥ mahām sindhum āśayānam
māyāvinam vṛtram asphurat niḥ arejetām rodasī bhiyāne kanikradataḥ vṛṣṇaḥ asya
vajrāt asya suvānasya mandinaḥ tritasya ni arbudam vāvṛdhānaḥ astaḥ avartayat
sūryaḥ na cakram bhinat valam indraḥ aṅgirasvān yaḥ jātaḥ eva prathamaḥ manasvān
devaḥ devān kratunā paryabhūṣat sa janāsaḥ indraḥ yaḥ pṛthivīm vyathamānām
adṛṃhat yaḥ parvatān prakupitāṁ aramṇāt yaḥ antarikṣam vimame varīyaḥ yaḥ dyām
astabhnāt sa janāsaḥ indraḥ yaḥ hatvā ahim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn yaḥ gāḥ udājat
apadhā valasya yaḥ aśmanoḥ antar agnim jajāna saṃvṛj samatsu sa janāsaḥ indraḥ
yam smā pṛcchanti kuha sa iti ghoram uta īm āhuḥ nā eṣaḥ asti iti enam saḥ aryaḥ
puṣṭīḥ vijaḥ ivā mināti śrad asmai dhatta sa janāsaḥ indraḥ yaḥ radhrasya coditā
yaḥ kṛśasya yaḥ brahmaṇaḥ nādhamānasya kīreḥ yukta grāvṇaḥ yaḥ avitā su śipraḥ
suta somasya sa janāsaḥ indraḥ yasya aśvāsaḥ pradiśi yasya gāvaḥ yasya grāmāḥ
yasya viśve rathāsaḥ yaḥ sūryam yaḥ uṣasam jajāna yaḥ apām netā sa janāsaḥ
indraḥ yam krandasī saṃyatī vihvayete pare avare ubhayāḥ amitrāḥ samānam cit
ratham ātasthivāṃsā nānā havete sa janāsaḥ indraḥ yasmāt na ṛte vijayante
janāsaḥ yam yudhyamānāḥ avase havante yaḥ viśvasya pratimānam babhūva yaḥ acyuta
cyut sa janāsaḥ indraḥ yaḥ mahi enaḥ dadhānān a manyamānān śarvā jaghāna yaḥ
śardhate na anudadāti śṛdhyām yaḥ dasyoḥ hantā sa janāsaḥ indraḥ yaḥ śambaram
parvateṣu kṣiyantam catvāriṃśyām śaradi anvavindat ojāyamānam yaḥ ahim jaghāna
dānum śayānam sa janāsaḥ indraḥ yaḥ sapta raśmiḥ vṛṣabhaḥ tuviṣmān avāsṛjat
sartave sapta sindhūn yaḥ rauhiṇam asphurat vajra bāhuḥ dyām ārohantam sa
janāsaḥ indraḥ dyāvā cit asmai pṛthivī namete śuṣmāt cit asya parvatāḥ bhayante
yaḥ soma pāḥ nicitaḥ vajra bāhuḥ yaḥ vajra hastaḥ sa janāsaḥ indraḥ yaḥ
sunvantam avati yaḥ pacantam yaḥ śaṃsantam yaḥ śaśamānam ūtī yasya brahma
vardhanam yasya somaḥ yasya idam rādhaḥ sa janāsaḥ indraḥ yaḥ sunvate pacate
dudhraḥ ā cit vājam dardarṣi sa kila asi satyaḥ vayam te indra viśvaha priyāsaḥ
su vīrāsaḥ vidatham ā vadema adha akṛṇoḥ pṛthivīm saṃdṛśe dive yaḥ dhautīnām ahi
han āriṇak pathaḥ tam tvā stomebhiḥ udabhiḥ na vājinam devam devāḥ ajanan sa asi
ukthyaḥ adhvaryavaḥ yaḥ apaḥ vavrivāṃsam vṛtram jaghāna aśanyā iva vṛkṣam tasmai
etam bharata eṣaḥ indraḥ arhati pītim asya apa hi valam var adhvaryavaḥ yaḥ
dṛbhīkam jaghāna yaḥ gāḥ udājat tasmai etam antarikṣe na vātam indram somaiḥ ā
ūrṇuta jūḥ na vastraiḥ adhvaryavaḥ yaḥ śatam śambarasya puraḥ bibheda aśmanā iva
pūrvīḥ yaḥ varcinaḥ śatam indraḥ sahasram apāvapat bharatā somam asmai
adhvaryavaḥ yaḥ śatam ā sahasram bhūmyāḥ upasthe avapat jaghanvān kutsasya āyoḥ
atithigvasya vīrān ni āvṛṇak bharatā somam asmai adhvaryavaḥ payasā udhar yathā
goḥ somebhiḥ īm pṛṇata bhojam indram veda aham asya nibhṛtam me etat ditsantam
bhūyas yajataḥ ciketa amājūr iva pitroḥ sacā satī samānāt ā sadasaḥ tvām iye
bhagam kṛdhi praketam upa māsi ā bhara daddhi bhāgam tanvaḥ yena māmahaḥ apāyi
asya andhasaḥ madāya manīṣiṇaḥ suvānasya prayasaḥ yasmin indraḥ pradivi
vāvṛdhānaḥ okaḥ dadhe brahmaṇyantaḥ ca naraḥ asya mandānaḥ madhvaḥ vajrahastaḥ
ahim indraḥ arṇovṛtam vi vṛścat pra yat vayaḥ na svasarāṇi acchā prayāṃsi ca
nadīnām cakramanta sa māhinaḥ indraḥ arṇaḥ apām prairayat ahi hā acchā samudram
ajanayat sūryam vidat gāḥ aktunā ahnām vayunāni sādhat saḥ apratīni manave
purūṇi indraḥ dāśat dāśuṣe hanti vṛtram sadyas yaḥ nṛbhyaḥ atasāyyaḥ bhūt
paspṛdhānebhyaḥ sūryasya sātau sa sunvate indraḥ sūryam ā devaḥ riṇak martyāya ā
yat rayim guhat avadyam asmai bharat aṃśam nā etaśaḥ daśasyan sa randhayat
sadivas sārathaye śuṣṇam aśuṣam kuyavam kutsāya divodāsāya navatim ca nava
indraḥ puraḥ vi airat śambarasya eva te indra ucatham ahema śravasyā na tmanā
vājayantaḥ aśyāma tat sāptam āśuṣāṇāḥ nanamaḥ vadhar a devasya pīyoḥ eva te
gṛtsamadāḥ śūra manma avasyavaḥ na vayunāni takṣuḥ brahmaṇyantaḥ indra te
navīyaḥ iṣam ūrjam su kṣitim sumnam aśyuḥ nūnam sā te prati varam jaritre
duhīyat indra dakṣiṇā maghonī śikṣa stotṛbhyaḥ mā ati dhak bhagaḥ naḥ bṛhat
vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ viddhi ṣu ṇaḥ vayam te vayaḥ indra pra bharāmahe vājayuḥ
na ratham vipanyavaḥ dīdhyataḥ manīṣā sumnam iyakṣantaḥ tvāvataḥ nṝn
trikadrukeṣu mahiṣaḥ yava āśiram tuvi śuṣmaḥ tṛpat somam apibat viṣṇunā sutam
yathā avaśat gaṇānām tvā gaṇapatim havāmahe kavim kavīnām upamaśravastamam
jyeṣṭha rājam brahmaṇām brahmaṇaspate ā naḥ śṛṇvan ūtibhiḥ sīda sādanam devāḥ
cit te asurya pracetasaḥ bṛhaspate yajñiyam bhāgam ānaśuḥ usrāḥ iva sūryaḥ
jyotiṣā mahaḥ viśveṣām id janitā brahmaṇām asi ā vibādhyā parirāpaḥ tamāṃsi ca
jyotiṣmantam ratham ṛtasya tiṣṭhasi bṛhaspate bhīmam amitra dambhanam rakṣaḥ
haṇam gotra bhidam svar vidam sunītibhiḥ nayasi trāyase janam yaḥ tubhyam dāśāt
na tam aṃhaḥ aśnavat brahma dviṣaḥ tapanaḥ manyumīḥ asi bṛhaspate mahi tat te
mahitvanam na tam aṃhaḥ na duritam kutaścana na arātayaḥ titiruḥ na dvayāvinaḥ
viśvāḥ id asmāt dhvarasaḥ vi bādhase yam su gopāḥ rakṣasi brahmaṇaspate tvam naḥ
gopāḥ pathikṛt vicakṣaṇaḥ tava vratāya matibhiḥ jarāmahe bṛhaspate yaḥ naḥ abhi
hvaraḥ dadhe svā tam marmartu ducchunā harasvatī uta vā yaḥ naḥ marcayāt
anāgasaḥ arātīvā martaḥ sānukaḥ vṛkaḥ bṛhaspate apa tam vartayā pathaḥ sugam naḥ
asyai deva vītaye kṛdhi trātāram tvā tanūnām havāmahe avaspartar adhivaktāram
asmayum bṛhaspate deva nidaḥ ni barhaya mā durevāḥ uttaram sumnam ud naśan tvayā
vayam su vṛdhā brahmaṇaspate spārhā vasu manuṣyā dadīmahi yāḥ naḥ dūre taḍitas
yāḥ arātayaḥ abhi santi jambhayā tāḥ anapnasaḥ mā naḥ duḥśaṃsaḥ abhidipsuḥ īśata
pra su śaṃsāḥ matibhiḥ tāriṣīmahi anānudaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ jagmiḥ āhavam niṣṭaptā
śatrum pṛtanāsu sāsahiḥ asi satyaḥ ṛṇayāḥ brahmaṇaspate ugrasya cit damitā vīḍu
harṣiṇaḥ adevena manasā yaḥ riṣaṇyati śāsām ugraḥ manyamānaḥ jighāṃsati
bṛhaspate mā praṇak tasya naḥ vadhaḥ ni karma manyum durevasya śardhataḥ bhareṣu
havyaḥ namasā upasadyaḥ gantā vājeṣu sanitā dhanam dhanam viśvāḥ id aryaḥ
abhidipsvaḥ mṛdhaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ vi vavarhā rathāṁ iva tejiṣṭhayā tapanī rakṣasaḥ
tapa ye tvā nide dadhire dṛṣṭa vīryam āvis tat kṛṣva yat asat te ukthyam
bṛhaspate vi parirāpaḥ ardaya bṛhaspate ati yat aryaḥ arhāt dyumat vibhāti
kratumat janeṣu yat dīdayat śavasaḥ ṛta prajāta tat asmāsu draviṇam dhehi citram
mā naḥ stenebhyaḥ ye abhi druhas pade nirāmiṇaḥ ripavaḥ anneṣu jāgṛdhuḥ ā
devānām ohate vi vrayaḥ hṛdi bṛhaspate na paras sāmnaḥ viduḥ viśvebhyaḥ hi tvā
bhuvanebhyas pari tvaṣṭā ajanat sāmnaḥ sāmnaḥ kaviḥ saḥ ṛṇacit ṛṇayāḥ
brahmaṇaspatiḥ druhaḥ hantā mahaḥ ṛtasya dhartari tava śriye vi ajihīta parvataḥ
gavām gotram udasṛjaḥ yat aṅgiraḥ indreṇa yujā tamasā parīvṛtam bṛhaspate niḥ
apām aubjaḥ arṇavam brahmaṇaspate tvam asya yantā sūktasya bodhi tanayam ca
jinva viśvam tat bhadram yat avanti devāḥ bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ viśvam
satyam maghavānā yuvoḥ id āpaḥ cana pra minanti vratam vām acchā
indrābrahmaṇaspatī haviḥ naḥ annam yuj jigātam brahmaṇaspateḥ abhavat yathāvaśam
satyaḥ manyuḥ mahi karmā kariṣyataḥ yaḥ gāḥ udājat sa dive vi ca abhajat mahī
iva rītiḥ śavasā asarat pṛthak sindhuḥ na kṣodaḥ śimīvāṁ ṛghāyataḥ vṛṣā iva
vadhrīṃr abhi vaṣṭi ojasā agneḥ iva prasitiḥ na aha vartave yam yam yujam kṛṇute
brahmaṇaspatiḥ vidyām ādityāḥ avasaḥ vaḥ asya yat aryaman bhaye ā cit mayobhu
yuṣmākam mitrāvaruṇā praṇītau pari śvabhrā iva duritāni vṛjyām yāḥ vaḥ māyāḥ
abhidruhe yajatrāḥ pāśāḥ ādityāḥ ripave vicṛttāḥ aśvī iva tāṁ ati yeṣam rathena
ariṣṭāḥ urau ā śarman syāma tava vrate subhagāsaḥ syāma su ādhyaḥ varuṇa
tuṣṭuvāṃsaḥ upāyane uṣasām gomatīnām agnayaḥ na jaramāṇāḥ anu dyūn tava syāma
puru vīrasya śarman uru śaṃsasya varuṇa praṇetar yūyam naḥ putrāḥ aditeḥ abhi
kṣamadhvam yujyāya devāḥ pra sīm ādityaḥ asṛjat ṛtam sindhavaḥ varuṇasya yanti
na śrāmyanti na vi mucanti ete vayaḥ na paptuḥ raghuyā parijman vi mat śrathāya
raśanām iva āgaḥ ṛdhyāma te varuṇa khām ṛtasya mā tantuḥ chedi vayataḥ dhiyam me
mā mātrā śāri apasaḥ puras ṛtoḥ apa u su myakṣa varuṇa bhiyasam mat samrāj
ṛtāvaḥ anu mā gṛbhāya dāma iva vatsāt vi mumugdhi aṃhaḥ nahi tvat āre nimiṣaḥ
cana īśe mā naḥ vadhaiḥ varuṇa ye te iṣṭau enaḥ kṛṇvantam asura bhrīṇanti mā
jyotiṣaḥ pravasathāni ganma vi ṣū mṛdhaḥ śiśrathaḥ jīvase naḥ dhṛta vratāḥ
ādityāḥ iṣirāḥ āre mat karta raha sūḥ iva āgaḥ śṛṇvataḥ vaḥ varuṇa mitra devāḥ
bhadrasya vidvāṁ avase huve vaḥ yūyam devāḥ pramatiḥ yūyam ojaḥ yūyam dveṣāṃsi
sanutar yuyota abhikṣattāraḥ abhi ca kṣamadhvam adya ca naḥ mṛḍayata aparam ca
kim ū nu vaḥ kṛṇavāma apareṇa kim sanena vasavaḥ āpyena yūyam naḥ mitrāvaruṇa
adite ca svastim indrāmarutaḥ dadhāta haye haye devāḥ yūyam id āpaya stha te
mṛḍata nādhamānāya mahyam mā vaḥ rathaḥ ṛte bhūt mā yuṣmāvatsu āpiṣu śramiṣma
pra vaḥ ekaḥ mimaya bhūri āgaḥ yat mā pitā iva kitavam śaśāsa yat mā pitā iva
kitavam śaśāsa āre pāśāḥ āre aghāni devāḥ mā mā adhi putre vim iva grabhīṣṭa
arvāñcaḥ adya bhavata yajatrāḥ ā vaḥ hārdi bhayamānaḥ vyayeyam trādhvam naḥ
devāḥ nijuraḥ vṛkasya trādhvam kartāt avapadaḥ yajatrāḥ mā aham maghonaḥ varuṇa
priyasya bhūri dāvnaḥ ā vidam śūnam āpeḥ mā rāyaḥ rājan su yamāt ava sthām bṛhat
vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ bṛhaspate tapuṣā aśnā iva vidhya vṛkadvarasaḥ asurasya
vīrān yathā jaghantha dhṛṣatā purā cit evā jahi śatrum asmākam indra sarasvati
tvam asmāṁ aviḍḍhi marutvatī dhṛṣatī jeṣi śatrūn hanti asmākebhiḥ satvabhiḥ śūra
śūraiḥ vīryā kṛdhi yāni te kartvāni jyok abhūvan anudhūpitāsaḥ hatvī teṣām ā
bhara naḥ vasūni uta vaḥ śaṃsam uśijām iva śmasi ahirbudhnyaḥ ajaḥ eka pād uta
tritaḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ savitā canaḥ dadhe apām napāt āśu hemā dhiyā etā vaḥ vaśmi
udyatā yajatrāḥ atakṣan āyavaḥ navyase sam śravasyavaḥ vājam cakānāḥ saptiḥ na
rathyaḥ aha dhītim aśyāḥ parṣi ṇaḥ pāram aṃhasaḥ svasti viśvāḥ abhītī rapasaḥ
yuyodhi ud mā mamanda vṛṣabhaḥ marutvān tvakṣīyasā vayasā nādhamānam iva chāyām
arapāḥ aśīyā vivāseyam rudrasya sumnam namasyā kalmalīkinam namobhiḥ gṛṇīmasi
tveṣam rudrasya nāma dhārā varāḥ marutaḥ dhṛṣṇu ojasaḥ mṛgāḥ na bhīmāḥ
taviṣībhiḥ arcinaḥ agnayaḥ na śuśucānāḥ ṛjīṣiṇaḥ bhṛmim dhamantaḥ apa gāḥ
avṛṇvata dyāvaḥ na stṛbhiḥ citayanta khādinaḥ vi abhriyāḥ na dyutayanta vṛṣṭayaḥ
rudraḥ yat vaḥ marutaḥ rukma vakṣasaḥ vṛṣā ajani pṛśnyāḥ śukre ūdhani ukṣante
aśvāṁ atyāṁ iva ājiṣu nadasya karṇaiḥ turayanta āśubhiḥ hiraṇya śiprāḥ marutaḥ
davidhvataḥ pṛkṣam yātha pṛṣatībhiḥ samanyavaḥ pṛkṣe tā viśvā bhuvanā vavakṣire
mitrāya vā sadam ā jīra dānavaḥ pṛṣat aśvāsaḥ anavabhra rādhasaḥ ṛjipyāsaḥ na
vayuneṣu dhūrṣadaḥ indhanvabhiḥ dhenubhiḥ rapśat ūdhabhiḥ adhvasmabhiḥ pathibhiḥ
ā haṃsāsaḥ na svasarāṇi gantana madhoḥ madāya marutaḥ ā naḥ brahmāṇi marutaḥ
narām na śaṃsaḥ savanāni gantana aśvām iva pipyata dhenum ūdhani kartā dhiyam
jaritre vāja peśasam tam naḥ dāta marutaḥ vājinam rathe āpānam brahma citayat
dive dive iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ vṛjaneṣu kārave sanim medhām ariṣṭam duṣṭaram sahaḥ
yat yuñjate marutaḥ rukma vakṣasaḥ aśvān bhage ā sudānavaḥ dhenuḥ na śiśve
svasareṣu pinvate janāya rāta haviṣe mahīm iṣam vasavaḥ rakṣatā riṣaḥ yaḥ naḥ
marutaḥ vṛkatāti martyaḥ ripuḥ dadhe vartayata tapuṣā cakriyā abhi tam ava
rudrau aśasaḥ hantana vadhaḥ tān vaḥ mahaḥ marutaḥ eva yāvnaḥ viṣṇoḥ eṣasya
prabhṛthe havāmahe hiraṇya varṇān kakuhān yata srucaḥ brahmaṇyantaḥ śaṃsyam
rādhaḥ īmahe te daśagvāḥ prathamāḥ yajñam ūhire te naḥ hinvantu uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭiṣu
uṣāḥ na rāmīḥ aruṇaiḥ apa ūrṇute mahā u jyotiṣā śucatā go arṇasā te kṣoṇībhiḥ
aruṇebhiḥ nā añjibhiḥ rudrāḥ ṛtasya sadaneṣu vāvṛdhuḥ nimeghamānāḥ atyena pājasā
su ścandram varṇam dadhire su peśasam tāṁ iyānaḥ mahi varūtham ūtaye upa gha id
enā namasā gṛṇīmasi tritaḥ na yān pañca hotṝn abhiṣṭaye āvavartat avarān cakriyā
avase yayā radhram pārayatha ati aṃhaḥ yayā nidaḥ muñcatha vanditāram arvācī sā
marutaḥ yā vaḥ ūtiḥ ā u ṣu vāśrā iva sumatiḥ jigātu upa īm asṛkṣi vājayuḥ
vacasyām canaḥ dadhīta nādyaḥ giraḥ me apām napāt āśu hemā kuvid sa su peśasas
karati joṣiṣat hi imam su asmai hṛdaḥ ā su taṣṭam mantram vocema kuvid asya
vedat apām napāt asuryasya mahnā viśvāni aryaḥ bhuvanā jajāna sam anyāḥ yanti
upa yanti anyāḥ samānam ūrvam nadyaḥ pṛṇanti tam ū śucim śucayaḥ dīdivāṃsam apām
napātam pari tasthuḥ āpaḥ tam a smerāḥ yuvatayaḥ yuvānam marmṛjyamānāḥ pari
yanti āpaḥ sa śukrebhiḥ śikvabhiḥ revat asme dīdāya anidhmaḥ ghṛta nirṇij apsu
asmai tisraḥ avyathyāya nārīḥ devāya devīḥ didhiṣanti annam kṛtāḥ iva upa hi
prasarsre apsu sa pīyūṣam dhayati pūrva sūnām saḥ īm vṛṣā ajanayat tāsu garbham
saḥ īm śiśuḥ dhayati tam rihanti saḥ apām napāt an abhimlāta varṇaḥ anyasya iva
iha tanvā viveṣa amā iva naḥ su havāḥ ā hi gantana ni barhiṣi sadatanā raṇiṣṭana
athā mandasva jujuṣāṇaḥ andhasaḥ tvaṣṭar devebhiḥ janibhiḥ sumadgaṇaḥ grāvāṇā
iva tat id artham jarethe gṛdhrā iva vṛkṣam nidhimantam accha brahmāṇā iva
vidathe uktha śāsā dūtā iva havyā janyā purutrā prātar yāvāṇā rathyā iva vīrā
ajā iva yamāḥ varam ā sacethe mene iva tanvā śumbhamāne dampatī iva kratu vidā
janeṣu śṛṅgā iva naḥ prathamā gantam arvāk śaphau iva jarbhurāṇā tarobhiḥ
cakravākā iva prati vastoḥ usrā arvāñcā yātam rathyā iva śakrā indraḥ āśābhyas
pari sarvābhyaḥ abhayam karat jetā śatrūn vicarṣaṇiḥ āvadan tvam śakune bhadram
ā vada yat utpatan vadasi karkariḥ yathā tūṣṇīm āsīnaḥ sumatim cikiddhi naḥ
bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ vaiśvānarāya dhiṣaṇām ṛtāvṛdhe ghṛtam na pūtam
agnaye janāmasi dvitā hotāram manuṣaḥ ca vāghataḥ dhiyā ratham na kuliśaḥ sam
ṛṇvati kratvā dakṣasya taruṣaḥ vidharmaṇi devāsaḥ agnim janayanta cittibhiḥ
rurucānam bhānunā jyotiṣā mahām atyam na vājam saniṣyan upa bruve ā rodasī
apṛṇat ā jātam yat enam apasaḥ adhārayan saḥ adhvarāya pari ṇīyate kaviḥ atyaḥ
na vāja sātaye canohitaḥ śucim na yāman ketum divaḥ rocana sthām uṣarbudham
agnim mūrdhānam divaḥ apratiṣkutam tam īmahe namasā vājinam bṛhat mandram
hotāram śucim a dvayāvinam damūnasam ukthyam viśvacarṣaṇim ratham na citram
vapuṣāya darśatam manuḥ hitam sadam id rāye īmahe prati agniḥ uṣasaḥ cekitānaḥ
abodhi vipraḥ padavīḥ kavīnām pṛthu pājāḥ devayadbhiḥ samiddhaḥ apa dvārā
tamasaḥ vahniḥ āvaḥ pra id u agniḥ vāvṛdhe stomebhiḥ gīrbhi stotṝṇām namasyaḥ
ukthaiḥ pūrvīḥ ṛtasya saṃdṛśaḥ cakānaḥ sam dūtaḥ adyaut uṣasaḥ viroke adhāyi
agniḥ mānuṣīṣu vikṣu apām garbhaḥ mitraḥ ṛtena sādhan ā haryataḥ yajataḥ sānu
asthāt abhūt u vipraḥ havyaḥ matīnām mitraḥ agniḥ bhavati yat samiddhaḥ mitraḥ
hotā varuṇaḥ jātavedāḥ mitraḥ adhvaryuḥ iṣiraḥ damūnāḥ mitraḥ sindhūnām uta
parvatānām pāti priyam ripaḥ agram padam veḥ pāti yahvaḥ caraṇam sūryasya pāti
nābhā sapta śīrṣāṇam agniḥ pāti devānām upamādam ṛṣvaḥ ṛbhuḥ cakre viśvāni devaḥ
vayunāni vidvān sasasya carma ghṛtavat padam veḥ tat id agniḥ rakṣati
aprayucchan ā yonim agniḥ ghṛtavantam asthāt pṛthu pragāṇam uśantam uśānaḥ
dīdyānaḥ śuciḥ ṛṣvaḥ pāvakaḥ punar punar mātarā navyasī kaḥ sadyas jātaḥ
oṣadhībhiḥ vavakṣe yadī vardhanti prasvaḥ ghṛtena āpaḥ iva pravatā śumbhamānāḥ
uruṣyat agniḥ pitroḥ upasthe ud u ṣṭutaḥ samidhā yahvaḥ adyaut varṣman divaḥ
adhi nābhā pṛthivyāḥ mitraḥ agniḥ īḍyaḥ mātariśvā dūtaḥ vakṣat yajathāya devān
ud astambhīt samidhā nākam ṛṣvaḥ agniḥ bhavan uttamaḥ rocanānām yadī bhṛgubhyaḥ
pari mātariśvā guhā santam havyavāham samīdhe iḍām agne purudaṃsam sanim goḥ
śaśvattamam havamānāya sādha syāt naḥ sūnuḥ tanayaḥ vijāvā agne sā te sumatiḥ
bhūtu asme samidhyamānaḥ prathamā anu dharmā sam aktubhiḥ ajyate viśva vāraḥ
śociṣkeśaḥ ghṛta nirṇij pāvakaḥ su yajñaḥ agniḥ yajathāya devān yathā ayajaḥ
hotram agne pṛthivyāḥ yathā divaḥ jātavedaḥ cikitvān evā anena haviṣā yakṣi
devān manuṣvat yajñam pra tira imam adya bhavā naḥ agne sumanāḥ upetau sakhā iva
sakhye pitarā iva sādhuḥ puru druhaḥ hi kṣitayaḥ janānām prati pratīcīḥ dahatāt
arātīḥ ayam ayam saḥ agniḥ yasmin somam indraḥ sutam dadhe jaṭhare vāvaśānaḥ
sahasriṇam vājam atyam na saptim sasavān san stūyase jātavedaḥ agne yat te divi
varcaḥ yat oṣadhīṣu apsu ā yajatra yena antarikṣam uru ātatantha tveṣaḥ sa
bhānuḥ arṇavaḥ nṛ cakṣāḥ agne divaḥ arṇam acchā jigāsi yāḥ rocane parastāt
sūryasya yāḥ ca avastāt upatiṣṭhante āpaḥ acchā devāṁ ūciṣe dhiṣṇyāḥ ye
purīṣyāsaḥ agnayaḥ prāvaṇebhiḥ sajoṣasaḥ juṣantām yajñam adruhaḥ anamīvāḥ iṣaḥ
mahīḥ iḍām agne purudaṃsam sanim goḥ śaśvattamam havamānāya sādha syāt naḥ sūnuḥ
tanayaḥ vijāvā agne sā te sumatiḥ bhūtu asme aśvaḥ na krandan janibhiḥ sam
idhyate vaiśvānaraḥ kuśikebhiḥ yuge yuge sa naḥ agniḥ su vīryam su aśvyam
dadhātu ratnam amṛteṣu jāgṛviḥ vṛṣaḥ agniḥ sam idhyate aśvaḥ na deva vāhanaḥ tam
haviṣmantaḥ īḍate yadī manthanti bāhubhiḥ vi rocate aśvaḥ na vājī aruṣaḥ vaneṣu
ā citraḥ na yāman aśvinoḥ a nivṛtaḥ pari vṛṇakti aśmanaḥ tṛṇā dahan ajījanan
amṛtam martyāsaḥ asremāṇam taraṇim vīḍu jambham daśa svasāraḥ agruvaḥ samīcīḥ
pumāṃsam jātam abhi sam rabhante pra sapta hotā sanakāt arocata mātuḥ upasthe
yat aśocat ūdhani ni sāmanām iṣirām indra bhūmim mahīm apārām sadane sasattha
dravat yathā sambhṛtam viśvatas cit upa imam yajñam ā vahātaḥ indram piba
vardhasva tava ghā sutāsaḥ somāsaḥ prathamāḥ uta ime yathā apibaḥ pūrvyāṁ indra
somāṁ evā pāhi panyaḥ adyā navīyān pra yat sindhavaḥ prasavam yathā āyan āpaḥ
samudram rathyā iva jagmuḥ atas cit indraḥ sadasaḥ varīyān yat īm somaḥ pṛṇati
dugdhaḥ aṃśuḥ asme pra yandhi maghavan ṛjīṣin indra rāyaḥ viśva vārasya bhūreḥ
asme śatam śaradaḥ jīvase dhāḥ asme vīrān śaśvataḥ indra śiprin abhi taṣṭā iva
dīdhayā manīṣām atyaḥ na vājī sudhuraḥ jihānaḥ abhi priyāṇi marmṛśat parāṇi
kavīṃr icchāmi saṃdṛśe sumedhāḥ matayaḥ soma pām urum rihanti śavasas patim
indram vatsam na mātaraḥ gambhīrāṁ udadhīṃr iva kratum puṣyasi gāḥ iva pra su
gopāḥ yavasam dhenavaḥ yathā hradam kulyāḥ iva āśata mahāṁ asi mahiṣa vṛṣṇyebhiḥ
dhana spṛt ugra sahamānaḥ anyān ekaḥ viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā sa yodhayā ca
kṣayayā ca janān urum gabhīram januṣā abhī ugram viśva vyacasam avatam matīnām
indram somāsaḥ pradivi sutāsaḥ samudram na sravataḥ ā viśanti sādhoḥ piba
pratikāmam yathā te rasa āśiraḥ prathamam somyasya śaṃsā mahām indram yasmin
viśvāḥ ā kṛṣṭayaḥ soma pāḥ kāmam avyan yam su kratum dhiṣaṇe vibhva taṣṭam
ghanam vṛtrāṇām janayanta devāḥ yam nu nakir pṛtanāsu svarājam dvitā tarati
nṛtamam hariṣṭhām inatamaḥ satvabhiḥ yaḥ ha śūṣaiḥ pṛthu jrayāḥ amināt āyuḥ
dasyoḥ sahāvā pṛtsu taraṇiḥ na arvā vyānaśī rodasī mehanāvān bhagaḥ na kāre
havyaḥ matīnām pitā iva cāruḥ su havaḥ vayodhāḥ dhartā divaḥ rajasas pṛṣṭaḥ
ūrdhvaḥ rathaḥ na vāyuḥ vasubhiḥ niyutvān kṣapām vastā janitā sūryasya vibhaktā
bhāgam dhiṣaṇā iva vājam śunam huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare vājasātau
śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṃjitam dhanānām indra marutvas
iha pāhi somam yathā śāryāte apibaḥ sutasya tiṣṭha su kam maghavan mā parā gāḥ
somasya nu tvā suṣutasya yakṣi pituḥ na putraḥ sicam ā rabhe te indra

rathaḥ na vājī viduḥ pṛthivyāḥ divaḥ janitram śṛṇvanti āpaḥ adha kṣarantīḥ āpaḥ
cit asmai pinvanta pṛthvīḥ vṛtreṣu śūrāḥ maṃsante ugrāḥ ā dhūrṣu asmai dadhāta

naḥ edhi gaya sphānaḥ gobhiḥ aśvebhiḥ indo edhi ajarāsaḥ te sakhye syāma syāma

gavyā vastrā iva vāsayantaḥ id naraḥ niḥ dhukṣan vakṣaṇābhyaḥ adha jmaḥ adha vā
divaḥ bṛhataḥ rocanāt adhi ayā vardhasva tanvā girā mama indrāya su madintamam

yuktāḥ rathe hiraṇyaye brahma yujaḥ harayaḥ indra keśinaḥ vahantu soma pītaye ā

yādvaḥ paśuḥ viśvāni yaḥ ṛjrā mahyam māmahe saha tvacā hiraṇyayā eṣa viśvāni
abhi astu saubhagā asaṅgasya svanat rathaḥ adha plāyogiḥ ati dāsat anyān āsaṅgaḥ
agne daśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ adha ukṣaṇaḥ daśa mahyam ruśantaḥ naḍāḥ iva sarasaḥ niḥ
atiṣṭhan anu asya sthūram dadṛśe purastāt anasthaḥ ūruḥ avarambamāṇaḥ śaśvatī

pibā su pūrṇam udaram anābhayin rarima te nṛbhiḥ dhūtaḥ sutaḥ aśnaiḥ vāraiḥ
paripūtaḥ aśvaḥ na niktaḥ nadīṣu tam te yavam yathā gobhiḥ svādum akarma
śrīṇantaḥ indra tvā asmin sadhamāde indraḥ id soma pāḥ ekaḥ indraḥ suta pāḥ
viśvāyuḥ antar devān martyān ca na yam yam śukraḥ na na durāśīr durāśīr na

harī brahma yujā śagmā vakṣataḥ sakhāyam gīrbhiḥ śrutam girvaṇasam svādavaḥ
somāḥ ā yāhi śrītāḥ somāḥ ā yāhi śiprin ṛṣīvas śacīvas na ayam acchā sadhamādam
stutaḥ ca yāḥ tvā vardhanti mahe rādhase nṛmṇāya indra kāriṇam vṛdhantaḥ giraḥ
ca yāḥ te girvāhaḥ ukthā ca tubhyam tāni satrā dadhire śavāṃsi eva id eṣa

śravasam satpatim śravaskāmam puru tmānam kaṇvāsaḥ gāta vājinam yaḥ ṛte gāḥ
padebhyaḥ dāt sakhā nṛbhyaḥ śacīvān ye asmin kāmam aśriyan pibā sutasya rasinaḥ
matsva naḥ indra gomataḥ āpiḥ naḥ bodhi sadhamādyaḥ vṛdhe asmāṁ avantu te dhiyaḥ
bhūyāma te sumatau vājinaḥ vayam mā naḥ star abhimātaye ā naḥ sumneṣu yāmaya
imāḥ u tvā purūvaso giraḥ vardhantu yāḥ mama pāvaka varṇāḥ śucayaḥ vipaścitaḥ
abhi stomaiḥ anūṣata ayam sahasram ṛṣibhiḥ sahaskṛtaḥ samudraḥ iva paprathe
satyaḥ saḥ asya mahimā gṛṇe śavaḥ yajñeṣu vipra rājye indram id devatātaye
indram prayati adhvare indram samīke vaninaḥ havāmahe indram dhanasya sātaye
indraḥ mahnā rodasī paprathat śavaḥ indraḥ sūryam arocayat indre ha viśvā
bhuvanāni yemire indre suvānāsaḥ indavaḥ abhi tvā pūrva pītaye stomebhiḥ āyavaḥ
samīcīnāsaḥ ṛbhavaḥ sam asvaran rudrāḥ gṛṇanta pūrvyam asya id indraḥ vāvṛdhe
vṛṣṇyam śavaḥ made sutasya viṣṇavi adya tam asya mahimānam āyavaḥ anu stuvanti
pūrvathā tat tvā yāmi su vīryam tat brahma pūrvacittaye yena yatibhyaḥ bhṛgave
dhane hite yena praskaṇvam āvitha yena samudram asṛjaḥ mahīḥ apaḥ tat indra te
śavaḥ sadyas saḥ asya mahimā na saṃnaśe yam kṣoṇīḥ anucakrade śagdhi naḥ indra
yat tvā rayim yāmi su vīryam śagdhi vājāya prathamam siṣāsate śagdhi stomāya
pūrvya śagdhi naḥ asya yat ha pauram āvitha dhiyaḥ indra siṣāsataḥ śagdhi yathā
ruśamam śyāvakam kṛpam indra prāvaḥ svarṇaram kad navyaḥ atasīnām turaḥ gṛṇīta
martyaḥ nahi nu asya mahimānam indriyam svar gṛṇantaḥ ānaśuḥ ṛṣiḥ kaḥ vipraḥ
ohate kadā havam maghavan indra sunvataḥ kad u stuvataḥ gamaḥ ud u tye
madhumattamāḥ giraḥ stomāsaḥ īrate satrājitaḥ dhanasāḥ akṣita ūtayaḥ vājayantaḥ
rathāḥ iva kaṇvāḥ iva bhṛgavaḥ sūryāḥ iva viśvam id dhītam ānaśuḥ indram

indra parāvataḥ arvācīnaḥ maghavan soma pītaye ugraḥ ṛṣvebhiḥ ā gahi ime hi

sūryaḥ niḥ somaḥ indriyaḥ rasaḥ niḥ antarikṣāt adhamaḥ mahām ahim kṛṣe tat indra
pauṃsyam yam me duḥ indraḥ marutaḥ pākasthāmā kaurayāṇaḥ viśveṣām tmanā

matiḥ indram ukthāni vāvṛdhuḥ samudram iva sindhavaḥ anutta manyum ajaram yat

aśvinā yena sindhum mahīḥ apaḥ rathāṁ iva pracodayaḥ panthām ṛtasya yātave tam

asya sūnṛtāḥ āpaḥ na pravatā yatīḥ ayā dhiyā yaḥ ucyate patiḥ divaḥ tantum
tanuṣva pūrvyam yathā vide tam id viprāḥ avasyavaḥ pravatvatībhiḥ ūtibhiḥ indram

indra ajirāyate vi te madāḥ arājiṣuḥ tvām āpaḥ parvatāsaḥ ca hinvire yasmin

satyaḥ satvā tuvikūrmiḥ ekaḥ cit san abhibhūtiḥ tve kṣemāsaḥ api santi sādhavaḥ

parīṇasaḥ nakir revantam sakhyāya vindase pīyanti te surāśvaḥ yadā kṛṇoṣi
nadanum sam ūhasi āt id pitā iva hūyase mā te amājuraḥ yathā mūrāsaḥ indra

piba somam madāya kam śatakrato yam te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanāḥ

yathā aśṛṇoḥ atreḥ karmāṇi kṛṇvataḥ pra trasadasyum āvitha tvam ekaḥ id nṛṣāhye
indra brahmāṇi vardhayan śyāvāśvasya rebhataḥ tathā śṛṇu yathā aśṛṇoḥ atreḥ
karmāṇi kṛṇvataḥ tat tat agniḥ vayaḥ dadhe yathā yathā kṛpaṇyati asmai u su
prabhūtaye varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ arca viduṣṭarebhyaḥ yaḥ dhītā mānuṣāṇām paśvaḥ
gāḥ iva iva rakṣati nabhantām anyake same yaḥ śvetāṁ adhinirṇijaḥ cakre kṛṣṇāṁ
anu vratā sa dhāma pūrvyam mame yaḥ skambhena vi rodasī ajaḥ na dyām adhārayat
nabhantām anyake same astabhnāt dyām asuraḥ viśva vedāḥ amimīta varimāṇam
pṛthivyāḥ yathā atriḥ gīrbhiḥ vipraḥ ajohavīt soma pītaye eva vām ahve ūtaye
yathā ahuvanta medhirāḥ nāsatyā soma pītaye dadbhiḥ vanāni bapsati ukṣa annāya

giraḥ vāśrāsaḥ īrate ā gha ye agnim indhate stṛṇanti barhiḥ ānuṣak yeṣām indraḥ

sakhā a yuddhaḥ id yudhā vṛtam śūraḥ ā ajati satvabhiḥ yeṣām indraḥ yuvā sakhā ā

pramamarṣa maghattaye tasya naḥ vedaḥ ā bhara ime u tvā vi cakṣate sakhāyaḥ

santam ūtaye dūrāt iha havāmahe yat śuśrūyāḥ imam havam durmarṣam cakriyāḥ uta
bhaveḥ āpiḥ naḥ antamaḥ yat cit hi te api vyathiḥ jaganvāṃsaḥ amanmahi go dāḥ id
indra bodhi naḥ ā tvā rambham na jivrayaḥ rarabhma śavasaḥ pate uśmasi tvā

adediṣṭa pauṃsyam satyam tat turvaśe yadau vidānaḥ a hnavāyyam vi ānaṭ turvaṇe
śamī taraṇim vaḥ janānām tradam vājasya gomataḥ samānam u pra śaṃsiṣam

kaḥ nu maryāḥ amithitaḥ sakhā sakhāyam abravīt jahā kaḥ asmat īṣate eva are

vāsarāṇi abhi pra su rādhasam indram arca yathā vide yaḥ jaritṛbhyaḥ maghavā

indavaḥ madāḥ ye indra girvaṇaḥ āpaḥ na vajrin anu okyam saraḥ pṛṇanti śūra

śucayaḥ sam gavāśiraḥ somāḥ indram amandiṣuḥ su devāḥ stha kāṇvāyanāḥ vayaḥ
vayaḥ vicarantaḥ aśvāsaḥ na caṅkramata yathā cit vṛddham atasam agne saṃjūrvasi
kṣami eva daha mitra mahas yaḥ asmadhruk durmanmā kaḥ ca venati śiśānaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ
yathā agniḥ śṛṅge davidhvat sapta hotāraḥ tam id īḍate tvā agne su tyajam
ahrayam aprāmi satya maghavan tathā id asat indra kratvā yathā vaśaḥ mitraḥ naḥ
ati aṃhatim varuṇaḥ parṣat aryamā ādityāsaḥ yathā viduḥ vi su dveṣaḥ vi aṃhatim
ādityāsaḥ vi saṃhitam viṣvak vi vṛhata rapaḥ abhi pra go patim girā indram arca
yathā vide sūnum satyasya satpatim indram tam śumbha puruhanman avase yasya
dvitā vidhartari hastāya vajraḥ prati dhāyi darśataḥ mahaḥ dive na sūryaḥ viśaḥ
viśaḥ vaḥ atithim vājayantaḥ puru priyam agnim vaḥ duryam vacaḥ stuṣe śūṣasya
manmabhiḥ yam janāsaḥ haviṣmantaḥ mitram na sarpiḥ āsutim praśaṃsanti
praśastibhiḥ tam nemim ṛbhavaḥ yathā namasva sahūtibhiḥ nedīyaḥ yajñam aṅgiraḥ
mā naḥ asmin mahā dhane parā vark bhāra bhṛt yathā vidma hi te purā vayam agne
pituḥ yathā avasaḥ adha te sumnam īmahe tvā śūra ditsantam bhīmam na gām
vārayante piba dadhṛṣ yathā ūciṣe ati naḥ viṣpitā naubhiḥ apaḥ na parṣatha yūyam
preṣṭham vaḥ atithim stuṣe mitram iva priyam agnim ratham na vedyam apādhamat
abhiśastīḥ aśasti hā atha indraḥ dyumnī ābhavat kanyā vār avāyatī somam api
srutā avidat astam bharantī abravīt indrāya sunavai tvā śakrāya sunavai tvā asau
yaḥ eṣi vīrakaḥ gṛham gṛham vicākaśat imam jambha sutam piba dhānāvantam
karambhiṇam apūpavantam ukthinam ā cana tvā cikitsāmaḥ adhi cana tvā na imasi
śanais iva śanakais iva indrāya indo pari srava kuvid śakat kuvid karat kuvid
naḥ vasyasaḥ karat kuvid pati dviṣaḥ yatīḥ indreṇa saṃgamāmahai imāni trīṇi
viṣṭapā tāni indra vi rohaya śiraḥ tatasya urvarām āt idam me upa udare asau ca
yā naḥ urvarā āt imām tanvam mama atha u tatasya yat śiraḥ sarvā tā romaśā kṛdhi
khe rathasya khe anasaḥ khe yugasya śatakrato apālām indra tris pūtvī akṛṇoḥ
sūrya tvacam kad atviṣanta sūrayaḥ tiras āpaḥ iva sridhaḥ arṣanti pūta dakṣasaḥ
ā tvā giraḥ rathīḥ iva asthuḥ suteṣu girvaṇaḥ abhi tvā sam anūṣata indra vatsam
na mātaraḥ āvat tam indraḥ śacyā dhamantam apa snehitīḥ nṛmaṇāḥ adhatta tat me
ṛtam indra śūra citra pātu apaḥ na vajrin duritā ati parṣi kadā naḥ indra rāyaḥ
ā daśasyeḥ viśvapsnyasya spṛhayāyyasya rājan tvam hi naḥ pitā vaso tvam mātā
śatakrato babhūvitha adha te sumnam īmahe ā savam savituḥ yathā bhagasya iva
bhujim huve agnim samudra vāsasam tam arvantam na sānasim gṛṇīhi vipra śuṣmiṇam
mitram na yātayat janam padam devasya mīḍhuṣaḥ anādhṛṣṭābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ bhadrā
sūryaḥ iva upadṛś aśvam na gīrbhiḥ rathyam sudānavaḥ marmṛjyante devayavaḥ ubhe

mitraḥ na darśataḥ sam sūryeṇa rocate pra svānāsaḥ rathāḥ iva arvantaḥ na
śravasyavaḥ somāsaḥ rāye akramuḥ hinvānāsaḥ rathāḥ iva dadhanvire gabhastyoḥ
bharāsaḥ kāriṇām iva abhi viprāḥ anūṣata gāvaḥ vatsam na mātaraḥ indram somasya
pītaye atyāḥ hiyānāḥ na hetṛbhiḥ asṛgram vājasātaye vi vāram avyam āśavaḥ vāśrāḥ
arṣanti indavaḥ abhi vatsam na dhenavaḥ dadhanvire gabhastyoḥ pra nimnena iva
sindhavaḥ ghnantaḥ vṛtrāṇi bhūrṇayaḥ somāḥ asṛgram āśavaḥ abhi suvānāsaḥ indavaḥ
vṛṣṭayaḥ pṛthivīm iva indram somāsaḥ akṣaran ati ūrmiḥ matsaraḥ madaḥ somaḥ
pavitre arṣati vighnan rakṣāṃsi devayuḥ ā kalaśeṣu dhāvati pavitre pari sicyate
ukthaiḥ yajñeṣu vardhate ati trī soma rocanā rohan na bhrājase divam iṣṇan
sūryam na codayaḥ abhi viprāḥ anūṣata mūrdhan yajñasya kāravaḥ dadhānāḥ cakṣasi
priyam tam u tvā vājinam naraḥ dhībhiḥ viprāḥ avasyavaḥ mṛjanti devatātaye
madhoḥ dhārām anu kṣara tīvraḥ sadhastham āsadaḥ cāruḥ ṛtāya pītaye upa śikṣa
apatasthuṣaḥ bhiyasam ā dhehi śatruṣu pavamāna vidāḥ rayim ni śatroḥ soma
vṛṣṇyam ni śuṣmam ni vayaḥ tira dūre vā sataḥ anti vā ete viśvāni vāryā

raśmibhiḥ yaḥ atyaḥ iva mṛjyate gobhiḥ madāya haryataḥ tam gīrbhiḥ vāsayāmasi

yāti haryataḥ somaḥ gīrbhiḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ viprasya medhyātitheḥ pavamāna vidāḥ
rayim asmabhyam soma su śriyam indo sahasra varcasam induḥ atyaḥ na vāja sṛt
kanikranti pavitre ā yat akṣār ati devayuḥ pavasva vāja sātaye viprasya gṛṇataḥ
vṛdhe soma rāsva su vīryam asṛgran deva vītaye atyāsaḥ kṛtvyāḥ iva kṣarantaḥ
parvatāvṛdhaḥ pariṣkṛtāsaḥ indavaḥ yoṣā iva pitryāvatī vāyum somāḥ asṛkṣata āt

pra te sargāḥ asṛkṣata sūryasya iva na raśmayaḥ hinvānaḥ vācam iṣyasi pavamāna
vidharmaṇi akrān devaḥ na sūryaḥ hinvānaḥ hetṛbhiḥ yataḥ ā vājam vājī akramīt
sīdantaḥ vanuṣaḥ yathā pra śukrāsaḥ vayojuvaḥ hinvānāsaḥ na saptayaḥ śrīṇānāḥ
apsu mṛñjata pavamānasya te kave vājin sargāḥ asṛkṣata arvantaḥ na śravasyavaḥ
acchā kośam madhuścutam asṛgram vāre avyaye avāvaśanta dhītayaḥ acchā samudram
indavaḥ astam gāvaḥ na dhenavaḥ agman ṛtasya yonim ā asṛgran deva vītaye
vājayantaḥ rathāḥ iva eṣa tunnaḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitram ati gāhate rakṣaḥ hā vāram
avyayam yat te pavitram arcivat agne tena punīhi naḥ brahma savaiḥ punīhi naḥ

devam acchā madhumantaḥ indavaḥ asiṣyadanta gāvaḥ ā na dhenavaḥ barhiṣadaḥ
vacanāvantaḥ ūdhabhiḥ parisrutam nirṇijam dhire iṣuḥ na dhanvan prati dhīyate
matiḥ vatsaḥ na mātuḥ upa sarji ūdhani uru dhārā iva duhe agre āyatī asya

paryayāḥ vājam indo eva pavasva suvitāya navyase ā yaḥ tasthau bhuvanāni

dhīraḥ uśanā kāvyena sa cit viveda nihitam yat āsām apīcyam guhyam nāma gonām
