pṛtanājaḥ atyāḥ pari hi sma puru hūtaḥ janānām viśvā asarat bhojanā pūyamānaḥ
atha bhara śyena bhṛta prayāṃsi rayim tuñjānaḥ abhi vājam arṣa eṣa suvānaḥ pari
somaḥ pavitre sargaḥ na sṛṣṭaḥ adadhāvat arvā tigme śiśānaḥ mahiṣaḥ na śṛṅge gāḥ
gavyan abhi śūraḥ na satvā eṣā yayau paramāt antar adreḥ kūcid satīḥ ūrve gāḥ
viveda divaḥ na vidyut stanayantī abhraiḥ somasya te pavate indra dhārā uta sma
rāśim pari yāsi gonām indreṇa soma sa ratham punānaḥ pūrvīḥ iṣaḥ bṛhatīḥ jīra
dāno śikṣa śacīvas tava tāḥ upaṣṭut saḥ īm rathaḥ na bhūriṣāh ayoji mahaḥ purūṇi
sātaye vasūni āt īm viśvā nahuṣyāṇi jātā svarṣātā vane ūrdhvā navanta divyāḥ na
kośāsaḥ abhra varṣāḥ ete somāḥ ati vārāṇi avyā vṛthā samudram sindhavaḥ na nīcīḥ
sutāsaḥ abhi kalaśāṁ asṛgran śuṣmī śardhaḥ na mārutam pavasva anabhiśastā divyā
yathā viś āpaḥ na makṣū sumatiḥ bhava naḥ sahasra apsāḥ pṛtanāṣāh na yajñaḥ
rājñaḥ nu te varuṇasya vratāni bṛhat gabhīram tava soma dhāma śuciḥ tvam asi
priyaḥ na mitraḥ dakṣāyyaḥ aryamā iva asi soma pra hinvānaḥ janitā rodasyoḥ
rathaḥ na vājam saniṣyan ayāsīt indram gacchan āyudhā saṃśiśānaḥ viśvā vasu
hastayoḥ ādadhānaḥ abhi tri pṛṣṭham vṛṣaṇam vayaḥ dhām āṅgūṣāṇām avāvaśanta
vāṇīḥ vanā vasānaḥ varuṇaḥ na sindhūn vi ratna dhāḥ dayate vāryāṇi asarji vakvā
rathye yathā ājau pari suvānaḥ hariḥ aṃśuḥ pavitre rathaḥ na sarji sanaye
hiyānaḥ āpat ślokam indriyam pūyamānaḥ prati devāṁ ajuṣata prayobhiḥ sākamukṣaḥ
marjayanta svasāraḥ daśa dhīrasya dhītayaḥ dhanutrīḥ hariḥ pari adravat jāḥ
sūryasya droṇam nanakṣe atyaḥ na vājī sam mātṛbhiḥ na śiśuḥ vāvaśānaḥ vṛṣā
dadhanve puru vāraḥ adbhiḥ maryaḥ na yoṣām abhi niṣkṛtam yan sam gacchate kalaśe
usriyābhiḥ uta pra pipye ūdhar aghnyāyāḥ induḥ dhārābhiḥ sacate sumedhāḥ
mūrdhānam gāvaḥ payasā camūṣu abhi śrīṇanti vasubhiḥ na niktaiḥ sa naḥ devebhiḥ
pavamāna rada indo rayim aśvinam vāvaśānaḥ rathirāyatām uśatī purandhiḥ
asmadryak ā dāvane vasūnām nu naḥ rayim upa māsva nṛvantam punānaḥ vātāpyam
viśva ścandram pra vandituḥ indo tāri āyuḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt adhi
yat asmin vājini iva śubhaḥ spardhante dhiyaḥ sūrye na viśaḥ apaḥ vṛṇānaḥ pavate
kavīyan vrajam na paśu vardhanāya manma dvitā vyūrṇvan amṛtasya dhāma svarvide
bhuvanāni prathanta dhiyaḥ pinvānāḥ svasare na gāvaḥ ṛtāyantīḥ abhi vāvaśre
indum devaḥ devānām guhyāni nāmā āviṣkṛṇoti barhiṣi pravāce apām iva id ūrmayaḥ
tarturāṇāḥ pra manīṣāḥ īrate somam accha namasyantīḥ upa ca yanti sam ca ā ca
viśanti uśatīḥ uśantam prāvīvipat vācaḥ ūrmim na sindhuḥ giraḥ somaḥ pavamānaḥ
manīṣāḥ antar paśyan vṛjanā imā avarāṇi ā tiṣṭhati vṛṣabhaḥ goṣu jānan pari
priyaḥ kalaśe deva vātaḥ indrāya somaḥ raṇyas madāya sahasra dhāraḥ śata vājaḥ
induḥ vājī na saptiḥ samanā jigāti yathā apavathāḥ manave vayaḥ dhāḥ amitra hā
varivaḥ vid haviṣmān eva pavasva draviṇam dadhānaḥ eṣa sya somaḥ matibhiḥ
punānaḥ atyaḥ na vājī tarati id arātīḥ payaḥ na dugdham aditeḥ iṣiram uru iva
gātuḥ su yamaḥ na voḍhā su āyudhaḥ sotṛbhiḥ pūyamānaḥ abhi arṣa guhyam cāru nāma
abhi vājam saptiḥ iva śravasyā abhi vāyum abhi gāḥ deva soma maryaḥ na śubhraḥ
tanvam mṛjānaḥ atyaḥ na sṛtvā sanaye dhanānām vṛṣā iva yūthā pari kośam arṣan
kanikradat camvoḥ ā viveśa dhārāḥ bṛhatīḥ asṛgran aktaḥ gobhiḥ kalaśāṁ ā viveśa
sāma kṛṇvan sāmanyaḥ vipaścit krandan eti abhi sakhyuḥ na jāmim sa raṃhate
urugāyasya jūtim vṛthā krīḍantam mimate na gāvaḥ parīṇasam kṛṇute tigma śṛṅgaḥ
divā hariḥ dadṛśe naktam ṛjraḥ granthim na vi sya grathitam punānaḥ ṛjum ca
gātum vṛjinam ca soma atyaḥ na kradaḥ hariḥ ā sṛjānaḥ maryaḥ deva dhanva
pastyāvān a raśmānaḥ ye a rathāḥ a yuktāḥ atyāsaḥ na sasṛjānāsaḥ ājau ete
śukrāsaḥ dhanvanti somāḥ devāsaḥ tāṁ upa yāta pibadhyai aśvaḥ na u kradaḥ
vṛṣabhiḥ yujānaḥ siṃhaḥ na bhīmaḥ manasaḥ javīyān arvācīnaiḥ pathibhiḥ ye
rajiṣṭhā ā pavasva saumanasam naḥ indo divyaḥ suparṇaḥ ava cakṣi soma pinvan
dhārāḥ karmaṇā deva vītau ā indo viśa kalaśam soma dhānam krandan ihi sūryasya
upa raśmim tisraḥ vācaḥ īrayati pra vahniḥ ṛtasya dhītim brahmaṇaḥ manīṣām gāvaḥ
yanti gopatim pṛcchamānāḥ somam yanti matayaḥ vāvaśānāḥ somaḥ sutaḥ dhārayā
sindhuḥ na nimnam abhi vājī akṣār ā yonim vanyam asadat punānaḥ sam induḥ gobhiḥ
asarat sam adbhiḥ abhi navante adruhaḥ priyam indrasya kāmyam vatsam na pūrve
āyuni jātam rihanti mātaraḥ pari te jigyuṣaḥ yathā dhārā sutasya dhāvati
raṃhamāṇā vi avyayam vāram vājī iva sānasiḥ tvām rihanti mātaraḥ harim pavitre
adruhaḥ vatsam jātam na dhenavaḥ pavamāna vidharmaṇi yaḥ dhārayā pāvakayā
pariprasyandate sutaḥ induḥ aśvaḥ na kṛtvyaḥ ete pūtāḥ vipaścitaḥ somāsaḥ dadhi
āśiraḥ sūryāsaḥ na darśatāsaḥ jigatnavaḥ dhruvāḥ ghṛte pra sunvānasya andhasaḥ
martaḥ na vṛta tat vacaḥ apa śvānam arādhasam hata makham na bhṛgavaḥ ā jāmiḥ
atke avyata bhuje na putraḥ oṇyoḥ sarat jāraḥ na yoṣaṇām varaḥ na yonim āsadam
sakhāyaḥ ā ni sīdata punānāya pra gāyata śiśum na yajñaiḥ pari bhūṣata śriye sam
ī vatsam na mātṛbhiḥ sṛjata gaya sādhanam devāvyam madam abhi dvi śavasam sa naḥ
madānām pate indo deva psarāḥ asi sakhā iva sakhye gātu vittamaḥ bhava tam
sakhāyaḥ madāya punānam abhi gāyata śiśum na yajñaiḥ svadayanta gūrtibhiḥ sa naḥ
harīṇām pate indo deva psarastamaḥ sakhā iva sakhye naryaḥ ruce bhava anūpe
gomān gobhiḥ akṣār somaḥ dugdhābhiḥ akṣār samudram na agman mandī madāya tośate
sa māmṛje tiras aṇvāni meṣyaḥ mīḍhe saptiḥ na vājayuḥ anumādyaḥ pavamānaḥ
manīṣibhiḥ somaḥ viprebhiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ pra soma deva vītaye sindhuḥ na pipye arṇasā
aṃśoḥ payasā madiraḥ na jāgṛviḥ acchā kośam madhuścutam ā haryataḥ arjune atke
avyata priyaḥ sūnuḥ na marjyaḥ tam īm hinvanti apasaḥ yathā ratham nadīṣu ā
gabhastyoḥ pavasva vāja sātaye abhi viśvāni kāvyā tvam samudram prathamaḥ vi
dhārayaḥ devebhyaḥ soma matsaraḥ apaḥ vasānaḥ pari kośam arṣati induḥ hiyānaḥ
sotṛbhiḥ janayan jyotiḥ mandanā avīvaśat gāḥ kṛṇvānaḥ na nirṇijam eṣa sya
dhārayā sutaḥ vārebhiḥ pavate madintamaḥ krīḍan ūrmiḥ apām iva ā sota pari
siñcata aśvam na stomam apturam rajasturam vanakrakṣam uda prutam indrasya hārdi
soma dhānam ā viśa samudram iva sindhavaḥ juṣṭaḥ mitrāya varuṇāya vāyave divaḥ
viṣṭambhaḥ uttamaḥ pavasva soma kratve dakṣāya aśvaḥ na niktaḥ vājī dhanāya
somaḥ punānaḥ avyaye vāre śiśuḥ na krīḍan pavamānaḥ akṣār sahasra dhāraḥ śata
vājaḥ induḥ agre bṛhan uṣasām ūrdhvaḥ asthāt niḥ jaganvān tamasaḥ jyotiṣā agāt
agniḥ bhānunā ruśatā su aṅgaḥ ā jātaḥ viśvā sadmāni aprāḥ sa jātaḥ garbhaḥ asi
rodasyoḥ agne cāruḥ vi bhṛtaḥ oṣadhīṣu citraḥ śiśuḥ pari tamāṃsi aktūn pra
mātṛbhyaḥ adhi kanikradat gāḥ viṣṇuḥ itthā paramam asya vidvān jātaḥ bṛhan abhi
pāti tṛtīyam āsā yat asya payaḥ akrata svam sacetasaḥ abhi arcanti atra atas u
tvā pitu bhṛtaḥ janitrīḥ annāvṛdham prati caranti annaiḥ tāḥ īm prati eṣi punar
anya rūpāḥ asi tvam vikṣu mānuṣīṣu hotā hotāram citra ratham adhvarasya yajñasya
yajñasya ketum ruśantam pratyardhim devasya devasya mahnā śriyā tu agnim atithim
janānām sa tu vastrāṇi adha peśanāni vasānaḥ agniḥ nābhā pṛthivyāḥ aruṣaḥ jātaḥ
pade iḍāyāḥ purohitaḥ rājan yakṣi iha devān ā hi dyāvāpṛthivī agne ubhe sadā
putraḥ na mātarā tatantha pra yāhi acchā uśataḥ yaviṣṭha atha ā vaha sahasya iha
devān piprīhi devāṁ uśataḥ yaviṣṭha vidvāṁ ṛtūn ṛtu pate yaja iha ye daivyāḥ
ṛtvijaḥ tebhiḥ agne tvam hotṝṇām asi āyajiṣṭhaḥ veṣi hotram uta potram janānām
mandhātā asi draviṇaḥ dāḥ ṛtāvā svāhā vayam kṛṇavāmā havīṃṣi devaḥ devān yajatu
agniḥ arhan ā devānām api panthām aganma yat śaknavāma tat anu pravoḍhum agniḥ
vidvān sa yajāt sa id u hotā saḥ adhvarān saḥ ṛtūn kalpayāti yat vaḥ vayam pra
mināma vratāni viduṣām devau aviduṣṭarāsaḥ agniḥ ṭat viśvam ā pṛṇāti vidvān
yebhiḥ devāṁ ṛtubhiḥ kalpayāti yat pākatrā manasā dīna dakṣāḥ na yajñasya
manvate martyāsaḥ agniḥ tad hotā kratu vid vijānan yajiṣṭhaḥ devāṁ ṛtuśas yajāti
viśveṣām hi adhvarāṇām anīkam citram ketum janitā tvā jajāna saḥ ā yajasva
nṛvatīḥ anu kṣāḥ spārhāḥ iṣaḥ kṣumatīḥ viśvajanyāḥ yam tvā dyāvāpṛthivī yam tvā
āpaḥ tvaṣṭā yam tvā su janimā jajāna panthām anu pravidvān pitṛyāṇam dyumat agne
samidhānaḥ vi bhāhi inaḥ rājan aratiḥ samiddhaḥ raudraḥ dakṣāya suṣumāṁ adarśi
cikit vi bhāti bhāsā bṛhatā asiknīm eti ruśatīm apājan kṛṣṇām yat enīm abhi
varpasā bhūt janayan yoṣām bṛhataḥ pituḥ jām ūrdhvam bhānum sūryasya stabhāyan
divaḥ vasubhiḥ aratiḥ vi bhāti bhadraḥ bhadrayā sacamānaḥ āgāt svasāram jāraḥ
abhi eti paścāt su praketaiḥ dyubhiḥ agniḥ vitiṣṭhan ruśadbhiḥ varṇaiḥ abhi
rāmam asthāt asya yāmāsaḥ bṛhataḥ na vagnūn indhānāḥ agneḥ sakhyuḥ śivasya
īḍyasya vṛṣṇaḥ bṛhataḥ svāsaḥ bhāmāsaḥ yāman aktavaḥ cikitre svanāḥ na yasya
bhāmāsaḥ pavante rocamānasya bṛhataḥ su divaḥ jyeṣṭhebhiḥ yaḥ tejiṣṭhaiḥ
krīḍumadbhiḥ varṣiṣṭhebhiḥ bhānubhiḥ nakṣati dyām svanāḥ na yasya bhāmāsaḥ
pavante rocamānasya bṛhataḥ su divaḥ jyeṣṭhebhiḥ yaḥ tejiṣṭhaiḥ krīḍumadbhiḥ
varṣiṣṭhebhiḥ bhānubhiḥ nakṣati dyām asya śuṣmāsaḥ dadṛśāna paveḥ jehamānasya
svanayan niyudbhiḥ pratnebhiḥ yaḥ ruśadbhiḥ devatamaḥ vi rebhadbhiḥ aratiḥ bhāti
vibhvā saḥ ā vakṣi mahi naḥ ā ca satsi divaspṛthivyoḥ aratiḥ yuvatyoḥ agniḥ
sutukaḥ sutukebhiḥ aśvaiḥ rabhasvadbhiḥ rabhasvāṁ ā iha gamyāḥ pra te yakṣi pra
te iyarmi manma bhuvaḥ yathā vandyaḥ naḥ haveṣu dhanvan iva prapā asi tvam agne

vrajam yaviṣṭha dūtaḥ devānām asi martyānām antar mahān carasi rocanena śiśum na
tvā jenyam vardhayantī mātā bibharti sacanasyamānā dhanoḥ adhi pravatā yāsi
haryan jigīṣase paśuḥ iva avasṛṣṭaḥ mūrāḥ a mūraiḥ na vayam cikitvaḥ mahi tvam
agne tvam aṅga vitse śaye vavriḥ carati jihvayā adan rerihyate yuvatim viśpatiḥ
san kūcid jāyate sanayāsu navyaḥ vane tasthau palitaḥ dhūma ketuḥ asnātā apaḥ
vṛṣabhaḥ na _ veti sacetasaḥ yam praṇayanta martāḥ tanūtyajā iva taskarā vanargū
raśanābhiḥ daśabhiḥ abhi adhītām iyam te agne navyasī manīṣā yukṣvā ratham na
śucayadbhiḥ aṅgaiḥ brahma ca te jātavedaḥ namaḥ ca iyam ca gīḥ sadam id vardhanī
bhūt rakṣā ṇaḥ agne tanayāni tokā rakṣa uta naḥ tanvaḥ aprayucchan ekaḥ samudraḥ
dharuṇaḥ rayīṇām asmat hṛdaḥ bhūri janmā vi caṣṭe siṣakti ūdhaḥ niṇyoḥ upasthe
utsasya madhye nihitam padam veḥ samānam nīḍam vṛṣaṇaḥ vasānāḥ sam jagmire
mahiṣāḥ arvatībhiḥ ṛtasya padam kavayaḥ ni pānti guhā nāmāni dadhire parāṇi
ṛtāyinī māyinī sam dadhāte mitvā śiśum jajñatuḥ vardhayantī viśvasya nābhim
carataḥ dhruvasya kaveḥ cit tantum manasā viyantaḥ ṛtasya hi vartanayaḥ su jātam
iṣaḥ vājāya pradivaḥ sacante adhīvāsam rodasī vāvasāne ghṛtaiḥ annaiḥ vāvṛdhāte
madhūnām sapta svasṝḥ aruṣīḥ vāvaśānaḥ vidvān madhvaḥ ud jabhārā dṛśe kam antar

tatakṣuḥ tāsām ekām id abhi aṃhuraḥ gāt āyoḥ ha skambhaḥ upamasya nīḍe pathām

patvā jigāti mandraḥ hotā sa juhvā yajiṣṭhaḥ sammiślaḥ agniḥ ā jigharti devān
tam usrām indram na rejamānam agnim gīrbhiḥ namobhiḥ ā kṛṇudhvam ā yam viprāsaḥ

agnim āyavaḥ ajananta vikṣu hotāram ni asādayanta svayam yajasva divi deva devān
kim te pākaḥ kṛṇavat apracetāḥ yathā ayajaḥ ṛtubhiḥ deva devān evā yajasva

ṣṭhā mayaḥ bhuvaḥ tāḥ naḥ ūrje dadhātana mahe raṇāya cakṣase yaḥ vaḥ śivatamaḥ
rasaḥ tasya bhājayata iha naḥ uśatīḥ iva mātaraḥ tasmai aram gamāma vaḥ yasya
kṣayāya jinvatha āpaḥ janayatha ca naḥ śam naḥ devīḥ abhiṣṭaye āpaḥ bhavantu

sakhā sakhyam vaṣṭi etat salakṣmā yat viṣurūpā bhavāti mahaḥ putrāsaḥ asurasya
vīrāḥ divaḥ dhartāraḥ urviyā pari khyan uśanti ghā te amṛtāsaḥ etat ekasya cit
tyajasam martyasya ni te manaḥ manasi dhāyi asme janyuḥ patiḥ tanvam ā viviśyāḥ
na yat purā cakṛma kad ha nūnam ṛtā vadantaḥ anṛtam rapema gandharvaḥ apsu apyā
ca yoṣā naḥ nābhiḥ paramam jāmi tat nau garbhe nu nau janitā dampatī kaḥ devaḥ
tvaṣṭā savitā viśva rūpaḥ nakir asya pra minanti vratāni veda nau asya pṛthivī
uta dyauḥ kaḥ asya veda prathamasya ahnaḥ kaḥ īm dadarśa kaḥ iha pra vocat bṛhat
mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma kad u bravaḥ āhanaḥ vīcyā nṝn yamasya mā yamyam kāmaḥ
āgan samāne yonau sahaśeyyāya jāyā iva patye tanvam riricyām vi cit vṛheva
rathyā iva cakrā na tiṣṭhanti na ni miṣanti ete devānām spaśaḥ iha ye caranti
anyena mat āhanaḥ yāhi tūyam tena vi vṛha rathyā iva cakrā rātrībhiḥ asmai
ahabhiḥ daśasyet sūryasya cakṣuḥ muhur ud mimīyāt divā pṛthivyā mithunā sabandhū
yamīḥ yamasya bibhṛyāt ajāmi ā ghā tā gacchān uttarā yugāni yatra jāmayaḥ
kṛṇavan ajāmi upa barbṛhi vṛṣabhāya bāhum anyam icchasva subhage patim mat kim
bhrātā asat yat anātham bhavāti kim u svasā yat nirṛtiḥ nigacchāt svasā kāma
mūtā bahu etat rapāmi tanvā me tanvam sam pipṛgdhi na vai u te tanvā tanvam sam
papṛcyām pāpam āhuḥ yaḥ svasāram nigacchāt anyena mat pramudaḥ kalpayasva na te
bhrātā subhage vaṣṭi etat bataḥ bata asi yama na eva te manaḥ hṛdayam ca avidāma
anyā kila tvām kakṣyā iva yuktam pari svajāte libujā iva vṛkṣam anyam ū ṣu tvam
yamī anyaḥ u tvām pari svajāte libujā iva vṛkṣam tasya vā tvam manaḥ iccha sa vā
tava adhā kṛṇuṣva saṃvidam su bhadrām vṛṣā vṛṣṇe duduhe dohasā divaḥ payāṃsi
yahvaḥ aditeḥ adābhyaḥ viśvam sa veda varuṇaḥ yathā dhiyā sa yajñiyaḥ yajatu
yajñiyāṁ ṛtūn rapat gandharvīḥ apyā ca yoṣaṇā nadasya nāde pari pātu me manaḥ
iṣṭasya madhye aditiḥ ni dhātu naḥ sā u cit nu bhadrā kṣumatī uṣāḥ uvāsa manave
svarvatī yat uśantam uśatām anu kratum agnim hotāram vidathāya jījanan adha tyam
drapsam vibhvam vicakṣaṇam viḥ ābharat iṣitaḥ śyenaḥ adhvare yadī viśaḥ vṛṇate
dasmam agnim hotāram adha dhīḥ ajāyata sadā asi raṇvaḥ yavasā iva puṣyate agne
su adhvaraḥ viprasya vā yat śaśamānaḥ ukthyam vājam sasavāṁ upayāsi bhūribhiḥ ud
īraya pitarā jāraḥ ā bhagam iyakṣati haryataḥ hṛttas iṣyati vivakti vahniḥ
svapasyate makhaḥ taviṣyate asuraḥ vepate matī yaḥ te agne sumatim martaḥ akṣat
ati sa pra śṛṇve iṣam dadhānaḥ vahamānaḥ aśvaiḥ iṣam dadhānaḥ vahamānaḥ aśvaiḥ ā
sa dyumāṁ amavān bhūṣati dyūn yat agne eṣā samitiḥ bhavāti devī deveṣu yajatā
yajatra ratnā ca yat vibhajāsi svadhāvas bhāgam naḥ atra vasumantam vītāt śrudhi
naḥ agne sadane sadhasthe yukṣva ratham amṛtasya dravitnum ā naḥ vaha rodasī
deva putre mākir devānām apa bhūḥ iha syāḥ dyāvā ha kṣāmā prathame ṛtena
abhiśrāve bhavataḥ satya vācā devaḥ yat martān yajathāya kṛṇvan sīdat hotā
pratyaṅ svam asum yan devaḥ devān paribhūḥ ṛtena vaha naḥ havyam prathamaḥ
cikitvān dhūma ketuḥ samidhā bhāṛjīkaḥ mandraḥ hotā nityaḥ vācā yajīyān svāvṛj
devasya amṛtam goḥ atas jātāsaḥ dhārayante urvī viśve devāḥ anu tat te yajuḥ guḥ
duhe yat divyam ghṛtam vāḥ arcāmi vām vardhāya apaḥ ghṛtasnū dyāvā bhūmī śṛṇutam
rodasī me ahā yat dyāvaḥ asunītim ayan madhvā naḥ atra pitarā śiśītām kim svid
naḥ rājā jagṛhe kad asya ati vratam cakṛmā kaḥ vi veda mitraḥ cit hi sma
juhurāṇaḥ devān ślokaḥ na yātām api vājaḥ asti durmantu atra amṛtasya nāma
salakṣmā yat viṣurūpā bhavāti yamasya yaḥ manavate sumantu agne tam ṛṣva pāhi
aprayucchan yasmin devāḥ vidathe mādayante vivasvataḥ sadane dhārayante sūrye
jyotiḥ adadhuḥ māsi aktūn pari dyotanim carataḥ ajasrā yasmin devāḥ manmani
saṃcaranti apīcye na vayam asya vidma mitraḥ naḥ aditiḥ anāgān savitā devaḥ
varuṇāya vocat śrudhi naḥ agne sadane sadhasthe yukṣva ratham amṛtasya dravitnum
ā naḥ vaha rodasī deva putre mākir devānām apa bhūḥ iha syāḥ syāḥ pareyivāṃsam
pravataḥ mahīḥ anu bahubhyaḥ panthām anupaspaśānam vaivasvatam saṃgamanam
janānām yamam rājānam haviṣā duvasya yamaḥ naḥ gātum prathamaḥ viveda na eṣā
gavyūtiḥ apabhartavai u yatrā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pareyuḥ enā jajñānāḥ pathyāḥ anu
svāḥ mātalī kavyaiḥ yamaḥ aṅgirobhiḥ bṛhaspatiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ yān ca devāḥ
vāvṛdhuḥ ye ca devān svāhā anye svadhayā anye madanti imam yama prastaram ā sīda
aṅgirobhiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ ā tvā mantrāḥ kavi śastāḥ vahantu enā rājan
haviṣā mādayasva aṅgirobhiḥ ā gahi yajñiyebhiḥ yama vairūpaiḥ iha mādayasva
vivasvantam huve yaḥ pitā te asmin yajñe barhiṣi ā niṣadya aṅgirasaḥ naḥ pitaraḥ
navagvāḥ atharvāṇaḥ bhṛgavaḥ somyāsaḥ aṅgirasaḥ naḥ pitaraḥ navagvāḥ atharvāṇaḥ
bhṛgavaḥ somyāsaḥ teṣām vayam sumatau yajñiyānām api bhadre saumanase syāma
prehi pathibhiḥ pūrvyebhiḥ yatrā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pareyuḥ ubhā rājānā svadhayā
madantā yamam paśyāsi varuṇam ca devam sam gacchasva pitṛbhiḥ sam yamena
iṣṭāpūrtena parame vyoman hitvāya avadyam punar astam ehi sam gacchasva tanvā
suvarcāḥ apeta vīta vi ca sarpata atas asmai etam pitaraḥ lokam akran ahobhiḥ
adbhiḥ aktubhiḥ vyaktam yamaḥ dadāti avasānam asmai ati drava sārameyau śvānau
catur akṣau śabalau sādhunā pathā athā pitṝn suvidatrāṁ upehi yamena ye
sadhamādam madanti yama tābhyām enam pari dehi rājan svasti ca asmai anamīvam ca
dhehi urūṇasau asutṛpau udumbalau yamasya dūtau carataḥ janāṁ anu tau asmabhyam
dṛśaye sūryāya punar dātām asum adya iha bhadram yamāya somam sunuta yamāya
juhuta haviḥ yamam ha yajñaḥ gacchati agni dūtaḥ araṃkṛtaḥ yamāya ghṛtavat haviḥ
juhota pra ca tiṣṭhata sa naḥ deveṣu ā yamat dīrgham āyuḥ pra jīvase yamāya
madhumattamam rājñe havyam juhotana idam namaḥ ṛṣibhyaḥ pūrvajebhyaḥ pūrvebhyaḥ
pathikṛdbhyaḥ trikadrukebhiḥ patati ṣaṣ urvīḥ ekam id bṛhat triṣṭubh gāyatrī
chandāṃsi sarvā tā yame āhitā ud īratām avare ud parāsaḥ ud madhyamāḥ pitaraḥ
somyāsaḥ asum ye īyuḥ avṛkāḥ ṛta jñāḥ te naḥ avantu pitaraḥ haveṣu idam
pitṛbhyaḥ namaḥ astu adya ye pūrvāsaḥ ye uparāsaḥ īyuḥ ye pārthive rajasi ā
niṣattāḥ ye vā nūnam su vṛjanāsu vikṣu ā aham pitṝn suvidatrāṁ avitsi napātam ca
vikramaṇam ca viṣṇoḥ barhiṣadaḥ ye svadhayā sutasya bhajanta te iha āgamiṣṭhāḥ
barhiṣadaḥ pitaraḥ ūtī arvāk imā vaḥ havyā cakṛma te ā gata avasā śantamena athā
naḥ śam yoḥ arapaḥ dadhāta upahūtāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ barhiṣyeṣu nidhiṣu priyeṣu
te ā gamantu te iha śruvantu adhi bruvantu te avantu asmān ācya jānu dakṣiṇatas
niṣadya imam yajñam abhi gṛṇīta viśve mā hiṃsiṣṭa pitaraḥ kena cit naḥ yat vaḥ
āgaḥ puruṣa tā karāma āsīnāsaḥ aruṇīnām upasthe rayim dhatta dāśuṣe martyāya
putrebhyaḥ pitaraḥ tasya vasvaḥ pra yacchata te iha ūrjam dadhāta ye naḥ pūrve
pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ anūhire soma pītham vasiṣṭhāḥ tebhiḥ yamaḥ sam rarāṇaḥ havīṃṣi
uśan uśadbhiḥ pratikāmam attu ye tātṛṣuḥ devatrā jehamānāḥ stoma taṣṭāsaḥ arkaiḥ
ā agne yāhi suvidatrebhiḥ arvāṅ satyaiḥ kavyaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ gharma sadbhiḥ ye
satyāsaḥ haviḥ adaḥ haviṣpāḥ indreṇa devaiḥ sa ratham dadhānāḥ ā agne yāhi
sahasram deva vandaiḥ paraiḥ pūrvaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ gharma sadbhiḥ agniṣvāttāḥ pitaraḥ
ā iha gacchata sadaḥ sadaḥ sadata su praṇītayaḥ attā havīṃṣi prayatāni barhiṣi
athā rayim sarva vīram dadhātana tvam agne īḍitaḥ jātavedaḥ avāṭ havyāni
surabhīṇi kṛtvī prādāḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhayā te akṣan addhi tvam deva prayatā
havīṃṣi ye ca iha pitaraḥ ye ca na iha yān ca vidma yāṁ u ca na pravidma tvam
vettha yati te jātavedaḥ svadhābhiḥ yajñam su kṛtam juṣasva tebhiḥ svarāj
asunītim etām yathāvaśam tanvam kalpayasva mā enam agne vi dahaḥ mā abhi śocaḥ
mā asya tvacam cikṣipaḥ mā śarīram yadā śṛtam kṛṇavaḥ jātavedaḥ atha īm enam pra
hiṇutāt pitṛbhyaḥ śṛtam yadā karasi jātavedaḥ atha īm enam pari dattāt pitṛbhyaḥ
yadā gacchāti asunītim etām atha devānām vaśanīḥ bhavāti sūryam cakṣuḥ gacchatu
vātam ātmā dyām ca gaccha pṛthivīm ca dharmaṇā apaḥ vā gaccha yadi tatra te
hitam oṣadhīṣu prati tiṣṭha śarīraiḥ ajaḥ bhāgaḥ tapasā tam tapasva tam te śociḥ
tapatu tam te arciḥ yāḥ te śivāḥ tanvaḥ jātavedaḥ tābhiḥ vaha enam su kṛtām u
lokam ava sṛja punar agne pitṛbhyaḥ yaḥ te āhutaḥ carati svadhābhiḥ āyuḥ vasānaḥ
upa vetu śeṣaḥ sam gacchatām tanvā jātavedaḥ yat te kṛṣṇaḥ śakunaḥ ātutoda
pipīlaḥ sarpaḥ uta vā śvāpadaḥ agniḥ tat viśva ad agadam kṛṇotu somaḥ ca yaḥ
brāhmaṇāṁ āviveśa agneḥ varma pari gobhiḥ vyayasva sam pra ūrṇuṣva pīvasā medasā
ca na id tvā dhṛṣṇuḥ harasā jarhṛṣāṇaḥ vidhakṣyan paryaṅkhayāte imam agne
camasam mā vi jihvaraḥ priyaḥ devānām uta somyānām yaḥ camasaḥ deva pānaḥ tasmin
devāḥ amṛtāḥ mādayante agnim pra hiṇomi dūram yama rājñaḥ gacchatu ripra vāhaḥ
iha eva ayam itaraḥ jātavedāḥ devebhyaḥ havyam vahatu prajānan yaḥ agniḥ
praviveśa vaḥ gṛham imam paśyan itaram jātavedasam yaḥ yaḥ agniḥ agniḥ praviveśa
praviveśa vaḥ vaḥ gṛham gṛham imam imam paśyan paśyan itaram itaram jātavedasam
jātavedasam tam harāmi pitṛ yajñāya devam sa gharmam invāt parame sadhasthe yaḥ
agniḥ kravya vāhanaḥ pitṝn yakṣat pra id u havyāni vocati devebhyaḥ ca pitṛbhyaḥ
ā uśantaḥ tvā ni dhīmahi uśantaḥ sam idhīmahi uśan uśataḥ ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe
attave yam tvam agne samadahaḥ yam tvam agne samadahaḥ tam u niḥ vāpayā punar
kiyāmbū atra rohatu pākadūrvā vyalkaśā śītike śītikāvati hlādike hlādikāvati
maṇḍūkyā su sam gamaḥ imam su agnim harṣaya tvaṣṭā duhitre vahatum kṛṇoti iti
viśvam bhuvanam sam eti yamasya mātā paryuhyamānā mahaḥ jāyā vivasvataḥ nanāśa
apāgūhan amṛtām martyebhyaḥ kṛtvī savarṇām adaduḥ vivasvate uta aśvinau abharat
yat tat āsīt ajahāt u dvā mithunā saraṇyūḥ pūṣā tvā itas cyāvayatu pra vidvān a
naṣṭa paśuḥ bhuvanasya gopāḥ sa tvā etebhyaḥ pari dadat pitṛbhyaḥ agniḥ
devebhyaḥ suvidatriyebhyaḥ āyuḥ pari pāsati tvā pūṣā tvā pātu prapathe purastāt
yatra āsate su kṛtaḥ yatra te yayuḥ tatra tvā devaḥ savitā dadhātu pūṣā imāḥ
āśāḥ anu veda sarvāḥ saḥ asmāṁ abhayatamena neṣat svasti dāḥ āghṛṇiḥ sarva vīraḥ
aprayucchan puras etu prajānan prapathe pathām ajaniṣṭa pūṣā prapathe divaḥ
prapathe pṛthivyāḥ ubhe abhi priyatame sadhasthe ā ca parā ca carati prajānan
sarasvatīm devayantaḥ havante sarasvatīm adhvare tāyamāne sarasvatīm su kṛtaḥ
ahvayanta sarasvatī dāśuṣe vāryam dāt sarasvati yā sa ratham yayātha svadhābhiḥ
devi pitṛbhiḥ madantī āsadya asmin barhiṣi mādayasva anamīvā iṣaḥ ā dhehi
sarasvatīm yām pitaraḥ havante dakṣiṇā yajñam abhinakṣamāṇāḥ sahasra argham iḍaḥ
atra bhāgam rāyaḥ poṣam yajamāneṣu dhehi āpaḥ asmān mātaraḥ śundhayantu ghṛtena
naḥ ghṛta pvaḥ punantu viśvam hi ripram pravahanti devīḥ ud id ābhyaḥ śuciḥ ā
pūtaḥ emi drapsaḥ caskanda prathamāṁ anu dyūn imam ca yonim anu yaḥ ca pūrvaḥ
samānam yonim anu saṃcarantam drapsam juhomi anu sapta hotrāḥ tam juhomi manasā
payasvatīḥ oṣadhayaḥ payasvat māmakam vacaḥ apām payasvat id payaḥ tena mā saha
śundhata param mṛtyo anu parehi panthām yaḥ te svaḥ itaraḥ deva yānāt cakṣuṣmate
śṛṇvate te bravīmi mā naḥ prajām rīriṣaḥ mā uta vīrān mṛtyoḥ padam yopayantaḥ
yat aita drāghīyaḥ āyuḥ prataram dadhānāḥ āpyāyamānāḥ prajayā dhanena śuddhāḥ
pūtāḥ bhavata ime jīvāḥ mṛtaiḥ āvavṛtran abhūt bhadrā deva hūtiḥ adya prāñcaḥ
agāma nṛtaye hasāya drāghīyaḥ āyuḥ prataram dadhānāḥ imam jīvebhyaḥ paridhim
dadhāmi mā eṣām nu gāt aparaḥ artham etam śatam jīvantu śaradaḥ purūcīḥ antar
mṛtyum dadhatām parvatena yathā yathā ahāni ahāni anupūrvam anupūrvam bhavanti
bhavanti yatha yatha ṛtavaḥ ṛtavaḥ ṛtubhiḥ ṛtubhiḥ yanti yanti sādhu sādhu yathā
na pūrvam aparaḥ jahāti evā dhātar āyūṃṣi kalpaya eṣām ā rohata āyuḥ jarasam
vṛṇānāḥ anupūrvam yatamānāḥ yati ṣṭha iha tvaṣṭā su janimā sajoṣāḥ dīrgham āyuḥ
karati jīvase vaḥ imāḥ nārīḥ a vidhavāḥ su patnīḥ āñjanena sarpiṣā sam viśantu
an aśravaḥ anamīvāḥ su ratnāḥ ā rohantu janayaḥ yonim agre ud īrṣva nāri abhi
jīva lokam gatāsum etam upa śeṣe abhi sam babhūtha su vīrāḥ viśvāḥ spṛdhaḥ
abhimātīḥ jayema upa sarpa mātaram bhūmim etām uru vyacasam pṛthivīm su śevām
yuvatiḥ eṣā tvā pātu nirṛteḥ upasthāt ucchvañcasva pṛthivi mā ni bādhathāḥ su
upāyanā asmai bhava su upavañcanā mātā putram yathā sicā abhī enam bhūme ūrṇuhi
ucchvañcamānā pṛthivī su tiṣṭhatu sahasram mitaḥ upa hi śrayantām te gṛhāsaḥ
ghṛtaścutaḥ bhavantu viśvāhā asmai śaraṇāḥ santu atra ud te stabhnāmi pṛthivīm
tvat pari imam logam nidadhan mā u aham riṣam etām sthūṇām pitaraḥ dhārayantu te
atrā yamaḥ sādanā minotu pratīcīm jagrabhā vācam aśvam raśanayā yathā bhadram
naḥ api vātaya manaḥ agnim īḍe bhujām yaviṣṭham mitram yasya dharman svar enīḥ
saparyanti mātuḥ ūdhaḥ yam āsā bhāsā ketum vardhayanti bhrājate aryaḥ viśām
gātuḥ eti pra yat ānaṭ divaḥ antān kaviḥ abhram dīdyānaḥ juṣat havyā mānuṣasya
ūrdhvaḥ tasthau ṛbhvāḥ yajñe minvan sadma puras eti sa hi kṣemaḥ haviḥ yajñaḥ
śruṣṭi id asya gātuḥ eti agnim devāḥ vāśīmantam yajñāsāham duvaḥ iṣe agnim
pūrvasya śevasya adreḥ sūnum āyum āhuḥ naraḥ ye ke ca asmat ā viśvā id te vāme ā
syuḥ agnim haviṣā vardhantaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ śvetaḥ aruṣaḥ yāmaḥ asya bradhnaḥ ṛjraḥ uta
śoṇaḥ yaśasvān hiraṇya rūpam janitā jajāna iṣam ūrjam su kṣitim viśvam ābhāḥ ā
agnim na svavṛktibhiḥ hotāram tvā vṛṇīmahe yajñāya stīrṇa barhiṣe vi vaḥ made
śīram pāvaka śociṣam vivakṣase tvām u te su ābhuvaḥ śumbhanti aśva rādhasaḥ veti
tvām upasecanī ṛjītiḥ āhutiḥ vi vaḥ made vivakṣase tve dharmāṇaḥ āsate juhūbhiḥ
siñcatīḥ iva kṛṣṇā rūpāṇi arjunā viśvāḥ adhi śriyaḥ dhiṣe vi vaḥ made vivakṣase
yam agne manyase rayim sahasāvan amartya tam ā bharāḥ vi vaḥ made vivakṣase
agniḥ jātaḥ atharvaṇā vidat viśvāni kāvyā bhuvat dūtaḥ vivasvataḥ priyaḥ yamasya
kāmyaḥ vaḥ made vivakṣase tvām yajñeṣu īḍate agne prayati adhvare tvam vasūni
kāmyā viśvā dadhāsi dāśuṣe vi vaḥ made vivakṣase tvām yajñeṣu ṛtvijam cārum agne
ni ṣedire ghṛta pratīkam manuṣaḥ śukram cetiṣṭham akṣabhiḥ agne śukreṇa śociṣā
uru prathayase bṛhat abhikrandan vṛṣāyase garbham dadhāsi jāmiṣu vi vaḥ made
vivakṣase kuha śrutaḥ indraḥ kasmin adya jane mitraḥ na śrūyate ṛṣīṇām vā yaḥ
kṣaye guhā vā carkṛṣe girā iha śrutaḥ indraḥ asme adya stave vajrī ṛcīṣamaḥ
mitraḥ na yaḥ janeṣu ā yaśaḥ cakre asāmi ā mahaḥ yaḥ patiḥ śavasaḥ asāmi ā mahaḥ
nṛmṇasya tūtujiḥ pitā putram iva priyam mahaḥ yaḥ patiḥ śavasaḥ asāmi ā mahaḥ
nṛmṇasya tūtujiḥ pitā putram iva priyam yujānaḥ aśvā vātasya dhunī devaḥ devasya
vajrivas sṛjāna stoṣi adhvanaḥ tvam tyā cit vātasya aśvā agāḥ ṛjrā tmanā
vahadhyai yayoḥ devaḥ na martyaḥ yantā nakir vidāyyaḥ adha gmantā uśanā pṛcchate
vām kadarthāḥ naḥ ā gṛham ā jagmathuḥ parākāt divaḥ ca gmaḥ ca martyam ā naḥ
indra pṛkṣase asmākam brahma udyatam tat tvā yācāmahe avaḥ śuṣṇam yat han a
mānuṣam akarmā dasyuḥ abhi naḥ amantuḥ anya vrataḥ a mānuṣaḥ tvam tasya amitra
han vadhar dāsasya dambhaya tvam naḥ indra śūra śūraiḥ uta tvotāsaḥ barhaṇā
purutrā vi pūrtayaḥ navanta kṣoṇayaḥ yathā tvam tān vṛtra hatye codayaḥ nṝn
kārpāṇe śūra vajrivas mā akudhryak indra śūra vasvīḥ asme bhūvan abhiṣṭayaḥ
vayam vayam te āsām sumne syāma vajrivas a hiṃsantīḥ upaspṛśaḥ vidyāma yāsām
bhujaḥ dhenūnām na vajrivas tā te indra santu satyā ahastā yat apadī vardhata
kṣāḥ śacībhiḥ vedyānām śuṣṇam pari pradakṣiṇit viśva āyave ni śiśnathaḥ piba id
indra śūra somam mā riṣaṇyaḥ vasavāna vasuḥ san uta trāyasva gṛṇataḥ maghonaḥ
mahaḥ ca rāyaḥ revataḥ kṛdhī naḥ yajāmahe indram vajra dakṣiṇam harīṇām rathyam
vivratānām pra śmaśru dodhuvat ūrdhvathā bhūt vi senābhiḥ dayamānaḥ vi rādhasā
harī nu asya yā vane vide vasu indraḥ maghaiḥ maghavā vṛtra hā bhuvat ṛbhuḥ
vājaḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ patyate śavaḥ ava kṣṇaumi dāsasya nāma cit yadā vajram hiraṇyam
id athā ratham harī yam asya vahataḥ vi sūribhiḥ ā tiṣṭhati maghavā sana śrutaḥ
indraḥ vājasya dīrgha śravasaḥ patiḥ sā u cit nu vṛṣṭiḥ yūthyā svā indraḥ
śmaśrūṇi haritā abhi pruṣṇute veti su kṣayam sute madhu ud id dhūnoti vātaḥ
yathā vanam yaḥ vācā vivācaḥ mṛdhravācaḥ purū sahasrā aśivā jaghāna tat tat id
asya pauṃsyam gṛṇīmasi pitā iva yaḥ taviṣīm vāvṛdhe śavaḥ stomam te indra
vimadāḥ ajījanan apūrvyam purutamam su dānave vidma hi asya bhojanam inasya yat
ā paśum na gopāḥ karāmahe mākir sakhyā vi yauṣuḥ indra vidma hi te pramatim deva
jāmi vat asme te santu sakhyā śivāni indra somam imam piba madhumantam camū
sutam asme rayim ni dhāraya sahasriṇam purūvaso vi made vivakṣase tvām yajñebhiḥ
ukthaiḥ upa havyebhiḥ īmahe śacīpate śacīnām śreṣṭham naḥ dhehi vāryam vi made
vivakṣase yaḥ patiḥ vāryāṇām asi radhrasya coditā indra stotṝṇām avitā dviṣaḥ
naḥ pāhi aṃhasaḥ vi made vivakṣase yuvam māyāvinā samīcī niḥ amanthatam vimadena
yat īḍitā niramanthatam viśve devāḥ akṛpanta samīcyoḥ nāsatyau abruvan devāḥ
punar ā vahatāt iti madhumat me parāyaṇam madhumat punar āyanam tā naḥ devatayā
yuvam madhumataḥ kṛtam bhadram naḥ api vātaya manaḥ dakṣam uta kratum adhā te
sakhye andhasaḥ raṇan gāvaḥ na yavase raṇan gāvaḥ na yavase vi vaḥ made
vivakṣase hṛdispṛśaḥ te āsate viśveṣu soma dhāmasu adhā kāmāḥ ime mama vi
tiṣṭhante vasūyavaḥ vi made vivakṣase uta vratāni soma te pra aham mināmi pākyā
adhā pitā iva sūnave mṛḍa naḥ abhi cit vadhāt vi made vivakṣase sam u pra yanti
dhītayaḥ sargāsaḥ avatāṁ iva kratum naḥ soma jīvase dhāraya camasāṁ iva vi vaḥ
made vivakṣase tava tye soma śaktibhiḥ nikāmāsaḥ vi ṛṇvire gṛtsasya dhīrāḥ
tavasaḥ vrajam gomantam aśvinam vi vaḥ made vivakṣase paśum naḥ soma rakṣasi
purutrā viṣṭhitam jagat samākṛṇoṣi jīvase viśvā saṃpaśyan bhuvanā vi made
vivakṣase tvam naḥ soma viśvatas gopāḥ adābhyaḥ bhava sedha rājan apa sridhaḥ mā
duḥśaṃsaḥ īśatā vi made vivakṣase tvam soma su kratuḥ vayaḥ dheyāya jāgṛhi
kṣetra vittaraḥ manuṣaḥ druhaḥ naḥ pāhi aṃhasaḥ vi made vivakṣase tvam naḥ vṛtra
hantama indrasya indo śivaḥ sakhā yat sīm havante samithe yudhyamānāḥ toka sātau
vi made vivakṣase ayam gha sa turaḥ madaḥ indrasya vardhata priyaḥ ayam
kakṣīvataḥ matim viprasya vardhayat ayam viprāya dāśuṣe vājāṁ iyarti gomataḥ
ayam pra andham śroṇam ca tāriṣat vi made vivakṣase pra hi acchā manīṣāḥ spārhāḥ
yanti niyutaḥ pra dasrā niyudrathaḥ pūṣā aviṣṭu māhinaḥ vipraḥ ā vaṃsat
dhītibhiḥ ciketa suṣṭutīnām sa veda suṣṭutīnām induḥ na pūṣā vṛṣā abhi psuraḥ
pruṣāyati vrajam naḥ ā pruṣāyati vrajam naḥ ā pruṣāyati maṃsīmahi tvā vayam
asmākam deva pūṣan matīnām ca sādhanam viprāṇām ca ādhavam pratyardhiḥ yajñānām
aśva hayaḥ rathānām ṛṣiḥ sa yaḥ manuḥ hitaḥ viprasya yāvayat sakhaḥ
ādhīṣamāṇāyāḥ patiḥ śucāyāḥ ca śucasya ca vāsaḥ vāyaḥ avīnām ā vāsāṃsi marmṛjat
inaḥ vājānām patiḥ inaḥ puṣṭīnām sakhā pra śmaśru haryataḥ dūdhot vi vṛthā yaḥ
adābhyaḥ ā te rathasya pūṣan ajāḥ dhuram vavṛtyuḥ viśvasya arthinaḥ sakhā
sanojāḥ an apacyutaḥ asmākam ūrjā ratham pūṣā aviṣṭu māhinaḥ bhuvat vājānām
vṛdhaḥ imam naḥ śṛṇavat havam viśvaḥ hi anyaḥ ariḥ ājagāma mama id aha śvaśuraḥ
na ā jagāma jakṣīyāt dhānāḥ uta somam papīyāt su āśitaḥ punar astam jagāyāt sa
roruvat vṛṣabhaḥ tigma śṛṅgaḥ varṣman tasthau variman ā pṛthivyāḥ viśveṣu enam
vṛjaneṣu pāmi yaḥ me kukṣī suta somaḥ pṛṇāti adriṇā te indra tūyān sunvanti
somān pibasi tvam eṣām pacanti te vṛṣabhāṁ atsi teṣām pṛkṣeṇa yan maghavan
hūyamānaḥ idam su me jaritar ā cikiddhi pratīpam śāpam nadyaḥ vahanti lopāśaḥ
siṃham pratyañcam atsāḥ kroṣṭā varāham niḥ atakta kakṣāt kathā te etat aham ā
ciketam gṛtsasya pākaḥ tavasaḥ manīṣām tvam naḥ vidvāṁ ṛtuthā vi vocaḥ yam
ardham te maghavan kṣemyā dhūḥ evā hi mām tavasam vardhayanti divaḥ cit me
uttarā dhūḥ purū sahasrā ni śiśāmi sākam hi mā janitā jajāna evā hi mām tavasam
jajñuḥ ugram karman karman vṛṣaṇam indra devāḥ vadhīm vṛtram vajreṇa mandasānaḥ
apa vrajam mahinā dāśuṣe vam devāsaḥ āyan paraśūn abibhran vanā vṛścantaḥ abhi
viḍbhiḥ āyan ni su drvam dadhataḥ vakṣaṇāsu yatrā kṛpīṭam anu tat dahanti śaśaḥ
kṣuram pratyañcam jagāra adrim logena vi abhedam ārāt bṛhantam cit ṛhate
randhayāni vayat vatsaḥ vṛṣabham śūśuvānaḥ suparṇaḥ itthā nakham ā siṣāya
avaruddhaḥ paripadam na siṃhaḥ niruddhaḥ cit mahiṣaḥ tarṣyāvān godhā tasmai
ayatham karṣat etat tebhyaḥ godhā ayatham karṣat ye brahmaṇaḥ pratipīyanti
annaiḥ sime ukṣṇaḥ avasṛṣṭāṁ adanti svayam balāni tanvaḥ śṛṇānāḥ ete śamībhiḥ
suśamī abhūvan ye hinvire tanvaḥ some ukthaiḥ vadan upa naḥ māhi vājān divi
śravaḥ dadhiṣe nāma vīraḥ ni adhāyi śuciḥ vām stomaḥ ajīgaḥ yasya id indraḥ puru
dineṣu hotā nṛṇām naryaḥ nṛtamaḥ kṣapāvān pra te asyāḥ uṣasaḥ pra aparasyāḥ
nṛtau syāma nṛtamasya nṛṇām anu triśokaḥ śatam āvahat nṝn kutsena rathaḥ yaḥ
asat sasavān kaḥ te madaḥ indra rantyaḥ bhūt duraḥ giraḥ abhi ugraḥ vi dhāva kad
vāhaḥ arvāk upa mā manīṣā ā tvā śakyām upamam rādhaḥ annaiḥ kad u dyumnam indra
nṝn kayā dhiyā karase kad naḥ āgan mitraḥ na satyaḥ urugāya bhṛtyā anne samasya
yat asan manīṣāḥ preraya sūraḥ artham na pāram ye asya kāmam janidhāḥ iva gman
giraḥ ca ye tuvi jāta pūrvīḥ naraḥ indra pratiśikṣanti annaiḥ mātre nu su mite
indra pūrvī dyauḥ majmanā pṛthivī kāvyena varāya te ghṛtavantaḥ sutāsaḥ svādman
bhavantu pītaye madhūni ā madhvaḥ asmai asican amatram indrāya pūrṇam sa hi
satya rādhāḥ sa vāvṛdhe variman ā pṛthivyāḥ abhi kratvā naryaḥ pauṃsyaiḥ ca vi
ānaṭ indraḥ pṛtanāḥ su ojāḥ ā asmai yatante sakhyāya pūrvīḥ ā smā ratham na
pṛtanāsu tiṣṭha yam bhadrayā sumatyā codayāse pra devatrā brahmaṇe gātuḥ etu
apaḥ acchā manasaḥ na prayukti mahīm mitrasya varuṇasya dhāsim pṛthu jrayase
rīradhā suvṛktim adhvaryavaḥ haviṣmantaḥ hi bhūta acchā apaḥ ita uśatīḥ ava yāḥ
caṣṭe aruṇaḥ suparṇaḥ tam āsyadhvam ūrmim adyā su hastāḥ adhvaryavaḥ apa ita
samudram apām napātam haviṣā yajadhvam sa vaḥ dadat ūrmim adyā su pūtam tasmai
somam madhumantam sunota yaḥ anidhmaḥ dīdayat apsu antar yam viprāsaḥ īḍate
adhvareṣu apām napāt madhumatīḥ apaḥ dāḥ yābhiḥ indraḥ vāvṛdhe vīryāya yābhiḥ
somaḥ modate harṣate ca kalyāṇībhiḥ yuvatibhiḥ na maryaḥ tāḥ adhvaryo apaḥ acchā
parehi yat āsiñcāḥ oṣadhībhiḥ punītāt eva id yūne yuvatayaḥ namanta yat īm uśan
uśatīḥ eti accha sam jānate manasā sam cikitre adhvaryavaḥ dhiṣaṇā apaḥ ca yaḥ
vaḥ vṛtābhyaḥ akṛṇot u lokam yaḥ mahyāḥ abhiśasteḥ amuñcat tasmai indrāya
madhumantam ūrmim deva mādanam pra hiṇotana apaḥ pra asmai hinota madhumantam
ūrmim garbhaḥ yaḥ vaḥ sindhavaḥ madhvaḥ utsaḥ ghṛta pṛṣṭham īḍyam adhvareṣu āpaḥ
revatīḥ śṛṇutā havam me tam sindhavaḥ indra pānam ūrmim pra heta yaḥ ubhe iyarti
mada cyutam auśānam nabhaḥ jām pari tri tantum vicarantam utsam ṛṣe janitrīḥ
bhuvanasya patnīḥ apaḥ vandasva savṛdhaḥ sayonīḥ hinotā naḥ adhvaram deva yajyā
hinota brahma sanaye dhanānām ṛtasya yoge vi syadhvam ūdhaḥ śruṣṭīvarīḥ bhūtana
asmabhyam āpaḥ āpaḥ revatīḥ kṣayathā hi vasvaḥ kratum ca bhadram bibhṛtha amṛtam
ca rāyaḥ ca stha su apatyasya patnīḥ sarasvatī tat gṛṇate vayaḥ dhāt prati yat
āpaḥ adṛśram āyatīḥ ghṛtam payāṃsi bibhratīḥ madhūni adhvaryubhiḥ manasā
saṃvidānāḥ indrāya somam su sutam bharantīḥ ā imāḥ agman revatīḥ jīva dhanyāḥ
adhvaryavaḥ sādayatā sakhāyaḥ ni barhiṣi dhattana somyāsaḥ apām naptrā
saṃvidānāsaḥ enāḥ āgman āpaḥ uśatīḥ barhiḥ ā idam ni adhvare asadan devayantīḥ
adhvaryavaḥ sunuta indrāya somam abhūt u vaḥ suśakā deva yajyā ā devānām upa
vetu śaṃsaḥ viśvebhiḥ turaiḥ avase yajatraḥ tebhiḥ vayam su sakhāyaḥ bhavema
tarantaḥ viśvā duritā syāma pari cit martaḥ draviṇam mamanyāt ṛtasya pathā
namasā vivāset uta svena kratunā sam vadeta śreyāṃsam dakṣam manasā jagṛbhyāt
adhāyi dhītiḥ asasṛgram aṃśāḥ tīrthe na dasmam upa yanti ūmāḥ abhi ānaśma
suvitasya śūṣam navedasaḥ amṛtānām abhūma nityaḥ cākanyāt sva patiḥ damūnāḥ
yasmai u devaḥ savitā jajāna bhagaḥ vā gobhiḥ aryamā īm anajyāt saḥ asmai cāruḥ
chadayat uta syāt iyam sā bhūyāḥ uṣasām iva kṣā yat ha kṣumantaḥ śavasā samāyan
stutim bhikṣamāṇāḥ ā naḥ śagmāsaḥ upa yantu vājāḥ asya id eṣā sumatiḥ paprathānā
abhavat pūrvyā bhūmanā gauḥ asya sanīḍāḥ asurasya yonau samāne ā bharaṇe
bibhramāṇāḥ kim svid vanam ke u sa vṛkṣaḥ āsa yatas dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭatakṣuḥ
saṃtasthāne ajare itaūtī ahāni jaranta na etāvat enā paras anyat asti ukṣā sa
dyāvāpṛthivī bibharti tvacam pavitram kṛṇuta svadhāvān yat īm sūryam na haritaḥ
vahanti stegaḥ na kṣām ati eti pṛthvīm miham na vātaḥ vi ha vāti bhūma mitraḥ
yatra varuṇaḥ ajyamānaḥ agniḥ vane na vi asṛṣṭa śokam starīḥ yat sūta sadyas
ajyamānā vyathiḥ a vyathīḥ kṛṇuta sva gopā putraḥ yat pūrvaḥ pitroḥ janiṣṭa
śamyām gauḥ jagāra yat ha pṛcchān uta kaṇvam nṛṣadaḥ putram āhuḥ uta śyāvaḥ
dhanam ādatta vājī pra kṛṣṇāya ruśat apinvata ūdhar ṛtam atra nakir asmai apīpet
pra mā yuyujre prayujaḥ janānām vahāmi sma pūṣaṇam antareṇa viśve devāsaḥ adha
mām arakṣan duḥśāsuḥ āgāt iti ghoṣaḥ āsīt sam mā tapanti abhitas sapatnīḥ iva
parśavaḥ ni bādhate amatiḥ nagnatā jasuḥ vevīyate matiḥ mūṣaḥ na śiśnā vi adanti
stotāram te śatakrato sakṛt su naḥ maghavan indra mṛḍaya adhā pitā iva naḥ bhava
kuruśravaṇam āvṛṇi rājānam trāsadasyavam maṃhiṣṭham vāghatām ṛṣiḥ adhi putra
upamaśravaḥ napāt mitrātitheḥ ihi pituḥ te asmi vanditā yat īśīya amṛtānām uta
vā martyānām jīvet id maghavā mama na devānām ati śata ātmā cana jīvati tathā
yujā vi vāvṛte uṣāsānaktā bṛhatī supeśasā dyāvākṣāmā varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā
indram huve marutaḥ parvatāṁ apaḥ ādityān dyāvāpṛthivī apaḥ svar dyauḥ ca naḥ
pṛthivī ca pracetasaḥ ṛtāvarī rakṣatām aṃhasaḥ riṣaḥ mā durvidatrā nirṛtiḥ īśata
tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe viśvasmāt naḥ aditiḥ pātu aṃhasaḥ mātā mitrasya
varuṇasya revataḥ svarvat jyotiḥ avṛkam naśīmahi tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe
grāvā vadan apa rakṣāṃsi sedhatu duṣṣvapnyam nirṛtim viśvam atriṇam ādityam
śarma marutām aśīmahi tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe ā indraḥ barhiḥ sīdatu
pinvatām iḍā bṛhaspatiḥ sāmabhiḥ ṛkvaḥ arcatu su praketam jīvase manma dhīmahi
tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe divispṛśam yajñam aśvinā jīra adhvaram kṛṇutam
sumnam iṣṭaye prācīna raśmim āhutam ghṛtena tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe upa
hvaye su havam mārutam gaṇam pāvakam ṛṣvam sakhyāya śambhuvam rāyaḥ poṣam
sauśravasāya dhīmahi tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe apām perum jīva dhanyam
bharāmahe devāvyam su havam adhvara śriyam su raśmim somam indriyam yamīmahi tat
devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe sanema tat susanitā sanitvabhiḥ jīvāḥ jīva putrāḥ
anāgasaḥ brahma dviṣaḥ viṣvak enaḥ bharerata tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe ye
stha manoḥ yajñiyāḥ te śṛṇotana yat vaḥ devāḥ īmahe tat dadātana jaitram kratum
rayimat vīravat yaśaḥ tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe mahat adya mahatām ā
vṛṇīmahe avaḥ devānām bṛhatām an arvaṇām yathā vasu vīra jātam naśāmahai tat
devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe mahaḥ agneḥ sam idhānasya śarmaṇi anāgāḥ mitre varuṇe
svastaye śreṣṭhe syāma savituḥ savīmani tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe ye
savituḥ satya savasya viśve vrate varuṇasya devāḥ te saubhagam vīravat gomat
apnaḥ dadhātana draviṇam citram asme savitā paścātāt savitā purastāt savitā
uttarāttāt savitā adharāttāt savitā naḥ suvatu sarvatātim savitā naḥ rāsatām
dīrgham āyuḥ asmin naḥ indra pṛtsutau yaśasvati śimīvati krandasi pra ava sātaye
yatra goṣātā dhṛṣiteṣu khādiṣu viṣvak patanti didyavaḥ nṛṣāhye sa naḥ kṣumantam
sadane vi ūrṇuhi goarṇasam rayim indra śravāyyam syāma te jayataḥ śakra medinaḥ
yathā vayam uśmasi tat vaso kṛdhi yudhaye ciketati asmābhiḥ suṣahāḥ santu
śatravaḥ tvayā yaḥ dabhrebhiḥ havyaḥ yaḥ ca bhūribhiḥ yaḥ abhīke varivaḥ vid
nṛṣāhye tam vikhāde sasnim adya śrutam naram arvāñcam indram avase karāmahe
svavṛjam tvām aham indra śuśrava anānudam vṛṣabha radhra codanam pra muñcasva
pari kutsāt iha ā gahi kim u tvāvān muṣkayoḥ baddhaḥ āsate yaḥ vām parijmā suvṛt
aśvinā rathaḥ doṣām uṣāsaḥ havyaḥ haviṣmatā śaśvattamāsaḥ tam u vām idam vayam
pituḥ na nāma su havam havāmahe codayatam sūnṛtāḥ pinvatam dhiyaḥ ud purandhīḥ
īrayatam tat uśmasi yaśasam bhāgam kṛṇutam aśvinā somam na cārum maghavatsu naḥ
kṛtam bhavathaḥ amājuraḥ cit bhavathaḥ yuvam bhagaḥ anāśoḥ cit avitārā apamasya
cit andhasya cit nāsatyā kṛśasya cit yuvām id āhuḥ bhiṣajā rutasya cit yuvam
cyavānam sanayam yathā ratham punar yuvānam carathāya takṣathuḥ niḥ taugryam
ūhathuḥ adbhyaḥ pari viśvā id tā vām savaneṣu pravācyā purāṇā vām vīryā pra
bravā jane atha u ha āsathuḥ bhiṣajā mayobhuvā tā vām nu navyau avase karāmahe
ayam nāsatyā śrath ariḥ yathā dadhat iyam vām ahve śṛṇutam me aśvinā putrāya iva
pitarā mahyam śikṣatam an āpiḥ a jñā asajātyā amatiḥ ava spṛtam yuvam rathena
vimadāya śundhyuvam ni ūhathuḥ purumitrasya yoṣaṇām yuvam havam vadhrimatyāḥ
agacchatam yuvam suṣutim cakrathuḥ purandhaye yuvam viprasya jaraṇām upeyuṣaḥ
punar kaleḥ akṛṇutam yuvat vayaḥ yuvam vandanam ṛśyadāt ud ūpathuḥ yuvam sadyas
viśpalām etave kṛthaḥ yuvam ha rebham vṛṣaṇā guhā hitam ud airayatam mamṛvāṃsam
aśvinā yuvam ṛbīsam uta taptam atraye omanvantam cakrathuḥ saptavadhraye yuvam
śvetam pedave aśvinā aśvam navabhiḥ vājaiḥ navatī ca vājinam carkṛtyam dadathuḥ
drāvayat sakham bhagam na nṛbhyaḥ havyam mayobhuvam na tam rājānau adite kutas
cana na aṃhaḥ aśnoti duritam nakir bhayam yam rudravartanī puroratham kṛṇuthaḥ
patnyā saha ā tena yātam manasaḥ javīyasā ratham yam vām ṛbhavaḥ cakruḥ aśvinā
yasya yoge duhitā jāyate divaḥ ubhe ahanī su dine vivasvataḥ yasya yoge duhitā
jāyate divaḥ ubhe ahanī su dine vivasvataḥ tā vartiḥ yātam vi parvatam apinvatam
śayave dhenum aśvinā vṛkasya cit vartikām antar āsyāt yuvam grasitām amuñcatam
etam vām stomam aśvinau akarma atakṣāma bhṛgavaḥ na ratham ni amṛkṣāma yoṣaṇām
na marye nityam na sūnum tanayam dadhānāḥ pari svajante janayaḥ yathā patim
maryam na śundhyum maghavānam ūtaye āpaḥ na sindhum abhi yat sam akṣaran somāsaḥ
indram kulyāḥ iva hradam vardhanti viprāḥ mahaḥ asya sādane yavam na vṛṣṭiḥ
divyena dānunā ud jāyatām paraśuḥ jyotiṣā saha bhūyāḥ ṛtasya sudughā purāṇa vat
vi rocatām aruṣaḥ bhānunā śuciḥ śuśucīta satpatiḥ aham bhuvam vasunaḥ pūrvyaḥ
patiḥ aham dhanāni sam jayāmi śaśvataḥ mām havante pitaram na jantavaḥ aham
dāśuṣe vi bhajāmi bhojanam mahyam tvaṣṭā vajram atakṣat āyasam mayi devāsaḥ
avṛjan api kratum mama anīkam sūryasya iva duṣṭaram mām āryanti kṛtena kartvena
ca aham pitā iva vetasūn abhiṣṭaye tugram kutsāya smadibham ca randhayam aham
bhuvam yajamānasya rājani pra yat bhare tujaye na priyā ādhṛṣe trīṇi śatā trī
sahasrāṇi agnim triṃśat ca devāḥ nava ca asaparyan aukṣan ghṛtaiḥ astṛṇan barhiḥ
asmai āt id hotāram ni asādayanta dūre tat nāma guhyam parācais yat tvā bhīte
ahvayetām ud astabhnāḥ pṛthivīm dyām abhīke bhrātuḥ putrān maghavan titviṣāṇaḥ
vidhum dadrāṇam samane bahūnām yuvānam santam palitaḥ jagāra devasya paśya
kāvyam mahitvā adya mamāra sa hyas sam āna mā pra gāma pathaḥ vayam mā yajñāt
indra sominaḥ mā antar sthuḥ naḥ arātayaḥ yaḥ yajñasya prasādhanaḥ tantuḥ deveṣu
ātataḥ tam āhutam naśīmahi manaḥ nu ā huvāmahe nārāśaṃsena somena pitṝṇām ca
manmabhiḥ ā te etu manaḥ punar kratve dakṣāya jīvase jyok ca sūryam dṛśe punar
naḥ pitaraḥ manaḥ dadātu daivyaḥ janaḥ jīvam vrātam sacemahi vayam soma vrate
tava manaḥ tanūṣu bibhrataḥ prajāvantaḥ sacemahi indra kṣatrā asamātiṣu
rathaproṣṭheṣu dhāraya divi iva sūryam dṛśe yathā yugam varatrayā nahyanti
dharuṇāya kam evā dādhāra te manaḥ jīvātave na mṛtyave atha u ariṣṭatātaye yathā
iyam pṛthivī mahī dādhāra imān vanaspatīn evā dādhāra te manaḥ jīvātave na
mṛtyave atha u ariṣṭatātaye bhargaḥ ha nāma uta yasya devāḥ svar na ye
triṣadhasthe niṣeduḥ agniḥ ha nāma uta jātavedāḥ śrudhi naḥ hotar ṛtasya hotā
adhruk ayam stutaḥ rājā vandi vedhāḥ apaḥ ca vipraḥ tarati sva setuḥ sa
kakṣīvantam rejayat saḥ agnim nemim na cakram arvataḥ raghudru te aṅgirasaḥ
sūnavaḥ te agneḥ pari jajñire na tam aśnoti kaścana divaḥ iva sānū ārabham
sāvarṇyasya dakṣiṇā vi sindhuḥ iva paprathe yām me dhiyam marutaḥ indra devāḥ
adadāta varuṇa mitra yūyam tām pīpayata payasā iva dhenum kuvid giraḥ adhi rathe
vahātha ghṛtam agneḥ vadhryaśvasya vardhanam ghṛtam annam ghṛtam u asya medanam
ghṛtena āhutaḥ urviyā vi paprathe sūryaḥ iva rocate sarpiḥ āsutiḥ vanaspate
raśanayā niyūya devānām pāthaḥ upa vakṣi vidvān svadāti devaḥ kṛṇavat havīṃṣi
avatām dyāvāpṛthivī havam me bṛhaspate prathamam vācaḥ agram yat prairata
nāmadheyam dadhānāḥ yat eṣām śreṣṭham yat aripram āsīt preṇā tat eṣām nihitam
guhā āvis saktum iva titaunā punantaḥ yatra dhīrāḥ manasā vācam akrata atra
sakhāyaḥ sakhyāni jānate bhadrā eṣām lakṣmīḥ nihitā adhi vāci yajñena vācaḥ
padavīyam āyan tām anu avindan ṛṣiṣu praviṣṭām tām ābhṛtya vi adadhuḥ purutrā
tām sapta rebhāḥ abhi sam navante yaḥ tityāja sacividam sakhāyam na tasya vāci
api bhāgaḥ asti yat īm śṛṇoti alakam śṛṇoti nahi praveda su kṛtasya panthām
akṣaṇvantaḥ karṇavantaḥ sakhāyaḥ manaḥ javeṣu asamāḥ babhūvuḥ ādaghnāsaḥ
upakakṣāsaḥ u tve hradāḥ iva snātvāḥ u tve dadṛśre brahmā tvaḥ vadati jāta
vidyām yajñasya mātrām vi mimīte u tvaḥ yat yatayaḥ yathā bhuvanāni apinvata
atrā samudre ā gūḍham ā sūryam ajabhartana avāhan uṣasaḥ yathā anaḥ pra su vaḥ
āpaḥ mahimānam uttamam kāruḥ vocāti sadane vivasvataḥ pra sapta sapta tredhā hi
cakramuḥ pra sṛtvarīṇām ati sindhuḥ ojasā pra te aradat varuṇaḥ yātave pathaḥ
sindho yat vājāṁ abhī adravaḥ tvam bhūmyāḥ adhi pravatā yāsi sānunā yat eṣām
agram jagatām irajyasi divi svanaḥ yatate bhūmyā upari anantam śuṣmam ud iyarti
bhānunā abhrāt iva pra stanayanti vṛṣṭayaḥ sindhuḥ yat eti vṛṣabhaḥ na roruvat
abhi tvā sindho śiśum id na mātaraḥ vāśrāḥ arṣanti payasā iva dhenavaḥ rājā iva
yudhvā nayasi tvam id sicau yat āsām agram pravatām inakṣasi imam me gaṅge
yamune sarasvati śutudri stomam sacata paruṣṇi ā asiknyā marudvṛdhe vitastayā
ārjīkīye śṛṇuhi ā suṣomayā tṛṣṭāmayā prathamam yātave sajūs susartvā rasayā
śvetyā tyā tvam sindho kubhayā gomatīm krumum mehatnvā sa ratham yābhiḥ īyase
ṛjītī enī ruśatī mahitvā pari jrayāṃsi bharate rajāṃsi adabdhā sindhuḥ apasām
apastamā aśvā na citrā vapuṣi iva darśatā su aśvā sindhuḥ su rathā su vāsāḥ
hiraṇyayī su kṛtā vājinīvatī ūrṇāvatī yuvatiḥ sīlamāvatī uta adhi vaste subhagā
madhuvṛdham sukham ratham yuyuje sindhuḥ aśvinam tena vājam saniṣat asmin ājau
mahān hi asya mahimā panasyate adabdhasya sva yaśasaḥ virapśinaḥ tat u śreṣṭham
savanam sunotana atyaḥ na hasta yataḥ adriḥ sotari vidat hi aryaḥ abhibhūti
pauṃsyam mahaḥ rāye cit tarute yathā purā manave gātum aśret goarṇasi tvāṣṭre
aśva nirṇiji adhvareṣu adhvarāṁ aśiśrayuḥ ā naḥ rayim sarva vīram sunotana
devāvyam bharata ślokam adrayaḥ pra ye divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ na barhaṇā tmanā riricre
abhrāt na sūryaḥ pājasvantaḥ na vīrāḥ panasyavaḥ riśādasaḥ na maryāḥ abhidyavaḥ
yuṣmākam budhne apām na yāmani vithuryati na mahī śratharyati viśvapsuḥ yajñaḥ
arvāk ayam su vaḥ prayasvantaḥ na ā gata uṣasām na ketavaḥ adhvara śriyaḥ
śubhaṃyavaḥ na añjibhiḥ vi aśvitan sindhavaḥ na bhrājat ṛṣṭayaḥ parāvataḥ na
yojanāni mamire kim deveṣu tyajaḥ enaḥ cakartha agne pṛcchāmi nu tvām a vidvān a
krīḍan krīḍan hariḥ attave a dat vi parvaśas cakarta gām iva asiḥ ṛc sāmābhyām
abhihitau gāvau te sāmanau itaḥ śrotram te cakre āstām divi panthāḥ cara acaraḥ
ud īrṣva atas pativatī hi eṣā viśvāvasum namasā gīrbhiḥ īḍe anyām iccha
pitṛṣadam vyaktām sa te bhāgaḥ januṣā tasya viddhi pra tvā muñcāmi varuṇasya
pāśāt yena tvā abadhnāt savitā su śevaḥ ṛtasya yonau sukṛtasya loke ariṣṭām tvā
saha patyā dadhāmi iha priyam prajayā te sam ṛdhyatām asmin gṛhe gārhapatyāya
jāgṛhi nīla lohitam bhavati kṛtyā āsaktiḥ vi ajyate edhante asyāḥ jñātayaḥ patiḥ
bandheṣu badhyate uve amba sulābhike yathā iva aṅga bhaviṣyati sa sūryaḥ pari
urū varāṃsi ā indraḥ vavṛtyāt rathyā iva cakrā atiṣṭhantam apasyam na sargam
kṛṣṇā tamāṃsi tviṣyā jaghāna samānam asmai anapāvṛt arcā kṣmayā divaḥ asamam
brahma navyam jaghāna vṛtram svadhitiḥ vanā iva aradat na sindhūn bibheda girim
navam id na kumbham ā gāḥ indraḥ akṛṇuta sva yugbhiḥ karhi svid sā te indra
cetyā asat aghasya yat bhinadaḥ rakṣaḥ mitrakruvaḥ yat śasane na gāvaḥ pṛthivyāḥ
āpṛk amuyā śayante yajñena yajñam ayajanta devāḥ tāni dharmāṇi prathamāni āsan
te ha nākam mahimānaḥ sacanta yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ prajānan agne
yonim ṛtviyam iḍāyāḥ pade ghṛtavantam āsadaḥ ā te cikitre uṣasām iva ītayaḥ
arepasaḥ sūryasya iva raśmayaḥ vāta upadhūtaḥ iṣitaḥ vaśāṁ tṛṣu yat annā veviṣat
vitiṣṭhase ā yatante rathyaḥ yathā pṛthak agne yasmin aśvāsaḥ ṛṣabhāsaḥ ukṣaṇaḥ
vaśāḥ meṣāḥ avasṛṣṭāsaḥ āhutāḥ kīlāla pe soma pṛṣṭhāya vedhase hṛdā matim janaye
cārum agnaye te hi prajāyai abharanta vi śravaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ vṛṣabhaḥ soma jāmayaḥ
yajñaiḥ atharvā prathamaḥ vi dhārayat devāḥ dakṣaiḥ bhṛgavaḥ sam cikitrire etam
me stomam tanā na sūrye dyutat yāmānam vāvṛdhanta nṛṇām saṃvananam na aśvyam
taṣṭā iva an apacyutam ugrāḥ iva pravahantaḥ samāyamuḥ sākam yuktāḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ
bibhrataḥ dhuraḥ yat śvasantaḥ jagrasānāḥ arāviṣuḥ śṛṇve eṣām prothathaḥ arvatām
iva te adrayaḥ daśa yantrāsaḥ āśavaḥ teṣām ādhānam pari eti haryatam harim hi
yonim abhi ye samasvaran hinvantaḥ harī divyam yathā sadaḥ ā yam pṛṇanti
haribhiḥ na dhenavaḥ indrāya śūṣam harivantam arcata uta sma sadma haryatasya
pastyoḥ atyaḥ na vājam harivāṁ acikradat mahī cit hi dhiṣaṇā aharyat bṛhat vayaḥ
dadhiṣe haryataḥ cit ā śatam vaḥ amba dhāmāni sahasram uta vaḥ ruhaḥ adhā śata
kratvaḥ yūyam imam me agadam kṛta oṣadhīḥ prati modadhvam puṣpavatīḥ prasūvarīḥ
aśvāḥ iva sa jitvarīḥ vīrudhaḥ pārayiṣṇvaḥ ud śuṣmāḥ oṣadhīnām gāvaḥ goṣṭhāt iva
īrate dhanam saniṣyantīnām ātmānam tava pūruṣa yat imāḥ vājayan aham oṣadhīḥ
haste ādadhe ātmā yakṣmasya naśyati purā jīva gṛbhaḥ yathā rājā somaḥ suvitasya
adhi etu naḥ yathā yathā mitradhitāni saṃdadhuḥ ā dhiyam yajñiyām varte ūtaye
devāḥ devīm yajatām yajñiyām iha sā naḥ duhīyat yavasā iva gatvī sahasra dhārā
payasā mahī gauḥ śunam aṣṭrāvi acarat kapardī varatrāyām dāru ānahyamānaḥ
nṛmṇāni kṛṇvan bahave janāya gāḥ paspaśānaḥ taviṣīḥ adhatta prāstaut ṛṣva ojāḥ
ṛṣvebhiḥ tatakṣa śūraḥ śavasā ṛbhuḥ na kratubhiḥ mātariśvā āpī vaḥ asme pitarā
iva putrā ugrā iva rucā nṛpatī turyai piba somam mahate indriyāya piba vṛtrāya
hantave śaviṣṭha piba rāye śavase hūyamānaḥ piba madhvaḥ tṛpat indrāḥ vṛṣasva
addhi id indra prasthitā imā havīṃṣi canaḥ dadhiṣva pacatā uta somam
prayasvantaḥ prati haryāmasi tvā satyāḥ santu yajamānasya kāmāḥ pra indra
agnibhyām su vacasyām iyarmi sindhau iva prerayam nāvam arkaiḥ pari caranti
devāḥ ye asmabhyam dhana dāḥ udbhidaḥ ca na sa sakhā yaḥ na dadāti sakhye
sacābhuve sacamānāya pitvaḥ apa asmāt preyāt na tat okaḥ asti pṛṇantam anyam
araṇam cit icchet pṛṇīyāt id nādhamānāya tavyān drāghīyāṃsam anu paśyeta panthām
ā u hi vartante rathyā iva cakrā anyam anyam upa tiṣṭhanta rāyaḥ kṛṣan id phālaḥ
āśitam kṛṇoti yan adhvānam apa vṛṅkte caritraiḥ vadan brahmā a vadataḥ vanīyān
pṛṇan āpiḥ a pṛṇantam abhi syāt ud mā pītāḥ ayaṃsata ratham aśvāḥ iva āśavaḥ
kuvid somasya apām iti upa mā matiḥ asthita vāśrā putram iva priyam kuvid
somasya apām iti ayam venaḥ codayat pṛśni garbhāḥ jyotiḥ jarāyū rajasaḥ vimāne
imam apām saṃgame sūryasya śiśum na viprāḥ matibhiḥ rihanti ūrdhvaḥ gandharvaḥ
adhi nāke asthāt pratyaṅ citrā bibhrat asya āyudhāni vasānaḥ atkam surabhim dṛśe
kam svar na nāma janata priyāṇi nā asat āsīt na u sat āsīt tadānīm na āsīt rajaḥ
na u vyomā paras yat kim āvarīvar kuha kasya śarman ambhaḥ kim āsīt gahanam
gabhīram na mṛtyuḥ āsīt amṛtam na tarhi na rātryāḥ ahnaḥ āsīt praketaḥ ānīt a
vātam svadhayā tat ekam tasmāt ha anyat na paras kim cana āsa tamaḥ āsīt tamasā
gūḍham agre a praketam salilam sarvam āḥ idam tucchyena ābhu apihitam yat āsīt
tapasaḥ tat ajāyata ekam kāmaḥ tat agre sam avartata adhi manasaḥ retaḥ
prathamam yat āsīt sataḥ bandhum asati niḥ avindan hṛdi pratīṣya kavayaḥ manīṣā
tiraścīnaḥ vitataḥ raśmiḥ eṣām adhas svid āsīt upari svid āsīt retaḥ dhāḥ āsan
mahimānaḥ āsan svadhā avastāt prayatiḥ parastāt kaḥ addhā veda kaḥ iha pra vocat
kutas ājātā kutas iyam visṛṣṭiḥ arvāk devā asya visarjanena athā kaḥ veda yatas
ābabhūva iyam visṛṣṭiḥ yatas ābabhūva yadi vā dadhe yadi vā na yaḥ asya
adhyakṣaḥ parame vyoman saḥ aṅga veda yadi vā na veda kuvid aṅga yavamantaḥ
yavam cit yathā dānti anupūrvam viyūya putram iva pitarau aśvinā ubhā indra
āvathuḥ kāvyaiḥ daṃsanābhiḥ yat surāmam vi apibaḥ śacībhiḥ sarasvatī tvā
maghavan abhiṣṇak yuvam hi apnarājau asīdatam tiṣṭhat ratham na dhūrṣadam
vanarṣadam tāḥ naḥ kaṇūkayantīḥ nṛmedhaḥ tatre aṃhasaḥ sumedhaḥ tatre aṃhasaḥ
mantumas pūrveṇa maghavan padā ajaḥ vayām yathā yamaḥ yathā abhavat anudeyī
tatas agram ajāyata anādhṛṣṭāni dhṛṣitaḥ vi āsyat nidhīṃr adevāṁ amṛṇat ayāsyaḥ
māsā iva sūryaḥ vasu puryam ā dade gṛṇānaḥ śatrūṃr aśṛṇāt virukmatā sūrya raśmiḥ
hari keśaḥ purastāt savitā jyotiḥ ud ayān ajasram tyam cit aśvam na vājinam
areṇavaḥ yam atnata dṛḍham granthim na vi syatam atrim yaviṣṭham ā rajaḥ nahi
asyāḥ nāma gṛbhṇāmi na u asmin ramate jane parām eva parāvatam sapatnīm
gamayāmasi aham asmi sahamānā atha tvam asi sāsahiḥ ubhe sahasvatī bhūtvī
sapatnīm me sahāvahai upa te adhām sahamānām abhi tvā adhām sahīyasā mām anu pra
te manaḥ vatsam gauḥ iva dhāvatu pathā vār iva dhāvatu yathā devāḥ asureṣu
śraddhām ugreṣu cakrire evam bhojeṣu yajvasu asmākam uditam kṛdhi muñcāmi tvā
haviṣā jīvanāya kam ajñāta yakṣmāt uta rājayakṣmāt grāhiḥ jagrāha yadi vā etat
enam tasyāḥ indra agnī pra mumuktam enam yadi kṣita āyuḥ yadi vā paretaḥ yadi
mṛtyoḥ antikam nītaḥ eva tam ā harāmi nirṛteḥ upasthāt aspārṣam enam śata
śāradāya sahasra akṣeṇa śata śāradena śata āyuṣā haviṣā ahārṣam enam śatam yathā
imam śaradaḥ nayāti indraḥ viśvasya duritasya pāram śatam jīva śaradaḥ
vardhamānaḥ śatam hemantān śatam u vasantān śatam indra agnī savitā bṛhaspatiḥ
śata āyuṣā haviṣā imam punar duḥ āhārṣam tvā avidam tvā punar āgāḥ punarnava
sarva aṅga sarvam te cakṣuḥ sarvam āyuḥ ca te avidam brahmaṇā agniḥ saṃvidānaḥ
rakṣaḥ hā bādhatām itas amīvā yaḥ te garbham durṇāmā yonim āśaye yaḥ te garbham
amīvā durṇāmā yonim āśaye agniḥ ṭam brahmaṇā saha niṣ kravya adam anīnaśat yaḥ
te hanti patayantam niṣatsnum yaḥ sarīsṛpam jātam yaḥ te jighāṃsati tam itas
nāśayāmasi yaḥ te ūrū viharati antarā dampatī śaye yonim yaḥ antar āreḍhi tam
itas nāśayāmasi yaḥ tvā bhrātā patiḥ bhūtvā jāraḥ bhūtvā nipadyate prajām yaḥ te
jighāṃsati tam itas nāśayāmasi yaḥ tvā svapnena tamasā mohayitvā nipadyate
prajām yaḥ te jighāṃsati tam itas nāśayāmasi ṛṣabham mā samānānām sapatnānām
viṣāsahim hantāram śatrūṇām kṛdhi virājam go patim gavām aham asmi sapatna hā
indraḥ iva ariṣṭaḥ akṣataḥ adhas sapatnāḥ me padoḥ ime sarve abhiṣṭhitāḥ atrā
eva vaḥ api nahyāmi ubhe ārtnī iva jyayā vācaspate ni ṣedha imān yathā mat
adharam vadān abhibhūḥ aham āgamam viśva karmeṇa dhāmnā ā vaḥ cittam ā vaḥ
vratam ā vaḥ aham samitim dade yogakṣemam vaḥ ādāya aham bhūyāsam uttamaḥ ā vaḥ
mūrdhānam akramīm adhas padān me ud vadata maṇḍūkāḥ iva udakāt maṇḍūkāḥ udakāt
iva vātasya nu mahimānam rathasya rujan eti stanayan asya ghoṣaḥ divispṛś yāti
aruṇāni kṛṇvan uta u eti pṛthivyāḥ reṇum asyan sam prerate anu vātasya viṣṭhāḥ ā
enam gacchanti samanam na yoṣāḥ na ni viśate katamat cana ahar apām sakhā
prathama jāḥ ṛtāvā kva svid jātaḥ kutas ā babhūva ātmā devānām bhuvanasya
garbhaḥ yathāvaśam carati devaḥ eṣaḥ ghoṣāḥ id asya śṛṇvire na rūpam tasmai
vātāya haviṣā vidhema idam śreṣṭham jyotiṣām jyotiḥ uttamam viśva jit dhana jit
ucyate bṛhat viśva bhrāj bhrājaḥ mahi sūryaḥ dṛśe uru paprathe sahaḥ ojaḥ
acyutam vibhrājan jyotiṣā svar agacchaḥ rocanam divaḥ yena imā viśvā bhuvanāni
ābhṛtā viśvakarmaṇā viśvadevyāvatā ā yāhi vanasā saha gāvaḥ sacanta vartanim yat
ūdhabhiḥ ā yāhi vasvyā dhiyā maṃhiṣṭhaḥ jārayat makhaḥ sudānubhiḥ pitu bhṛtaḥ na
tantum id sudānavaḥ prati dadhmaḥ yajāmasi uṣāḥ apa svasuḥ tamaḥ sam vartayati
vartanim su jāta tā ā tvā ahārṣam antar edhi dhruvaḥ tiṣṭha avicācaliḥ viśaḥ tvā
sarvāḥ vāñchantu mā tvat rāṣṭram adhi bhraśat iha evā edhi mā apa cyoṣṭhāḥ
parvataḥ iva avicācaliḥ dhruvam dhruveṇa haviṣā abhi somam mṛśāmasi pra sūnavaḥ
ṛbhūṇām bṛhat navanta vṛjanā kṣāmā ye viśva dhāyasaḥ aśnan dhenum na mātaram
ayam u pra devayuḥ hotā yajñāya nīyate rathaḥ na abhīvṛtaḥ ghṛṇīvān cetati tmanā
sadyas cit yaḥ śavasā pañca kṛṣṭīḥ sūryaḥ iva jyotiṣā apaḥ tatāna sahasra sāḥ
śata sāḥ asya raṃhiḥ na smā varante yuvatim na śaryām śrātam haviḥ ā u ṣu indra
pra yāhi jagāma sūraḥ adhvanaḥ vimadhyam pari tvā āsate nidhibhiḥ sakhāyaḥ
kulapāḥ na vrāja patim carantam carantam viṣṇuḥ yonim kalpayatu tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi
piṃśatu ā siñcatu prajāpatiḥ dhātā garbham dadhātu te garbham dhehi sinīvāli
garbham dhehi sarasvati garbham te aśvinau devau ā dhattām puṣkarasrajā
hiraṇyayī araṇī yam nirmanthataḥ aśvinā tam te garbham havāmahe daśame māsi
sūtave ā ayam gauḥ pṛśniḥ akramīt asadat mātaram puras pitaram ca prayan svar
antar carati rocanā asya prāṇāt apānatī vi akhyat mahiṣaḥ divam triṃśat dhāma vi
rājati vāc pataṅgāya dhīyate prati vastoḥ aha dyubhiḥ brahmā devānām prathamaḥ
saṃbabhūva viśvasya kartā bhuvanasya goptā sa brahma vidyām sarva vidyā
pratiṣṭhām atharvāya jyeṣṭha putrāya prāha sa bhāradvājāya prāha bhāradvājaḥ
aṅgirase parāvarām śaunakaḥ ha vai mahāśālaḥ aṅgirasam vidhivat upasannaḥ
papraccha kasmin nu bhagavaḥ vijñāte sarvam idam vijñātam bhavati iti tasmai sa
ha uvāca dve vidye veditavye iti ha sma yat brahma vidaḥ vadanti parā ca eva
aparā ca tatra aparā ṛgvedaḥ yajurvedaḥ sāmavedaḥ atharvavedaḥ śikṣā kalpaḥ
vyākaraṇam niruktam chandaḥ jyotiṣam iti atha parā yayā tat akṣaram adhigamyate
yat tat adreśyam agrāhyam a gotram avarṇam a cakṣuḥ śrotram tat a pāṇi pādam
nityam vibhum sarva gatam su sūkṣmam tat avyayam yat bhūta yonim paripaśyanti
dhīrāḥ yathā ūrṇanābhiḥ sṛjate gṛhṇate ca yathā pṛthivyām oṣadhayaḥ sambhavanti
yathā sataḥ puruṣāt keśa lomāni tathā akṣarāt sambhavati iha viśvam tapasā
cīyate brahma tatas annam abhijāyate annāt prāṇaḥ manaḥ satyam lokāḥ karmasu ca
amṛtam yaḥ sarva jñaḥ sarva vid yasya jñāna mayam tapaḥ tasmāt etat brahma rūpam
annam ca jāyate tat etat satyam mantreṣu karmāṇi kavayaḥ yāni apaśyan tāni
tretāyām bahudhā saṃtatāni tāni ācaratha niyatam satya kāmāḥ eṣa vaḥ panthāḥ
sukṛtasya loke yadā lelāyate hi arciḥ samiddhe havyavāhane tadā ājyabhāgau
antareṇa āhutīḥ pratipādayet śraddhayā hutam om yasya agnihotram a darśam a
paurṇamāsam a cāturmāsyam an āgrayaṇam atithi varjitam ca a hutam a vaiśvadevam
avidhinā hutam ā saptamān tasya lokān hinasti kālī karālī ca manojavā ca
sulohitā yā ca sudhūmravarṇā sphuliṅginī viśvarucī ca devī lelāyamānā iti sapta
jihvāḥ tam nayanti etāḥ sūryasya raśmayaḥ yatra devānām patiḥ ekaḥ adhivāsaḥ ehi
ehi iti tam āhutayaḥ su varcasaḥ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ yajamānam vahanti priyām
vācam abhivadantyaḥ arcayantyaḥ eṣa vaḥ puṇyaḥ su kṛtaḥ brahma lokaḥ plavāḥ hi
ete adṛḍhāḥ yajña rūpāḥ aṣṭādaśa uktam avaram yeṣu karma etat śreyaḥ ye
abhinandanti mūḍhāḥ jarā mṛtyum te punar evā apiyanti avidyāyām antare
vartamānāḥ svayam dhīrāḥ paṇḍitam manyamānāḥ jaṅghanyamānāḥ pariyanti mūḍhāḥ
andhena eva nīyamānāḥ yathā andhāḥ avidyāyām bahudhā vartamānāḥ vayam kṛtārthāḥ
iti abhimanyanti bālāḥ yat karmiṇaḥ na pravedayanti rāgāt tena āturāḥ kṣīṇa
lokāḥ cyavante iṣṭāpūrtam manyamānāḥ variṣṭham nā anyat śreyaḥ vedayante
pramūḍhāḥ nākasya pṛṣṭhe te sukṛte anubhūtvā imam lokam hīnataram vā viśanti
tapaḥ śraddhe ye hi upavasanti araṇye śāntāḥ vidvāṃsaḥ bhaikṣa caryām carantaḥ
sūrya dvāreṇa te virajāḥ prayānti yatra amṛtaḥ sa puruṣaḥ hi avyaya ātmā
parīkṣya lokān karma citān brāhmaṇaḥ nirvedam āyāt na asti a kṛtaḥ kṛtena tad
vijñāna artham sa gurum eva abhigacchet samidh pāṇiḥ śrotriyam brahma niṣṭham
tasmai sa vidvān upasannāya samyak praśānta cittāya śama anvitāya yena akṣaram
puruṣam veda satyam provāca tām tattvataḥ brahma vidyām tat etat satyam yathā su
dīptāt pāvakāt visphuliṅgāḥ sahasraśas prabhavante sarūpāḥ tathā akṣarāt
vividhāḥ somya bhāvāḥ prajāyante tatra ca eva apiyanti divyaḥ hi amūrtaḥ puruṣaḥ
sa bāhya abhyantaraḥ hi ajaḥ a prāṇaḥ hi a manāḥ śubhraḥ hi akṣarāt paratas
paraḥ etasmāt jāyate prāṇaḥ manaḥ sarva indriyāṇi ca kham vāyuḥ jyotiḥ āpaḥ
pṛthivī viśvasya dhāriṇī agniḥ mūrdhā cakṣuṣī candra sūryau diśaḥ śrotre vāc
vivṛtāḥ ca vedāḥ vāyuḥ prāṇaḥ hṛdayam viśvam asya padbhyām pṛthivī hi eṣa sarva
bhūta antarātmā tasmāt agniḥ samidhaḥ yasya sūryaḥ somāt parjanyaḥ oṣadhayaḥ
pṛthivyām pumān retaḥ siñcati yoṣitāyām bahvīḥ prajāḥ puruṣāt samprasūtāḥ tasmāt
ṛcaḥ sāma yajūṃṣi dīkṣāḥ yajñāḥ ca sarve kratavaḥ dakṣiṇāḥ ca saṃvatsaraḥ ca
yajamānaḥ ca lokāḥ somaḥ yatra pavate yatra sūryaḥ tasmāt ca devāḥ bahudhā
samprasūtāḥ sādhyāḥ manuṣyāḥ paśavaḥ vayāṃsi prāṇa apānau vrīhi yavau tapaḥ ca
śraddhā satyam brahmacaryam vidhiḥ ca sapta prāṇāḥ prabhavanti tasmāt sapta
arciṣaḥ samidhaḥ sapta homāḥ sapta ime lokāḥ yeṣu caranti prāṇāḥ guhā āśayāḥ
nihitāḥ sapta sapta atas samudrāḥ girayaḥ ca sarve asmāt syandante sindhavaḥ
sarva rūpāḥ atas ca sarvāḥ oṣadhayaḥ rasaḥ ca yena eṣa bhūtaiḥ tiṣṭhate hi
antarātmā puruṣaḥ evā idam viśvam karma tapaḥ brahma para amṛtam etat yaḥ veda
nihitam guhāyām saḥ avidyā granthim vikirati iha somya āvis saṃnihitam guhā
caram nāma mahat padam atra etat samarpitam param vijñānāt yat variṣṭham
prajānām yat arcimat yat aṇubhyaḥ aṇu ca yasmin lokāḥ nihitāḥ lokinaḥ ca tat
etat akṣaram brahma sa prāṇaḥ tat u vāc manaḥ tat etat satyam tat amṛtam tat
veddhavyam somya viddhi āyamya tat bhāva gatena cetasā lakṣyam tat evā akṣaram
somya viddhi praṇavaḥ dhanuḥ śaraḥ hi ātmā brahma tat lakṣyam ucyate apramattena
veddhavyam śara vat tad mayaḥ bhavet yasmin dyauḥ pṛthivī ca antarikṣam otam
manaḥ saha prāṇaiḥ ca sarvaiḥ tam evā ekam jānatha ātmānam anyāḥ vācaḥ
vimuñcatha amṛtasya eṣa setuḥ arāḥ iva ratha nābhau saṃhatāḥ yatra nāḍyaḥ saḥ
eṣaḥ antar carate bahudhā jāyamānaḥ om iti evam dhyāyatha ātmānam svasti vaḥ
pārāya tamasaḥ parastāt yaḥ sarva jñaḥ sarva vid yasya eṣa mahimā bhuvi divye
brahma pure hi eṣa vyomni ātmā pratiṣṭhitaḥ manaḥ mayaḥ prāṇa śarīra netā
pratiṣṭhitaḥ anne hṛdayam saṃnidhāya tat vijñānena paripaśyanti dhīrāḥ ānanda
rūpam amṛtam yat vibhāti bhidyate hṛdaya granthiḥ chidyante sarva saṃśayāḥ
kṣīyante ca asya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare hiraṇmaye pare kośe virajam
brahma niṣkalam tat śubhram jyotiṣām jyotiḥ tat yat ātma vidaḥ viduḥ na tatra
sūryaḥ bhāti na candra tārakam na imāḥ vidyutaḥ bhānti kutas ayam agniḥ tam eva
bhāntam anubhāti sarvam tasya bhāsā sarvam idam vibhāti brahma eva idam amṛtam
purastāt brahma paścāt brahma dakṣiṇatas ca uttareṇa adhas ca ūrdhvam ca
prasṛtam brahma eva idam viśvam idam variṣṭham sa veda etat paramam brahma dhāma
yatra viśvam nihitam bhāti śubhram upāsate puruṣam ye hi akāmāḥ te śukram etat
ativartanti dhīrāḥ kāmān yaḥ kāmayate manyamānaḥ sa kāmabhiḥ jāyate tatra tatra
paryāpta kāmasya kṛtātmanaḥ tu iha eva sarve pravilīyanti kāmāḥ na ayam ātmā
pravacanena labhyaḥ na medhayā na bahunā śrutena yam evā eṣa vṛṇute tena labhyaḥ
tasya eṣaḥ ātmā vivṛṇute tanūm svām na ayam ātmā bala hīnena labhyaḥ na ca
pramādāt tapasaḥ vā api aliṅgāt etaiḥ upāyaiḥ yatate yaḥ tu vidvān tasya eṣaḥ
ātmā viśate brahma dhāma samprāpya enam ṛṣayaḥ jñāna tṛptāḥ kṛtātmānaḥ vīta
rāgāḥ praśāntāḥ te sarvagam sarvatas prāpya dhīrāḥ yukta ātmānaḥ sarvam eva
āviśanti vedānta vijñāna su niścita arthāḥ saṃnyāsa yogāt yatayaḥ śuddha sattvāḥ
brahma lokeṣu para anta kāle parāmṛtāḥ parimucyanti sarve gatāḥ kalāḥ pañcadaśa
pratiṣṭhāḥ devāḥ ca sarve pratidevatāsu karmāṇi vijñāna mayaḥ ca ātmā pare
avyaye sarve ekībhavanti yathā nadyaḥ syandamānāḥ samudre astam gacchanti nāma
rūpe vihāya tathā vidvān nāma rūpāt vimuktaḥ parāt param puruṣam upaiti divyam
sa yaḥ ha vai tat paramam brahma veda brahma eva bhavati na asya a brahma vid
kule bhavati tarati śokam tarati pāpmānam guhā granthibhyaḥ vimuktaḥ amṛtaḥ
bhavati tat etat ṛcā abhyuktam kriyāvantaḥ śrotriyāḥ brahma niṣṭhāḥ svayam
juhvataḥ eka ṛṣim śraddhayantaḥ teṣām eva etām brahma vidyām vadeta śirovratam
vidhivat yaiḥ tu cīrṇam tat etat satyam ṛṣiḥ aṅgirāḥ purā uvāca na etat a cīrṇa
vrataḥ adhīte namaḥ parama ṛṣibhyaḥ namaḥ parama ṛṣibhyaḥ āūm śrī gurubhyaḥ
namaḥ hariḥ āūm āūm śam naḥ mitraḥ śam varuṇaḥ śam naḥ bhavatu aryamā śam naḥ
indraḥ bṛhaspatiḥ śam naḥ viṣṇuḥ urukramaḥ namaḥ brahmaṇe namaḥ te vāyo tvam eva
pratyakṣam brahmā asi tvām eva pratyakṣam brahma vadiṣyāmi ṛtam vadiṣyāmi satyam
vadiṣyāmi tat mām avatu tat vaktāram avatu avatu mām avatu vaktāram āūm śāntiḥ
śāntiḥ śāntiḥ saha nau yaśaḥ saha nau brahmavarcasam atha atas saṃhitāyāḥ
upaniṣadam vyākhyāsyāmaḥ pañcasu adhikaraṇeṣu adhilokam adhijyautiṣam adhividyam
adhiprajam adhyātmam tāḥ mahā saṃhitāyāḥ iti ācakṣate athā adhilokam pṛthivī
pūrvarūpam dyauḥ uttara rūpam ākāśaḥ sandhiḥ vāyuḥ sandhānam iti adhilokam athā
adhijyautiṣam agniḥ pūrvarūpam ādityaḥ uttara rūpam āpaḥ sandhiḥ vaidyutaḥ
sandhānam iti adhijyautiṣam atha adhividyam ācāryaḥ pūrvarūpam antevāsī uttara
rūpam vidyā sandhiḥ pravacanam sandhānam iti adhividyam athā adhiprajam mātā
pūrvarūpam pitā uttara rūpam prajā sandhiḥ prajananam sandhānam iti adhiprajam
atha adhyātmam adharā hanuḥ pūrvarūpam uttarā hanuḥ uttara rūpam vāc sandhiḥ
jihvā sandhānam iti adhyātmam iti imāḥ mahā saṃhitāḥ yaḥ evam etāḥ mahā saṃhitāḥ
vyākhyātāḥ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhiḥ brahmavarcasena annādyena suvargyeṇa
lokena bhūḥ bhuvaḥ suvar iti vai etāḥ tisraḥ vyāhṛtayaḥ tāsām u ha sma etām
caturthīm māhācamasyaḥ pravedayate mahaḥ iti tat brahma saḥ ātmā aṅgāni anyāḥ
devatāḥ bhūḥ iti vai ayam lokaḥ bhuvaḥ iti antarikṣam suvar iti asau lokaḥ mahaḥ
iti ādityaḥ ādityena vāva sarve lokāḥ mahīyante bhūḥ iti vai agniḥ bhuvaḥ iti
vāyuḥ suvar iti ādityaḥ mahaḥ iti candramāḥ candramasā vāva sarvāṇi jyotīṃṣi
mahīyante bhūḥ iti vai ṛcaḥ bhuvaḥ iti sāmāni suvar iti yajūṃṣi mahaḥ iti brahma
brahmaṇā vāva sarve vedāḥ mahīyante bhūḥ iti vai prāṇaḥ bhuvaḥ iti apānaḥ suvar
iti vyānaḥ mahaḥ iti annam annena vāva sarve prāṇāḥ mahīyante tāḥ vai etāḥ
catasraḥ caturdhā catasraḥ catasraḥ vyāhṛtayaḥ tāḥ yaḥ veda sa veda brahma sarve
asmai devāḥ balim āvahanti sa yaḥ eṣaḥ antara hṛdayaḥ ākāśaḥ tasmin ayam puruṣaḥ
manaḥ mayaḥ amṛtaḥ hiraṇmayaḥ antareṇa tāluke yaḥ eṣa stanaḥ iva avalambate sā
indra yoniḥ yatra asau keśāntaḥ vivartate vyapohya śīrṣa kapāle bhūḥ iti agnau
pratitiṣṭhati bhuvar iti vāyau suvar iti āditye mahaḥ iti brahmaṇi āpnoti
svārājyam āpnoti manasaspatim vāc patiḥ cakṣuṣpatiḥ śrotra patiḥ vijñāna patiḥ
etat tatas bhavati ākāśa śarīram brahma satya ātma prāṇa ārāmam manaḥ ānandam
śānti samṛddham amṛtam iti prācīnayogya upāssva pṛthivī antarikṣam dyauḥ diśaḥ
avāntaradiśāḥ agniḥ vāyuḥ ādityaḥ candramāḥ nakṣatrāṇi āpaḥ oṣadhayaḥ
vanaspatayaḥ ākāśaḥ ātmā iti adhibhūtam atha adhyātmam prāṇaḥ vyānaḥ apānaḥ
udānaḥ samānaḥ cakṣuḥ śrotram manaḥ vāc tvac carma māṃsam snāva asthi majjā etat
adhividhāya ṛṣiḥ avocat pāṅktam vai idam sarvam pāṅktena eva pāṅktam spṛṇoti iti
om iti brahma om iti idam sarvam om iti etat anukṛtiḥ ha sma vai api o śrāvaya
iti āśrāvayanti om iti sāmāni gāyanti oṃ śom iti śastrāṇi śaṃsanti om iti
adhvaryuḥ pratigaram pratigṛṇāti om iti brahmā prasauti om iti agnihotram
anujānāti om iti brāhmaṇaḥ pravakṣyan āha brahma upāpnavāni iti brahma eva
upāpnoti ṛtam ca svādhyāya pravacane ca satyam ca svādhyāya pravacane ca tapaḥ
ca svādhyāya pravacane ca damaḥ ca svādhyāya pravacane ca śamaḥ ca svādhyāya
pravacane ca agnayaḥ ca svādhyāya pravacane ca agnihotram ca svādhyāya pravacane
ca atithayaḥ ca svādhyāya pravacane ca mānuṣam ca svādhyāya pravacane ca prajā
ca svādhyāya pravacane ca prajanaḥ ca svādhyāya pravacane ca prajātiḥ ca
svādhyāya pravacane ca satyam iti satyavacāḥ rāthītaraḥ tapaḥ iti taponityaḥ
pauruśiṣṭiḥ svādhyāya pravacane eva iti nākaḥ maudgalyaḥ tat hi tapaḥ tat hi
tapaḥ aham vṛkṣasya rerivā kīrtiḥ pṛṣṭham gireḥ iva ūrdhva pavitraḥ vājinīvasu
amṛtam asmi draviṇam sa varcasam sumedhāḥ amṛta ukṣitaḥ iti triśaṅkoḥ veda
anuvacanam vidma śarasya pitaram parjanyam bhūri dhāyasam vidma u su asya
mātaram pṛthivīm bhūri varpasam jyāke pari naḥ nama aśmānam tanvam kṛdhi vīḍuḥ
varīyaḥ arātīḥ apa dveṣāṃsi ā kṛdhi vṛkṣam yat gāvaḥ pariṣasvajānāḥ anusphuram
śaram arcanti ṛbhum śarum asmat yāvaya didyum indra yathā dyām ca pṛthivīm ca
antar tiṣṭhati tejanam evā rogam ca āsrāvam ca antar tiṣṭhatu muñjaḥ id ambayaḥ
yanti adhvabhiḥ jāmayaḥ adhvarīyatām pṛñcatīḥ madhunā payaḥ amūḥ yāḥ upa sūrye
yābhiḥ vā sūryaḥ saha tāḥ naḥ hinvantu adhvaram apaḥ devīḥ upa hvaye yatra gāvaḥ
pibanti naḥ sindhubhyaḥ kartvam haviḥ apsu antar amṛtam apsu bheṣajam apām uta
praśastibhiḥ aśvāḥ bhavatha vājinaḥ gāvaḥ bhavatha vājinīḥ idam haviḥ yātudhānān
nadī phenam iva ā vahat yaḥ idam strī pumān akaḥ iha sa stuvatām janaḥ ayam
stuvānaḥ āgamat imam sma prati haryata bṛhaspate vaśe labdhvā agnīṣomāḥ vi
vidhyatam yātudhānasya somapa jahi prajām nayasva ca ni stuvānasya pātaya param
akṣi uta avaram yatra eṣām agne janimāni vettha guhā satām attriṇām jātavedaḥ
tān tvam brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānaḥ jahi eṣām śatatarham agne asmin vasu vasavaḥ
dhārayantu indraḥ pūṣā varuṇaḥ mitraḥ agniḥ imam ādityāḥ uta viśve ca devāḥ
uttarasmin jyotiṣi dhārayantu asya devāḥ pradiśi jyotiḥ astu sūryaḥ agniḥ uta vā
hiraṇyam sapatnāḥ asmat adhare bhavantu uttamam nākam adhi rohaya imam yena
indrāya samabharaḥ payāṃsi uttamena brahmaṇā jātavedaḥ tena tvam agne iha
vardhaya imam sajātānām śraiṣṭhye ā dhehi enam ā eṣām yajñam uta varcaḥ dade
aham rāyaḥ poṣam uta cittāni agne sapatnāḥ asmat adhare bhavantu uttamam nākam
adhi rohaya imam namaḥ te astu vidyute namaḥ te stanayitnave namaḥ te astu
aśmane yena ā dūḍāśe asyasi namaḥ te pravataḥ napāt yatas tapaḥ samūhasi mṛḍayā
naḥ tanūbhyaḥ mayaḥ tokebhyaḥ kṛdhi pravataḥ napāt namaḥ eva astu tubhyam namaḥ
te hetaye tapuṣe ca kṛṇmaḥ vidma te dhāma paramam guhā yat samudre antar nihitā
asi nābhiḥ yām tvā devāḥ asṛjanta viśve iṣum kṛṇvānāḥ asanāya dhṛṣṇum sā naḥ
mṛḍa vidathe gṛṇānā tasyai te namaḥ astu devi bhagam asyāḥ varcaḥ ādiṣi adhi
vṛkṣāt iva srajam mahā budhnaḥ iva parvataḥ jyok pitṛṣu āstām eṣā te rājan kanyā
vadhūḥ ni dhūyatām yama sā mātuḥ badhyatām gṛhe atha u bhrātuḥ atha u pituḥ eṣā
te kula pāḥ rājan tām u te pari dadmasi jyok pitṛṣu āsātai ā śīrṣṇaḥ śamopyāt
asitasya te brahmaṇā kaśyapasya gayasya ca antar kośam iva jāmayaḥ api nahyāmi
te bhagam ye amāvāsyām rātrim udasthuḥ vrājam attriṇaḥ agniḥ turīyaḥ yātu hā saḥ
asmabhyam adhi bravat sīsāya adhi āha varuṇaḥ sīsāya agniḥ upāvati sīsam me
indraḥ prāyacchat tat aṅga yātu cātanam idam viṣkandham sahate idam bādhate
attriṇaḥ anena viśvā sasahe yā jātāni piśācyāḥ yadi naḥ gām haṃsi yadi aśvam
yadi pūruṣam tam tvā sīsena vidhyāmaḥ yathā naḥ asaḥ a vīra hā amūḥ yāḥ yanti
yoṣitaḥ hirāḥ lohita vāsasaḥ a bhrātaraḥ iva jāmayaḥ tiṣṭhantu hata varcasaḥ
tiṣṭha avare tiṣṭha pare uta tvam tiṣṭha madhyame kaniṣṭhikā ca tiṣṭhati tiṣṭhāt
id dhamaniḥ mahī śatasya dhamanīnām sahasrasya hirāṇām asthuḥ id madhyamāḥ imāḥ
sākam antāḥ araṃsata pari vaḥ sikatāvatī dhanūḥ bṛhatī akramīt tiṣṭhata ilayata
su kam mā naḥ vidan vivyādhinaḥ mā u abhivyādhinaḥ vidan ārāt śaravyāḥ asmat
viṣūcīḥ indra pātaya viṣvañcaḥ asmat śaravaḥ patantu ye astāḥ ye ca asyāḥ daivīḥ
manuṣya iṣavaḥ mama amitrān vi vidhyata yaḥ naḥ svaḥ yaḥ araṇaḥ sajātaḥ uta
niṣṭyaḥ yaḥ asmāṁ abhidāsati rudraḥ śaravyayā etān mama amitrān vi vidhyatu yaḥ
sapatnaḥ yaḥ a sapatnaḥ yaḥ ca dviṣan śapāti naḥ devāḥ tam sarve dhūrvantu
brahma varma mama antaram a dāra sṛt bhavatu deva soma asmin yajñe marutaḥ
mṛḍata naḥ mā naḥ vidat abhibhā mā u aśastiḥ mā naḥ vidat vṛjinā dveṣyā yā yuvam
tam mitrāvaruṇau asmat yāvayatam pari itas ca yat amutas ca yat vadham varuṇa
yāvaya vi mahat śarma yaccha varīyaḥ yāvaya vadham śāsaḥ itthā mahāṁ asi amitra
sāhaḥ astṛtaḥ na yasya hanyate sakhā na jīyate kadācana anu sūryam ud ayatām
hṛddyotaḥ harimā ca te goḥ rohitasya varṇena tena tvā paridadhmasi pari tvā
rohitaiḥ varṇaiḥ dīrgha āyu tvāya dadhmasi yathā ayam arapāḥ asat atha u a
haritaḥ bhuvat yāḥ rohiṇīḥ devatyāḥ gāvaḥ yāḥ uta rohiṇīḥ rūpam rūpam vayaḥ
vayaḥ tābhiḥ tvā paridadhmasi śukeṣu te harimāṇam ropaṇākāsu dadhmasi atha u
hāridraveṣu te harimāṇam nidadhmasi idam janāsaḥ vidatha mahat brahma vadiṣyati
na tat pṛthivyām na u divi yena prāṇanti vīrudhaḥ antarikṣe āsām sthāma śrānta
sadām iva āsthānam asya bhūtasya viduḥ tat vedhasaḥ na vā yat rodasī rejamāne
bhūmiḥ ca niratakṣatam ārdram tat adya sarvadā samudrasya iva srotyāḥ tat
anyasyām adhi śritam dive ca viśva vedase pṛthivyai ca akaram namaḥ iyam vīrudh
madhu jātā madhunā tvā khanāmasi madhoḥ adhi prajātā asi sā naḥ madhumataḥ kṛdhi
jihvāyāḥ agre madhu me jihvā mūle madhūlakam mama id aha kratau asaḥ mama cittam
upāyasi madhumat me nikramaṇam madhumat me parāyaṇam vācā vadāmi madhumat
bhūyāsam madhu saṃdṛśaḥ madhoḥ asmi madhutaraḥ madughāt madhumattaraḥ mām id
kila tvam vanāḥ śākhām madhumatīm iva pari tvā paritatnunā ikṣuṇā agām a vidviṣe
yathā mām kāminī asaḥ yathā mat na apagā asaḥ adaḥ yat avadhāvati avatkam adhi
parvatāt tat te kṛṇomi bheṣajam su bheṣajam yathā asasi āt aṅga kuvid aṅga śatam
yā bheṣajāni te teṣām asi tvam uttamam an āsrāvam arogaṇam nīcais khananti
asurāḥ arusrāṇam idam mahat tat āsrāvasya bheṣajam tat u rogam anīnaśat upajīkāḥ
ud bharanti samudrāt adhi bheṣajam tat āsrāvasya bheṣajam tat u rogam aśīśamat
arusrāṇam idam mahat pṛthivyāḥ adhi udbhṛtam tat āsrāvasya bheṣajam tat u rogam
anīnaśat śam naḥ bhavantu apaḥ oṣadhayaḥ śivāḥ indrasya vajraḥ apa hantu
rakṣasaḥ ārāt visṛṣṭāḥ iṣavaḥ patantu rakṣasām dīrgha āyu tvāya bṛhate raṇāya a
riṣyantaḥ dakṣamāṇāḥ sadā eva maṇim viṣkandha dūṣaṇam jaṅgiḍam bibhṛmaḥ vayam
jaṅgiḍaḥ jambhāt viśarāt viṣkandhāt abhiśocanāt maṇiḥ sahasra vīryaḥ pari naḥ
pātu viśvatas ayam viṣkandham sahate ayam bādhate attriṇaḥ ayam naḥ viśva
bheṣajaḥ jaṅgiḍaḥ pātu aṃhasaḥ devaiḥ dattena maṇinā jaṅgiḍena mayobhuvā
viṣkandham sarvā rakṣāṃsi vyāyāme sahāmahe śaṇaḥ ca mā jaṅgiḍaḥ ca viṣkandhāt
abhi rakṣatām araṇyāt anyaḥ ābhṛtaḥ kṛṣyāḥ anyaḥ rasebhyaḥ kṛtyā dūṣiḥ ayam
maṇiḥ atha u arāti dūṣiḥ atha u sahasvān jaṅgiḍaḥ pra naḥ āyūṃṣi tāriṣat daśa
vṛkṣa muñca imam rakṣasaḥ grāhyāḥ adhi yā enam jagrāha parvasu atha u enam
vanaspate jīvānām lokam ud naya āgāt ud agāt ayam jīvānām vrātam api agāt abhūt
u putrāṇām pitā nṛṇām ca bhagavattamaḥ adhītīḥ adhi agāt ayam adhi jīva purā
agan śatam hi asya bhiṣajaḥ sahasram uta vīrudhaḥ devāḥ te cītim avidan
brahmāṇaḥ uta vīrudhaḥ cītim te viśve devāḥ avidan bhūmyām adhi yaḥ cakāra sa
niḥ karat saḥ eva su bhiṣaktamaḥ saḥ eva tubhyam bheṣajāni kṛṇavat bhiṣajā śuciḥ
ā iha yantu paśavaḥ ye pareyuḥ vāyuḥ yeṣām sahacāram jujoṣa tvaṣṭā yeṣām
rūpadheyāni veda asmin tān goṣṭhe savitā ni yacchatu imam goṣṭham paśavaḥ sam
sravantu bṛhaspatiḥ ā nayatu prajānan sinīvālī nayatu ā agram eṣām ājagmuṣaḥ
anumate ni yaccha sam sam sravantu paśavaḥ sam aśvāḥ sam u pūruṣāḥ sam dhānyasya
yā sphātiḥ saṃsrāvyeṇa haviṣā juhomi sam siñcāmi gavām kṣīram sam ājyena balam
rasam saṃsiktāḥ asmākam vīrāḥ dhruvāḥ gāvaḥ mayi gopatau ā harāmi gavām kṣīram
āhārṣam dhānyam rasam āhṛtāḥ asmākam vīrau ā patnīḥ idam astakam na id śatruḥ
prāśam jayāti sahamānā abhibhūḥ asi prāśam pratiprāśaḥ jahi arasān kṛṇu oṣadhe
suparṇaḥ tvā anu avindat sūkaraḥ tvā akhanat nasā prāśam pratiprāśaḥ jahi arasān
kṛṇu oṣadhe indraḥ ha cakre tvā bāhau asurebhyaḥ starītave prāśam pratiprāśaḥ
jahi arasān kṛṇu oṣadhe pāṭām indraḥ vi āśnāt asurebhyaḥ starītave prāśam
pratiprāśaḥ jahi arasān kṛṇu oṣadhe tayā aham śatrūn sākṣe indraḥ sālāvṛkāṁ iva
prāśam pratiprāśaḥ jahi arasān kṛṇu oṣadhe rudra jalāṣa bheṣaja nīla śikhaṇḍa
karma kṛt prāśam pratiprāśaḥ jahi arasān kṛṇu oṣadhe tasya prāśam tvam jahi yaḥ
naḥ indra abhidāsati adhi naḥ brūhi śaktibhiḥ prāśi mām uttaram kṛdhi yathā idam
bhūmyāḥ adhi tṛṇam vātaḥ mathāyati eva mathnāmi te manaḥ yathā mām kāminī asaḥ
yathā mat na apagā asaḥ sam ca id nayāthaḥ aśvinā kāminā sam ca vakṣathaḥ sam
vām bhagāsaḥ agmata sam cittāni sam vratā yat suparṇāḥ vivakṣavaḥ anamīvāḥ
vivakṣavaḥ tatra me gacchatāt havam śalyaḥ iva kulmalam yathā yat antaram tat
bāhyam yat bāhyam tat antaram kanyānām viśva rūpāṇām manaḥ gṛbhāya oṣadhe ā iyam
agan pati kāmā jani kāmaḥ aham āgamam aśvaḥ kanikradat yathā bhagena aham saha
āgamam agniḥ naḥ śatrūn prati etu vidvān pratidahan abhiśastim arātim sa senām
mohayatu pareṣām nirhastān ca kṛṇavat jātavedāḥ yūyam ugrāḥ marutaḥ īdṛśe stha
abhi preta mṛṇata sahadhvam amīmṛṇan vasavaḥ nāthitāḥ ime agniḥ hi eṣām dūtaḥ
pratyetu vidvān amitra senām maghavan asmān śatrūyatīm abhi yuvam tām indra
vṛtrahan agniḥ ca dahatam prati prasūtaḥ indra pravatā haribhyām pra te vajraḥ
pramṛṇan etu śatrūn jahi pratīcaḥ anūcaḥ parācaḥ viṣvak satyam kṛṇuhi cittam
eṣām indra senām mohaya amitrāṇām agneḥ vātasya dhrājyā tān viṣūcaḥ vi nāśaya
indraḥ senām mohayatu marutaḥ ghnantu ojasā cakṣūṃsi agniḥ ā dattām punar etu
parājitā atha u yat adya eṣām hṛdi tat eṣām pari niḥ jahi amīṣām cittāni
pratimohayantī gṛhāṇa aṅgāni apve parehi abhi prehi niḥ daha hṛtsu śokaiḥ ā tvā
gan rāṣṭram saha varcasā ud ihi prāṅ viśām patiḥ eka rāj tvam vi rāja sarvāḥ tvā
rājan pradiśaḥ hvayantu upasadyaḥ namasyaḥ bhava iha tvām viśaḥ vṛṇatām rājyāya
tvām imāḥ pradiśaḥ pañca devīḥ varṣman rāṣṭrasya kakudi śrayasva tatas naḥ ugraḥ
vi bhaja vasūni accha tvā yantu havinaḥ sajātāḥ agniḥ dūtaḥ ajiraḥ sam carātai
jāyāḥ putrāḥ sumanasaḥ bhavantu bahum balim prati paśyāsai ugraḥ aśvinā tvā agre
mitrāvaruṇā ubhā viśve devāḥ marutaḥ tvā hvayantu ā ayam agan parṇa maṇiḥ balī
balena pramṛṇan sapatnān ojaḥ devānām payaḥ oṣadhīnām varcasā mā jinvantu mayi
kṣatram parṇa maṇe mayi dhārayatāt rayim aham rāṣṭrasya abhīvarge nijaḥ bhūyāsam
uttamaḥ yam nidadhuḥ vanaspatau guhyam devāḥ priyam maṇim tam asmabhyam saha
āyuṣā devāḥ dadatu bhartave somasya parṇaḥ sahaḥ ugram āgan indreṇa dattaḥ
varuṇena śiṣṭaḥ tam bhriyāsām bahu rocamānaḥ dīrgha āyu tvāya śata śāradāya ā mā
ārukṣat parṇa maṇiḥ mahyai ariṣṭatātaye yathā aham uttaraḥ asāni aryamṇaḥ uta
saṃvidaḥ ye dhīvānaḥ rathakārāḥ karmārāḥ ye manīṣiṇaḥ upastīn parṇa mahyam tvam
sarvān kṛṇu abhitas janān ye rājānaḥ rāja kṛtaḥ sūtāḥ grāmaṇyaḥ ca ye upastīn
parṇa mahyam tvam sarvān kṛṇu abhitas janān parṇaḥ asi tanūpānaḥ sa yoniḥ vīraḥ
vīreṇa mayā saṃvatsarasya tejasā tena badhnāmi tvā maṇe eka śatam viṣkandhāni
viṣṭhitā pṛthivīm anu teṣām tvām agre ud jaharuḥ maṇim viṣkandha dūṣaṇam kāmān
asmākam pūraya prati gṛhṇāhi naḥ haviḥ tam ā harāmi nirṛteḥ upasthāt aspārṣam
enam śata śāradāya iha eva dhruvām ni minomi śālām kṣeme tiṣṭhāti ghṛtam
ukṣamāṇā tām tvā śāle sarva vīrāḥ su vīrāḥ ariṣṭa vīrāḥ upa sam carema iha eva
dhruvā prati tiṣṭha śāle aśvāvatī gomatī sūnṛtāvatī ūrjasvatī ghṛtavatī
payasvatī ud śrayasva mahate saubhagāya dharuṇī asi śāle bṛhat chandāḥ pūti
dhānyā ā tvā vatsaḥ gamet ā kumāraḥ ā dhenavaḥ sāyam āspandamānāḥ imām śālām
savitā vāyuḥ indraḥ bṛhaspatiḥ ni minotu prajānan ukṣantu udnā marutaḥ ghṛtena
bhagaḥ naḥ rājā ni kṛṣim tanotu mānasya patni śaraṇā syonā devī devebhiḥ nimitā
asi agre tṛṇam vasānā sumanāḥ asaḥ tvam athā asmabhyam saha vīram rayim dāḥ
saṃśitam me idam brahma saṃśitam vīryam balam saṃśitam kṣatram ajaram astu
jiṣṇuḥ yeṣām asmi purohitaḥ sam aham eṣām rāṣṭram syāmi sam ojaḥ vīryam balam
vṛścāmi śatrūṇām bāhūn anena haviṣā aham nīcais padyantām adhare bhavantu ye naḥ
sūrim maghavānam pṛtanyān kṣiṇāmi brahmaṇā amitrān ud nayāmi svān aham
tīkṣṇīyāṃsaḥ paraśoḥ agneḥ tīkṣṇatarāḥ uta indrasya vajrāt tīkṣṇīyāṃsaḥ yeṣām
asmi purohitaḥ eṣām aham āyudhā sam syāmi eṣām rāṣṭram su vīram vardhayāmi eṣām
kṣatram ajaram astu jiṣṇu eṣām cittam viśve avantu devāḥ ud harṣantām maghavan
vājināni ud vīrāṇām jayatām etu ghoṣaḥ pṛthak ghoṣāḥ ululayaḥ ketumantaḥ ud
īratām devāḥ indra jyeṣṭhāḥ marutaḥ yantu senayā preta jayata naraḥ ugrāḥ vaḥ
santu bāhavaḥ tīkṣṇa iṣavaḥ abala dhanvanaḥ hata ugra āyudhāḥ abalān ugra
bāhavaḥ avasṛṣṭā parā pata śaravye brahma saṃśite jaya amitrān pra padyasva jahi
eṣām varam varam mā amīṣām moci kaścana yena vehat babhūvitha nāśayāmasi tat
tvat idam tat anyatra tvat apa dūre nidadhmasi ā te yonim garbhaḥ etu pumān
bāṇaḥ iva iṣudhim ā vīraḥ atra jāyatām putraḥ te daśamāsyaḥ pumāṃsam putram
janaya tam pumān anujāyatām bhavāsi putrāṇām mātā jātānām janayāḥ ca yān yāni
bhadrāṇi bījāni ṛṣabhāḥ janayanti ca taiḥ tvam putram vindasva sā prasūḥ dhenukā
bhava kṛṇomi te prājāpatyam ā yonim garbhaḥ etu te vindasva tvam putram nāri yaḥ
tubhyam śam asat śam u tasmai tvam bhava yāsām dyauḥ pitā pṛthivī mātā samudraḥ
mūlam vīrudhām babhūva tāḥ tvā putra vidyāya daivīḥ prāvantu oṣadhayaḥ uttudaḥ
tvā ud tudatu mā dhṛthāḥ śayane sve iṣuḥ kāmasya yā bhīmā tayā vidhyāmi tvā hṛdi
ādhī parṇām kāma śalyām iṣum saṃkalpa kulmalām tām su saṃnatām kṛtvā kāmaḥ
vidhyatu tvā hṛdi yā plīhānam śoṣayati kāmasya iṣuḥ su saṃnatā prācīna pakṣā
vyoṣā tayā vidhyāmi tvā hṛdi śucā viddhā vyoṣayā śuṣka āsyā abhi sarpa mā mṛduḥ
nimanyuḥ kevalī priya vādinī anuvratā ājāmi tvā ājanyā pari mātuḥ atha u pituḥ
yathā mama kratau asaḥ mama cittam upāyasi vi asyai mitrāvaruṇau hṛdaḥ cittāni
asyatam atha enām akratum kṛtvā mama eva kṛṇutam vaśe tvaṣṭā duhitre vahatum
yunakti iti idam viśvam bhuvanam vi yāti agniḥ prāṇān sam dadhāti candraḥ
prāṇena saṃhitaḥ vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā prāṇena viśvatas
vīryam devāḥ sūryam sam airayan āyuṣmatām āyuṣkṛtām prāṇena jīva mā mṛthāḥ ud
itas trayaḥ akraman vyāghraḥ puruṣaḥ vṛkaḥ hiruk hi yanti sindhavaḥ hiruk devaḥ
vanaspatiḥ hiruk namantu śatravaḥ pareṇa etu pathā vṛkaḥ parameṇa uta taskaraḥ
pareṇa datvatī rajjuḥ pareṇa aghāyuḥ arṣatu akṣyau ca te mukham ca te vyāghra
jambhayāmasi āt sarvān viṃśatim nakhān vyāghram datvatām vayam prathamam
jambhayāmasi āt u stenam atha u ahim yātudhānam atha u vṛkam yaḥ adya stenaḥ
āyati sa sampiṣṭaḥ apāyati pathām apadhvaṃsena etu indraḥ vajreṇa hantu tam
mūrṇāḥ mṛgasya dantāḥ apiśīrṇāḥ u pṛṣṭayaḥ nimruc te godhā bhavatu nīcā āyat
śaśayuḥ mṛgaḥ yat saṃyamaḥ na vi yamaḥ vi yamaḥ yat na saṃyamaḥ indra jāḥ soma
jāḥ ātharvaṇam asi vyāghra jambhanam sahasra śṛṅgaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ yaḥ samudrāt
udācarat tena sahasyena vayam ni janān svāpayāmasi na bhūmim vātaḥ ati vāti nā
ati paśyati kaścana striyaḥ ca sarvāḥ svāpaya śunaḥ ca indra sakhā caran
brāhmaṇaḥ jajñe prathamaḥ daśa śīrṣaḥ daśa āsyaḥ sa somam prathamaḥ papau sa
cakāra arasam viṣam yāvatī dyāvāpṛthivī varimṇā yāvat sapta sindhavaḥ vitaṣṭhire
vācam viṣasya dūṣaṇīm tām itas niḥ avādiṣam suparṇaḥ tvā garutmān viṣa prathamam
āvayat na amīmadaḥ nā arūrupaḥ uta asmai abhavaḥ pituḥ yaḥ te āsyat pañca
aṅguriḥ vakrāt cit adhi dhanvanaḥ apaskambhasya śalyāt niḥ avocam aham viṣam
śalyāt viṣam niḥ avocam prāñjanāt uta parṇadheḥ apāṣṭhāt śṛṅgāt kulmalāt niḥ
avocam aham viṣam arasaḥ te iṣo śalyaḥ atha u te arasam viṣam uta arasasya
vṛkṣasya dhanuḥ te arasa arasam ye apīṣan ye adihan ye āsyan ye avāsṛjan sarve
