te vadhrayaḥ kṛtāḥ vadhriḥ viṣa giriḥ kṛtaḥ vadhrayaḥ te khanitāraḥ vadhriḥ tvam
asi oṣadhe vadhriḥ sa parvataḥ giriḥ yatas jātam idam viṣam vāḥ idam vārayātai
varaṇāvatyām adhi tatra amṛtasya āsiktam tena te vāraye viṣam arasam prācyam
viṣam arasam yat udīcyam athā idam adharācyam karambheṇa vi kalpate karambham
kṛtvā tiryam pībaspākam udārathim kṣudhā kila tvā duṣṭano jakṣivān sa na rūrupaḥ
vi te madam madāvati śaram iva pātayāmasi pra tvā carum iva yeṣantam vacasā
sthāpayāmasi pari grāmam iva ācitam vacasā sthāpayāmasi tiṣṭha vṛkṣaḥ iva
sthāmni abhri khāte na rūrupaḥ pavastaiḥ tvā pari akrīṇan dūrśebhiḥ ajinaiḥ uta
prakrīḥ asi tvam oṣadhe abhri khāte na rūrupaḥ an āptāḥ ye vaḥ prathamāḥ yāni
karmāṇi cakrire vīrān naḥ atra mā dabhan tat vaḥ etat puras dadhe vātāt jātaḥ
antarikṣāt vidyutaḥ jyotiṣaḥ pari sa naḥ hiraṇya jāḥ śaṅkhaḥ kṛśanaḥ pātu
aṃhasaḥ yaḥ agratas rocanānām samudrāt adhi jajñiṣe śaṅkhena hatvā rakṣāṃsi
attriṇaḥ vi sahāmahe śaṅkhena amīvām amatim śaṅkhena uta sadānvāḥ śaṅkhaḥ naḥ
viśva bheṣajaḥ kṛśanaḥ pātu aṃhasaḥ divi jātaḥ samudra jaḥ sindhutaḥ pari
ābhṛtaḥ sa naḥ hiraṇya jāḥ śaṅkhaḥ āyuṣprataraṇaḥ maṇiḥ samudrāt jātaḥ maṇiḥ
vṛtrāt jātaḥ divākaraḥ saḥ asmān sarvatas pātu hetyāḥ deva asurebhyaḥ hiraṇyānām
ekaḥ asi somāt tvam adhi jajñiṣe rathe tvam asi darśataḥ iṣudhau rocanaḥ tvam
pra naḥ āyūṃṣi tāriṣat devānām asthi kṛśanam babhūva tat ātmanvat carati apsu
antar tat te badhnāmi āyuṣe varcase balāya dīrgha āyu tvāya śata śāradāya
kārśanaḥ tvā abhi rakṣatu anaḍvān dādhāra pṛthivīm uta dyām anaḍvān dādhāra uru
antarikṣam anaḍvān dādhāra pradiśaḥ ṣaḍ urvīḥ anaḍvān viśvam bhuvanam ā viveśa
anaḍvān indraḥ sa paśubhyaḥ vi caṣṭe trayān śakraḥ vi mimīte adhvanaḥ bhūtam
bhaviṣyat bhuvanā duhānaḥ sarvā devānām carati vratāni indraḥ jātaḥ manuṣyeṣu
antar gharmaḥ taptaḥ carati śośucānaḥ suprajāḥ san saḥ udāre na sarṣat yaḥ na
aśnīyāt anaḍuhaḥ vijānan anaḍvān duhe sukṛtasya loke ā enam pyāyayati pavamānaḥ
purastāt parjanyaḥ dhārāḥ marutaḥ ūdhar asya yajñaḥ payaḥ dakṣiṇā dohaḥ asya
yasya nā īśe yajña patiḥ na yajñaḥ na asya dātā īśe na pratigrahītā yaḥ viśva
jit viśva bhṛt viśva karmā gharmam naḥ brūta yatamaḥ catuṣpād yena devāḥ svar
āruruhuḥ hitvā śarīram amṛtasya nābhim tena geṣma sukṛtasya lokam gharmasya
vratena tapasā yaśasyavaḥ indraḥ rūpeṇa rūpeṇa agniḥ vahena prajāpatiḥ
parameṣṭhī virāj viśvānare akramata vaiśvānare akramata anaḍuhi akramata saḥ
adṛṃhayata saḥ adhārayata madhyam etat anaḍuhaḥ yatrā eṣa vahaḥ āhitaḥ etāvat
asya prācīnam yāvān pratyaṅ samāhitaḥ yaḥ veda anaḍuhaḥ dohān sapta
anupadasvataḥ prajām ca lokam ca āpnoti tathā sapta ṛṣayaḥ viduḥ padbhiḥ sedim
avakrāman irām jaṅghābhiḥ utkhidan śrameṇa anaḍvān kīlālam kīnāśaḥ ca abhi
gacchataḥ dvādaśa vai etāḥ rātrīḥ vratyāḥ āhuḥ prajāpateḥ tatra upa brahma yaḥ
veda tat vai anaḍuhaḥ vratam duhe sāyam duhe prātar duhe madhyaṃdinam pari dohāḥ
ye asya saṃyanti tān vidma anupadasvataḥ rohaṇī asi rohaṇī asthnaḥ chinnasya
rohaṇī asi rohaya idam arundhati yat te riṣṭam yat te dyuttam asti peṣṭram te
ātmani dhātā tat bhadrayā punar sam dadhat paruṣā paruḥ sam te majjā majjñā
bhavatu sam u te paruṣā paruḥ sam te māṃsasya visrastam sam asthi api rohatu
majjā majjñā sam dhīyatām carmaṇā carma rohatu asṛk te asthi rohatu māṃsam
māṃsena rohatu loma lomnā sam kalpaya tvacā sam kalpaya tvacam asṛk te asthi
rohatu chinnam sam dhehi oṣadhe saḥ ud tiṣṭha pra drava rathaḥ su cakraḥ su
paviḥ su nābhiḥ prati tiṣṭha ūrdhvaḥ yadi kartam patitvā saṃśaśre yadi vā aśmā
prahṛtaḥ jaghāna ṛbhuḥ rathasya iva aṅgāni sam dadhat paruṣā paruḥ abhi kranda
ardaya udadhim bhūmim parjanya payasā sam aṅdhi tvayā sṛṣṭam bahulam aitu varṣam
āśāra eṣī kṛśaguḥ etu astam apām agniḥ tanūbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ yaḥ oṣadhīnām adhipāḥ
babhūva sa naḥ varṣam vanutām jātavedāḥ prāṇam prajābhyaḥ amṛtam divaḥ pari apaḥ
niṣiñcan asuraḥ pitā naḥ śvasantu gargarāḥ apām varuṇa ava nīcīḥ apaḥ sṛja
vadantu pṛśni bāhavaḥ maṇḍūkāḥ iriṇā anu ā paśyati prati paśyati parā paśyati
divam antarikṣam āt bhūmim sarvam tat devi paśyati tisraḥ divaḥ tisraḥ pṛthivīḥ
ṣaḍ ca imāḥ pradiśaḥ pṛthak tvayā aham sarvā bhūtāni paśyāni devi oṣadhe
divyasya suparṇasya tasya ha asi kanīnikā sā bhūmim ā rurohitha vahyam śrāntā
vadhūḥ iva tām me sahasra akṣaḥ devaḥ dakṣiṇe haste ā dadhat tayā aham sarvam
paśyāmi yaḥ ca śūdraḥ uta āryaḥ āvis kṛṇuṣva rūpāni mā ātmānam apa gūhathāḥ atha
u sahasra cakṣo prati paśyāḥ kimīdinaḥ darśaya mā yātudhānān darśaya yātudhānyaḥ
piśācān sarvān darśaya iti tvā ā rabhe oṣadhe kaśyapasya cakṣuḥ asi śunyāḥ ca
catur akṣyāḥ vīdhre sūryam iva sarpantam mā piśācam tiras karaḥ ud agrabham
paripāṇāt yātudhānam kimīdinam tena aham sarvam paśyāmi uta śūdram uta āryam yaḥ
antarikṣeṇa patati divam yaḥ ca atisarpati bhūmim yaḥ manyate nātham tam piśācam
pra darśaya yena agninā paṇīn indraḥ jigāya sa naḥ muñcatu aṃhasaḥ tvayā manyo
sa ratham ārujantaḥ harṣamāṇāḥ hṛṣitāsaḥ marutvan tigma iṣavaḥ āyudhā saṃśiśānāḥ
upa pra yantu naraḥ agni rūpāḥ agniḥ iva manyo tviṣitaḥ sahasva senānīḥ naḥ
sahure hūtaḥ edhi hatvāya śatrūn vi bhajasva vedaḥ ojaḥ mimānaḥ vi mṛdhaḥ
nudasva sahasva manyo abhimātim asmai rujan mṛṇan pramṛṇan prehi śatrūn ugram te
pājaḥ nanu ā rurudhre vaśī vaśam nayāsai eka ja tvam ekaḥ bahūnām asi manyo
īḍitā viśam viśam yuddhāya sam śiśādhi a kṛtta ruc tvayā yujā vayam dyumantam
ghoṣam vijayāya kṛṇmasi vijeṣa kṛt indraḥ iva anavabravaḥ asmākam manyo adhipāḥ
bhava iha priyam te nāma sahure gṛṇīmasi vidma tam utsam yatas ābabhūtha ābhūtyā
sahajāḥ vajra sāyaka sahaḥ bibharṣi saha bhūtaḥ uttaram kratvā naḥ manyo saha
medī edhi mahā dhanasya puru hūta saṃsṛji saṃsṛṣṭam dhanam ubhayam samākṛtam
asmabhyam dhattām varuṇaḥ ca manyuḥ bhiyaḥ dadhānāḥ hṛdayeṣu śatravaḥ
parājitāsaḥ apa ni layantām brahmā asya śīrṣam bṛhat asya pṛṣṭham vāmadevyam
udaram odanasya chandāṃsi pakṣau mukham asya satyam viṣṭārī jātaḥ tapasaḥ adhi
yajñaḥ anasthāḥ pūtāḥ pavanena śuddhāḥ śucayaḥ śucim api yanti lokam na eṣām
śiśnam pra dahati jātavedāḥ svarge loke bahu straiṇam eṣām viṣṭāriṇam odanam ye
pacanti na enān avartiḥ sacate kadācana āste yame upa yāti devān sam gandharvaiḥ
madate somyebhiḥ viṣṭāriṇam odanam ye pacanti na enān yamaḥ pari muṣṇāti retaḥ
rathī ha bhūtvā ratha yānaḥ īyate pakṣī ha bhūtvā ati divaḥ sam eti eṣa yajñānām
vitataḥ vahiṣṭhaḥ viṣṭāriṇam paktvā divam ā viveśa āṇḍīkam kumudam sam tanoti
bisam śālūkam śaphakaḥ mulālī etāḥ tvā dhārāḥ upa yantu sarvāḥ svarge loke
madhumat pinvamānāḥ upa tvā tiṣṭhantu puṣkariṇīḥ samantāḥ yaḥ giriṣu ajāyathāḥ
vīrudhām balavattamaḥ kuṣṭha ihi takma nāśana takmānam nāśayan itas suparṇa
suvane girau jātam himavataḥ pari dhanaiḥ abhi śrutvā yanti viduḥ hi takma
nāśanam aśvatthaḥ deva sadanaḥ tṛtīyasyām itas divi tatra amṛtasya cakṣaṇam
devāḥ kuṣṭham avanvata hiraṇyayī nauḥ acarat hiraṇya bandhanā divi tatra
amṛtasya puṣpam devāḥ kuṣṭham avanvata hiraṇyayāḥ panthānaḥ āsan aritrāṇi
hiraṇyayā nāvaḥ hiraṇyayīḥ āsan yābhiḥ kuṣṭham nirāvahan imam me kuṣṭha pūruṣam
tam ā vaha tam niḥ kuru tam u me agadam kṛdhi devebhyaḥ adhi jātaḥ asi somasya
asi sakhā hitaḥ sa prāṇāya vyānāya cakṣuṣe me asmai mṛḍa udaṅ jātaḥ himavataḥ sa
prācyām nīyase janam tatra kuṣṭhasya nāmāni uttamāni vi bhejire uttamaḥ nāma
kuṣṭha asi uttamaḥ nāma te pitā yakṣmam ca sarvam nāśaya takmānam ca arasam
kṛdhi śīrṣa āmayam upahatyām akṣyoḥ tanvaḥ rapaḥ kuṣṭhaḥ tat sarvam niḥ karat
daivam samaha vṛṣṇyam vaikaṅkatena idhmena devebhyaḥ ājyam vaha agne tāṁ iha
mādaya sarve ā yantu me havam indra ā yāhi me havam idam kariṣyāmi tat śṛṇu ime
aindrāḥ atisarāḥ ākūtim sam namantu me tebhiḥ śakema vīryam jātavedaḥ tanū vaśin
yat asau amutas devāḥ adevaḥ saṃścikīrṣati mā tasya agniḥ havyam vākṣīt havam
devāḥ asya mā upa guḥ mama eva havam etana ati dhāvata atisarāḥ indrasya vacasā
hata avim vṛkaḥ iva mathnīta sa vaḥ jīvan mā moci prāṇam asya api nahyata yam
amī purodadhire brahmāṇam apabhūtaye indra sa te adhaspadam tam prati asyāmi
mṛtyave yadi preyuḥ deva purā brahma varmāṇi cakrire tanū pānam paripāṇam
kṛṇvānāḥ yat upocire sarvam tat arasam kṛdhi yān asau atisarān cakāra kṛṇavat ca
yān tvam tān indra vṛtrahan pratīcaḥ punar ā kṛdhi yathā amum tṛṇahān janam
yathā indraḥ udvācanam labdhvā cakre adhaspadam kṛṇve aham adharān tathā amūn
śaśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ atrā enān indra vṛtrahan ugraḥ marmaṇi vidhya atra eva
enān abhi tiṣṭha indra medī aham tava anu tvā indrāḥ rabhāmahe syāma sumatau
tava sūryaḥ me cakṣuḥ vātaḥ prāṇaḥ antarikṣam ātmā pṛthivī śarīram astṛtaḥ nāma
aham ayam asmi saḥ ātmānam ni dadhe dyāvāpṛthivībhyām gopīthāya dadiḥ hi mahyam
varuṇaḥ divaḥ kaviḥ vacobhiḥ ugraiḥ ni riṇāmi te viṣam khātam a khātam uta
saktam agrabham irā iva dhanvan ni jajāsa te viṣam yat te apodakam viṣam tat te
etāsu agrabham gṛhṇāmi te madhyamam uttamam rasam uta avamam bhiyasā neśat āt u
te vṛṣā me ravaḥ nabhasā na tanyatuḥ ugreṇa te vacasā bādhe āt u te aham tam
asya nṛbhiḥ agrabham rasam tamasaḥ iva jyotiḥ ud etu sūryaḥ cakṣuṣā te cakṣuḥ
hanmi viṣeṇa hanmi te viṣam ahe mriyasva mā jīvīḥ pratyak abhī etu tvā viṣam
kairāta pṛśne upatṛṇya babhro ā me śṛṇuta asitāḥ alīkāḥ mā me sakhyuḥ stāmānam
api sthāta āśrāvayantaḥ ni viṣe ramadhvam asitasya taimātasya babhroḥ apodakasya
ca sātrāsāhasya aham manyoḥ ava jyām iva dhanvanaḥ vi muñcāmi rathāṁ iva āligī
ca viligī ca pitā ca mātā ca vidma vaḥ sarvatas bandhū arasāḥ kim kariṣyatha
urugūlāyāḥ duhitā jātā dāsī asiknyā prataṅkam dadruṣīṇām sarvāsām arasam viṣam
karṇā śvāvidh tat abravīt gireḥ avacarantikā yāḥ kāḥ ca imāḥ khanitrimāḥ tāsām
arasatamam viṣam tābuvam na tābuvam na ghā id tvam asi tābuvam tābuvena arasam
viṣam tastuvam na tastuvam na ghā id tvam asi tastuvam tastuvena arasam viṣam
suparṇaḥ tvā anu avindat sūkaraḥ tvā akhanat nasā dipsa auṣadhe tvam dipsantam
ava kṛtyā kṛtam jahi ava jahi yātudhānān ava kṛtyā kṛtam jahi atho yaḥ asmān
dipsati tam u tvam jahi oṣadhe riśyasya iva parīśāsam parikṛtya pari tvacaḥ
kṛtyām kṛtyā kṛte devāḥ niṣkam iva prati muñcata punar kṛtyām kṛtyā kṛte hasta
gṛhya parā naya samakṣam asmai ā dhehi yathā kṛtyā kṛtam hanat kṛtyāḥ santu
kṛtyā kṛte śapathaḥ śapathīyate sukhaḥ rathaḥ iva vartatām kṛtyā kṛtyā kṛtam
punar yadi strī yadi vā pumān kṛtyām cakāra pāpmane tām u tasmai nayāmasi aśvam
iva aśva abhidhānyā yadi vā asi deva kṛtā yadi vā puruṣaiḥ kṛtā tām tvā punar
nayāmasi indreṇa sayujā vayam agne pṛtanāṣāh pṛtanāḥ sahasva punar kṛtyām kṛtyā
kṛte pratiharaṇena harāmasi kṛtavyadhani vidhya tam yaḥ cakāra tam id jahi na
tvām a cakruṣe vayam vadhāya sam śiśīmahi putraḥ iva pitaram gaccha svajaḥ iva
abhiṣṭhitaḥ daśa bandham iva avakrāmī gaccha kṛtye kṛtyā kṛtam punar ud eṇī iva
vāraṇī abhiskandam mṛgī iva kṛtyā kartāram ṛcchatu iṣvāḥ ṛjīyaḥ patatu
dyāvāpṛthivī tam prati sā tam mṛgam iva gṛhṇātu kṛtyā kṛtyā kṛtam punar agniḥ
iva etu pratikūlam anukūlam iva udakam sukhaḥ rathaḥ iva vartatām kṛtyā kṛtyā
kṛtam punar jihvā jyā bhavati kulmalam vāc nāḍīkāḥ dantāḥ tīkṣṇa iṣavaḥ
brāhmaṇāḥ hetimantaḥ yām asyanti śaravyām na sā mṛṣā yaḥ brāhmaṇam deva bandhum
hinasti na sa pitṛyāṇam api eti lokam jyā ghoṣāḥ dundubhayaḥ abhi krośantu yāḥ
diśaḥ senāḥ parājitāḥ yatīḥ amitrāṇām anīkaśas āditya cakṣuḥ ā datsva marīcayaḥ
anu dhāvata pad saṅginīḥ ā sajantu vigate bāhu vīrye anya kṣetre na ramase vaśī
san mṛḍayāsi naḥ abhūt u prārthaḥ takmā sa gamiṣyati balhikān takman bhrātrā
balāsena svasrā kāsikayā saha pāpmā bhrātṛvyeṇa saha gaccha amum araṇam janam
yajūṃṣi yajñe samidhaḥ svāhā agniḥ pravidvān iha vaḥ yunaktu yunaktu devaḥ
savitā prajānan asmin yajñe mahiṣaḥ svāhā indraḥ ukthāmadāni asmin yajñe
pravidvān yunaktu su yujaḥ svāhā yām te cakruḥ senāyām yām cakruḥ iṣu āyudhe
dundubhau kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām doṣaḥ gāya bṛhat gāya dyumat
dhehi ātharvaṇa stuhi devam savitāram tam u stuhi yaḥ antar sindhau sūnuḥ
satyasya yuvānam a drogha vācam su śevam sa gha naḥ devaḥ savitā sāviṣat amṛtāni
bhūri ubhe suṣṭutī sugātave ā yam viśanti indavaḥ vayaḥ na vṛkṣam andhasaḥ
virapśin vi mṛdhaḥ jahi rakṣasvinīḥ sunota soma pāvne somam indrāya vajriṇe yuvā
jetā īśānaḥ sa puruṣṭutaḥ pātam naḥ indrāpūṣaṇā aditiḥ pāntu marutaḥ apām napāt
sindhavaḥ sapta pātana pātu naḥ viṣṇuḥ uta dyauḥ pātām naḥ dyāvāpṛthivī
abhiṣṭaye pātu grāvā pātu somaḥ naḥ aṃhasaḥ pātu naḥ devī subhagā sarasvatī pātu
agniḥ śivāḥ ye asya pāyavaḥ pātām naḥ devā aśvinā śubhaḥ patī uṣāsānaktā uta naḥ
uruṣyatām apām napāt abhihrutī gayasya cit deva tvaṣṭar vardhaya sarvatātaye
yathā vṛkṣam libujā samantam pariṣasvaje eva pari svajasva mām yathā mām kāminī
asaḥ yathā mat na apagā asaḥ yathā suparṇaḥ prapatan pakṣau nihanti bhūmyām eva
ni hanmi te manaḥ yathā mām kāminī asaḥ yathā mat na apagā asaḥ yathā ime
dyāvāpṛthivī sadyas paryeti sūryaḥ eva pari emi te manaḥ yathā mām kāminī asaḥ
yathā mat na apagā asaḥ śamīm aśvatthaḥ ārūḍhaḥ tatra puṃsuvanam kṛtam tat vai
putrasya vedanam tat strīṣu ā bharāmasi puṃsi vai retaḥ bhavati tat striyām anu
sicyate tat vai putrasya vedanam tat prajāpatiḥ abravīt prajāpatiḥ anumatiḥ
sinīvālī acīkﾱpat straiṣūyam anyatra dadhat pumāṃsam u dadhat iha īrṣyāyāḥ
dhrājim prathamām prathamasyāḥ uta aparām agnim hṛdayyam śokam tam te niḥ
vāpayāmasi yathā bhūmiḥ mṛta manāḥ mṛtāt mṛtamanastarā yathā uta mamruṣaḥ manaḥ
eva īrṣyoḥ mṛtam manaḥ adaḥ yat te hṛdi śritam manaskam patayiṣṇukam tatas te
īrṣyām muñcāmi niḥ ūṣmāṇam dṛteḥ iva amūn hetiḥ patatriṇī ni etu yat ulūkaḥ
vadati mogham etat yat vā padam agnau kṛṇoti yau te dūtau nirṛte idam etaḥ a
prahitau prahitau vā gṛham naḥ kapota ulūkābhyām a padam tat astu a vairahatyāya
idam ā papatyāt su vīra tāyai idam ā sasadyāt parāṅ eva parā vada parācīm anu
saṃvatam yathā yamasya tvā gṛhe arasam praticākaśān ābhūkam praticākaśān antar
dāve juhuta su etat yātudhāna kṣayaṇam ghṛtena ārāt rakṣāṃsi prati daha tvam
agne na naḥ gṛhāṇām upa tītapāsi rudraḥ vaḥ grīvāḥ aśarait piśācāḥ pṛṣṭīḥ vaḥ
api śṛṇātu yātudhānāḥ vīrudh vaḥ viśvatas vīryā yamena sam ajīgamat abhayam
mitrāvaruṇau iha astu naḥ arciṣā attriṇaḥ nudatam pratīcaḥ mā jñātāram mā
pratiṣṭhām vidanta mithas vighnānāḥ upa yantu mṛtyum indrasya rantyam bṛhat na
ādhṛṣe ā dadhṛṣate dhṛṣāṇaḥ dhṛṣitaḥ śavaḥ purā yathā vyathiḥ śravaḥ indrasya na
ādhṛṣe śavaḥ sa naḥ dadātu tām rayim urum piśaṅga saṃdṛśam indraḥ patiḥ
tuviṣṭamaḥ janeṣu ā ayam darbhaḥ vimanyukaḥ svāya cāraṇāya ca manyoḥ
vimanyukasya ayam manyu śamanaḥ ucyate ayam yaḥ bhūri mūlaḥ samudram avatiṣṭhati
darbhaḥ pṛthivyāḥ utthitaḥ manyu śamanaḥ ucyate vi te hanavyām śaraṇim vi te
mukhyām nayāmasi yathā avaśaḥ na vādiṣaḥ mama cittam upāyasi hatam tardam
samaṅkam ākhum aśvinā chinttam śiraḥ api pṛṣṭīḥ śṛṇītam yavān na id adān api
nahyatam mukham atha abhayam kṛṇutam dhānyāya tarda hai pataṅga hai jabhya hai
upakvasa brahmā iva asaṃsthitam haviḥ an adantaḥ imān yavān a hiṃsantaḥ apodita
tardā pate vaghā pate tṛṣṭa jambhāḥ ā śṛṇota me ye āraṇyāḥ vyadvarāḥ ye ke ca
stha vyadvarāḥ tān sarvān jambhayāmasi anu svadhā cikitām somaḥ agniḥ vāyuḥ naḥ
pātu savitā bhagaḥ ca idam id vai u bheṣajam idam rudrasya bheṣajam yena iṣum
eka tejanām śata śalyām apabravat jālāṣeṇa abhi siñcata jālāṣeṇa upa siñcata
jālāṣam ugram bheṣajam tena naḥ mṛḍa jīvase śam ca naḥ mayaḥ ca naḥ mā ca naḥ
kim cana amamat kṣamā rapaḥ viśvam naḥ astu bheṣajam sarvam naḥ astu bheṣajam
vaiśvānaraḥ raśmibhiḥ naḥ punātu vātaḥ prāṇena iṣiraḥ nabhobhiḥ dyāvāpṛthivī
payasā payasvatī ṛtāvarī yajñiye naḥ punītām vaiśvānarīm sūnṛtām ā rabhadhvam
yasyāḥ āśāḥ tanvaḥ vīta pṛṣṭhāḥ tayā gṛṇantaḥ sadhamādeṣu vayam syāma patayaḥ
rayīnām vaiśvānarīm varcase ā rabhadhvam śuddhāḥ bhavantaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ iha
iḍayā sadhamādam madantaḥ jyok paśyema sūryam uccarantam yat te devī nirṛtiḥ
ābabandha dāma grīvāsu avimokyam yat tat te vi syāmi āyuṣe varcase balāya
adomadam annam addhi prasūtaḥ namaḥ astu te nirṛte tigma tejaḥ ayasmayān vi cṛta
bandha pāśān yamaḥ mahyam punar id tvām dadāti tasmai yamāya namaḥ astu mṛtyave
ayasmaye drupade bedhiṣe iha abhihitaḥ mṛtyubhiḥ ye sahasram yamena tvam
pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ uttamam nākam adhi rohaya imam sam sam id yuvase vṛṣan agne
viśvāni aryaḥ ā iḍaḥ pade sam idhyase sa naḥ vasūni ā bhara nirhastaḥ śatruḥ
abhidāsan astu ye senābhiḥ yudham āyanti asmān sam arpaya indra mahatā vadhena
drātu eṣām aghahāraḥ vividdhaḥ ātanvānāḥ āyacchantaḥ asyantaḥ ye ca dhāvatha
nirhastāḥ śatravaḥ sthana indraḥ vaḥ adya parāśarīt nirhastāḥ santu śatravaḥ
santu aṅgā eṣām mlāpayāmasi atha eṣām indra vedāṃsi śataśas vi bhajāmahai yathā
māṃsam yathā surā yathā akṣāḥ adhidevane yathā puṃsaḥ vṛṣaṇyataḥ striyām
nihanyate manaḥ eva te aghnye manaḥ adhi vatse ni hanyatām yathā asitaḥ
prathayate vaśāṁ anu vapūṃṣi kṛṇvan asurasya māyayā eva sahasā ayam arkaḥ aṅgena
aṅgam saṃsamakam kṛṇotu yathā pasaḥ tāyādaram vātena sthūla bham kṛtam yāvat
parasvataḥ pasaḥ tāvat te vardhatām pasaḥ yāvadaṅgīnam pārasvatam hāstinam
gārdabham ca yat yāvat aśvasya vājinaḥ tāvat te vardhatām pasaḥ ā iha yātu
varuṇaḥ somaḥ agniḥ bṛhaspatiḥ vasubhiḥ ā iha yātu asya śriyam upasaṃyāta sarve
ugrasya cettuḥ saṃmanasaḥ sajātāḥ yaḥ vaḥ śuṣmaḥ hṛdayeṣu antar ākūtiḥ yā vaḥ
manasi praviṣṭā tān sīvayāmi haviṣā ghṛtena mayi sajātāḥ ramatiḥ vaḥ astu iha
eva sta mā apa yāta adhi asmat pūṣā parastāt apatham vaḥ kṛṇotu vāstoṣpatiḥ anu
vaḥ johavītu mayi sajātāḥ ramatiḥ vaḥ astu niḥ amum nuda okasaḥ sapatnaḥ yaḥ
pṛtanyati nairbādhyena haviṣā indraḥ enam parāśarīt paramām tam parāvatam indraḥ
nudatu vṛtrahā yatas na punar āyati śaśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ etu tisraḥ parāvataḥ
etu pañca janāṁ ati etu tisraḥ ati rocanāḥ yatas na punar āyati śaśvatībhyaḥ
samābhyaḥ yāvat sūryaḥ asat divi vṛṣā indrasya vṛṣā divaḥ vṛṣā pṛthivyāḥ ayam
vṛṣā viśvasya bhūtasya tvam eka vṛṣaḥ bhava samudraḥ īśe sravatām agniḥ
pṛthivyāḥ vaśī candramāḥ nakṣatrāṇām īśe tvam eka vṛṣaḥ bhava samrāj asi
asurāṇām kakud manuṣyānām devānām ardha bhāj asi tvam eka vṛṣaḥ bhava yām te
rudraḥ iṣum āsyat aṅgebhyaḥ hṛdayāya ca idam tām adya tvat vayam viṣūcīm vi
vṛhāmasi yāḥ te śatam dhamanayaḥ aṅgāni anu viṣṭhitāḥ tāsām te sarvāsām vayam
niḥ viṣāṇi hvayāmasi namaḥ te rudrā asyate namaḥ pratihitāyai namaḥ
visṛjyamānāyai namaḥ nipatitāyai yāḥ oṣadhayaḥ soma rājñīḥ bahvīḥ śata
vicakṣaṇāḥ bṛhaspati prasūtāḥ tāḥ naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ muñcantu mā śapathyāt
atha u varuṇyāt uta atha u yamasya paḍvīśāt viśvasmāt deva kilbiṣāt yat cakṣuṣā
manasā yat ca vācā upārima jāgrataḥ yat svapantaḥ somaḥ tāni svadhayā naḥ punātu
ādānena saṃdānena amitrān ā dyāmasi apānāḥ ye ca eṣām prāṇāḥ asunā asūn sam
achidan idam ādānam akaram tapasā indreṇa saṃśitam amitrāḥ ye atra naḥ santi tān
agne ā dya tvam ā enān dyatām indra agnī somaḥ rājā ca medinau indraḥ marutvān
ādānam amitrebhyaḥ kṛṇotu naḥ yathā manaḥ manasketaiḥ parāpatati āśumat eva tvam
kāse pra pata manasaḥ anu pravāyyam yathā bāṇaḥ su saṃśitaḥ parāpatati āśumat
eva tvam kāse pra pata pṛthivyāḥ anu saṃvatam yathā sūryasya raśmayaḥ
parāpatanti āśumat eva tvam kāse pra pata samudrasya anu vikṣaram āyane te
parāyaṇe dūrvāḥ rohantu puṣpiṇīḥ utsaḥ vā tatra jāyatām hradaḥ vā puṇḍarīkavān
apām idam nyayanam samudrasya niveśanam madhye hradasya naḥ gṛhāḥ parācīnā mukhā
kṛdhi himasya tvā jarāyuṇā śāle pari vyayāmasi śīta hradā hi naḥ bhuvaḥ agniḥ
kṛṇotu bheṣajam pippalī kṣipta bheṣajī uta atividdha bheṣajī tām devāḥ sam
akalpayan iyam jīvitavai alam pippalyaḥ sam avadanta āyatīḥ jananāt adhi yam
jīvam aśnavāmahai na sa riṣyāti pūruṣaḥ asurāḥ tvā ni akhanan devāḥ tvā ud
avapan punar vātīkṛtasya bheṣajīm atha u kṣiptasya bheṣajīm imam me agne puruṣam
mumugdhi ayam yaḥ baddhaḥ su yataḥ lālapīti atas adhi te kṛṇavat bhāgadheyam
yadā an unmaditaḥ asati agniḥ te ni śamayatu yadi te manaḥ udyutam kṛṇomi vidvān
bheṣajam yathā an unmaditaḥ asasi deva enasāt unmaditam unmattam rakṣasaḥ pari
kṛṇomi vidvān bheṣajam yadā an unmaditaḥ asati punar tvā duḥ apsarasaḥ punar
indraḥ punar bhagaḥ punar tvā duḥ viśve devāḥ yathā an unmaditaḥ asasi mā
jyeṣṭham vadhīt ayam agne eṣām mūla barhaṇāt pari pāhi enam sa grāhyāḥ pāśān vi
cṛta prajānan tubhyam devāḥ anu jānantu viśve ud muñca pāśān tvam agne eṣām
trayaḥ tribhiḥ utsitāḥ yebhiḥ āsan sa grāhyāḥ pāśān vi cṛta prajānan pitāputrau
mātaram muñca sarvān yebhiḥ pāśaiḥ parivittaḥ vibaddhaḥ aṅge aṅge ārpitaḥ
utsitaḥ ca vi te mucyantām vimucaḥ hi santi bhrūṇa ghni pūṣan duritāni mṛkṣva
trite devāḥ amṛjata etat enaḥ tritaḥ enat manuṣyeṣu mamṛje tatas yadi tvā grāhiḥ
ānaśe tām te devāḥ brahmaṇā nāśayantu marīcīḥ dhūmān pra viśa anu pāpman udārān
gaccha uta vā nīhārān nadīnām phenāṁ anu tān vi naśya bhrūṇa ghni pūṣan duritāni
mṛkṣva dvādaśadhā nihitam tritasya apamṛṣṭam manuṣya enasāni tatas yadi tvā
grāhiḥ ānaśe tām te devāḥ brahmaṇā nāśayantu upa śvāsaya pṛthivīm uta dyām
purutrā te vanvatām viṣṭhitam jagat sa dundubhe sajūs indreṇa devaiḥ dūrāt
davīyaḥ apa sedha śatrūn ā krandaya balam ojaḥ naḥ ā dhāḥ abhi stana duritā
bādhamānaḥ apa sedha dundubhe ducchunām itas indrasya muṣṭiḥ asi pra amūm jaya
abhi ime jayantu ketumat dundubhiḥ vāvadītu sam aśva parṇāḥ patantu naḥ naraḥ
asmākam indra rathinaḥ jayantu devī devyām adhi jātā pṛthivyām asi oṣadhe tām
tvā nitatni keśebhyaḥ dṛṃhaṇāya khanāmasi dṛṃha pratnān janaya ajātān jātān u
varṣīyasaḥ kṛdhi yaḥ te keśaḥ avapadyate sa mūlaḥ yaḥ ca vṛścate idam tam viśva
bheṣajyā abhi siñcāmi vīrudhā abhīśunā meyāḥ āsan vyāmena anumeyāḥ keśāḥ naḍāḥ
iva vardhantām śīrṣṇaḥ te asitāḥ pari ayā viṣṭhā janayan karvarāṇi sa hi ghṛṇiḥ
uruḥ varāya gātuḥ sa pratyudait dharuṇam madhvaḥ agram svayā tanvā tanvam
airayata agne jātān pra nuda me sapatnān prati a jātān jātavedaḥ nudasva
adhaspadam kṛṇuṣva ye pṛtanyavaḥ anāgasaḥ te vayam aditaye syāma imāḥ yāḥ te
śatam hirāḥ sahasram dhamanīḥ uta tāsām te sarvāsām aham aśmanā bilam api adhām
akṣyau nau madhu saṃkāśe anīkam nau samañjanam antar kṛṇuṣva mām hṛdi manaḥ id
nau saha asati idam khanāmi bheṣajam māṃpaśyam abhirorudam parāyataḥ nivartanam
āyataḥ pratinandanam yena nicakre āsurī indram devebhyaḥ pari tena ni kurve tvām
aham yathā te asāni su priyā pratīcī somam asi pratīcī uta sūryam pratīcī viśvān
devān tām tvā acchāvadāmasi aham vadāmi na id tvam sabhāyām aha tvam vada mama
id asaḥ tvam kevalaḥ na anyāsām kīrtayāḥ cana yadi vā asi tirojanam yadi vā
nadyaḥ tiras iyam ha mahyam tvām oṣadhiḥ baddhvā iva nyānayat yasya vratam
paśavaḥ yanti sarve yasya vrate upatiṣṭhante āpaḥ yasya vrate puṣṭa patiḥ
niviṣṭaḥ tam sarasvantam avase havāmahe ā pratyañcam dāśuṣe dāśvāṃsam
sarasvantam puṣṭa patim rayiṣṭhām rāyaḥ poṣam śravasyum vasānāḥ iha sadanam
rayīṇām devānām patnīḥ uśatīḥ avantu naḥ prāvantu naḥ tujaye vājasātaye yāḥ
pārthivāsaḥ yāḥ apām api vrate tāḥ naḥ devīḥ su havāḥ śarma yacchantu uta gnāḥ
vyantu deva patnīḥ indrāṇī agnāyī aśvinī rāj ā rodasī varuṇānī śṛṇotu vyantu
devīḥ yaḥ ṛtuḥ janīnām saṃjñānam naḥ svebhiḥ saṃjñānam araṇebhiḥ saṃjñānam
aśvinā yuvam iha asmāsu ni yacchatam sam jānāmahai manasā sam cikitvā mā
yutsmahi manasā daivyena mā ghoṣāḥ ud sthuḥ bahule vinirhate mā iṣuḥ paptat
indrasya ahani āgate yat agne tapasā tapaḥ upatapyāmahe tapaḥ priyāḥ śrutasya
bhūyāsma āyuṣmantaḥ sumedhasaḥ agne tapaḥ tapyāmahe upa tapyāmahe tapaḥ śrutāni
śṛṇvantaḥ vayam āyuṣmantaḥ sumedhasaḥ yat kim ca asau manasā yat ca vācā yajñaiḥ
juhoti haviṣā yajuṣā tat mṛtyunā nirṛtiḥ saṃvidānā purā satyāt āhutim hantu asya
yātudhānāḥ nirṛtiḥ āt u rakṣaḥ te asya ghnantu anṛtena satyam indra iṣitāḥ devāḥ
ājyam asya mathnantu mā tat sam pādi yat asau juhoti ajira adhirājau śyenau
saṃpātinau iva ājyam pṛtanyataḥ hatām yaḥ naḥ kaḥ ca abhyaghāyati apāñcau te
ubhau bāhū apinahyāmi āsyam agneḥ devasya manyunā tena te avadhiṣam haviḥ
apinahyāmi te bāhū apinahyāmi āsyam agneḥ ghorasya manyunā tena avadhiṣam haviḥ
sāṃtapanāḥ idam haviḥ marutaḥ tat jujuṣṭana asmākā ūtī riśādasaḥ yaḥ naḥ martaḥ
marutaḥ durhṛṇāyuḥ tiras cittāni vasavaḥ jighāṃsati druhaḥ pāśān prati muñcatām
saḥ tapiṣṭhena tapasā hantana tam samvatsarīṇāḥ marutaḥ su arkāḥ uru kṣayāḥ sa
gaṇāḥ mānuṣāsaḥ te asmat pāśān pra muñcantu enasaḥ sāṃtapanāḥ matsarāḥ
mādayiṣṇavaḥ yaḥ agnau rudraḥ yaḥ apsu antar yaḥ oṣadhīḥ vīrudhaḥ āviveśa yaḥ
imā viśvā bhuvanāni cākﾱpe tasmai rudrāya namaḥ astu agnaye ud asya śyāvau
vithurau gṛdhrau dyām iva petatuḥ ucchocana praśocanau asya ucchocanau hṛdaḥ
aham enau ud atiṣṭhipam gāvau śrānta sadau iva kurkurau iva kūjantau udavantau
vṛkau iva ātodinau nitodinau atha u saṃtodinau uta api nahyāmi asya meḍhram yaḥ
itas strī pumān jabhāra sam barhiḥ aktam haviṣā ghṛtena sam indreṇa vasunā sam
marudbhiḥ sam devaiḥ viśvadevebhiḥ aktam indram gacchatu haviḥ svāhā paryāvarte
duṣvapnyāt pāpāt svapnyāt abhūtyāḥ brahmā aham antaram kṛṇve parā svapna mukhāḥ
śucaḥ tṛṣṭike tṛṣṭa vandane ud amūm chinddhi tṛṣṭike yathā kṛta dviṣṭā asaḥ
amuṣmai śepyāvate tṛṣṭā asi tṛṣṭikā viṣā viṣātakī asi parivṛktā yathā asasi
ṛṣabhasya vaśā iva mā tvā prāṇaḥ balam hāsīt asum te anu hvayāmasi ā rabhasva
imām amṛtasya śnuṣṭim a chidyamānā jaradaṣṭiḥ astu te asum te āyuḥ punar ā
bharāmi rajaḥ tamaḥ mā upa gāḥ mā pra meṣṭhāḥ jīvatām jyotiḥ abhyehi arvāṅ ā tvā
harāmi śata śāradāya ārāt agnim kravyādam nirūhan jīvātave te paridhim dadhāmi
ārāt arātim nirṛtim paras grāhim kravyādaḥ piśācān rakṣaḥ yat sarvam durbhūtam
tat tamaḥ iva apa hanmasi śarade tvā hemantāya vasantāya grīṣmāya pari dadmasi
varṣāṇi tubhyam syonāni yeṣu vardhante oṣadhīḥ ye mṛtyavaḥ eka śatam yāḥ nāṣṭrāḥ
atitāryāḥ muñcantu tasmāt tvām devāḥ agneḥ vaiśvānarāt adhi yajñaiḥ iṣūḥ
saṃnamamānaḥ agne vācā śalyāṁ aśanibhiḥ dihānaḥ tābhiḥ vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān
pratīcaḥ bāhūn prati bhaṅgdhi eṣām asmai maṇim varma badhnantu devāḥ indraḥ
viṣṇuḥ savitā rudraḥ agniḥ prajāpatiḥ parameṣṭhī virāj vaiśvānaraḥ ṛṣayaḥ ca
sarve tāḥ iha ā yantu oṣadhīḥ aśvatthaḥ darbhaḥ vīrudhām somaḥ rājā vrīhiḥ yavaḥ
ca bheṣajau divasputrau amartyau ujjihīdhve stanayati abhikrandati oṣadhīḥ yadā
vaḥ pṛśni mātaraḥ parjanyaḥ retasā avati tasya amṛtasya imam balam puruṣam
pāyayāmasi atha u kṛṇomi bheṣajam yathā asat śata hāyanaḥ varāhaḥ veda vīrudham
nakulaḥ veda bheṣajīm sarpāḥ gandharvāḥ yāḥ viduḥ tāḥ asmai avase huve yāḥ
suparṇāḥ āṅgirasīḥ divyāḥ yāḥ raghaṭaḥ viduḥ vayāṃsi haṃsāḥ yāḥ viduḥ yāḥ ca
sarve patatriṇaḥ mṛgāḥ yāḥ viduḥ oṣadhīḥ tāḥ asmai avase huve yāvatīnām
oṣadhīnām gāvaḥ prāśnanti aghnyāḥ yāvatīnām aja avayaḥ tāvatīḥ tubhyam oṣadhīḥ
yacchantu ābhṛtāḥ kutas tau jātau katamaḥ saḥ ardhaḥ kasmāt lokāt katamasyāḥ
pṛthivyāḥ vatsau virājaḥ salilāt udaitām tau tvā pṛcchāmi katareṇa dugdhā yaḥ
akrandayat salilam mahitvā yonim kṛtvā tribhujam śayānaḥ vatsaḥ kāma dughaḥ
virājaḥ sa guhā cakre tanvaḥ parācais yāni trīṇi bṛhanti yeṣām caturtham
viyunakti vācam brahmā enat vidyāt tapasā vipaścit yasmin ekam yujyate yasmin
ekam bṛhataḥ pari sāmāni ṣaṣṭhāt pañca adhi nirmitā bṛhat bṛhatyāḥ nirmitam
kutas adhi bṛhatī mitā bṛhatī pari mātrāyāḥ mātuḥ mātrā adhi nirmitā māyā ha
jajñe māyāyāḥ māyāyāḥ mātalī pari vaiśvānarasya pratimā upari dyauḥ yāvat rodasī
vibabādhe agniḥ tatas ṣaṣṭhāt ā amutas yanti stomāḥ ud itas yanti abhi ṣaṣṭham
ahnaḥ ṣaṭ tvā pṛcchāmaḥ ṛṣayaḥ kaśyapa ime tvam hi yuktam yuyukṣe yogyam ca
virājam āhuḥ brahmaṇaḥ pitaram tām naḥ vidhehi yatidhā sakhibhyaḥ yām pracyutām
anu yajñāḥ pracyavante upatiṣṭhante upatiṣṭhamānām yasyāḥ vrate prasave yakṣam
ejati sā virāj ṛṣayaḥ parame vyoman a prāṇā eti prāṇena prāṇatīnām virāj
svarājam abhyeti paścāt viśvam mṛśantīm abhirūpām virājam paśyanti tve na tve
paśyanti enām kaḥ virājaḥ mithuna tvam praveda kaḥ ṛtūn kaḥ u kalpam asyāḥ
kramān kaḥ asyāḥ katidhā vidugdhān kaḥ asyāḥ dhāma katidhā vyuṣṭīḥ iyam eva sā
yā prathamā vyaucchat āsu itarāsu carati praviṣṭā mahāntaḥ asyām mahimānaḥ antar
vadhūḥ jigāya navagat janitrī chandaḥ pakṣe uṣasā pepiśāne samānam yonim anu
saṃcarete sūrya patnī saṃcarataḥ prajānatī ketumatī ajare bhūri retasā ṛtasya
panthām anu tisraḥ āguḥ trayaḥ gharmāḥ anu retaḥ āguḥ prajām ekā jinvati ūrjam
ekā rāṣṭram ekā rakṣati devayūnām agnīṣomau adadhuḥ yā turīyā āsīt yajñasya
pakṣau ṛṣayaḥ kalpayantaḥ gāyatrīm triṣṭubham jagatīm anuṣṭubham bṛhadarkīm
yajamānāya svar ābharantīm pañca vyuṣṭīḥ anu pañca dohāḥ gām pañca nāmnīm ṛtavaḥ
anu pañca pañca diśaḥ pañcadaśena kﾱptāḥ tāḥ eka mūrdhnīḥ abhi lokam ekam ṣaḍ
jātā bhūtā prathama jāḥ ṛtasya ṣaḍ u sāmāni ṣaḍaham vahanti ṣaṣ yogam sīram anu
sāma sāma ṣaṣ āhuḥ dyāvāpṛthivīḥ ṣaḍ urvīḥ ṣaṭ āhuḥ śītān ṣaṭ u māsaḥ uṣṇān ṛtum
naḥ brūta yatamaḥ atiriktaḥ sapta suparṇāḥ kavayaḥ niṣeduḥ sapta chandāṃsi anu
sapta dīkṣāḥ sapta homāḥ samidhaḥ ha sapta madhūni sapta ṛtavaḥ ha sapta sapta
ājyāni pari bhūtam āyan tāḥ sapta gṛdhrāḥ iti śuśruma vayam sapta chandāṃsi
catur uttarāṇi anyonyasmin adhi ārpitāni katham stomāḥ pratitiṣṭhanti teṣu tāni
stomeṣu katham ārpitāni katham gāyatrī trivṛtam vyāpa katham triṣṭubh
pañcadaśena kalpate trayastriṃśena jagatī katham anuṣṭubh katham ekaviṃśaḥ aṣṭa
jātā bhūtā prathama jāḥ ṛtasya aṣṭa indra ṛtvijaḥ daivyāḥ ye aṣṭa yoniḥ aditiḥ
aṣṭa putrā aṣṭamīm rātrim abhi havyam eti ittham śreyaḥ manyamānā idam āgamam
yuṣmākam sakhye aham asmi śevā samāna janmā kratuḥ asti vaḥ śivaḥ sa vaḥ sarvāḥ
saṃcarati prajānan aṣṭā indrasya ṣaṭ yamasya ṛṣīṇām sapta saptadhā apaḥ manuṣyān
oṣadhīḥ tāṁ u pañcā anusecire kevalī indrāya duduhe hi gṛṣṭiḥ vaśam pīyūṣam
prathamam duhānā atha atarpayat caturaḥ caturdhā devān manuṣyāṁ asurān uta ṛṣīn
kaḥ nu gauḥ kaḥ eka ṛṣiḥ kim u dhāma kāḥ āśiṣaḥ yakṣam pṛthivyām ekavṛt eka ṛtuḥ
katamaḥ nu saḥ ekaḥ gauḥ ekaḥ eka ṛṣiḥ ekam dhāma ekadhā āśiṣaḥ yakṣam pṛthivyām
ekavṛt eka ṛtuḥ na atiricyate virāj vai idam agre āsīt tasyāḥ jātāyāḥ sarvam
abibhet iyam eva idam bhaviṣyati iti sā udakrāmat sā gārhapatye nyakrāmat
gṛhamedhī gṛhapatiḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda sā udakrāmat sā āhavanīye nyakrāmat
yanti asya devāḥ deva hūtim priyaḥ devānām bhavati yaḥ evam veda sā udakrāmat sā
dakṣiṇāgnau nyakrāmat yajña ṛtaḥ dakṣiṇīyaḥ vāsateyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda sā
udakrāmat sā sabhāyām nyakrāmat yanti asya sabhām sabhyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda
sā udakrāmat sā samitau nyakrāmat yanti asya samitim sāmityaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam
veda sā udakrāmat sā āmantraṇe nyakrāmat yanti asya āmantraṇam āmantraṇīyaḥ
bhavati yaḥ evam veda sā udakrāmat sā antarikṣe caturdhā vikrāntā tiṣṭhat tām
deva manuṣyāḥ abruvan iyam eva tat veda yat ubhaye upajīvema imām upahvayāmahai
iti tām upāhvayanta ūrje ehi svadhe ehi sūnṛte ehi irāvati ehi iti tasyāḥ indraḥ
vatsaḥ āsīt gāyatrī abhidhānī abhram ūdhar bṛhat ca rathaṃtaram ca dvau stanau
āstām āstām yajñāyajñiyam ca vāmadevyam ca dvau oṣadhīḥ eva rathaṃtareṇa devāḥ
aduhran vyacaḥ bṛhatā apaḥ vāmadevyena yajñam yajñāyajñiyena oṣadhīḥ eva asmai
rathaṃtaram duhe vyacaḥ bṛhat apaḥ vāmadevyam yajñam yajñāyajñiyam yaḥ evam veda
sā udakrāmat sā vanaspatīn āgacchat tām vanaspatayaḥ aghnata sā saṃvatsare
samabhavat tasmāt vanaspatīnām saṃvatsare vṛkṇam apirohati vṛścate asya apriyaḥ
bhrātṛvyaḥ yaḥ evam veda sā udakrāmat sā pitṝn āgacchat tām pitaraḥ aghnata sā
māsi samabhavat tasmāt pitṛbhyaḥ māsi upamāsyam dadati pra pitṛyāṇam panthām
jānāti yaḥ evam veda sā udakrāmat sā devān āgacchat tām devāḥ aghnata sā ardha
māse samabhavat tasmāt devebhyaḥ ardha māse vaṣaṭkurvanti pra deva yānam panthām
jānāti yaḥ evam veda sā udakrāmat sā manuṣyān āgacchat tām manuṣyāḥ aghnata sā
sadyas samabhavat tasmāt manuṣyebhyaḥ ubhayadyus upaharanti upa asya gṛhe
haranti yaḥ evam veda sā udakrāmat sā asurān āgacchat tām asurāḥ upāhvayanta
māye ehi iti tasyāḥ virocanaḥ prāhrādiḥ vatsaḥ āsīt ayaspātram pātram tām
dvimūrdha ārtvyaḥ adhok tām māyām eva adhok tām māyām asurāḥ upajīvanti
upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda sā udakrāmat sā pitṝn āgacchat tām pitaraḥ
upāhvayanta svadhe ehi iti tasyāḥ yamaḥ rājā vatsaḥ āsīt rajata pātram pātram
tām antakaḥ mārtyavaḥ adhok tām svadhām eva adhok tām svadhām pitaraḥ upajīvanti
upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda sā udakrāmat sā manuṣyān āgacchat tām
manuṣyāḥ upāhvayanta irāvati ehi iti tasyāḥ manuḥ vaivasvataḥ vatsaḥ āsīt
pṛthivī pātram tām pṛthī vainyaḥ adhok tām kṛṣim ca sasyam ca adhok te svadhām
kṛṣim ca sasyam ca manuṣyāḥ upajīvanti kṛṣṭa rādhiḥ upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ
evam veda sā udakrāmat sā sapta ṛṣīn āgacchat tām sapta ṛṣayaḥ upāhvayanta
brahmaṇvati ehi iti tasyāḥ somaḥ rājā vatsaḥ āsīt chandaḥ pātram tām bṛhaspatiḥ
āṅgirasaḥ adhok tām brahma ca tapaḥ ca adhok tat brahma ca tapaḥ ca sapta ṛṣayaḥ
upajīvanti brahmavarcasī upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda sā udakrāmat sā
devān āgacchat tām devāḥ upāhvayanta ūrje ehi iti tasyāḥ indraḥ vatsaḥ āsīt
camasaḥ pātram tām devaḥ savitā adhok tām ūrjām eva adhok tām ūrjām devāḥ
upajīvanti upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda sā udakrāmat sā gandharva
apsarasaḥ āgacchat tām gandharva apsarasaḥ upāhvayanta puṇya gandhe ehi iti
tasyāḥ citrarathaḥ sauryavarcasaḥ vatsaḥ āsīt puṣkara parṇam pātram tām
vasuruciḥ sauryavarcasaḥ adhok tām puṇyam eva gandham adhok tam puṇyam gandham
gandharva apsarasaḥ upajīvanti puṇya gandhiḥ upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda
sā udakrāmat sa itarajanān āgacchat tām itarajanāḥ upāhvayanta tirodhe ehi iti
tasyāḥ kuberaḥ vaiśravaṇaḥ vatsaḥ āsīt āma pātram pātram tām rajatanābhiḥ
kāberakaḥ adhok tām tirodhām eva adhok tām tirodhām itarajanāḥ upajīvanti
tirodhatte sarvam pāpmānam upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda sā udakrāmat sā
sarpān āgacchat tām sarpāḥ upāhvayanta viṣavati ehi iti tasyāḥ takṣakaḥ
vaiśāleyaḥ vatsaḥ āsīt alābu pātram pātram tām dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ airāvataḥ adhok tām
viṣam eva adhok tat viṣam sarpāḥ upajīvanti upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda
tat yasmai evam viduṣe alābunā abhiṣiñcet pratyāhanyāt na ca pratyāhanyāt manasā
tvā pratyāhanmi iti pratyāhanyāt yat pratyāhanti viṣam eva tat pratyāhanti viṣam
eva asya apriyam bhrātṛvyam anuviṣicyate yaḥ evam veda madhoḥ kaśām ajanayanta
devāḥ tasyāḥ garbhaḥ abhavat viśva rūpaḥ tam jātam taruṇam piparti mātā sa jātaḥ
viśvā bhuvanā vi caṣṭe aśvinā sāragheṇa mā madhunā aṅktam śubhaḥ patī yathā

kṣipasi bhūmyām divi tām paśavaḥ upa jīvanti sarve tena u sā iṣam ūrjam piparti
pṛthivī daṇḍaḥ antarikṣam garbhaḥ dyauḥ kaśā vidyut prakaśaḥ hiraṇyayaḥ binduḥ
yaḥ vai kaśāyāḥ sapta madhūni veda madhumān bhavati somena pūrṇam kalaśam
bibharṣi tvaṣṭā rūpāṇām janitā paśūnām bahis bilam niḥ dravatu kāhābāham tava
udarāt yakṣmāṇām sarveṣām viṣam niḥ avocam aham tvat tatra idam sarvam ārpitam
ejat prāṇat pratiṣṭhitam aghāyatām api nahya mukhāni sapatneṣu vajram arpaya
etam namaḥ te jāyamānāyai jātāyai uta te namaḥ vālebhyaḥ śaphebhyaḥ rūpāya
aghnye te namaḥ yaḥ vidyāt sapta pravataḥ sapta vidyāt parāvataḥ śiraḥ yajñasya
yaḥ vidyāt sa vaśām prati gṛhṇīyāt veda aham sapta pravataḥ sapta veda parāvataḥ
śiraḥ yajñasya aham veda somam ca asyām vicakṣaṇam yayā dyauḥ yayā pṛthivī yayā
āpaḥ gupitāḥ imāḥ vaśām sahasra dhārām brahmaṇā acchāvadāmasi śatam kaṃsāḥ śatam
dogdhāraḥ śatam goptāraḥ adhi pṛṣṭhe asyāḥ ye devāḥ tasyām prāṇanti te vaśām
viduḥ ekadhā yajñapadī irā kṣīrā svadhā prāṇā mahīlukā vaśā parjanya patnī devāṁ
api eti brahmaṇā anu tvā agniḥ prāviśat anu somaḥ vaśe tvā ūdhar te bhadre
parjanyaḥ vidyutaḥ te stanāḥ vaśe apaḥ tvam dhukṣe prathamāḥ urvarāḥ aparāḥ vaśe
tṛtīyam rāṣṭram dhukṣe annam kṣīram vaśe tvam yat ādityaiḥ hūyamānā upātiṣṭhaḥ
ṛtāvari indraḥ sahasram pātrān somam tvā apāyayat vaśe yat anūcī indram aiḥ āt
tvā ṛṣabhaḥ ahvayat tasmāt te vṛtrahā payaḥ kṣīram kruddhaḥ aharat vaśe yat te
kruddhaḥ dhana patiḥ ā kṣīram aharat vaśe idam tat adya nākaḥ triṣu pātreṣu
rakṣati triṣu pātreṣu tam somam ā devī aharat vaśā atharvā yatra dīkṣitaḥ
barhiṣi āsta hiraṇyaye sam hi somena agata sam u sarveṇa padvatā vaśā samudram
adhyaṣṭhāt gandharvaiḥ kalibhiḥ saha sam hi vātena agata sam u sarvaiḥ
patatribhiḥ vaśā samudre prānṛtyat ṛcaḥ sāmāni bibhratī sam hi sūryeṇa agata sam
u sarveṇa cakṣuṣā vaśā samudram ati akhyat bhadrā jyotīṃṣi bibhratī abhīvṛtā
hiraṇyena yat atiṣṭhaḥ ṛtāvari aśvaḥ samudraḥ bhūtvā adhi askandat vaśe tvā tat
bhadrāḥ sam agacchanta vaśā deṣṭrī atha u svadhā atharvā yatra dīkṣitaḥ barhiṣi
āsta hiraṇyaye vaśā mātā rājanyasya vaśā mātā svadhe tava vaśāyāḥ yajñe āyudham
tatas cittam ajāyata ūrdhvaḥ binduḥ ud acarat brahmaṇaḥ kakudāt adhi tatas tvam
jajñiṣe vaśe tatas hotā ajāyata āsnaḥ te gāthāḥ abhavan uṣṇihābhyaḥ balam vaśe
pājasyāt jajñe yajñaḥ stanebhyaḥ raśmayaḥ tava īrmābhyām ayanam jātam

mahādevaḥ abhavat sa devānām īśām paryait saḥ īśānaḥ abhavat saḥ eka vrātyaḥ
abhavat sa dhanuḥ ādatta tat eva indra dhanuḥ nīlam asya udaram lohitam pṛṣṭham
nīlena eva apriyam bhrātṛvyam prorṇoti lohitena dviṣantam vidhyati iti brahma

tiṣṭhasi iti saḥ abravīt āsandīm me saṃbharantu iti tasmai vrātyāya āsandīm

dvau bṛhat ca rathantaram ca anūcye āstām yajñāyajñiyam ca vāmadevyam ca
tiraścye ṛcaḥ prāñcaḥ tantavaḥ yajūṃṣi tiryañcaḥ vedaḥ āstaraṇam brahma
upabarhaṇam sāma āsādaḥ udgīthaḥ apaśrayaḥ tām āsandīm vrātyaḥ ārohat tasya deva
janāḥ pariṣkandāḥ āsan saṃkalpāḥ prahāyyāḥ viśvāni bhūtāni upasadaḥ viśvāni eva
asya bhūtāni upasadaḥ bhavanti yaḥ evam veda tasmai prācyāḥ diśaḥ vāsantau māsau
goptārau akurvan bṛhat ca rathantaram ca anuṣṭhātārau vāsantau enam māsau
prācyāḥ diśaḥ gopāyataḥ bṛhat ca rathantaram ca anutiṣṭhataḥ yaḥ evam veda
tasmai dakṣiṇāyāḥ diśaḥ graiṣmau māsau goptārau akurvan yajñāyajñiyam ca
vāmadevyam ca anuṣṭhātārau graiṣmau enam māsau dakṣiṇāyāḥ diśaḥ gopāyataḥ
yajñāyajñiyam ca vāmadevyam ca anutiṣṭhataḥ yaḥ evam veda tasmai pratīcyāḥ diśaḥ
vārṣikau māsau goptārau akurvan vairūpam ca vairājam ca anuṣṭhātārau vārṣikau
enam māsau pratīcyāḥ diśaḥ gopāyataḥ vairūpam ca vairājam ca anutiṣṭhataḥ yaḥ
evam veda tasmai udīcyāḥ diśaḥ śāradau māsau goptārau akurvan śyaitam ca
naudhasam ca anuṣṭhātārau śāradau enam māsau udīcyāḥ diśaḥ gopāyataḥ śyaitam ca
naudhasam ca anutiṣṭhataḥ yaḥ evam veda tasmai dhruvāyāḥ diśaḥ haimanau māsau
goptārau akurvan bhūmim ca agnim ca anuṣṭhātārau haimanau enam māsau dhruvāyāḥ
diśaḥ gopāyataḥ bhūmiḥ ca agniḥ ca anutiṣṭhataḥ yaḥ evam veda tasmai ūrdhvāyāḥ
diśaḥ śaiśirau māsau goptārau akurvan divam ca ādityam ca anuṣṭhātārau śaiśirau
enam māsau ūrdhvāyāḥ diśaḥ gopāyataḥ dyauḥ ca ādityaḥ ca anutiṣṭhataḥ yaḥ evam
veda tasmai prācyāḥ diśaḥ antardeśāt bhavam iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan bhavaḥ
enam iṣvāsaḥ prācyāḥ diśaḥ antardeśāt anuṣṭhātā anutiṣṭhati na enam śarvaḥ na
bhavaḥ na īśānaḥ na asya paśūn na samānān hinasti yaḥ evam veda tasmai
dakṣiṇāyāḥ diśaḥ antardeśāt śarvam iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan śarvaḥ enam
iṣvāsaḥ dakṣiṇāyāḥ diśaḥ antardeśāt anuṣṭhātā anutiṣṭhati na enam śarvaḥ na
bhavaḥ na īśānaḥ na asya paśūn na samānān hinasti yaḥ evam veda tasmai pratīcyāḥ
diśaḥ antardeśāt paśupatim iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan paśupatiḥ enam iṣvāsaḥ
pratīcyāḥ diśaḥ antardeśāt anuṣṭhātā anutiṣṭhati na enam śarvaḥ na bhavaḥ na
īśānaḥ na asya paśūn na samānān hinasti yaḥ evam veda tasmai udīcyāḥ diśaḥ
antardeśāt ugram devam iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan ugraḥ enam devaḥ iṣvāsaḥ
udīcyāḥ diśaḥ antardeśāt anuṣṭhātā anutiṣṭhati na enam śarvaḥ na bhavaḥ na
īśānaḥ na asya paśūn na samānān hinasti yaḥ evam veda tasmai dhruvāyāḥ diśaḥ
antardeśāt rudram iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan rudraḥ enam iṣvāsaḥ dhruvāyāḥ
diśaḥ antardeśāt anuṣṭhātā anutiṣṭhati na enam śarvaḥ na bhavaḥ na īśānaḥ na
asya paśūn na samānān hinasti yaḥ evam veda tasmai ūrdhvāyāḥ diśaḥ antardeśāt
mahādevam iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan mahādevaḥ enam iṣvāsaḥ ūrdhvāyāḥ diśaḥ
antardeśāt anuṣṭhātā anutiṣṭhati na enam śarvaḥ na bhavaḥ na īśānaḥ na asya
paśūn na samānān hinasti yaḥ evam veda tasmai sarvebhyaḥ antardeśebhyaḥ īśānam
iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan īśānaḥ enam iṣvāsaḥ sarvebhyaḥ antardeśebhyaḥ
anuṣṭhātā anutiṣṭhati na enam śarvaḥ na bhavaḥ na īśānaḥ na asya paśūn na
samānān hinasti yaḥ evam veda sa dhruvām diśam anuvyacalat tam bhūmiḥ ca agniḥ
ca oṣadhayaḥ ca vanaspatayaḥ ca vānaspatyāḥ ca vīrudhaḥ ca anuvyacalan bhūmeḥ ca
vai saḥ agneḥ ca oṣadhīnām ca vanaspatīnām ca vānaspatyānām ca vīrudhām ca
priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam veda saḥ ūrdhvām diśam anuvyacalat tam ṛtam ca
satyam ca sūryaḥ ca candraḥ ca nakṣatrāṇi ca anuvyacalan ṛtasya ca vai sa
satyasya ca sūryasya ca candrasya ca nakṣatrāṇām ca priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ
evam veda saḥ uttamām diśam anuvyacalat tam ṛcaḥ ca sāmāni ca yajūṃṣi ca brahma
ca anuvyacalan ṛcām ca vai sa sāmnām ca yajuṣām ca brahmaṇaḥ ca priyam dhāma
bhavati yaḥ evam veda sa bṛhatīm diśam anuvyacalat tam itihāsaḥ ca purāṇam ca
gāthāḥ ca nārāśaṃsīḥ ca anuvyacalan itihāsasya ca vai sa purāṇasya ca gāthānām
ca nārāśaṃsīnām ca priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam veda sa paramām diśam
anuvyacalat tam āhavanīyaḥ ca gārhapatyaḥ ca dakṣiṇāgniḥ ca yajñaḥ ca yajamānaḥ
ca paśavaḥ ca anuvyacalan āhavanīyasya ca vai sa gārhapatyasya ca dakṣiṇāgneḥ ca
yajñasya ca yajamānasya ca paśūnām ca priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam veda saḥ an
ādiṣṭām diśam anuvyacalat tam ṛtavaḥ ca ārtavāḥ ca lokāḥ ca laukyāḥ ca māsāḥ ca
ardha māsāḥ ca ahorātre ca anuvyacalan ṛtūnām ca vai saḥ ārtavānām ca lokānām ca
laukyānām ca māsānām ca ardha māsānām ca ahorātrayoḥ ca priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ
evam veda saḥ an āvṛttām diśam anuvyacalat tatas na āvartsyan amanyata tam ditiḥ
ca aditiḥ ca iḍā ca indrāṇī ca anuvyacalan diteḥ ca vai saḥ aditeḥ ca iḍāyāḥ ca
indrāṇyāḥ ca priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam veda sa diśaḥ anuvyacalat tam virāj
anuvyacalat sarve ca devāḥ sarvāḥ ca devatāḥ virājaḥ ca vai sa sarveṣām ca
devānām sarvāsām ca devatānām priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam veda sa sarvān
antardeśān anuvyacalat tam prajāpatiḥ ca parameṣṭhī ca pitā ca pitāmahaḥ ca
anuvyacalan prajāpateḥ ca vai sa parameṣṭhinaḥ ca pituḥ ca pitāmahasya ca priyam
dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam veda sa mahimā sadruḥ bhūtvā antam pṛthivyāḥ agacchat
samudraḥ abhavat tam prajāpatiḥ ca parameṣṭhī ca pitā ca pitāmahaḥ ca apaḥ ca
śraddhā ca varṣam bhūtvā anuvyavartayanta ā enam āpaḥ gacchanti ā enam śraddhā
gacchati ā enam varṣam gacchati yaḥ evam veda tam śraddhā ca yajñaḥ ca lokaḥ ca
annam ca annādyam ca bhūtvā abhiparyāvartanta ā enam śraddhā gacchati ā enam
yajñaḥ gacchati ā enam lokaḥ gacchati ā enam annam gacchati ā enam annādyam
gacchati yaḥ evam veda saḥ arajyata tatas rājanyaḥ ajāyata sa viśaḥ sabandhūn
annam annādyam abhyudatiṣṭhat viśām ca vai sa sabandhūnām ca annasya ca
annādyasya ca priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam veda sa viśaḥ anuvyacalat tam sabhā
ca samitiḥ ca senā ca surā ca anuvyacalan sabhāyāḥ ca vai sa samiteḥ ca senāyāḥ
ca surāyāḥ ca priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam veda tat yasya evam vidvān vrātyaḥ
rājñaḥ atithiḥ gṛhān āgacchet śreyāṃsam enam ātmanaḥ mānayet tathā kṣatrāya na
āvṛścate tathā rāṣṭrāya na āvṛścate atas vai brahma ca kṣatram ca udatiṣṭhatām
te abrūtām kam praviśāva iti bṛhaspatim eva brahma praviśatu indram kṣatram
tathā vai iti atas vai bṛhaspatim eva brahma prāviśat indram kṣatram iyam vai u
pṛthivī bṛhaspatiḥ dyauḥ eva indraḥ ayam vai u agniḥ brahma asau ādityaḥ kṣatram
ā enam brahma gacchati brahmavarcasī bhavati yaḥ pṛthivīm bṛhaspatim agnim
brahma veda ā enam indriyam gacchati indriyavān bhavati yaḥ ādityam kṣatram
divam indram veda tat yasya evam vidvān vrātyaḥ uddhṛteṣu agniṣu adhiśrite
agnihotre atithiḥ gṛhān āgacchet svayam enam abhyudetya brūyāt vrātya atisṛja
hoṣyāmi iti sa ca atisṛjet juhuyāt na ca atisṛjet na juhuyāt sa yaḥ evam viduṣā
vrātyena atisṛṣṭaḥ juhoti pra pitṛyāṇam panthām jānāti pra deva yānam na deveṣu
āvṛścate hutam asya bhavati pari asya asmin loke āyatanam śiṣyate yaḥ evam
viduṣā vrātyena atisṛṣṭaḥ juhoti atha yaḥ evam viduṣā vrātyena an atisṛṣṭaḥ
juhoti na pitṛyāṇam panthām jānāti na deva yānam ā deveṣu vṛścate ahutam asya
bhavati na asya asmin loke āyatanam śiṣyate yaḥ evam viduṣā vrātyena an
atisṛṣṭaḥ juhoti tat yasya evam vidvān vrātyaḥ ekām rātrim atithiḥ gṛhe vasati
ye pṛthivyām puṇyāḥ lokāḥ tān eva tena avarunddhe tat yasya evam vidvān vrātyaḥ
dvitīyām rātrim atithiḥ gṛhe vasati ye antarikṣe puṇyāḥ lokāḥ tān eva tena
avarunddhe tat yasya evam vidvān vrātyaḥ tṛtīyām rātrim atithiḥ gṛhe vasati ye
divi puṇyāḥ lokāḥ tān eva tena avarunddhe tat yasya evam vidvān vrātyaḥ
caturthīm rātrim atithiḥ gṛhe vasati ye puṇyānām puṇyāḥ lokāḥ tān eva tena
avarunddhe tat yasya evam vidvān vrātyaḥ aparimitāḥ rātrīḥ atithiḥ gṛhe vasati
ye eva aparimitāḥ puṇyāḥ lokāḥ tān eva tena avarunddhe atha yasya avrātyaḥ
vrātya bruvaḥ nāmabibhratī atithiḥ gṛhān āgacchet karṣet enam na ca enam karṣet
asyai devatāyai udakam yācāmi imām devatām vāsaye imām imām devatām pariveveṣmi
iti enam pariveviṣyāt tasyām eva asya tat devatāyām hutam bhavati yaḥ evam veda
sa yat prācīm diśam anuvyacalat mārutam śardhaḥ bhūtvā anuvyacalat manaḥ anna
ādam kṛtvā manasā anna ādena annam atti yaḥ evam veda sa yat dakṣiṇām diśam
anuvyacalat indraḥ bhūtvā anuvyacalat balam anna ādam kṛtvā balena anna ādena
annam atti yaḥ evam veda sa yat pratīcīm diśam anuvyacalat varuṇaḥ rājā bhūtvā
anuvyacalat apaḥ annādīḥ kṛtvā adbhiḥ annādībhiḥ annam atti yaḥ evam veda sa yat
udīcīm diśam anuvyacalat somaḥ rājā bhūtvā anuvyacalat saptarṣibhiḥ hute āhutim
annādīm kṛtvā āhutyā annādyā annam atti yaḥ evam veda sa yat dhruvām diśam
anuvyacalat viṣṇuḥ bhūtvā anuvyacalat virājam annādīm kṛtvā virājā annādyā annam
atti yaḥ evam veda sa yat paśūn anuvyacalat rudraḥ bhūtvā anuvyacalat oṣadhīḥ
annādīḥ kṛtvā oṣadhībhiḥ annādībhiḥ annam atti yaḥ evam veda sa yat pitṝn
anuvyacalat yamaḥ rājā bhūtvā anuvyacalat svadhākāram anna ādam kṛtvā
svadhākāreṇa annādena annam atti yaḥ evam veda sa yat manuṣyān anuvyacalat agniḥ
bhūtvā anuvyacalat svāhākāram anna ādam kṛtvā svāhākāreṇa anna ādena annam atti
yaḥ evam veda sa yat ūrdhvām diśam anuvyacalat bṛhaspatiḥ bhūtvā anuvyacalat
vaṣaṭkāram anna ādam kṛtvā vaṣaṭkāreṇa anna ādena annam atti yaḥ evam veda sa
yat devān anuvyacalat īśānaḥ bhūtvā anuvyacalat manyum anna ādam kṛtvā manyunā
anna ādena annam atti yaḥ evam veda sa yat prajāḥ anuvyacalat prajāpatiḥ bhūtvā
anuvyacalat prāṇam anna ādam kṛtvā prāṇena anna ādena annam atti yaḥ evam veda
sa yat sarvān antardeśān anuvyacalat parameṣṭhī bhūtvā anuvyacalat brahma anna
ādam kṛtvā brahmaṇā anna ādena annam atti yaḥ evam veda yaḥ asya prathamaḥ
apānaḥ sā paurṇamāsī yaḥ asya dvitīyaḥ apānaḥ sā aṣṭakā yaḥ asya tṛtīyaḥ apānaḥ
sā amāvāsyā yaḥ asya caturthaḥ apānaḥ sā śraddhā yaḥ asya pañcamaḥ apānaḥ sā
dīkṣā yaḥ asya ṣaṣṭhaḥ apānaḥ sa yajñaḥ yaḥ asya saptamaḥ apānaḥ tāḥ imāḥ
dakṣiṇāḥ yaḥ asya prathamaḥ vyānaḥ sā iyam bhūmiḥ yaḥ asya dvitīyaḥ vyānaḥ tat
antarikṣam yaḥ asya tṛtīyaḥ vyānaḥ sā dyauḥ yaḥ asya caturthaḥ vyānaḥ tāni
nakṣatrāṇi yaḥ asya pañcamaḥ vyānaḥ te ṛtavaḥ yaḥ asya ṣaṣṭhaḥ vyānaḥ te ārtavāḥ
yaḥ asya saptamaḥ vyānaḥ sa saṃvatsaraḥ samānam artham pariyanti devāḥ
saṃvatsaram vai etat ṛtavaḥ anupariyanti vrātyam ca yat ādityam abhisaṃviśanti
amāvāsyām ca eva tat paurṇamāsīm ca tat ekam tat eṣām amṛta tvam iti āhutiḥ eva
tasya vrātyasya yat asya dakṣiṇam akṣi asau saḥ ādityaḥ yat asya savyam akṣi
asau sa candramāḥ yaḥ asya dakṣiṇaḥ karṇaḥ ayam saḥ agniḥ yaḥ asya savyaḥ karṇaḥ
ayam sa pavamānaḥ ahorātre nāsike ditiḥ ca aditiḥ ca śīrṣa kapāle saṃvatsaraḥ
śiraḥ ahnā pratyaṅ vrātyaḥ rātryā prāṅ namaḥ vrātyāya atisṛṣṭaḥ apām vṛṣabhaḥ
atisṛṣṭāḥ agnayaḥ divyāḥ rujan parirujan mṛṇan pramṛṇan mrokaḥ manaḥ hā khanaḥ
nirdāhaḥ ātma dūṣiḥ tanū dūṣiḥ idam tam atisṛjāmi tam mā abhyavanikṣi tena tam
abhyatisṛjāmaḥ yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam vayam dviṣmaḥ apām agram asi samudram vaḥ
abhyavasṛjāmi yaḥ apsu agniḥ ati tam sṛjāmi mrokam khanim tanū dūṣim yaḥ vaḥ
āpaḥ agniḥ āviveśa saḥ eṣa yat vaḥ ghoram tat etat indrasya vaḥ indriyeṇa
abhiṣiñcet ariprāḥ āpaḥ apa ripram asmat pra asmat enaḥ vahantu pra duṣvapnyam
vahantu śivena mā cakṣuṣā paśyata apaḥ śivayā tanvā upaspṛśata tvacam me śivān
agnīn apsuṣadaḥ havāmahe mayi kṣatram varcaḥ ādhatta devīḥ nābhiḥ aham rayīṇām
nābhiḥ samānānām bhūyāsam svāsad asi sūṣāḥ amṛtaḥ martyeṣu ā mā mām prāṇaḥ hāsīt
mā u apānaḥ avahāya parāgāt sūryaḥ mā ahnaḥ pātu agniḥ pṛthivyāḥ vāyuḥ
antarikṣāt yamaḥ manuṣyebhyaḥ sarasvatī pārthivebhyaḥ prāṇa apānau mā mā
hāsiṣṭam mā jane prameṣi svasti adya uṣasaḥ ca sarvaḥ āpaḥ sarva gaṇaḥ aśīya
śakvarīḥ stha paśavaḥ mā upastheṣuḥ mitrāvaruṇau me prāṇa apānau agniḥ me dakṣam
dadhātu tasmāt amum nirbhajāmaḥ amum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram asau yaḥ sa
grāhyāḥ pāśāt mā moci tasya idam varcaḥ tejaḥ prāṇam āyuḥ nirveṣṭayāmi idam enam
adharāñcam pādayāmi saḥ nirṛtyāḥ pāśāt mā moci saḥ abhūtyāḥ pāśāt mā moci
viṣāsahim sahamānam sāsahānam sahīyāṃsam sahamānam sahaḥ jitam svar jitam go
jitam saṃdhanājitam īḍyam nāma hve indram āyuṣmān bhūyāsam viṣāsahim sahamānam
sāsahānam sahīyāṃsam sahamānam sahaḥ jitam svar jitam go jitam saṃdhanājitam
īḍyam nāma hve indram priyaḥ devānām bhūyāsam viṣāsahim sahamānam sāsahānam
sahīyāṃsam sahamānam sahaḥ jitam svar jitam go jitam saṃdhanājitam īḍyam nāma
hve indram priyaḥ prajānām bhūyāsam viṣāsahim sahamānam sāsahānam sahīyāṃsam
sahamānam sahaḥ jitam svar jitam go jitam saṃdhanājitam īḍyam nāma hve indram
priyaḥ paśūnām bhūyāsam viṣāsahim sahamānam sāsahānam sahīyāṃsam sahamānam sahaḥ
jitam svar jitam go jitam saṃdhanājitam īḍyam nāma hve indram priyaḥ samānānām
bhūyāsam udihi udihi sūrya varcasā mā abhyudihi dviṣan ca mahyam radhyatu mā ca
aham dviṣate radham tava id viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāni tvam naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhiḥ viśva
rūpaiḥ sudhāyām mā dhehi parame vyoman udihi udihi sūrya varcasā mā abhyudihi
yān ca paśyāmi yān ca na teṣu mā sumatim kṛdhi tava id viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāni
tvam naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhiḥ viśva rūpaiḥ sudhāyām mā dhehi parame vyoman mā tvā
dabhan salile apsu antar ye pāśinaḥ upatiṣṭhanti atra hitvā aśastim divam
ārukṣaḥ etām sa naḥ mṛḍa sumatau te syāma tava id viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāni tvam naḥ
pṛṇīhi paśubhiḥ viśva rūpaiḥ sudhāyām mā dhehi parame vyoman tvam naḥ indra
mahate saubhagāya adabdhebhiḥ paripāhi aktubhiḥ tava id viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāni
tvam naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhiḥ viśva rūpaiḥ sudhāyām mā dhehi parame vyoman tvam naḥ
indra ūtibhiḥ śivābhiḥ śaṃtamaḥ bhava ārohan tridivam divaḥ gṛṇānaḥ soma pītaye
priya dhāmā svastaye tava id viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāni tvam naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhiḥ
viśva rūpaiḥ sudhāyām mā dhehi parame vyoman tvam indra asi viśva jit sarva vid
puruhūtaḥ tvam indra tvam indra imam su havam stomam erayasva sa naḥ mṛḍa
sumatau te syāma tava id viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāṇi tvam naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhiḥ viśva
rūpaiḥ sudhāyām mā dhehi parame vyoman a dabdhaḥ divi pṛthivyām uta asi na te
āpuḥ mahimānam antarikṣe a dabdhena brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānaḥ sa tvam naḥ indra divi
sam śarma yaccha tava id viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāṇi tvam naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhiḥ viśva
rūpaiḥ sudhāyām mā dhehi parame vyoman yā te indra tanūḥ apsu yā pṛthivyām yā
antar agnau yā te indra pavamāne svar vidi yayā indra tanvā antarikṣam vyāpitha
tayā naḥ indra tanvā śarma yaccha tava id viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāṇi tvam naḥ pṛṇīhi
paśubhiḥ viśva rūpaiḥ sudhāyām mā dhehi parame vyoman tvām indra brahmaṇā
vardhayantaḥ sattram niṣeduḥ ṛṣayaḥ nādhamānāḥ tava id viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāṇi
tvam naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhiḥ viśva rūpaiḥ sudhāyām mā dhehi parame vyoman tvam tṛtam
tvam paryeṣi utsam sahasra dhāram vidatham svar vidam tava id viṣṇo bahudhā
vīryāṇi tvam naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhiḥ viśva rūpaiḥ sudhāyām mā dhehi parame vyoman
tvam rakṣase pradiśaḥ catasraḥ tvam śociṣā nabhasī vibhāsi tvam imā viśvā
bhuvanā anutiṣṭhase ṛtasya panthām anveṣi vidvān tava id viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāṇi
tvam naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhiḥ viśva rūpaiḥ sudhāyām mā dhehi parame vyoman pañcabhiḥ
parāṅ tapasi ekayā arvāṅ aśastim eṣi sudine bādhamānaḥ tava id viṣṇo bahudhā
vīryāṇi tvam naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhiḥ viśva rūpaiḥ sudhāyām mā dhehi parame vyoman
tvam indraḥ tvam mahā indraḥ tvam lokaḥ tvam prajāpatiḥ tubhyam yajñaḥ vitāyate
tubhyam juhvati juhvataḥ tava id viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāṇi tvam naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhiḥ
viśva rūpaiḥ sudhāyām mā dhehi parame vyoman asati sat pratiṣṭhitam sati bhūtam
pratiṣṭhitam bhūtam ha bhavye āhitam bhavyam bhūte pratiṣṭhitam tava id viṣṇo
bahudhā vīryāṇi tvam naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhiḥ viśva rūpaiḥ sudhāyām mā dhehi parame
vyoman śukraḥ asi bhrājaḥ asi sa yathā tvam bhrājatā bhrājaḥ asi eva aham
bhrājatā bhrājyāsam ruciḥ asi rocaḥ asi sa yathā tvam rucyā rocaḥ asi eva aham
paśubhiḥ ca brāhmaṇa varcasena ca ruciṣīya udyate namaḥ udāyate namaḥ uditāya
namaḥ virāje namaḥ sva rāje namaḥ samrāje namaḥ astam yate namaḥ astam eṣyate
namaḥ astamitāya namaḥ virāje namaḥ sva rāje namaḥ samrāje namaḥ udagāt ayam
ādityaḥ viśvena tapasā saha sapatnān mahyam randhayan mā ca aham dviṣate radham
tava id viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāṇi tvam naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhiḥ viśva rūpaiḥ sudhāyām mā
dhehi parame vyoman āditya nāvam ārukṣaḥ śata aritrām svastaye ahar mā
atyapīparaḥ rātrim satrā atipāraya sūrya nāvam ārukṣaḥ śata aritrām svastaye
rātrim mā atyapīparaḥ ahar satrā atipāraya prajāpateḥ āvṛtaḥ brahmaṇā varmaṇā
aham kaśyapasya jyotiṣā varcasā ca jaradaṣṭiḥ kṛta vīryaḥ vihāyāḥ sahasra āyuḥ
su kṛtaḥ careyam parivṛtaḥ brahmaṇā varmaṇā aham kaśyapasya jyotiṣā varcasā ca
mā mā prāpan iṣavaḥ daivyāḥ yāḥ mā mānuṣīḥ avasṛṣṭāḥ vadhāya ṛtena guptaḥ
ṛtubhiḥ ca sarvaiḥ bhūtena guptaḥ bhavyena ca aham mā mā prāpat pāpmā mā uta
mṛtyuḥ antardadhe aham salilena vācaḥ agniḥ mā goptā paripātu viśvatas udyan
sūryaḥ nudatām mṛtyu pāśān vyucchantīḥ uṣasaḥ parvatāḥ dhruvāḥ sahasram prāṇāḥ
mayi āyatantām hvayāmi te manasā manaḥ iha imān gṛhāṁ upa jujuṣāṇaḥ ehi sam
gacchasva pitṛbhiḥ sam yamena syonāḥ tvā vātāḥ upa vāntu śagmāḥ ud tvā vahantu
marutaḥ uda vāhāḥ uda prutaḥ ajena kṛṇvantaḥ śītam varṣeṇa ukṣantu bāl iti ā
idam barhiḥ asadaḥ medhyaḥ abhūḥ prati tvā jānantu pitaraḥ paretam yathāparu
tanvam sam bharasva gātrāṇi te brahmaṇā kalpayāmi namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ yat śivam
tasmai namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ yat syonam tasmai namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ svadhā vaḥ pitaraḥ
vidma gātau haviḥ janayan tasthe indra agram jyeṣṭha pari agāma iha deva sa
gātau gātau uttama āpaya āpim asmabhyam indra dadataḥ pracetaḥ agniḥ naḥ puras
etā astu añjasā bṛhaspatiḥ sanyā astu naḥ sakhā indram huve vṛtra haṇam puram
daram bhagena adya bhagavantaḥ syāma tvam soma divyaḥ nṛ cakṣāḥ sugāṁ asmabhyam
pathaḥ anu khyaḥ abhi naḥ gotram viduṣaḥ iva neṣaḥ acchā naḥ vācam uśatīm jigāsi
imām agne śaraṇim mīmṛṣaḥ naḥ imam adhvānam yam agāma dūram āpiḥ pitā pramatiḥ
somyānām bhṛmiḥ asi ṛṣi kṛt martyānām tvam agne pramatiḥ tvam pitā asi naḥ tvam
sakhā yujyaḥ asi jātavedaḥ tvam viśva vid gātu vid kaviḥ viśvāḥ āśāḥ abhayāḥ
santu asme idam varcaḥ agninā dattam āgan bhargaḥ yaśaḥ sahaḥ ojaḥ vayaḥ balam
trayastriṃśat yāni vīryāṇi tāni agniḥ pra dadātu me varcaḥ ā dhehi me tanvām
sahaḥ ojaḥ vayaḥ balam indriyāya tvā karmaṇe vīryāya prati gṛhṇāmi śata śāradāya
ūrje tvā balāya tvā ojase sahase tvā abhibhūyāya tvā rāṣṭra bhṛtyāya pari ūhāmi
śata śāradāya ṛtubhiḥ tvā ārtavaiḥ āyuṣe varcase tvā saṃvatsarasya tejasā tena
saṃhanu kṛṇmasi idam āñjanam ānaje ākanikradam abhi mā cakranda bhagaḥ ṛṣabhaḥ
vāśitām iva aśvaḥ kanikradat yathā pratyaṅ mā bhagaḥ āgamat tam aham putram iva
upasthe ādhiṣi akṣyau me madhu saṃkāśe jihvā me madhu vādinī nasoḥ adhi
pramandanam datsu me sāragham madhu madhumat mama niṃsanam jaghanam madhumat
mama mām id kila tvam vāvanaḥ śākhām madhumatīm iva yasmāt aṅgāt saṃsusrāva yat
babhūva galantaśas gāvaḥ vatsam iva jānānāḥ tat paraitu yathāyatham na asṛj asti
pataṅgasya tardasya maśakādyāḥ veṇoḥ pūtudroḥ na asti mā asya glauḥ mā apacit
bhuvat aham veda yathā āsitha gurvikā nāma vai asi amum tvam tam itas gaccha yam
aham dveṣmi pūruṣam tasya api madhye ā sīda nīla grīvāsu sīdata vātasya anu
pravām maśakasya anu saṃvidam pra itas yantu agruvaḥ niḥ itas yantu agruvaḥ
adharācīm itas paras pra aham glāvam adhmāsam niḥ aham glāvam adhmāsam adharācīm
itas paras yat te annam bhuvaspate ākṣiyet pṛthivīm anu tasya naḥ tvam
bhuvaspate sam pra yaccha prajāpate vyātte parameṣṭhinaḥ brahmaṇā āpīpadāma tam
saṃvatsarasya daṃṣṭrābhyām hetiḥ tam sam adhāt abhi iyam tam babhastu āhutiḥ
samidh devī sahīyasī rājñaḥ varuṇasya bandhaḥ asi saḥ amum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ
putram ahne rātraye badhāna mṛṇaḥ asi deva savitar gāyatreṇa chandasā mṛṇa
amuṣya paśūn dvi padaḥ catuḥ padaḥ yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam vayam dviṣmaḥ tam jahi
tam mṛṇa tasmai mā mīmṛḍaḥ tasmai durāhā ni te padam pade mama ni cittam etu
niṣkṛtam yathā asaḥ kevalaḥ mama aham sādhāraṇī tava padena gām anu yanti padena
aśvam padā ratham padena marya mat tvam na eṣaḥ na u aham tvat mā apa sṛpaḥ mā
parā sṛpaḥ mā anyatra asmat manaḥ kṛthāḥ yam tvā ahiḥ iva bhogaiḥ nākulena
parīmasi ni tvā kṛṇve saṃnahane ni kurīre ni opaśe ni tvā adhamasmin lomni ni u
tvā muṣkayoḥ mṛje ghṛta āhutā pṛthivī mā naḥ enaḥ asmān prajām vocata kilbiṣāṇi
an āturāḥ su manasaḥ su vīrāḥ jyok jīvantaḥ tava sakhye syāma antar emi
yātudhānān antar emi kimīdinaḥ vayam sarasvatyā carāmasi mā te riṣam khanitā
yasmai ca tvā khanāmasi dvi pād catur pād asmākam mā riṣat devi oṣadhe anyā vaḥ
anyām avatu anyā anyasyāḥ upāvata sadhrīcīḥ sa vratāḥ bhūtvā asya avata vīryam
dhruvaḥ tiṣṭha bhuvanasya gopa mā sam vikthāḥ vanaspate atra eva tvam iha vayam
su vīrāḥ viśvāḥ mṛdhaḥ abhimātīḥ vi asya yaḥ vānaspatyānām adhipatiḥ babhūva
yasmin imā viśvā bhuvanāni ārpitā tam anajmi madhunā daivyena tasmāt maṇim niḥ
mame viśva rūpam imam maṇim viśva jitam su vīram asmāt aśvatthāt pari ud bharāmi
yena viśvāḥ pṛtanāḥ saṃjayāni yena viśvāḥ pṛtanāḥ saṃjayāni atha u dyumat
samitim ā vadāni sa bandhuḥ ca a sa bandhuḥ ca yaḥ naḥ indra abhidāsati vṛścāmi
tasya aham mūlam prajām cakṣuḥ atha u balam jāyamānaḥ niḥ arujat sapatnān
dodhataḥ abhayān sa vai sapatnānām sabhāḥ avālapsyaḥ anāśayat ārāt arātim kṛṇute
aśastim apa bādhate avālapsyaḥ sa yaḥ maṇiḥ sahasvān abhimāti hā cakṣuḥ asya
sūtram āsīt tardma śrotram uta ā abharat avālapsyaḥ sa yaḥ maṇiḥ sahasvān
abhimāti hā imam maṇim āvālapsyam yasmin ārohayāmasi sa vai sapatnān ā datte saḥ
enam pātu viśvatas saḥ enam jarase nayāt agniḥ te viśaḥ ā nayāt indraḥ vāyuḥ
bṛhaspatiḥ sa te dharmam adīdharat dhātā iva bhuvanebhyaḥ bṛhaspate puras etā
viśām ihi agniḥ paścāt abhi nudāti āyatīḥ vāyuḥ enāḥ dakṣiṇatas pūṣā uttarāt upa
ā nudāt ā sahasrī śata rathaḥ ā revāṁ etu naḥ viśam ā indraḥ vāmena viś patiḥ ā
rūpeṇa bṛhaspatiḥ svarjuṣṭaḥ kaśyapasya sa rāṣṭre jāgarat sve ṛṣabhaḥ
śātamāturaḥ a vihrutaḥ devān yajñena bodhayāt indraḥ devānām varuṇaḥ dhṛta
vrataḥ somaḥ vīrudhām jagataḥ paraspāḥ vāyuḥ paśūnām paśu pāḥ janānām ayam puras
rāḥ naḥ asya astu mūrdhā mūrdhā divaḥ antarikṣasya mūrdhā mūrdhā sindhūnām uta
parvatānām mūrdhā viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā ayam puras rāḥ naḥ asya astu mūrdhā
mṛdhaḥ te samrāj ava hantu sarvān amitrān rājā varuṇaḥ viṣūcaḥ indraḥ śatrūn asu
nītim nayāti te ayam puras rāḥ naḥ asya astu mūrdhā viśaḥ tvā rājan pradiśaḥ
juṣantām daivīḥ viśaḥ su praketāḥ sa ketāḥ viśvāḥ āśāḥ manuṣyaḥ vi bhāhi ayam
puras rāḥ naḥ asya astu mūrdhā vi bādhasva dṛṃhasva vīḍayasva adhas padam
śatravaḥ te bhavantu sapatna sāhaḥ ṛṣabhaḥ jana sāh ugraḥ cettā pañca kṛṣṭīḥ vi
rāja śivam kṣetram an amīvam te astu uttame nāke adhi tiṣṭha ā ihi putrān
bhrātṝn bahulān paśyamānaḥ viśve tvā devāḥ iha dhārayantu tvaṣṭā rūpeṇa savitā
savena ahar mitreṇa varuṇena rātrī indraḥ jyaiṣṭhyena brahmaṇā ayam bṛhaspatiḥ
dhātā tvā dhībhiḥ abhi rakṣatu iha vāstoṣpate iha naḥ śarma yaccha ghane
vṛtrāṇām saṃgathe vasūnām iha eva edhi grāma patiḥ jana sāh viśvaiḥ devaiḥ
gupitaḥ rakṣamāṇaḥ ūrdhvaḥ bhava prati vidhya adhi asmat ugram dhanuḥ ojasvān ā
tanuṣva prati durhārdam harasā śṛṇīhi kṛtvānam agne adharam kṛṇuṣva prati enam
yāhi prati bhaṅdhi enam vividhyan agne vitaram vi bhāhi pratyaṅ pra ihi vartmanā
jarhṛṣāṇaḥ kṛtyā kṛte duṣkṛte mā adhi vocaḥ yaḥ naḥ durhārd hṛdayena abhivaste
yaḥ cakṣuṣā manasā yaḥ ca vācā pratyaṅ daṃṣṭrābhyām abhi tam bubhūṣan kṛtyā
kṛtam duṣkṛtam niḥ daha agne dhātāram indram savitāram ūtaye huve devāṁ a mṛtān
martyaḥ san śreṣṭhe naḥ vasavaḥ dhatta dhāmni mā radhāma dviṣate mā u arātaye
adhi bravītu adhivaktā naḥ indraḥ adhi bravītu savitā daivyena svasti mitra
varuṇā ca dhattām rātrim rātrim ahar ahar ca devāḥ adhi bravītu pṛthivī uta
dyauḥ adhi bruvantu marutaḥ pṛśni mātaraḥ yaḥ naḥ dveṣṭi araṇaḥ yaḥ sanābhiḥ
paviḥ iva nemeḥ adharaḥ saḥ astu yasya trayāḥ gatam anuprayanti devāḥ manuṣyāḥ
paśavaḥ ca sarve tat naḥ devam manaḥ adhi bravītu su nīti naḥ nayatu dviṣate mā
radhāma varcasvān asi deveṣu varcasvān oṣadhīṣu ā atha u varcasvinam kṛdhi yam
aśvattha adhirohasi yam aśvatthaḥ adhyarukṣat rājā manuṣyam janam indraḥ iva vi
mṛdhaḥ hanat tasmāt rāṣṭram an apacyutam ārohaḥ nāma vai asi sahasvān ud
ajāyathāḥ tam tvā sapatna sāsaham aśvattha bibharāt ayam rājā vai asi bhūtānām
ṛṣabhaḥ vīrudhām patiḥ sa naḥ sapatnān aśvattha viṣūcaḥ vi ud ā kṛdhi
saṃpaśyamānāḥ amṛtāya āyan śuddhāḥ yonibhyaḥ pari jāyamānāḥ śivam kṛṇvānāḥ upa
jighrata imam vīram vīreṣu api ā kṛṇudhvam śivaḥ vaḥ vīraḥ iha jātaḥ astu
śuddhaḥ yonibhyaḥ pari jāyamānaḥ a riṣṭaḥ ayam vardhatām sarvam āyuḥ varma
jyāyobhyaḥ haviṣā kṛṇotu jarām mṛtyum pra īpsatu jīvaḥ eṣa na asya krimiḥ īśāte
na uta jambhaḥ saṃrabhya jīva śaradaḥ su varcāḥ agniḥ te gopāḥ adhipāḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ
jarā mṛtyuḥ jarā āyuḥ jarā cakṣuḥ jarā svar jarase tvā jarat aṣṭim pari dadāmi
dyauḥ te pitā pṛthivī mātā antarikṣam ātmā vātaḥ prāṇaḥ sūryaḥ cakṣuḥ divaḥ
payaḥ suparṇaḥ tvā abhi ava paśyāt āyuṣe varcase ayam annasya anna patiḥ astu
vīraḥ agneḥ prajātam pari yat hiraṇyam amṛtam dadhre adhi martyeṣu yaḥ enat veda
saḥ id enat arhati jarā mṛtyuḥ bhavati yaḥ bibharti yat hiraṇyam sūryeṇa su
varṇam prajāvantaḥ manavaḥ pūrve īṣire tat tvā candram varcasā sam sṛjāti
āyuṣmān bhavati yaḥ bibharti āyuṣe tvā varcase tvā ojase ca balāya ca yathā
hiraṇya tejasā vibhāsāsi janāṁ anu yat veda rājā varuṇaḥ veda devaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ
indraḥ yat vṛtra hā veda tat te āyuṣyam bhuvat tat te varcasyam bhuvat yam
gṛhṇanti apsarasaḥ yam mathnāti bṛhaspatiḥ tam kaśyapasya brahmaṇā savitā punar
ā bharat yaḥ paridhāya mṛgeṣu api dhāvati tam kaśyapasya brahmaṇā savitā punar ā
bharat savitā agniḥ brahmā somaḥ indraḥ tvaṣṭā bṛhaspatiḥ ete marut yutam tvā
brahmaṇā punar ā bharan bhadrām vācam śivam cakṣuḥ marut yutāya kṛṇmasi imām hi
asmai oṣadhim ā harāmi arundhatīm tribhyaḥ rudrebhyaḥ pravasan yajāmi jyeṣṭhaḥ
kaniṣṭhaḥ uta madhyamaḥ yaḥ jyotiḥ kārāḥ kavayaḥ soma pāḥ ye kaṇvāḥ ajantu niḥ
itas vadhena indra agnī vītam haviṣaḥ saṃvidānau samiddhaḥ agniḥ samidhā gīrbhiḥ
indraḥ nudethām kaṇvāḥ niḥ itas arātim ārāt rakṣāṃsi tapatam vi asmat vāstoṣpate
su prajasaḥ su vīrāḥ śaradaḥ śatāni dus vāstu kaṇvāḥ abhi niḥ nudasva su vāstu
asmāṁ upa sam viśasva yā tanti sad khala sad yā ca goṣṭhe yāḥ jātāḥ śakadhūme
sabhāyām prapāyām jātāḥ uta yāḥ ca bhitsu tāḥ cātayāmaḥ śivatā naḥ astu dudvā ca
dudvatī ca sthaḥ tat vām nāma tat vām nāmadheyam rudra preṣite sthaḥ avye nāma
pari asmān vṛṅktam yaḥ naḥ dveṣṭi tam ṛcchatam vīcī nāma asi aghahārā nāma namaḥ
te astu vātake anyatra asmat agham kṛdhi ṛjīte pari naḥ nama agreṇa pari naḥ
nama aśmānam tanvam kṛṇmahe adya naḥ soma mṛḍaya tvam darbha asi patiḥ oṣadhīnām
vibhindan yāsi kanyāḥ iva enān bhinddhi śiraḥ kṛmeḥ jāyānyasya śarīram bhinddhi
uta bhinddhi asthi yaḥ kīkasā sthaḥ viradāt parūṃṣi yasya uddhāraḥ uṣṇihāḥ tāḥ
hi vavre haniṣyāmi vām niḥ atas tṛṇāni attam ayam yaḥ āste jaṭhareṣu antar
martyasya haniṣyāmi vām niḥ atas stāyat eyathuḥ prati vām abhutsi yena īyathuḥ
tena pathā paretam stāyat eyathuḥ prati vām abhutsi brahmaṇā vām paritṛhya
samantam vi chetsyāmi nakulaḥ iva sarpam payaḥ deveṣu payaḥ oṣadhīṣu payaḥ āśāsu
payaḥ antarikṣe tat me dhātā savitā ca dhattām viśve tat devāḥ abhi sam gṛṇantu
payaḥ yat apsu payaḥ usriyāsu payaḥ utseṣu uta parvateṣu tat me dhātā savitā ca
dhattām viśve tat devāḥ abhi sam gṛṇantu yat mṛgeṣu payaḥ āviṣṭam asti yat ejati
patati yat patatriṣu tat me dhātā savitā ca dhattām viśve tat devāḥ abhi sam
gṛṇantu yāni payāṃsi divi ārpitāni yāni antarikṣe bahudhā bahūni teṣām īśāne
vaśinī naḥ adya pra dattām dyāvā pṛthivī a hṛṇīyamāne tris kuṣṭha asi vṛtrāt
jātaḥ tris divaḥ pari jajñiṣe tris somāt jajñiṣe tvam tris ādityebhyaḥ pari
jīvalam naghāriṣam jayatkam a parājitam tam tvā amṛtasya īśānam rājan kuṣṭha ā
vadāmasi antarā dyāvā pṛthivī antarikṣam idam mahat tatra amṛtasya īśānam
kuṣṭham devāḥ abadhnata kuṣṭhaḥ asi deva kṛtaḥ himavadbhyaḥ nirābhṛtaḥ
tīkṣṇābhiḥ abhribhiḥ khātaḥ sa cakartha arasam viṣam yāḥ te śatam dhamanayaḥ
sahasrāṇi ca viṃśatiḥ babhroḥ aśvasya vāreṇa api nahyāmi tāḥ aham śatasya te
dhamanīnām sahasrasya ayutasya ca dṛteḥ pādam iva sārathiḥ api nahyāmi yat bilam
tatas śuṣkasya śuṣmeṇa tiṣṭhantu lohinīḥ apaḥ pari vaḥ sikatāmayam marum bile
vapāmasi yakat cit asravīt purā takat cit aśamīt idam rudra mā tvā jīhiḍāma su
stutyā maghavan mā sa hūtyā bhiṣaktamam tvā bhiṣajām śṛṇomi ud naḥ vīrāṁ īraya
bheṣajebhiḥ rudra yat te guhyam nāma yat te addhātayaḥ viduḥ śivā śaravyā yā
tava tayā naḥ mṛḍa jīvase agnim tvā āhuḥ vaiśvānaram sadanān pradahan u agāḥ sa
naḥ devatrā adhi brūhi mā riṣāma vayam tava yā devaiḥ prahitā iṣuḥ patāt tapase
vā mahase vā avasṛṣṭā somaḥ tvām asmat yāvayatu vidvān avantu naḥ pitaraḥ deva
hūtiṣu asmān juṣadhvam asavaḥ adya mā naḥ purā jarasaḥ asavaḥ hāsiṣṭa pākāḥ
gṛṇīmaḥ tava vīryāya śatam himān adhipatiḥ naḥ ehi ud mṛṇaḥ agāt ā arjunam agāt
su śrut bhagavas gopāya mā ahne adya ātmānam pari dade sūrya prāṇaḥ bhavāmi ni
mṛṇaḥ agāt ā asitam agāt su śrut bhagavas gopāya mā rātraye adya ātmānam pari
dade agni prāṇaḥ bhavāmi sa yatra tvam prajāpate tris ekasya ahnaḥ prajāḥ
saṃpaśyasi tatra mām api sam paśya a naṣṭa paśuḥ bhuvanasya gopāḥ yathā mṛgam
ropayasi tiras carma atividhyasi eva tvam ugre oṣadhe amum ropaya mām abhi
bandhaḥ ca imau upadhiḥ ca madhumat nau samañjanam dvārau bhagasya imau ūrū
mṛgaḥ tṛṣyan iva ā cara abhi tvā adhām jālena iva mahā jaṣam yathā mama kratau
asaḥ mama citte sacāvahai aham vai tvat uttarā asmi adha tvam upadhiḥ mama sam
nau badhnāmi saṃbandhanena yathā asāva a vicartyau ā mṛtyoḥ ā parāvataḥ
apocchantī duṣvapnyam apa durhārdam ucchatam apa uṣṭam sarvam kṣetriyam sarvāḥ
ca yātudhānyaḥ ud agātām bhagavatī vicṛtau nāma tārake vi kṣetriyasya muñcatām
saṃgranthim hṛdayasya ca namaḥ astu varatrābhyaḥ namaḥ īṣā yugebhyaḥ mṛgāya
araṇye tiṣṭhate kṣetriyāya akaram namaḥ ākhoḥ idam kṣaitrapatyam manoḥ ca
mānavasya ca manaḥ sarvasya paśyataḥ iha bhūyaḥ syāt ud ehi devi kanye ācitā
vasunā saha na tvā taranti oṣadhayaḥ bāhyāḥ parvatīyāḥ uta yathā tvā devi oṣadhe
sarvaḥ kāmayate janaḥ eva bhagasya naḥ dhehi devebhyaḥ iva amṛtam pari
utsaktapatni oṣadhe āvataṃkaraṇī id asi yat eṣi yat niṣīdasi tatra tvā aham sam
agrabham aśvam iva aśva abhidhānyā yathā kumāraḥ taruṇaḥ mātaram pratinandati
eva asmān prati nandatu yām vayam kāmayāmahe trīṇi pātrāṇi prathamāni āsan tāni
satyam uta bhūtam tatakṣa ṛtasya māne adhi yā dhruvāṇi ebhiḥ devāḥ amṛtam
bhakṣayanti svar yat devāḥ vibhajantaḥ āyan trīṇi pātrāṇi prathamāni āsan
ādityāḥ ekam vasavaḥ dvitīyam tṛtīyam rudrāḥ abhi sam babhūvuḥ dhātā veda savitā
etāni sarvā bṛhaspatiḥ prathamaḥ devaḥ agniḥ ebhiḥ indraḥ jaṭharam ā pṛṇīte
tribhiḥ pātraiḥ uta viśve ca devāḥ ūrdhvā tiṣṭhanti nanu jihmā bhavanti na ūnam
babhūva katamat cana eṣām devānām pātrāṇi nihitāni yāni tāni sam pāti yaḥ ṛtasya
gopāḥ ghṛtasya jūtiḥ samanā saṃvatsaram haviṣā vardhayantī śrotram cakṣuḥ prāṇaḥ
a chinnaḥ naḥ astu a chinnāḥ vayam āyuṣaḥ varcasaḥ upa asmān prāṇaḥ hvayatām upa
vayam prāṇam havāmahe varcaḥ jagrāha pṛthivī antarikṣam varcaḥ somaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ
vidhartā varcasaḥ dyāvā pṛthivī saṃgrahaṇī babhūvatuḥ varcaḥ gṛhītvā pṛthivīm
anu sam carema yaśasā gāvaḥ go patim upa tiṣṭhanti āyatīḥ yaśaḥ gṛhītvā pṛthivīm
anu sam carema vrajam kṛṇudhvam sa hi vaḥ nṛ pānaḥ varmā sīvyadhvam bahulā
pṛthūni puraḥ kṛṇudhvam āyasīḥ a dhṛṣṭāḥ mā vaḥ susrot camasaḥ dṛṃhata tam imau
ūrū sa vāsinau varcasā añje aham mama nāma hi enayoḥ veda yathā na bahavaḥ viduḥ
varcasā āpīnā pṛthivī sūryeṇa uttabhitā dyauḥ tviṣim yām paśyāmaḥ vāte tām ni
yacche mama ūrvoḥ veda vai vām nāmadheyam jigīvāṁ a parājitam prajām ca bahvīm ā
śāse rāṣṭram ca indra abhirakṣitam viduṣī vām nāmadheyam aśvinā sāragham madhu
sūryaḥ iva cakṣuḥ bhūtānām prajām dhārayatam mayi rayim dhārayatam mayi śata
pāśām vi tanomi ūrubhyām jaghanena ca tasmin yaḥ badhyate bandhe sa me astu
nyakṣakaḥ yakṣmam tvacasyam te vayam viṣvañcam vi vṛhāmasi bhagaḥ tvā itas
nayatu hasta gṛhya bṛhaspatiḥ puraetā te astu agniḥ vai devānām avamaḥ viṣṇuḥ
paramaḥ tad antareṇa sarvāḥ anyāḥ devatāḥ āgnāvaiṣṇavam puroﾱāśam nirvapanti
dīkṣaṇīyam ekādaśa kapālam sarvābhyaḥ eva enam tat devatābhyaḥ anantarāyam
nirvapanti agniḥ vai sarvāḥ devatāḥ viṣṇuḥ sarvāḥ devatāḥ ete vai yajñasya antye
tanvau yat agniḥ ca viṣṇuḥ ca tat yat āgnāvaiṣṇavam puroﾱāśam nirvapanti antatas
eva tat devān ṛdhnuvanti tat āhuḥ yat ekādaśa kapālaḥ puroﾱāśaḥ dvau agnāviṣṇū
kā enayoḥ tatra kﾱptiḥ kā vibhaktiḥ iti aṣṭākapālaḥ āgneyaḥ aṣṭa akṣarā vai
gāyatrī gāyatram agneḥ chandaḥ tri kapālaḥ vaiṣṇavaḥ vaiṣṇavaḥ tris hi idam
viṣṇuḥ vyakramata sā enayoḥ tatra kﾱptiḥ sā vibhaktiḥ sā vibhaktiḥ ghṛte carum
nirvapeta yaḥ a pratiṣṭhitaḥ manyeta asyām vāva sa na pratitiṣṭhati yaḥ na
pratitiṣṭhati tat yat ghṛtam tat striyai payaḥ ye taṇḍulāḥ te puṃsaḥ tat
mithunam mithunena eva enam tat prajayā paśubhiḥ prajanayati prajātyai prajāyate
prajayā paśubhiḥ yaḥ evam veda ārabdha yajñaḥ vai eṣaḥ ārabdha devataḥ yaḥ darśa
pūrṇamāsābhyām yajate āmāvāsyena vā haviṣā iṣṭvā paurṇamāsena vā tasmin eva
haviṣi tasmin barhiṣi dīkṣeta eṣā u ekā dīkṣā saptadaśa sāmidhenīḥ anubrūyāt
saptadaśaḥ vai prajāpatiḥ dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca ṛtavaḥ hemanta śiśirayoḥ samāsena
tāvān saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ prajāpati āyatanābhiḥ eva ābhiḥ
rādhnoti yaḥ evam veda punar vai etam ṛtvijaḥ garbham kurvanti yam dīkṣayanti
adbhiḥ abhiṣiñcanti retaḥ vai āpaḥ sa retasam eva enam tat kṛtvā dīkṣayanti
navanītena abhyañjanti ājyam vai devānām surabhi ghṛtam manuṣyāṇām āyutam
pitṝṇām navanītam garbhāṇām tat yat navanītena abhyañjanti svena eva enam tat
bhāgadheyena samardhayanti āñjanti enam tejaḥ vai etat akṣyoḥ yat āñjanam sa
tejasam eva enam tat kṛtvā dīkṣayanti ekaviṃśatyā darbha piñjūlaiḥ pāvayanti
śuddham eva enam tat pūtam dīkṣayanti dīkṣita vimitam prapādayanti yoniḥ vai eṣā
dīkṣitasya yat dīkṣita vimitam yonim eva enam tat svām prapādayanti tasmāt
dhruvāt yoneḥ āste ca carati ca tasmāt dhruvāt yoneḥ garbhāḥ dhīyante ca pra ca
jāyante tasmāt dīkṣitam na anyatra dīkṣita vimitāt ādityaḥ abhyudiyāt vā
abhyastam iyāt vā api vā abhyāśrāvayeyuḥ vāsasā prorṇuvanti ulbam vai etat
dīkṣitasya yat vāsaḥ ulbena eva enam tat prorṇuvanti kṛṣṇājinam uttaram bhavati
uttaram vai ulbāt jarāyu jarāyuṇā eva enam tat prorṇuvanti muṣṭī kurute muṣṭī
vai kṛtvā garbhaḥ antar śete muṣṭī kṛtvā kumāraḥ jāyate tat yat muṣṭī kurute
yajñam ca eva tat sarvāḥ ca devatāḥ muṣṭyoḥ kurute tat āhuḥ na pūrva dīkṣiṇaḥ
saṃsavaḥ asti parigṛhītaḥ vai etasya yajñaḥ parigṛhītāḥ devatāḥ na etasya ārtiḥ
asti apara dīkṣiṇaḥ eva yathā tathā iti unmucya kṛṣṇājinam avabhṛtham abhyavaiti
tasmāt muktāḥ garbhāḥ jarāyoḥ jāyante saha eva vāsasā abhyavaiti tasmāt saha eva
ulbena kumāraḥ jāyate tvam agne saprathāḥ asi soma yāḥ te mayaḥ bhuvaḥ iti ājya
bhāgayoḥ puronuvākye anubrūyāt yaḥ pūrvam an ījānaḥ syāt tasmai tvayā yajñam vi
tanvate iti yajñam eva asmai etat vitanoti agniḥ pratnena manmanā soma gīrbhiḥ
tvā vayam iti yaḥ pūrvam ījānaḥ syāt tasmai pratnam iti pūrvam karma abhivadati
tat tat na ādṛtyam agniḥ vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanat tvam soma asi sat patiḥ iti
vārtraghnau eva kuryāt vṛtram vai eṣa hanti yam yajñaḥ upanamati tasmāt
vārtraghnau eva kartavyau agniḥ mukham prathamaḥ devatānām agniḥ ca viṣṇo tapaḥ
uttamam mahaḥ iti āgnāvaiṣṇavasya haviṣaḥ yājyā anuvākye bhavataḥ āgnāvaiṣṇavyau
rūpa samṛddhe etat vai yajñasya samṛddham yat rūpa samṛddham yat karma
kriyamāṇam ṛc abhivadati agniḥ ca ha vai viṣṇuḥ ca devānām dīkṣā pālau tau
dīkṣāyāḥ īśāte tat yat āgnāvaiṣṇavam haviḥ bhavati yau dīkṣāyāḥ īśāte tau prītau
dīkṣām prayacchatām yau dīkṣayitārau tau dīkṣayetām iti triṣṭubhau bhavataḥ sa
indriya tvāya gāyatryau sviṣṭakṛtaḥ saṃyājye kurvīta tejaskāmaḥ brahmavarcasa
kāmaḥ tejaḥ vai brahmavarcasam gāyatrī tejasvī brahmavarcasī bhavati yaḥ evam
vidvān gāyatryau kurute uṣṇihau āyuṣkāmaḥ kurvīta āyuḥ vai uṣṇih sarvam āyuḥ eti
yaḥ evam vidvān uṣṇihau kurute anuṣṭubhau svarga kāmaḥ kurvīta catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ
dvayoḥ vai anuṣṭubhoḥ catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ akṣarāṇi trayaḥ ime ūrdhvāḥ ekaviṃśāḥ lokāḥ
ime ekaviṃśatyā ekaviṃśatyā eva imān lokān rohati svarge eva loke
catuḥṣaṣṭitamena pratitiṣṭhati pratitiṣṭhati yaḥ evam vidvān anuṣṭubhau kurute
bṛhatyau śrī kāmaḥ yaśaskāmaḥ kurvīta śrīḥ vai yaśaḥ chandasām bṛhatī śriyam eva
yaśaḥ ātman dhatte yaḥ evam vidvān bṛhatyau kurute paṅktī yajña kāmaḥ kurvīta
pāṅktaḥ vai yajñaḥ upa enam yajñaḥ namati yaḥ evam vidvān paṅktī kurute
triṣṭubhau vīrya kāmaḥ kurvīta ojaḥ vai indriyam vīryam triṣṭubhau ojasvī
indriyavān vīryavān bhavati yaḥ evam vidvān triṣṭubhau kurute jagatyau paśu
kāmaḥ kurvīta jāgatāḥ vai paśavaḥ paśumān bhavati yaḥ evam vidvān jagatyau
kurute virājau annādya kāmaḥ kurvīta annam vai virāj tasmāt yasya eva iha
bhūyiṣṭham annam bhavati saḥ eva bhūyiṣṭham loke virājati tat virājaḥ virāj tvam
vi sveṣu rājati śreṣṭhaḥ svānām bhavati yaḥ evam veda atho pañca vīryam vai etat
chandaḥ yat virāj gāyatryau yat tri padā tena uṣṇihā gāyatryau yat asyāḥ ekādaśa
akṣarāṇi padāni tena triṣṭubh yat trayastriṃśat akṣarā tena anuṣṭubh na vai
ekena akṣareṇa chandāṃsi viyanti na dvābhyām yat virāj tat pañcamam sarveṣām
chandasām vīryam avarunddhe sarveṣām chandasām vīryam aśnute sarveṣām chandasām
sāyujyam sarūpa tām salokatām aśnute anna ādaḥ anna patiḥ bhavati aśnute prajayā
annādyam yaḥ evam vidvān kurute tasmāt virājau eva kartavye preddhaḥ agne imā u
agne iti ete ṛtam vāva dīkṣā satyam dīkṣā tasmāt dīkṣitena satyam eva vaditavyam
atho khalu āhuḥ kaḥ arhati manuṣyaḥ sarvam satyam vaditum satya saṃhitāḥ vai
devāḥ anṛta saṃhitāḥ manuṣyāḥ iti vicakṣaṇavatīm vācam vadet cakṣuḥ vai
vicakṣaṇam vi hi enena paśyati iti etat ha vai manuṣyeṣu satyam nihitam yat
cakṣuḥ tasmāt ācakṣāṇam āhuḥ adrāk iti sa yadi adarśam iti āha atha asya
śraddadhati yadi u vai svayam paśyati na bahūnām cana anyeṣām śraddadhāti tasmāt
vicakṣaṇavatīm eva vācam vadet satya uttarā ha eva asya vāc uditā bhavati
svargam vai etena lokam upa prayanti yat prāyaṇīyaḥ tat prāyaṇīyasya prāyaṇīya
tvam prāṇaḥ vai prāyaṇīyaḥ udānaḥ udayanīyaḥ samānaḥ hotā bhavati samānau hi
prāṇa udānau prāṇānām kﾱptyai prāṇānām pratiprajñātyai yajñaḥ vai devebhyaḥ
udakrāmat te devāḥ na kiṃcana aśaknuvan kartum na prājānan te abruvan aditim
tvayā imam yajñam prajānāma iti sā tathā iti abravīt sā vai vaḥ varam vṛṇai iti
vṛṇīṣva iti sā etam eva varam avṛṇīta mad prāyaṇāḥ yajñāḥ santu mad udayanāḥ iti
tathā iti tasmāt ādityaḥ caruḥ prāyaṇīyaḥ bhavati ādityaḥ udayanīyaḥ vara vṛtaḥ
hi asyāḥ atho etam varam avṛṇīta mayā eva prācīm diśam prajānātha agninā
dakṣiṇām somena pratīcīm savitrā udīcīm iti mayā eva prācīm diśam prajānātha
agninā dakṣiṇām somena pratīcīm savitrā udīcīm iti pathyām yajati yat pathyām
yajati tasmāt asau puras udeti paścā astam eti pathyām hi eṣaḥ anusaṃcarati
agnim yajati yat agnim yajati tasmāt dakṣiṇatas agre oṣadhayaḥ pacyamānāḥ āyanti
āgneyyaḥ hi oṣadhayaḥ somam yajati yat somam yajati tasmāt pratīcyaḥ api āpaḥ
bahvyaḥ syandante saumyāḥ hi āpaḥ savitāram yajati yat savitāram yajati tasmāt
uttaratas paścāt ayam bhūyiṣṭham pavamānaḥ pavate savitṛ prasūtaḥ hi eṣaḥ etat
pavate uttamām aditim yajati yat uttamām aditim yajati tasmāt asau imām vṛṣṭyā
abhyunatti abhijighrati pañca devatāḥ yajati pāṅktaḥ yajñaḥ sarvāḥ diśaḥ
kalpante kalpate yajñaḥ api tasyai janatāyai kalpate yatra evam vidvān hotā
bhavati yaḥ tejaḥ brahmavarcasam icchet prayāja āhutibhiḥ prāṅ saḥ iyāt tejaḥ
vai brahmavarcasam prācī diś tejasvī brahmavarcasī bhavati yaḥ evam vidvān prāṅ
eti yaḥ annādyam icchet prayāja āhutibhiḥ dakṣiṇā saḥ iyāt anna ādaḥ vai eṣaḥ
anna patiḥ yat agniḥ anna ādaḥ anna patiḥ bhavati aśnute prajayā annādyam yaḥ
evam vidvān dakṣiṇā eti yaḥ paśūn icchet prayāja āhutibhiḥ pratyaṅ saḥ iyāt
paśavaḥ vai ete yat āpaḥ paśumān bhavati yaḥ evam vidvān pratyaṅ eti yaḥ soma
pītham icchet prayāja āhutibhiḥ udaṅ saḥ iyāt uttarā ha vai somaḥ rājā pra soma
pītham āpnoti yaḥ evam vidvān udaṅ eti svargyā eva ūrdhvā diś sarvāsu dikṣu
rādhnoti samyañcaḥ vai ime lokāḥ samyañcaḥ asmai ime lokāḥ śriyai dīdyati yaḥ
evam veda pathyām yajati yat pathyām yajati vācam eva tat yajña mukhe saṃbharati
prāṇa apānau agnīṣomau prasavāya savitā pratiṣṭhityai aditiḥ pathyām eva yajati
yat pathyām eva yajati vācā eva tat yajñam panthām apinayati cakṣuṣī eva
agnīṣomau prasavāya savitā pratiṣṭhityai aditiḥ cakṣuṣā vai devāḥ yajñam
prājānan cakṣuṣā vai etat prajñāyate yat a prajñeyam tasmāt api mugdhaḥ caritvā
yadā eva anuṣṭhyā cakṣuṣā prajānāti atha prajānāti yat vai tat devāḥ yajñam
prājānan asyām vāva tat prājānan asyām samabharan asyai vai yajñaḥ tāyate asyai
kriyate asyai saṃbhriyate iyam hi aditiḥ tat uttamām aditim yajati yat uttamām
aditim yajati yajñasya prajñātyai svargasya lokasya anukhyātyai deva viśaḥ
kalpayitavyāḥ iti āhuḥ tāḥ kalpamānāḥ anu manuṣya viśaḥ kalpante iti sarvāḥ
viśaḥ kalpante kalpate yajñaḥ api tasyai janatāyai kalpate yatra evam vidvān
hotā bhavati svasti naḥ pathyāsu dhanvasu iti anvāha svasti apsu vṛjane svarvati
svasti naḥ putrakṛtheṣu yoniṣu svasti rāye marutaḥ dadhātana iti marutaḥ vai
devānām viśaḥ tāḥ eva etat yajña mukhe acīkﾱpat sarvaiḥ chandobhiḥ yajet iti
āhuḥ sarvaiḥ vai chandobhiḥ iṣṭvā devāḥ svargam lokam ajayan tathā eva etat
yajamānaḥ sarvaiḥ chandobhiḥ iṣṭvā svargam lokam jayati svasti naḥ pathyāsu
dhanvasu svastiḥ id hi prapathe śreṣṭhā iti pathyāyāḥ svasteḥ triṣṭubhau agne
naya su pathā rāye asmān ā devānām api panthām aganma iti agneḥ triṣṭubhau tvam
soma pra cikitaḥ manīṣā yā te dhāmāni divi yā pṛthivyām iti somasya triṣṭubhau ā
viśva devam sat patim yaḥ imā viśvā jātāni iti savituḥ gāyatryau su trāmāṇam
pṛthivīm dyām anehasam mahīm u su mātaram suvratānām iti aditeḥ jagatyau etāni
vāva sarvāṇi chandāṃsi gāyatram traiṣṭubham jāgatam anu anyāni etāni hi yajñe
pratamām iva kriyante etaiḥ ha vai asya chandobhiḥ yajataḥ sarvaiḥ chandobhiḥ
iṣṭam bhavati yaḥ evam veda tāḥ vai etāḥ pravatyaḥ netṛmatyaḥ pathimatyaḥ
svastimatyaḥ etasya haviṣaḥ yājyā anuvākyāḥ etābhiḥ vai iṣṭvā devāḥ svargam
lokam ajayan tathā eva etat yajamānaḥ etābhiḥ iṣṭvā svargam lokam jayati tāsu
padam asti svasti rāye marutaḥ dadhātana iti marutaḥ ha vai deva viśaḥ antarikṣa
bhājanāḥ tebhyaḥ ha yaḥ a nivedya svargam lokam eti īśvarāḥ ha enam ni vā
roddhoḥ vi vā mathitoḥ sa yat āha svasti rāye marutaḥ dadhātana iti tam
marudbhyaḥ deva viḍbhyaḥ yajamānam nivedayati na ha vai enam marutaḥ deva viśaḥ
svargam lokam yantam nirundhate na vimathnate svasti ha enam atyarjanti svargam
lokam abhi yaḥ evam veda virājau etasya haviṣaḥ sviṣṭakṛtaḥ saṃyājye syātām ye
trayastriṃśat akṣare syātām sa id agniḥ agnīṃr ati astu anyān sa id agniḥ yaḥ
vanuṣyataḥ nipāti iti ete virāḍbhyām vai iṣṭvā devāḥ svargam lokam ajayan tathā
eva etat yajamānaḥ virāḍbhyām iṣṭvā svargam lokam jayati te trayastriṃśat akṣare
bhavataḥ trayastriṃśat vai devāḥ aṣṭau vasavaḥ ekādaśa rudrāḥ dvādaśā ādityāḥ
prajāpatiḥ ca vaṣaṭkāraḥ ca tat prathame yajña mukhe devatāḥ akṣara bhājaḥ
karoti akṣareṇa akṣareṇa eva tat devatām prīṇāti deva pātreṇa eva tat devatāḥ
tarpayati prācyām vai diśi devāḥ somam rājānam akrīṇan tasmāt prācyām diśi
krīyate tam trayodaśāt māsāt akrīṇan tasmāt trayodaśaḥ māsaḥ na anuvidyate na
vai soma vikrayī anuvidyate pāpaḥ hi soma vikrayī tasya krītasya manuṣyān abhi
upāvartamānasya diśaḥ vīryāṇi indriyāṇi vyudasīdan tāni ekayā ṛcā avārurutsanta
tāni na aśaknuvan tāni dvābhyām tāni tisṛbhiḥ tāni catasṛbhiḥ tāni pañcabhiḥ
tāni ṣaḍbhiḥ tāni saptabhiḥ na eva avārundhata tāni aṣṭābhiḥ avārundhata
aṣṭābhiḥ āśnuvata yat aṣṭābhiḥ avārundhata aṣṭābhiḥ āśnuvata tat aṣṭānām aṣṭa
tvam aśnute yat yat kāmayate yaḥ evam veda tasmāt eteṣu karmasu aṣṭau aṣṭau
anūcyante indriyāṇām vīryāṇām avaruddhyai somāya krītāya prohyamāṇāya anubrūhi
iti āha adhvaryuḥ bhadrāt abhi śreyaḥ prehi iti anvāha ayam vāva lokaḥ bhadraḥ
tasmāt asau eva lokaḥ śreyān svargam eva tad lokam yajamānam gamayati bṛhaspatiḥ
puraetā te astu iti brahma vai bṛhaspatiḥ brahma eva asmai etat etat purogavam
akaḥ na vai brahmaṇvat riṣyati atha īm ava sya vare ā pṛthivyāḥ iti devayajanam
vai varam pṛthivyai devayajane eva enam tat avasāyayati āre śatrūn kṛṇuhi sarva
vīra iti dviṣantam eva asmai tat pāpmānam bhrātṛvyam apabādhate adharam pādayati
soma yāḥ te mayobhuvaḥ iti tṛcam saumyam gāyatram anvāha some rājani prohyamāṇe
svayā eva enam tat devatayā svena chandasā samardhayati sarve nandanti yaśasā
āgatena iti anvāha yaśaḥ vai somaḥ rājā sarvaḥ ha vai etena krīyamāṇena nandati
yaḥ ca yajñe lapsyamānaḥ bhavati yaḥ ca na sabhāsāhena sakhyā sakhāyaḥ iti eṣa
vai brāhmaṇānām sabhāsāhaḥ sakhā yat somaḥ rājā kilbiṣa spṛt iti eṣaḥ u eva
kilbiṣa spṛt yaḥ vai bhavati yaḥ śreṣṭha tām aśnute sa kilbiṣam bhavati tasmāt
āhuḥ mā anuvocaḥ mā pracārīḥ kilbiṣam nu mā yātayan iti pituṣaṇiḥ iti annam vai
pitu dakṣiṇā vai pitu tām enena sanoti anna sanim eva enam tat karoti aram hitaḥ
bhavati vājināya iti indriyam vai vīryam vājinam ājarasam ha asmai vājinam na
apacchidyate yaḥ evam veda āgan devaḥ iti anvāha āgataḥ hi sa tarhi bhavati
