atha yat srucaḥ saṃkṣālanam ninayati tena vayāṃsi prīṇāti tam vayāṃsi āhuḥ
śraddhā te mā vigāt sarvaiḥ kāmaiḥ tṛpya svargam lokam āpnuhi iti atha yāḥ etāḥ
srucaḥ nirṇijya udīcīḥ apaḥ utsiñcati tena ṛṣīn prīṇāti tam ṛṣayaḥ āhuḥ śraddhā
te mā vigāt sarvaiḥ kāmaiḥ tṛpya svargam lokam āpnuhi iti atha yat sthālī
saṃkṣālanam ninayati tena sarpa janān prīṇāti tam sarpa janāḥ āhuḥ śraddhā te mā
vigāt sarvaiḥ kāmaiḥ tṛpya svargam lokam āpnuhi iti atha yat paścāt vā purastāt
vā parikramya dakṣiṇatas agnīnām āste prajāpatiḥ eva tat bhūtvā āste kam aham
asmi kam mama iti kim pañcamam iti lohita kulyām ca ghṛta kulyām ca prabāhuk
syandamāne sā yā lohita kulyā abhūt tām kṛṣṇaḥ nagnaḥ puruṣaḥ musalī jugopa atha
yā ghṛta kulyā tasyai hiraṇmayāḥ puruṣāḥ hiraṇmayaiḥ camasaiḥ sarvān kāmān
udacante iti om iti ha uvāca ye vai asmin loke agnihotram juhvataḥ na evaṃvidaḥ
brāhmaṇasya lohitam utpīḍayanti sā sā lohita kulyā atha yaḥ enām kṛṣṇaḥ nagnaḥ
puruṣaḥ musalī ajūgupat krodhaḥ sa tasya u tat eva annam iti tasya kā niṣkṛtiḥ
iti yat eva etat srucā prāśnāti sā tasya niṣkṛtiḥ tayā tat atimucyate iti atha
yāḥ etām srucam nirṇijya udīcīḥ apaḥ utsiñcati sā sā ghṛta kulyā tasyai
hiraṇmayāḥ puruṣāḥ hiraṇmayaiḥ camasaiḥ sarvān kāmān udacante iti kim ṣaṣṭham
iti pañca nadīḥ puṣkariṇīḥ puṇḍarīkiṇīḥ madhu udakāḥ syandamānāḥ tāsu nṛtta
gītam vīṇā ghoṣaḥ apsarasām gaṇāḥ surabhiḥ gandhaḥ mahān ghoṣaḥ abhūt iti om iti
ha uvāca mama eva ete lokāḥ abhūvan iti te kena abhijayyāḥ iti etena eva pañca
gṛhītena pañca unnītena iti sa ha uvāca na vai kila anyatra agnihotrāt loka
jityāḥ avakāśaḥ asti adya eva me agnyādheyasya upavasathaḥ iti tasya ha tathā
cakruḥ yaḥ evam vidvān agnihotram juhoti na enam amuṣmin loke vanaspatayaḥ
puruṣa rūpam kṛtvā pratyadanti na paśavaḥ na vrīhi yavāḥ na asya iṣṭāpūrte
śraddhām ca aśraddhām ca gacchataḥ apahate lohita kulyām avarunddhe ghṛta kulyām
atha etām anustaraṇīm ānayanti tām prokṣya tris apasalī paryāṇāyya kūṭena hanyāt
tat āhuḥ yat etasya dīrgha sattriṇaḥ agnihotram juhvataḥ agnihotram duhyamānam
amedhyam āpadyeta kim tatra karma kā prāyaścittiḥ iti tat u ha eke hotavyam eva
manyante na vai devāḥ kasmāccana bībhatsante iti vadantaḥ tat u tathā na vidyāt
puruṣaḥ nu eva bībhatseyāt bībhatsate bībhatsante id u devāḥ ittham eva kuryāt
gārhapatyasya eva uṣṇam bhasma nirūhya tasmin enat tūṣṇīm ninayet tat na hutam
na a hutam adbhiḥ anuninayet adbhiḥ eva enat āpnoti atha yat anyat vindet tena
juhuyāt atha u khalu āhuḥ yat dugdham amedhyam āpadyeta kim tatra karma kā
prāyaścittiḥ iti yeṣu eva aṅgāreṣu adhiśrayiṣyan syāt tān eva pratyūhya teṣu eva
enat tūṣṇīm ninayet tat na hutam na a hutam adbhiḥ anuninayet adbhiḥ eva enat
āpnoti atha yat anyat vindet tena juhuyāt atha u khalu āhuḥ yat adhiśritam
amedhyam āpadyeta kim tatra karma kā prāyaścittiḥ iti yeṣu eva aṅgāreṣu
adhiśritam syāt tān eva pratyūhya teṣu eva enat tūṣṇīm ninayet tat na hutam na a
hutam yat aha enat teṣu ninayati tena hutam yat u enān tena u eva anugamayati
tena u a hutam adbhiḥ anuninayet adbhiḥ eva enat āpnoti atha yat anyat vindet
tena juhuyāt atha u khalu āhuḥ yat prāc uddrutam amedhyam āpadyeta kim tatra
karma kā prāyaścittiḥ iti tat u ha eke hotavyam eva manyante pretam etat na
etasya a homaḥ kalpate iti vadantaḥ atha ha eke adbhiḥ abhyāsicya parāsiñcanti
tat u tathā na kuryāt yaḥ ha tatra brūyāt parā nvai ayam idam agnihotram asiñcat
parāsekṣyate ayam yajamānaḥ iti tathā ha eva syāt ittham eva kuryāt āhavanīye
eva samidham abhyādhāya āhavanīyasya eva uṣṇam bhasma nirūhya tasmin enat tūṣṇīm
ninayet tat na hutam na a hutam adbhiḥ anuninayet adbhiḥ eva enat āpnoti atha
yat anyat vindet tena juhuyāt atha u khalu āhuḥ yat avavarṣet kim tatra karma kā
prāyaścittiḥ iti sa vidyāt upariṣṭāt mā śukram āgāt prajātiḥ me bhūyasī abhūt
śreyān bhaviṣyāmi iti tathā ha eva syāt atha u khalu āhuḥ yat pūrvasyām āhutau
hutāyām aṅgārāḥ anugaccheyuḥ kva uttarām juhuyāt iti yaḥ eva tatra śakalaḥ
antikaḥ syāt tam adhyasya juhuyāt dārau dārau hi agniḥ sa yadi tasyām na tiṣṭhet
hiraṇyam abhijuhuyāt tat agneḥ vai etat retaḥ yat hiraṇyam yaḥ u vai pitā sa
putraḥ tasmāt hiraṇyam abhijuhuyāt atha u khalu āhuḥ yat adhiśrite yajamānaḥ
mriyeta kim tatra karma kā prāyaścittiḥ iti paryādhāya eva enat viṣyandayet etat
eva atra karma atha u ha khalu eṣā eva sarveṣām haviryajñānām prāyaścittiḥ atha
u khalu āhuḥ yat prāci uddrute yajamānaḥ mriyeta kim tatra karma kā prāyaścittiḥ
iti yat eva adaḥ catur gṛhītam ādiṣṭam syāt tatra eva enat abhyunnayet etat eva
atra karma atha u khalu āhuḥ yat pūrvasyām āhutau hutāyām yajamānaḥ mriyeta kim
tatra karma kā prāyaścittiḥ iti tat u ha eke hotavyam eva manyante kṛtsnam vai
etasya agnihotram hutam bhavati yasya pūrvā hutā āhutiḥ bhavati iti vadantaḥ tat
u tathā na vidyāt na vai pretasya agnihotram juhoti yat eva adaḥ catur gṛhītam
ādiṣṭam syāt tatra eva enat abhyunnayet etat eva atra karma tat āhuḥ etasya
dīrgha sattriṇaḥ agnihotram juhvataḥ agnihotrī duhyamānā upaviśet kim tatra
karma kā prāyaścittiḥ iti tām u ha eke yajuṣā utthāpayanti avṛttim vai eṣā
yajamānasya pāpmānam pratidṛśya upaviśati yasya agnihotrī duhyamānā upaviśati
tām utthāpayanti ud asthāt devī aditiḥ iti iyam vai devī aditiḥ imām eva asmai
tat utthāpayanti āyuḥ yajña patau adhāt iti āyuḥ eva asmin tat dadhati indrāya
kṛṇvatī bhāgam iti indriyam eva asmin tat dadhati mitrāya varuṇāya ca iti prāṇa
apānau nvai mitrāvaruṇau prāṇa apānau eva asmin tat dadhati tām tasyām eva
āhutau hutāyām brāhmaṇāya dadati yam saṃvatsaram an abhyāgamiṣyantaḥ bhavanti
avṛttim asmin pāpmānam niveśayāmaḥ iti vadantaḥ tat u ha uvāca vājasaneyaḥ a
śraddadhānebhyaḥ ha ebhyaḥ gauḥ apakrāmati avṛttyā hi tam vidhyanti ittham eva
kuryāt daṇḍam eva labdhvā tena enām vipiṣya utthāpayet tat yathā vai adaḥ
dhāvayataḥ aśvataraḥ gadāyate yuktaḥ vā balīvardaḥ upaviśati tena daṇḍa
prajitena tottra prajitena yam adhvānam kāmayate tam samaśnute evam eva etayā
daṇḍa prajitayā tottra prajitayā yam svargam lokam kāmayate tam samaśnute tām
ātman eva kurvīta ātman eva tat śriyam dhatte iti yat agnayaḥ anugaccheyuḥ kim
tatra karma kā prāyaścittiḥ iti tam u ha eke ulmukāt eva nirmanthanti vadantaḥ
tat u tathā na vidyāt ulmukam hi eva tatas ādāya caret ulmukasya vā avavraścam
ittham eva kuryāt ulmukāt eva apacchidya araṇyoḥ abhivimanthet upa aha tam kāmam
āpnoti yaḥ ulmuka mathyaḥ upa u tam yaḥ araṇyoḥ atha u khalu āhuḥ yat āhavanīyaḥ
uddhṛtaḥ anugacchet kim tatra karma kā prāyaścittiḥ iti an anugataḥ vai eṣa
tāvat bhavati yāvat gārhapatyaḥ na anugacchati sa yadi api bahu iva kṛtvas
anugacchet punar punar eva enam uddharet etat eva atra karma atha u khalu āhuḥ
yat āhavanīye uddhṛte gārhapatyaḥ anugacchet kim tatra karma kā prāyaścittiḥ iti
tam u ha eke tatas eva prāñcam uddharanti tat u tathā na kuryāt yaḥ ha tatra
brūyāt prācaḥ nvai ayam yajamānasya prāṇān prāvṛkṣat mariṣyati ayam yajamānaḥ
iti tathā ha eva syāt tam u ha eke tatas eva pratyañcam āharanti prāṇaḥ vai
gārhapatyaḥ apānaḥ āhavanīyaḥ saṃvidānau vai imau prāṇa apānau annam attaḥ iti
vadantaḥ prāṇaḥ vai gārhapatyaḥ apānaḥ āhavanīyaḥ saṃvidānau vai imau prāṇa
apānau annam attaḥ iti vadantaḥ atha u gṛhaḥ vai gārhapatyaḥ pratiṣṭhā u vai
gṛhāḥ sa yaḥ enam tatra brūyāt pra nvai ayam asyai pratiṣṭhāyai acyoṣṭa
mariṣyati ayam yajamānaḥ iti tathā ha eva syāt tam u ha eke gārhapatye eva
mathitvā upasamādadhati tat u tathā na kuryāt yaḥ ha tatra brūyāt agnau adhi
agnim ajījanat kṣipre asya dviṣan bhrātṛvyaḥ janiṣyate iti tathā ha eva syāt tam
u ha eke anugamayya manthanti tat u tathā na kuryāt yaḥ ha tatra brūyāt api yat
pariśiṣṭam abhūt tat ajījasat na asya dāyādaḥ cana pariśekṣyate iti tathā ha eva
syāt ittham eva kuryāt araṇyoḥ eva samārohayeta ayam te yoniḥ ṛtviyaḥ yatas
jātaḥ arocathāḥ tam jānan agne āroha atha naḥ vardhaya rayim atha naḥ vardhaya
giraḥ iti vā saḥ udavasāya juhvat vaset nava avasāne ha asya ubhayatas rātram
hutam bhavati na u kāṃcana paricakṣām kurute sa prātar bhasma uddhṛtya śakṛt
piṇḍena parilipya yathāyatham agnīn ādadhīta etat eva atra karma atha u khalu
āhuḥ yat āhavanīyam an uddhṛtam abhi astam iyāt kim tatra karma kā prāyaścittiḥ
iti etasmāt ha vai viśve devāḥ apakrāmanti yasya āhavanīyam an uddhṛtam abhi
astam eti sa darbheṇa suvarṇam hiraṇyam prabadhya paścāt haret tat etasya rūpam
kriyate yaḥ eṣa tapati ahnaḥ vai etat rūpam tat ahnaḥ rūpam kriyate atha idhmam
ādīpya prāñcam hareyuḥ tam upasamādhāya catur gṛhītam ājyam gṛhītvā viśvebhyaḥ
devebhyaḥ svāhā iti juhuyāt yathā vai adaḥ āvasatha vāsinam kruddham yantam ukṣa
vehatā vā anumantrayeta anyena vā priyeṇa dhāmnā evam eva tat viśvān devān
anumantrayate te ha asmai sarve eva a kruddhāḥ bhavanti atha u khalu āhuḥ yat
āhavanīyam an uddhṛtam yat agnayaḥ saṃsṛjyeran kim tatra karma kā prāyaścittiḥ
iti sa yadi parastāt anyaḥ abhidahan eyāt sa vidyāt parastāt mā śukram āgāt
prajātiḥ me bhūyasī abhūt śreyān bhaviṣyāmi iti tathā ha eva syāt yadi tu asya
hṛdayam vilikhet agnaye vivicaye iṣṭim nirvapet etāḥ eva pañcadaśa sāmidhenīḥ
vārtraghnau ājyabhāgau virājau saṃyājye atha ete yājyā puronuvākye vi te viṣvak
vāta jūtāsaḥ agne bhāmāsaḥ śuce śucayaḥ caranti tuvi mrakṣāsaḥ divyāḥ navagvāḥ
vanā vananti dhṛṣatā rujantaḥ iti atha yājyā tvām agne mānuṣīḥ īḍate viśaḥ hotrā
vidam vivicim ratna dhātamam guhā santam subhaga viśva darśatam su yajam
ghṛtaśriyam iti atha u ha enayā pāpmanā vyāvṛtsyamānaḥ yajeta kṣipre ha eva
pāpmanaḥ vyāvartate yadi tu ayam itas abhidahan eyāt agnaye saṃvargāya iṣṭim
nirvapet etāḥ eva pañcadaśa sāmidhenīḥ vārtraghnau ājyabhāgau virājau saṃyājye
atha ete yājyā puronuvākye agninā eva asya pavamānena śarīram prāṇena saṃdadhāti
deva asurāḥ aspardhanta te devāḥ vajram kṣura pavim asṛjanta puruṣam eva tam
asurān abhyavṛñjan saḥ asurān apopya devān abhyāvartata tasmāt devāḥ abibhayuḥ
tam abhipadya tredhā samaśṛṇan sa tredhā saṃśīrṇaḥ ud eva atiṣṭhat tam ārabhya
paryaikṣanta tasmin devatāḥ chandāṃsi puruṣe praviṣṭāḥ apaśyan te abruvan
devatāḥ vai chandāṃsi imā asmin puruṣe praviṣṭāḥ asmin vai ayam loke puṇyam
jīvitvā iṣṭāpūrtena tapasā sukṛtena asmān anvāgamiṣyati iti te vai tathā
karavāma iti abruvan yathā naḥ na anvāgacchāt iti tasmai vai pāpmānam
anvavadadhāma iti tasmai etam pāpmānam anvavādadhuḥ svapnam tandrīm manyum
aśanayām akṣa kāmyām strī kāmyām iti ete ha vai pāpmānaḥ puruṣam asmin loke
sacante yaḥ etat agne tīrtvā asmin loke sādhu cikīrṣāt tam tvam asmin loke
dhīpsatāt iti agnim asmin loke adadhuḥ vāyum antarikṣe ādityam divi ugradevaḥ ha
sma āha rājaniḥ na aham manuṣyāya arātīyāmi yān asmai trīn devānām śreṣṭhān
arātīyataḥ aśṛṇom arātītam arātītam hi eva tasmai yasmai etāḥ devatāḥ arātīyanti
iti atha u ha asmai etāḥ devatāḥ na arātīyanti yaḥ evam veda atha u ha tam eva
dhīpsanti yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam dhīpsati iti te devāḥ abruvan yāḥ eva imāḥ devatāḥ
chandāṃsi puruṣe praviṣṭāḥ etābhiḥ eva asurān dhūrvāma eva iti atha jaghanena
gārhapatyam tiṣṭhan asidam vā aśva parśum vā ādatte devasya tvā savituḥ prasave
aśvinoḥ bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām ādade iti ādāya abhimantrayate yajñasya
ghoṣat asi iti gārhapatye pratitapati pratyuṣṭam rakṣaḥ pratyuṣṭāḥ arātayaḥ iti
tris atha āhavanīyam abhipraiti pra iyam agāt dhiṣaṇā barhiḥ accha manunā kṛtā
svadhayā vitaṣṭā te āvahanti kavayaḥ purastāt devebhyaḥ juṣṭam iti iha barhiḥ
āsade iti vedim pratyavekṣate atha tām diśam eti yatra barhiḥ vetsyan manyate
darbha stambam parigṛhṇāti yāvantam alam prastarāya manyate devānām pariṣūtam
asi iti atha enam ūrdhvam unmārṣṭi varṣa vṛddham asi iti asidena upayacchati
deva barhiḥ mā tvā anvak mā tiryak parva te rādhyāsam iti ācchinatti ācchettā te
mā riṣam iti ācchedanāni abhimṛśati deva barhiḥ śata valśam viroha iti sahasra
valśāḥ vi vayam ruhema iti ātmānam pratyabhimṛśate sarvaśas eva enam stambam
lunoti kṛtvā prastaram nidadhāti pṛthivyāḥ saṃpṛcaḥ pāhi iti tūṣṇīm atas ūrdhvam
ayujaḥ muṣṭīn lunoti trīn vā pañca vā sapta vā nava vā ekādaśa vā yāvataḥ vā
alam manyate atha tris anvāhitam śulbam kṛtvā apasalaiḥ āveṣṭayati adityai rāsnā
asi iti tat udīcīna agram nidhāya tasmin prastaram abhisaṃbharati su saṃbhṛtā
tvā saṃbharāmi iti saṃnahyati indrāṇyai saṃnahanam iti granthim karoti pūṣā te
granthim grathnātu iti sa te mā asthāt iti paścāt prāñcam upagūhati atha enat
udyacchate indrasya tvā bāhubhyām udyacche iti śīrṣan adhinidhatte bṛhaspateḥ
mūrdhnā harāmi iti aiti uru antarikṣam anvihi iti etya uttareṇa gārhapatyam
anadhas sādayati devaṃgamam asi iti tat upari iva nidadhāti yatra guptam manyate
tūṣṇīm paribhojanīyāni lunoti sakṛt ācchinnam pitṛbhyaḥ ācchinatti atha tathā
eva tris anvāhitam śulbam kṛtvā ekaviṃśati dārum idhmam saṃnahyati yat kṛṣṇaḥ
rūpam kṛtvā prāviśaḥ tvam vanaspatīn tatas tvām ekaviṃśatidhā saṃbharāmi su
saṃbhṛtaḥ iti vedam karoti vatsajñum paśu kāmasya mūta kāryam annādya kāmasya
trivṛtam tejaskāmasya ūrdhva agram svarga kāmasya vedim karoti prāk uttarāt
parigrāhāt atha aparāhṇe piṇḍapitṛyajñena carati atha etasyai śākhāyai parṇāni
pracchidya agreṇa gārhapatyam nivapati atha enām adhastāt parivāsya jaghanena
gārhapatyam sthavimat upaveṣāya nidadhāti atha asyāḥ prādeśa mātram pramāya
darbha nāḍīḥ praveṣṭya tat trivṛt śākhāpavitram karoti trivṛt palāśe darbhaḥ
iyān prādeśa saṃmitaḥ yajñe pavitram potṛtamam payaḥ havyam karotu me iti atha
sāyam hute agnihotre uttareṇa gārhapatyam tṛṇāni saṃstīrya teṣu catuṣṭayam
saṃsādayati dohanam pavitram sāṃnāyya tapanyau sthālyau iti atha enāni adbhiḥ
prokṣati śundhadhvam daivyāya karmaṇe deva yajyāyai iti tris atha jaghanena
gārhapatyam upaviśya upaveṣeṇa udīcaḥ aṅgārān nirūhati mātariśvanaḥ gharmaḥ asi
iti teṣu sāṃnāyya tapanīm adhiśrayati dyauḥ asi pṛthivī asi viśva dhāyāḥ asi
parameṇa dhāmnā dṛṃhasva mā hvār iti tasyām prācīna agram śākhāpavitram
nidadhāti vasūnām pavitram asi śata dhāram vasūnām pavitram asi sahasra dhāram
iti tat anvārabhya vācaṃyamaḥ āste atha gāḥ āyatīḥ pratīkṣate etāḥ ācaranti
madhumat duhānāḥ prajāvatīḥ yaśasaḥ viśva rūpāḥ bahvīḥ bhavantīḥ upajāyamānāḥ
iha vaḥ indraḥ ramayatu gāvaḥ iti mahendraḥ iti vā yadi mahendra yājī bhavati
atha āha upasṛṣṭām me prabrūtāt iti upasṛṣṭām prāhuḥ dohyamānām anumantrayate
hutaḥ stokaḥ hutaḥ drapsaḥ agnaye bṛhate nākāya svāhā dyāvāpṛthivībhyām iti atha
purastāt pratyak ānayantam pṛcchati kām adhukṣaḥ iti amūm iti itaraḥ pratyāha
tām anumantrayate sā viśva āyuḥ iti dvitīyam ānayantam pṛcchati kām adhukṣaḥ iti
amūm iti eva itaraḥ pratyāha tām anumantrayate sā viśva vyacāḥ iti tṛtīyam
ānayantam pṛcchati kām adhukṣaḥ iti amūm iti eva itaraḥ pratyāha tām
anumantrayate sā viśva karmā iti tisṛṣu dugdhāsu vācam visṛjate bahu dugdhi
indrāya devebhyaḥ havyam āpyāyatām punar vatsebhyaḥ manuṣyebhyaḥ punar dohāya
kalpatām iti mahendrāya iti vā yadi mahendra yājī bhavati visṛṣṭa vāc an
anvārabhya tūṣṇīm uttarāḥ dohayitvā dohane apaḥ ānīya saṃkṣālanam ānayati
saṃpṛcyadhvam ṛtāvarīḥ ūrmiṇīḥ madhumattamāḥ mandrāḥ dhanasya sātaye iti atha
enat taptvā udak udvāsya śītīkṛtvā tiras pavitram dadhnā ātanakti somena tvā
tanacmi indrāya dadhi iti mahendrāya iti vā yadi mahendra yājī bhavati yāvatā
mūrchayiṣyat manyate tāvat ānayati agnihotra uccheṣaṇam abhyātanakti yajñasya
saṃtatiḥ asi yajñasya tvā saṃtatim anusaṃtanomi iti atha enat udanvatā kaṃsena
vā camasena vā apidadhāti a dastam asi viṣṇave tvā yajñāya apidadhāmi aham
adbhiḥ ariktena pātreṇa yāḥ pūtāḥ pariśerate iti tat upari iva nidadhāti yatra
guptam manyate viṣṇo havyam rakṣasva iti etasmin kāle darbhaiḥ prātardohāya
vatsān apākaroti tūṣṇīm atha prātar hute agnihotre hastau saṃmṛśate karmaṇe vām
devebhyaḥ śakeyam iti naktam paristīrṇāḥ eva ete agnayaḥ bhavanti yadi u vai a
paristīrṇāḥ bhavanti āhavanīyam eva agre purastāt paristṛṇāti atha dakṣiṇatas
atha paścāt atha uttaratas evam eva anvāhāryapacanam paristṛṇāti evam
gārhapatyam atha agreṇa gārhapatyam tṛṇāni saṃstīrya teṣu dvandvam nyañci
yajñāyudhāni saṃsādayati sphyam ca kapālāni ca agnihotrahavaṇīm ca śūrpam ca
kṛṣṇājinam ca śamyām ca ulūkhalam ca musalam ca dṛṣadam ca upalām ca juhūm ca
upabhṛtam ca sruvam ca dhruvām ca prāśitraharaṇam ca iḍāpātram ca mekṣaṇam ca
piṣṭodvapanīm ca praṇītā praṇayanam ca ājya sthālīm ca vedam ca dāru pātrīm ca
yoktram ca veda parivāsanam ca dhṛṣṭim ca idhmapravraścanam ca anvāhārya sthālīm
ca madantīm ca yāni ca anyāni pātrāṇi tāni evam eva dvandvam saṃsādya brahmāṇam
dakṣiṇatas upaveśya pṛṣṭhyām stṛṇāti saṃtatām gārhapatyāt āhavanīyāt yajñasya
saṃtatiḥ asi yajñasya tvā saṃtatyai stṛṇāmi saṃtatyai tvā yajñasya stṛṇāmi iti
atha barhiṣaḥ pavitre kurute prādeśa mātre same a praticchinna agre a nakha
chinne imau prāṇa apānau yajñasya aṅgāni sarvaśas āpyāyayantau saṃcaratām
pavitre havya śodhane iti atha ene adbhiḥ anumārṣṭi pavitre sthaḥ vaiṣṇavī sthaḥ
yajñiye sthaḥ vāyu pūte sthaḥ viṣṇoḥ manasā pūte sthaḥ yajñasya pavane stha iti
atha uttareṇa gārhapatyam upaviśya kaṃsam vā camasam vā praṇītā praṇayanam
yācati tasmin tiras pavitram apaḥ ānayan āha brahman apaḥ praṇeṣyāmi yajamāna
vācam yaccha iti prasūtaḥ samam prāṇaiḥ dhārayamāṇaḥ a viṣiñcan hṛtvā uttareṇa
āhavanīyam darbheṣu sādayitvā darbhaiḥ pracchādya pavitram ādāya pradakṣiṇam
āvṛtya pratyaṅ ādrutya ādatte dakṣiṇena agnihotrahavaṇīm savyena śūrpam veṣāya
tvā iti gārhapatye pratitapati pratyuṣṭam rakṣaḥ pratyuṣṭāḥ arātayaḥ iti tris
atha jaghanena gārhapatyam agniṣṭham anaḥ bhavati tasya uttarām dhuram
abhimṛśati dhūḥ asi dhūrva tam yaḥ asmān dhūrvati tam dhūrva yam vayam dhūrvāmaḥ
iti anaḥ abhimantrayate tvam devānām asi sasnitamam papritamam juṣṭatamam
vahnitamam devahūtamam ahrutam asi havirdhānam dṛṃhasva mā hvār iti atha viṣṇoḥ
kramaḥ asi iti dakṣiṇam akṣa pālim kramitvā abhyāruhya prauge śūrpam nidadhāti
śūrpe srucam sruci pavitre atha puroḍāśīyān prekṣate mitrasya tvā cakṣuṣā prekṣe
mā bheḥ mā saṃvikthāḥ mā tvā hiṃsiṣam iti uru vātāya iti tṛṇam vā kiṃśāru vā
nirasyati atha apaḥ upaspṛśya daśahotāram vyākhyāya haviḥ nirvapsyāmi iti
yajamānam āmantrya pavitravatyā agnihotrahavaṇyā nirvapati yadi u vai na anaḥ
bhavati jaghanena gārhapatyam sphyam nidadhāti sphya upari pātrīm pātryām
puroḍāśīyān āvapati atha pūrva ardham pātryāḥ abhimṛśati dhūḥ asi dhūrva tam yaḥ
asmān dhūrvati tam dhūrva yam vayam dhūrvāmaḥ tvam devānām asi sasnitamam
papritamam juṣṭatamam vahnitamam devahūtamam ahrutam asi havirdhānam dṛṃhasva mā
hvār iti atha puroḍāśīyān prekṣate mitrasya tvā cakṣuṣā prekṣe mā bheḥ mā
saṃvikthāḥ mā tvā hiṃsiṣam iti uru vātāya iti tṛṇam vā kiṃśāru vā nirasyati atha
apaḥ upaspṛśya daśahotāram vyākhyāya haviḥ nirvapsyāmi iti yajamānam āmantrya
pavitravatyā agnihotrahavaṇyā nirvapati om nirvapa iti yajamānaḥ anujānāti atha
nirvapati devasya tvā savituḥ prasave aśvinoḥ bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām agnaye
juṣṭam nirvapāmi iti tris etena yajuṣā sakṛt tūṣṇīm etām eva pratipadam kṛtvā
agnīṣomābhyām iti paurṇamāsyām indrāya vaimṛdhāya iti ca indra agnibhyām iti
amāvāsyāyām a saṃnayataḥ indrāya iti saṃnayataḥ mahendrāya iti vā yadi mahendra
yājī bhavati atha niruptān abhimṛśati idam devānām iti idam u naḥ saha iti ye
atiśiṣṭāḥ bhavanti sphātyai tvā na arātyai iti atha āhavanīyam īkṣate suvar
abhivikhyeṣam vaiśvānaram jyotiḥ iti atha gṛhān anvīkṣate dṛṃhantām duryāḥ
dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ iti atha enān ādāya upottiṣṭhati aiti uru antarikṣam anvihi iti
etya uttareṇa gārhapatyam upasādayati adityāḥ tvā upasthe sādayāmi iti
gārhapatyam abhimantrayate agne havyam rakṣasva iti atha etasyām eva sruci tiras
pavitram apaḥ ānīya udīcīna agrābhyām pavitrābhyām tris utpunāti devaḥ vaḥ
savitā utpunātu acchidreṇa pavitreṇa vasoḥ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ iti pacchas atha
enāḥ unmahayan upottiṣṭhati āpaḥ devīḥ agrepuvaḥ agreguvaḥ agre imam yajñam
nayatā agre yajña patim dhatta yuṣmān indraḥ avṛṇīta vṛtratūrye yūyam indram
avṛṇīdhvam vṛtratūrye iti adbhiḥ eva apaḥ prokṣati prokṣitāḥ stha prokṣitāḥ stha
iti tris atha puroḍāśīyān prokṣati devasya tvā savituḥ prasave aśvinoḥ bāhubhyām
pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām agnaye vaḥ juṣṭam prokṣāmi agnīṣomābhyām amuṣmai amuṣmai iti
yathādevatam tris uttānāni pātrāṇi kṛtvā prokṣati śundhadhvam daivyāya karmaṇe
deva yajyāyai iti tris atiśiṣṭāḥ prokṣaṇīḥ nidhāya kṛṣṇājinam avadhūnoti ūrdhva
grīvam udaṅ āvṛtya avadhūtam rakṣaḥ avadhūtāḥ arātayaḥ iti tris atha enat
purastāt pratīcīna grīvam uttara loma upastṛṇāti adityāḥ tvac asi prati tvā
pṛthivī vettu iti tasmin ulūkhalam adhyūhati adhiṣavaṇam asi vānaspatyam prati
tvā adityāḥ tvac vettu iti tasmin puroḍāśīyān āvapati agneḥ tanūḥ asi vācaḥ
visarjanam deva vītaye tvā gṛhṇāmi iti musalam avadadhāti adriḥ asi vānaspatyaḥ
saḥ idam devebhyaḥ havyam suśami śamiṣva iti atha haviṣkṛtam āhvayati haviṣkṛt
ehi haviṣkṛt ehi iti tris uccais samāhantavai iti ca atha dṛṣad upale vṛṣāraveṇa
uccais samāhanti iṣam āvada ūrjam āvada dyumat vadata vayam saṃghātam jeṣma iti
avahatya uttuṣān kṛtvā uttaratas śūrpam upayacchati varṣa vṛddham asi iti tasmin
puroḍāśīyān udvapati prati tvā varṣa vṛddham vettu iti atha udaṅ paryāvṛtya
parāpunāti parāpūtam rakṣaḥ parāpūtāḥ arātayaḥ iti savyena tuṣān upahatya imām
diśam nirasyati rakṣasām bhāgaḥ asi iti atha apaḥ upaspṛśya vivinakti vāyuḥ vaḥ
vivinaktu iti pātryām taṇḍulān praskandayati devaḥ vaḥ savitā hiraṇya pāṇiḥ
pratigṛhṇātu iti avahantryai prayacchan āha triṣphalīkartavai triṣphalīkṛtān me
prabrūtāt iti triṣphalīkṛtān prāhuḥ triṣphalīkriyamāṇānām yaḥ nyaṅgaḥ avaśiṣyate
rakṣasām bhāgadheyam āpaḥ tat pravahatāt itas iti taṇḍula prakṣālanam antarvedi
ninayati utkara deśe vā etasmin kāle prātardoham dhenūḥ dohayati udak agreṇa
pavitreṇa na atra ātanakti atha etāni kapālāni prakṣālitāni jaghanena
gārhapatyam upasādayati aṣṭau dakṣiṇatas ekādaśa uttaratas atha jaghanena
gārhapatyam upaviśya dhṛṣṭim ādatte dhṛṣṭiḥ asi brahma yaccha iti gārhapatyam
abhimantrayate apa agne agnim āma adam jahi iti niḥ kravya adam sedha iti
dakṣiṇā aṅgāram nirasyati atha anyam āvartayati ā deva yajam vaha iti tam
dakṣiṇeṣām kapālānām madhyamena abhyupadadhāti dhruvam asi pṛthivīm dṛṃha āyuḥ
dṛṃha prajām dṛṃha sajātān asmai yajamānāya paryūha iti aṅgāram adhivartayati
nirdagdham rakṣaḥ nirdagdhāḥ arātayaḥ iti atha pūrva ardhyam upadadhāti dhartram
asi antarikṣam dṛṃha prāṇam dṛṃha apānam dṛṃha sajātān asmai yajamānāya paryūha
iti atha apara ardhyam upadadhāti dharuṇam asi divam dṛṃha cakṣuḥ dṛṃha śrotram
dṛṃha sajātān asmai yajamānāya paryūha iti atha dakṣiṇa ardhyam upadadhāti
dharma asi diśaḥ dṛṃha yonim dṛṃha prajām dṛṃha sajātān asmai yajamānāya paryūha
iti atha pūrvam upadhim upadadhāti citaḥ stha prajām asmai rayim asmai sajātān
asmai yajamānāya paryūha iti atha aparam evam eva dve uttaratas saṃspṛṣṭe
upadadhāti citaḥ stha prajām asmai rayim asmai sajātān asmai yajamānāya paryūha
iti atha enāni aṅgāraiḥ adhivāsayati bhṛgūṇām aṅgirasām tapasā tapyadhvam iti
atha enāni yogena yunakti yāni gharme kapālāni upacinvanti vedhasaḥ pūṣṇaḥ tāni
api vrate indra vāyū yuṅktām iti evam eva uttarāṇi kapālāni upadadhāti
abhīndhate kapālāni upendhate carusthālīm adhyasyanti śrapaṇāni tapanti piṣṭa
saṃyavanīyāḥ āpaḥ atha uttareṇa gārhapatyam upaviśya vācaṃyamaḥ tiras pavitram
pātryām kṛṣṇājināt piṣṭāni saṃvapati devasya tvā savituḥ prasave aśvinoḥ
bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām agnaye juṣṭam saṃvapāmi agnīṣomābhyām amuṣmai
amuṣmai iti yathādevatam atha parikarmiṇam āha āhara apaḥ ānaya iti āharati
praiṣa kāraḥ praṇītābhyaḥ sruveṇa upahatya vedena upayamya pāṇim vā antardhāya
evam madantībhyaḥ tāḥ ubhayīḥ ānīyamānāḥ pratimantrayate sam āpaḥ adbhiḥ agmata
sam oṣadhayaḥ rasena sam revatīḥ jagatībhiḥ madhumatīḥ madhumatībhiḥ sṛjyadhvam
iti atha anupariplāvayati adbhyaḥ pari prajātāḥ stha sam adbhiḥ pṛcyadhvam iti
saṃyauti janayatyai tvā saṃyaumi iti saṃyutya vyūhya abhimṛśati agnaye tvā
agnīṣomābhyām amuṣmai amuṣmai iti yathādevatam piṇḍam karoti makhasya śiraḥ asi
iti tam dakṣiṇeṣām kapālānām pratyūhya aṅgārān teṣu adhipṛṇakti gharmaḥ asi
viśva āyuḥ iti prathayati uru prathasva uru te yajñapatiḥ prathatām iti tam
tanvantam kūrma prakāram karoti sarvāṇi kapālāni abhiprathayati iti brāhmaṇam
atha tiras pavitram ājya sthālyām ājyam nirvapati mahīnām payaḥ asi oṣadhīnām
rasaḥ tasya te a kṣīyamāṇasya nirvapāmi deva yajyāyai iti atha uttaratas bhasma
miśrān aṅgārān nirūhya teṣu adhiśrayati evam eva uttaram puroḍāśam adhipṛṇakti
atha śṛtam atha dadhi atha pātryām apaḥ ānīya dakṣiṇasya puroḍāśasya tvacam
grāhayati tvacam gṛhṇīṣva tvacam gṛhṇīṣva iti tris atha uttarasya atha paryagni
karoti antaritam rakṣaḥ antaritāḥ arātayaḥ iti tris atha dakṣiṇam puroḍāśam
śrapayati devaḥ tvā savitā śrapayatu varṣiṣṭhe adhi nāke agniḥ te tanuvam mā ati
dhāk iti gārhapatyam abhimantrayate agne havyam rakṣasva iti evam eva uttaram
puroḍāśam śrapayati atha dakṣiṇam puroḍāśam bhasmanā abhivāsya vedena
abhivāsayati sam brahmaṇā pṛcyasva sam brahmaṇā pṛcyasva iti tris atha uttaram a
vidahantaḥ śrapayata iti vācam visṛjate atra etat pātrī saṃkṣālanam gārhapatyāt
aṅgāreṇa abhitapya hṛtvā antarvedi pratīcīnam tisṛṣu lekhāsu ninayati ekatāya
svāhā dvitāya svāhā tritāya svāhā iti atha vedam ādatte ayam vedaḥ pṛthivīm
anvavindat guhā satīm gahane gahvareṣu sa vindatu yajamānāya lokam acchidram
yajñam bhūri karmā karotu iti vedena vedim tris saṃmārṣṭi vedena vedim vividuḥ
pṛthivīm sā paprathe pṛthivī pārthivāni garbham bibharti bhuvaneṣu antar tatas
yajñaḥ jāyate viśvadāniḥ iti atha jaghanena vedyai tiṣṭhan sphyam ādatte devasya
tvā savituḥ prasave aśvinoḥ bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām ādade iti ādāya
abhimantrayate indrasya bāhuḥ asi dakṣiṇaḥ sahasra bhṛṣṭiḥ śata tejāḥ iti śata
tejāḥ iti atha enam barhiṣā saṃśyati vāyuḥ asi tigma tejāḥ śata bhṛṣṭiḥ asi
vānaspatyaḥ dviṣataḥ vadhaḥ iti atha antarvedi udīcīna agram barhiḥ nidadhāti
pṛthivyai varma asi varma yajamānāya bhava iti tasmin sphyena praharati pṛthivi
deva yajani oṣadhyāḥ te mūlam mā hiṃsiṣam iti apahataḥ araruḥ pṛthivyāḥ iti
ādatte vrajam gaccha gosthānam iti harati vedim pratyavekṣate varṣatu te dyauḥ
iti hṛtvā utkare nivapati badhāna deva savitar paramasyām parāvati śatena pāśaiḥ
yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ tam atas mā mauk iti dvitīyam praharati
pṛthivi deva yajani oṣadhyāḥ te mūlam mā hiṃsiṣam iti apahataḥ araruḥ pṛthivyai
deva yajanyai iti ādatte vrajam gaccha gosthānam iti harati vedim pratyavekṣate
varṣatu te dyauḥ iti hṛtvā utkare nivapati badhāna deva savitar paramasyām
parāvati śatena pāśaiḥ yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ tam atas mā mauk
iti tṛtīyam praharati pṛthivi deva yajani oṣadhyāḥ te mūlam mā hiṃsiṣam iti
apahataḥ araruḥ pṛthivyāḥ a deva yajanaḥ iti ādatte vrajam gaccha gosthānam iti
harati vedim pratyavekṣate varṣatu te dyauḥ iti hṛtvā utkare nivapati badhāna
deva savitar paramasyām parāvati śatena pāśaiḥ yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam ca vayam
dviṣmaḥ tam atas mā mauk araruḥ te divam mā skān iti atra anuvartayati tūṣṇīm
caturtham harati saha barhiṣā atha pūrvam parigrāham parigṛhṇāti vasavaḥ tvā
parigṛhṇantu gāyatreṇa chandasā iti dakṣiṇatas rudrāḥ tvā parigṛhṇantu
traiṣṭubhena chandasā iti paścāt ādityāḥ tvā parigṛhṇantu jāgatena chandasā iti
uttaratas atha karaṇam japati imām narāḥ kṛṇuta vedim etya vasumatīm rudravatīm
ādityavatīm divaḥ nābhau pṛthivyāḥ yathā ayam yajamānaḥ na riṣyet iti atha
prācīm sphyena vedim uddhanti devasya savituḥ save karma kṛṇvanti vedhasaḥ iti
atha āgnīdhram āha agnīdh itas tris hara iti tatas tris āgnīdhraḥ harati yat
āgnīdhraḥ tris harati atha saṃpraiṣam āha brahman uttaram parigrāham
parigrahīṣyāmi iti prasūtaḥ uttaram parigrāham parigṛhṇāti ṛtam asi iti
dakṣiṇatas ṛta sadanam asi iti paścāt ṛta śrīḥ asi iti uttaratas atha pratīcīm
sphyena vedim yoyupyate dhāḥ asi sva dhāḥ asi urvī ca asi vasvī ca asi purā
krūrasya visṛpaḥ virapśin udādāya pṛthivīm jīra dānuḥ yām airayan candramasi
svadhābhiḥ tām dhīrāsaḥ anudṛśya yajante iti atha antarvedi tiryañcam sphyam
stabdhvā saṃpraiṣam āha prokṣaṇīḥ āsādaya idhmābarhiḥ upasādaya sruvam ca srucaḥ
ca saṃmṛḍḍhi patnīm saṃnahya ājyena udehi iti āharanti etāḥ prokṣaṇīḥ abhipūrya
dakṣiṇena adhvaryuḥ tāḥ sphye upaninīya sphyasya vartman sādayati atha utkare
sphyam nihanti yaḥ mā hṛdā manasā yaḥ ca vācā yaḥ brahmaṇā karmaṇā dveṣṭi devāḥ
yaḥ śrutena hṛdayena iṣṇatā ca tasya indra vajreṇa śiraḥ chinadmi iti hastau
prakṣālya sphyam ca prakṣālayati upasādayanti etat idhmābarhiḥ dakṣiṇam idhmam
uttaram barhiḥ atha etāḥ srucaḥ samādatte dakṣiṇena sruvam juhū upabhṛtau
savyena dhruvām prāśitraharaṇam veda parivāsanāni iti gārhapatye pratitapati
pratyuṣṭam rakṣaḥ pratyuṣṭāḥ arātayaḥ agneḥ vaḥ tejiṣṭhena tejasā niṣṭapāmi iti
atha sruvam saṃmārṣṭi goṣṭham mā nirmṛkṣam vājinam tvā sapatna sāham saṃmārjmi
iti tris antarataḥ tris bāhyatas tris evam mūlaiḥ daṇḍam saṃmṛjya adbhiḥ
saṃsparśya pratitapya utprayacchati atha juhūm saṃmārṣṭi vācam prāṇam mā
nirmṛkṣam vājinīm tvā sapatna sāhīm saṃmārjmi iti tathā eva saṃmṛjya adbhiḥ
saṃsparśya pratitapya utprayacchati atha upabhṛtam saṃmārṣṭi cakṣuḥ śrotram mā
nirmṛkṣam vājinīm tvā sapatna sāhīm saṃmārjmi iti tathā eva saṃmṛjya adbhiḥ
saṃsparśya pratitapya utprayacchati atha dhruvām saṃmārṣṭi prajām yonim mā
nirmṛkṣam vājinīm tvā sapatna sāhīm saṃmārjmi iti tathā eva saṃmṛjya adbhiḥ
saṃsparśya pratitapya utprayacchati atha prāśitraharaṇam saṃmārṣṭi rūpam varṇam
paśubhyaḥ mā nirmṛkṣam vājinam tvā sapatna sāham saṃmārjmi iti tathā eva
saṃmṛjya adbhiḥ saṃsparśya pratitapya utprayacchati atha etāni sruc saṃmārjanāni
adbhiḥ saṃsparśya gārhapatye anupraharati divaḥ śilpam avatatam pṛthivyāḥ
kakudbhiḥ śritam tena vayam sahasra valśena sapatnam nāśayāmasi svāhā iti atha
agreṇa utkaram tṛṇāni saṃstīrya teṣu srucaḥ sādayitvā atha etām patnīm antareṇa
vedi utkarau prapādya jaghanena dakṣiṇena gārhapatyam udīcīm upaveśya yoktreṇa
saṃnahyati āśāsānā saumanasam prajām saubhāgyam tanūm agneḥ anuvratā bhūtvā
saṃnahye sukṛtāya kam iti atha enām vācayati yuktam āśīḥ kāme iti atha enām
tiras pavitram apaḥ ācāmayati payasvatīḥ oṣadhayaḥ payasvat vīrudhām payaḥ apām
payasaḥ yat payaḥ tena mām indra saṃsṛja iti atha enām gārhapatye samidhaḥ
ādhāpayati agne vratapate vratam cariṣyāmi tat śakeyam tat me rādhyatām svāhā
vāyo vrata pate āditya vrata pate vratānām vrata pate vratam cariṣyāmi tat
śakeyam tat me rādhyatām svāhā iti atha jaghanena gārhapatyam upasīdati su
prajasaḥ tvā vayam su patnīḥ upasedima agne sapatna dambhanam adabdha aso
adābhyam indrāṇī iva avidhavā bhūyāsam aditiḥ iva su putrā asthūri tvā
suprajāstvāya mama putrāḥ śatru haṇaḥ atha u me duhitā virāj uta aham asmi
saṃjayā patyuḥ me ślokaḥ uttamaḥ iti atha enām vācayati ūne atiriktam dhīyātai
iti ca atha enām gārhapatyam īkṣayati agne gṛhapate upa mā hvayasva devānām
patnīḥ upa mā hvayadhvam patni patni eṣa te lokaḥ namaḥ te astu mā mā hiṃsīḥ iti
atha enām ājyam avekṣayati mahīnām payaḥ asi oṣadhīnām rasaḥ tvā cakṣuṣā avekṣe
suprajāstvāya iti atha enat gārhapatye adhiśrayati tejaḥ asi iti samidham
upayatya prāṅ harati tejaḥ anu prehi iti atha enat āhavanīye adhiśrayati agniḥ
te tejaḥ mā vinait iti atra etām samidham madhyataḥ āhavanīyasya abhyādadhāti
svāhā iti atha enat agreṇa prokṣaṇīḥ paryāhṛtya dakṣiṇa ardhe vedyai nidhāya
yajamānam ājyam avekṣayati nimīlya avekṣeta iti brāhmaṇam atha enat yathāhṛtam
pratiparyāhṛtya uttara ardhe vedyai nidhāya adhvaryuḥ avekṣate agneḥ jihvā asi
subhūḥ devānām dhāmne dhāmne devebhyaḥ yajuṣe yajuṣe bhava iti atha enat udīcīna
agrābhyām pavitrābhyām punar āhāram tris utpunāti śukram asi jyotiḥ asi tejaḥ
asi iti atha prokṣaṇīḥ utpunāti devaḥ vaḥ savitā utpunātu acchidreṇa pavitreṇa
vasoḥ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ iti pacchas prokṣaṇīṣu pavitre avadhāya ādatte
dakṣiṇena sruvam savyena juhūm vede pratiṣṭhāpya tasyām gṛhṇīte śukram tvā
śukrāyām dhāmne dhāmne devebhyaḥ yajuṣe yajuṣe gṛhṇāmi iti etena yajuṣā
caturgṛhītam gṛhītvā saṃmṛśya utprayacchati atha upabhṛti gṛhṇīte jyotiḥ tvā
jyotiṣi dhāmne dhāmne devebhyaḥ yajuṣe yajuṣe gṛhṇāmi iti etena yajuṣā aṣṭa
gṛhītam gṛhītvā bhūyasaḥ grahān gṛhṇānaḥ kanīyaḥ ājyam gṛhṇīte tathā eva
saṃmṛśya utprayacchati atha dhruvāyām gṛhṇīte arciḥ tvā arciṣi dhāmne dhāmne
devebhyaḥ yajuṣe yajuṣe gṛhṇāmi iti etena yajuṣā caturgṛhītam gṛhītvā abhipūrya
tathā eva saṃmṛśya utprayacchati atha etām ājya sthālīm sa sruvām jaghanena
vedyai nidhāya prokṣaṇīḥ unmahayan upottiṣṭhati āpaḥ devīḥ agrepuvaḥ agreguvaḥ
agre imam yajñam nayatā agre yajñapatim dhatta yuṣmān indraḥ avṛṇīta vṛtratūrye
yūyam indram avṛṇīdhvam vṛtratūrye iti adbhiḥ eva apaḥ prokṣati prokṣitāḥ stha
prokṣitāḥ stha iti tris atha idhmam visrasya prokṣati kṛṣṇaḥ asi ākhareṣṭhaḥ
agnaye tvā svāhā iti vedim prokṣati vediḥ asi barhiṣe tvā svāhā iti barhiḥ
prokṣati barhiḥ asi srugbhyaḥ tvā svāhā iti āharanti etat barhiḥ antareṇa
praṇītāḥ ca āhavanīyam ca tat antarvedi purogranthi āsādya prokṣati dive tvā iti
agrāṇi antarikṣāya tvā iti madhyāni pṛthivyai tvā iti mūlāni saha srucā purastāt
pratyañcam granthim pratyukṣya atiśiṣṭāḥ prokṣaṇīḥ ninayati dakṣiṇāyai śroṇeḥ ā
uttarāyai śroṇeḥ svadhā pitṛbhyaḥ ūrj bhava barhiṣadbhyaḥ ūrjā pṛthivīm gacchata
iti udūhya prokṣaṇī dhānam barhiḥ visrasya purastāt prastaram gṛhṇāti viṣṇo
stūpaḥ asi iti tasmin pavitre apisṛjati yajamāne prāṇa apānau dadhāmi iti vā
tūṣṇīm vā tam yajamānāya vā brahmaṇe vā prayacchati atha etāni barhiḥ
saṃnahanāni āyātayati dakṣiṇāyai śroṇeḥ ā uttarāt aṃsāt atha dakṣiṇe vedi ante
barhiḥ muṣṭim stṛṇāti deva barhiḥ ūrṇāmradasam tvā stṛṇāmi svāsastham devebhyaḥ
iti tām bahulām purastāt pratyañcam trivṛtam anatidṛśnam stṛṇāti atha _ pāṇiḥ
prāñc abhisṛpya paridhīn paridadhāti gandharvaḥ asi viśvāvasuḥ viśvāt īṣataḥ
yajamānasya paridhiḥ iḍaḥ īḍitaḥ iti madhyamam indrasya bāhuḥ asi dakṣiṇaḥ
yajamānasya paridhiḥ iḍaḥ īḍitaḥ iti dakṣiṇam mitrāvaruṇau tvā uttaratas
paridhattām dhruveṇa dharmaṇā yajamānasya paridhiḥ iḍaḥ īḍitaḥ iti uttaram atha
sūryeṇa purastāt paridadhāti sūryaḥ tvā purastāt pātu kasyāścid abhiśastyāḥ iti
ūrdhve samidhau ādadhāti vītihotram tvā kave dyumantam samidhīmahi agne bṛhantam
adhvare iti dakṣiṇām tūṣṇīm uttarām abhyādhāya antarvedi _ agre vidhṛtī
tiryañcau sādayati viśaḥ yantre stha iti vidhṛtyoḥ prastaram vasūnām rudrāṇām
ādityānām sadasi sīda iti prastare juhvam juhūḥ asi ghṛtāñc nāmnā priyeṇa nāmnā
priye sadasi sīda iti uttarām upabhṛtam upabhṛt asi ghṛtāñc nāmnā priyeṇa nāmnā
priye sadasi sīda iti uttarām dhruvām dhruvā asi ghṛtāñc nāmnā priyeṇa nāmnā
priye sadasi sīda iti atha srucaḥ sannāḥ abhimṛśati etāḥ asadan sukṛtasya loke
tāḥ viṣṇo pāhi pāhi yajñam pāhi yajñapatim pāhi mām yajñanyam iti atha viṣṇūni
stha vaiṣṇavāni dhāmāni stha prājāpatyāni iti ājyāni abhimantrayate atha ādatte
dakṣiṇena _ sthālīm sa sruvām savyena pātrīm vedam iti etat samādāya pradakṣiṇam
āvṛtya pratyañc ādrutya jaghanena gārhapatyam upaviśya pātryām dvedhā upastṛṇīte
syonam te sadanam karomi ghṛtasya dhārayā su śevam kalpayāmi tasmin sīda amṛte
pratitiṣṭha vrīhīnām medhaiḥ sumanasyamānaḥ iti atha dhṛṣṭim ādāya dakṣiṇasya
puroḍāśasya aṅgārān apohati idam aham senāyai _ mukham apohāmi iti atha enam
vidarśayati _ jyotiḥ vibhāhi mahate indriyāya iti vedena virajasam kṛtvā
abhighārayati āpyāyatām _ yoniḥ agniḥ havyāni anumanyatām kham aṅkṣva tvacam
aṅkṣva surūpam tvā _ vidam paśūnām tejasā agnaye juṣṭam abhighārayāmi iti _
devatyaḥ _ bhavati atha enam udvāsayati śṛtaḥ utsnāti janitā matīnām iti ājyena
su saṃtarpayati ārdraḥ prathasnuḥ bhuvanasya gopaḥ iti upariṣṭāt abhyajya
adhastāt upānakti yaḥ te ātmā paśuṣu praviṣṭaḥ tam aṅkṣva iti evam eva uttaram
puroḍāśam udvāsayati atha śṛtam atha dadhi atha sāṃnāyye alaṃkaroti yaḥ te ātmā
paśuṣu praviṣṭaḥ devānām viṣṭhām _ yaḥ vitasthe ātmanvān somaiḥ ghṛtavān hi
bhūtvā devān gaccha svar yajamānāya me iti pratyajya kapālāni udvāsayati irā
bhūtiḥ pṛthivyai rasaḥ mā utkramīt iti saṃkhyāya udvāsayati yajamānasya
gopīthāya iti brāhmaṇam atha enam sruvam ājyasya pūrayitvā antareṇa puroḍāśau
avadadhāti atha enā samparigṛhya antarvedi āsādayati bhūḥ bhuvar svar iti
etābhiḥ vyāhṛtibhiḥ madhyatas puroḍāśau āsādayati dakṣiṇatas śṛtam uttaratas
dadhi atha enam sruvam agreṇa srucaḥ paryāhṛtya dakṣiṇena juhvam prastare
sādayati syonaḥ me sīda suṣadaḥ pṛthivyām prathayi prajayā paśubhiḥ suvarge loke
divi sīda pṛthivyām antarikṣe aham uttaraḥ bhūyāsam adharāḥ mat sapatnāḥ iti
atha enam yathāhṛtam pratiparyāhṛtya dhruvāyām avadadhāti ṛṣabhaḥ asi śākvaraḥ
ghṛtācīnām sūnuḥ priyeṇa nāmnā priye sadasi sīda iti paśunā yakṣyamāṇaḥ bhavati
saḥ upakalpayate pautudravān paridhīn gulgulu sugandhi tejanam śuklām ūrṇā
stukām yā petvasya antarā śṛṅge dve raśane dviguṇām ca triguṇām ca dve
vapāśrapaṇī viśākhām ca a viśākhām ca hṛdayaśūlam kārṣmarya mayān paridhīn
audumbaram maitrāvaruṇa daṇḍam mukhena saṃmitam idhmābarhiḥ idhmam praṇayanīyam
plakṣa śākhām iḍa sūnam yavān yavamatībhyaḥ saktūn saktu homāya pṛṣadājyāya
dadhi hiraṇyam iti atha āmāvāsyena vā haviṣā iṣṭvā nakṣatre vā gārhapatye ājyam
vilāpya utpūya sruci caturgṛhītam gṛhītvā ṣaḍḍhotāram manasā anudrutya āhavanīye
juhoti anvārabdhe yajamāne svāhā iti aparam caturgṛhītam gṛhītvā yūpa āhutim
juhoti uru viṣṇo vikramasva uru kṣayāya naḥ kṛdhi aparam caturgṛhītam gṛhītvā
atha yācati ājya sthālīm sa sruvām barhiḥ hiraṇyam uda pātram hvayanti takṣāṇam
sa paraśum āha aihi yajamāna iti pūrvayā dvārā upaniṣkramya tām diśam yanti
yatra asya yūpaḥ spaṣṭaḥ bhavati yatra vā vetsyan manyate sa yaḥ same bhūmyai
svāt yoneḥ rūḍhaḥ bahu parṇaḥ bahu śākhaḥ a pratiśuṣka agraḥ pratyaṅ upanataḥ
tam upatiṣṭhate ati anyān agām na anyān upāgām arvāk tvā paraiḥ avidam paras
avaraiḥ tam tvā juṣe vaiṣṇavam deva yajyāyai iti atha enam ājyena anakti devaḥ
tvā savitā madhvā anaktu iti ūrdhva agram barhiḥ anūcchrayati oṣadhe trāyasva
enam iti svadhitinā tiryañcam praharati svadhite mā enam hiṃsīḥ iti yaḥ
prathamaḥ śakalaḥ parāpatati tam prajñātam nidadhāti tam a paribhindan an akṣa
saṅgam vṛścati prāñcam vā udañcam vā prayāntam anumantrayate divam agreṇa mā
lekhīḥ antarikṣam madhyena mā hiṃsīḥ pṛthivyā saṃbhava iti atha āvraścane
hiraṇyam nidhāya saṃparistīrya abhijuhoti vanaspate śata valśaḥ viroha svāhā iti
sahasra valśāḥ vi vayam ruhema iti ātmānam pratyabhimṛśate anu agram śākhāḥ
prasūdayati yam tvā ayam svadhitiḥ tetijānaḥ praṇināya mahate saubhagāya iti
pañca aratnim tasmai vṛścet iti eṣa brāhmaṇavatām avamaḥ tam pariṣvaṅga paramam
prādeśa avamam caṣālasya kāle parivāsayati a chinnaḥ rāyaḥ su vīraḥ iti yat
param bhavati tasya catur aṅgulam caṣālāya pracchedayati tam catur aśrim vā aṣṭa
aśrim vā kṛtvā āvāhayati ā vā hārayati ohya nistiṣṭhati avatakṣaṇānām eva svarum
kurute atha asya eṣā pūrvedyus eva pāśubandhikī vediḥ vimitā bhavati daśa padā
paścāt tiraścī dvādaśa padā prācī aṣṭa padā purastāt tiraścī bhavati tām
paristīrya stambayajuḥ harati idam eva prasiddham pauroḍāśikam tris yajuṣā
tūṣṇīm caturtham pūrvam parigrāham parigṛhṇāti karaṇam japati uddhanti uddhatāt
āgnīdhraḥ tris harati yat āgnīdhraḥ tris harati atha yācati sphyam uda pātram
barhiḥ śamyām iti etat samādāya āha ehi yajamāna iti uttareṇa vedim dvayoḥ vā
triṣu vā prakrameṣu sphyena uddhatya avokṣya śamyayā cātvālam parimimīte
vittāyanī me asi iti purastāt udīcīna kumbayā antarataḥ sphyena ālikhati
tiktāyanī me asi iti dakṣiṇatas prācīna kumbayā antarataḥ sphyena ālikhati
avatāt mā nāthitam iti paścāt udīcīna kumbayā antarataḥ sphyena ālikhati avatāt
mā vyathitam iti uttaratas prācīna kumbayā antarataḥ sphyena ālikhati atha
cātvāle barhiḥ nidhāya tasmin sphyena praharati videḥ agniḥ nabhaḥ nāma agne
aṅgiraḥ yaḥ asyām pṛthivyām asi iti ādatte āyuṣā nāmnā ihi iti hṛtvā
uttaravedyām nivapati yat te anādhṛṣṭam nāma yajñiyam tena tvā ādadhe iti
dvitīyam praharati videḥ agniḥ nabhaḥ nāma agne aṅgiraḥ yaḥ dvitīyasyām
pṛthivyām asi iti ādatte āyuṣā nāmnā ihi iti hṛtvā uttaravedyām nivapati yat te
anādhṛṣṭam nāma yajñiyam tena tvā ādadhe iti tṛtīyam praharati videḥ agniḥ
nabhaḥ nāma agne aṅgiraḥ yaḥ tṛtīyasyām pṛthivyām asi iti ādatte āyuṣā nāmnā ihi
iti hṛtvā uttaravedyām nivapati yat te anādhṛṣṭam nāma yajñiyam tena tvā ādadhe
iti tūṣṇīm caturtham harati saha barhiṣā atha adhvaryuḥ sphyena cātvālāt purīṣam
uddhanti atha āgnīdhram āha agnīdh itas tris hara iti tatas tris āgnīdhraḥ
harati yat āgnīdhraḥ tris harati atha adhvaryuḥ uttaravedyai purīṣam saṃprayauti
siṃhīḥ asi mahiṣīḥ asi iti prathayati uru prathasva uru te yajñapatiḥ prathatām
iti sphyena saṃhanti dhruvā asi iti atha enām adbhiḥ avokṣati devebhyaḥ
śundhasva iti devebhyaḥ śumbhasva iti sikatābhiḥ anuprakirati tām prādeśa mātrīm
catur aśrām niṣṭhāya śamyayā parimimīte uttaranābhim utsādya atha enām
praticchādya abhrim ādatte devasya tvā savituḥ prasave aśvinoḥ bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ
hastābhyām ādade iti ādāya abhimantrayate abhriḥ asi nāriḥ asi iti tayā yūpa
avaṭam parilikhati yathā antarvedi ardham syāt bahirvedi ardham parilikhitam
rakṣaḥ parilikhitāḥ arātayaḥ idam aham rakṣasaḥ grīvāḥ apikṛntāmi yaḥ asmān
dveṣṭi yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ idam asya grīvāḥ apikṛntāmi iti atha āgnīdhram āha
agnīdh ehi imam yūpa avaṭam khana upara saṃmitam prāk purīṣam udvapatāt catur
aṅgulena uparam atikhanatāt iti tam sa khanati vā khānayati vā yāvat eva atra
adhvaryuḥ ceṣṭati tāvat eṣa pratiprasthātā abhyādadhāti idhmam praṇayanīyam upa
upayamanīḥ kalpayanti cātvālāt ātmanā indra ghoṣavatīḥ prokṣaṇīḥ adhvaryuḥ
ādatte parikarmiṇe pañca gṛhītam ājyam prayacchati brahmaṇi saṃbhārāḥ bhavanti
atha saṃpraiṣam āha agnaye praṇīyamānāya anubrūhi agnīdh ekasphyayā anusaṃdhehi
iti tris uktāyām udyacchante hotuḥ vaśam yanti uttareṇa vedim pratipadyante
dhārayanti etam agnim atha adhvaryuḥ indra ghoṣavatībhiḥ prokṣaṇībhiḥ
uttaravedim prokṣati indraghoṣaḥ tvā vasubhiḥ purastāt pātu iti purastāt
manojavāḥ tvā pitṛbhiḥ dakṣiṇatas pātu iti dakṣiṇatas pracetāḥ tvā rudraiḥ
paścāt pātu iti paścāt viśvakarmā tvā ādityaiḥ uttaratas pātu iti uttaratas atha
yat prokṣaṇīnām ucchiṣyate tat dakṣiṇatas uttaravedyai ninayati yat eva tatra
krūram tat tena śamayati iti brāhmaṇam atha enām hiraṇyam antardhāya akṣṇayā
pañca gṛhītena vyāghārayati siṃhīḥ asi sapatna sāhī svāhā iti dakṣiṇe aṃse
siṃhīḥ asi su prajā vaniḥ svāhā iti uttarasyām śroṇyām siṃhīḥ asi rāyaspoṣa
vaniḥ svāhā iti dakṣiṇasyām śroṇyām siṃhīḥ asi āditya vaniḥ svāhā iti uttare
aṃse siṃhīḥ asi āvaha devān devayate yajamānāya svāhā iti madhye atha bhūtebhyaḥ
tvā iti srucam udgṛhṇāti atha pautudravān paridhīn paridadhāti viśva āyuḥ asi
pṛthivīm dṛṃha iti madhyamam dhruva kṣit asi antarikṣam dṛṃha iti dakṣiṇam a
cyuta kṣit asi divam dṛṃha iti uttaram atha atiśiṣṭān saṃbhārān nivapati gulgulu
sugandhi tejanam śuklām ūrṇā stukām agneḥ bhasma asi agneḥ purīṣam asi iti atha
enān saṃsrāveṇa abhighārayati atha pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya idhmam pratiṣṭhāpayati
yajña pratitiṣṭha sumatau su śevā ā tvā vasūni purudhā viśantu dīrgham āyuḥ
yajamānāya kṛṇvan atha amṛtena jaritāram aṅdhi iti atha enam visrasya āhuti
sāham kṛtvā adhvara āhutibhiḥ abhijuhoti agniḥ yajñam nayatu prajānan mā enam
yajña hanaḥ vidan devebhyaḥ prabrūtāt yajñam pra pra yajñapatim tira svāhā vāyuḥ
yajñam nayatu prajānan mā enam yajña hanaḥ vidan devebhyaḥ prabrūtāt yajñam pra
pra yajñapatim tira svāhā sūryaḥ yajñam nayatu prajānan mā enam yajña hanaḥ
vidan devebhyaḥ prabrūtāt yajñam pra pra yajñapatim tira svāhā yajñaḥ yajñam
nayatu prajānan mā enam yajña hanaḥ vidan devebhyaḥ prabrūtāt yajñam pra pra
yajñapatim tira svāhā iti atha etāḥ yajamānaḥ eva svayam juhoti agniḥ anna ādaḥ
anna patiḥ annasya īśe sa me annam dadātu svāhā vāyuḥ prāṇa dāḥ prāṇasya īśe sa
me prāṇam dadātu svāhā ādityaḥ bhūri dāḥ bhūyiṣṭhānām paśūnām īśe sa me
bhūyiṣṭhān paśūn dadātu svāhā iti agnivati uttaram parigrāham parigṛhya
yoyupitvā tiryañcam sphyam stabdhvā saṃpraiṣam āha prokṣaṇīḥ āsādayaḥ
idhmābarhiḥ upasādaya sruvam svadhitim srucaḥ ca saṃmṛḍḍhi tūṣṇīm pṛṣadājya
grahaṇīm patnīm saṃnahya ājyena ca dadhnā ca udehi iti āhṛtāsu prokṣaṇīṣu udasya
sphyam mārjayitvā idhmābarhiḥ upasādya pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅ ādrutya sruvam
svadhitim srucaḥ ca saṃmārṣṭi tūṣṇīm pṛṣadājya grahaṇīm patnīm saṃnahya ājyena
ca dadhnā ca udeti ājyam ca prokṣaṇīḥ ca utpūya prasiddham ājyāni gṛhītvā
pṛṣadājya grahaṇyām upastṛṇīte mahīnām payaḥ asi iti viśveṣām devānām tanūḥ iti
dvitīyam barhiṣī antardhāya dadhi ānayati ṛdhyāsam adya pṛṣatīnām graham
pṛṣatīnām grahaḥ asi iti apoddhṛtya barhiṣī atha abhighārayati viṣṇoḥ hṛdayam
asi iti ekam iṣa viṣṇuḥ tvā anu vicakrame iti dvitīyam atha prokṣaṇībhiḥ
upottiṣṭhati idhmam prokṣati vedim prokṣati barhiḥ prokṣati barhiḥ āsannam
prokṣya upaninīya purastāt prastaram gṛhṇāti pañcavidham barhiḥ stīrtvā prastara
pāṇiḥ prāṅ abhisṛpya kārṣmarya mayān paridhīn paridadhāti ūrdhve samidhau
ādadhāti vidhṛtī tiraścī sādayati vidhṛtyoḥ prastaram prastare juhūm barhiṣi
itarāḥ etāḥ asadan iti samabhimṛśya pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅ ādrutya yācati
yavamatīḥ prokṣaṇīḥ barhiḥ hastam ājya sthālīm sa sruvām svaru raśanam
maitrāvaruṇa daṇḍam yūpa śakalam hiraṇyam uda pātram iti etat saṃnidhāya yūpam
prakṣālayati yat te śikvaḥ parāvadhīt takṣā hastena vāsyā āpaḥ te tat vanaspate
apanudantu śundhanīḥ iti yūpaḥ eṣa prakṣālitaḥ prapannaḥ sampanna caṣālaḥ prāk
avaṭāt upaśete tam uttareṇa āhavanīyam tiṣṭhan parāñcam prokṣati pṛthivyai tvā
antarikṣāya tvā dive tvā iti avaṭe apaḥ avanayati śundhatām lokaḥ pitṛṣadanaḥ
iti yavān praskandayati yavaḥ asi yavaya asmat dveṣaḥ yavaya arātīḥ iti barhiḥ
hastam vyatiṣajya avastṛṇāti pitṝṇām sadanam asi iti atha enat hiraṇyam
antardhāya sruva āhutyā abhijuhoti pitṛbhyaḥ svāhā iti yūpa śakalam avāsyati su
āveśaḥ asi agregāḥ netṝṇām vanaspatiḥ adhi tvā sthāsyati tasya vittāt iti atha
ādatte ājya sthālīm sa sruvām svaru raśanam maitrāvaruṇa daṇḍam uda pātram iti
etat samādāya āha ehi yajamāna iti anvak yajamānaḥ anūcī patnī agreṇa yūpam
parītya dakṣiṇatas udak mukhāḥ tiṣṭhanti pūrvaḥ eva adhvaryuḥ aparaḥ yajamānaḥ
aparā patnī atha pravṛhya caṣālam yūpasya agram anakti devaḥ tvā savitā madhvā
anaktu iti antarataḥ ca bāhyatas ca su abhyaktam kṛtvā caṣālam pratimuñcati su
pippalābhyaḥ tvā oṣadhībhyaḥ iti sruveṇa agniṣṭhām aśrim abhighārayan āha yūpāya
ajyamānāya anubrūhi iti ā antam anakti ā antam eva yajamānam tejasā anakti na
uparam anakti patnī uparam anakti sarvatas parimṛśati aparivargam eva asmin
tejaḥ dadhāti iti brāhmaṇam ucchrayan āha ucchrīyamāṇāya anubrūhi iti ucchrayati
ud divam stabhāna antarikṣam pṛṇa pṛthivīm upareṇa dṛṃha iti atha enam
vaiṣṇavībhyām ṛgbhyām kalpayati te te dhāmāni viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi paśyata iti
dvābhyām sa yatra agniṣṭhām aśrim āhavanīyena sampādayati tat dhruvasya caṣālam
prekṣayati tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ divi iva cakṣuḥ ātatam
iti atha enam pradakṣiṇam purīṣeṇa paryūhati brahma vanim tvā kṣatra vanim su
prajā vanim rāyaspoṣa vanim paryūhāmi iti maitrāvaruṇa daṇḍena saṃhanti brahma
dṛṃha kṣatram dṛṃha prajām dṛṃha rāyaspoṣam dṛṃha iti a nyūnam an atiriktam
parinyasya uda pātram upaninīya atha etām triguṇām raśanām tris saṃbhujya
madhyamena guṇena nābhi daghne parivyayan āha parivīyamāṇāya anubrūhi iti tris
pradakṣiṇam parivyayati parivīḥ asi pari tvā daivīḥ viśaḥ vyayantām pari imam
rāyaspoṣaḥ yajamānam manuṣyāḥ iti upānte vyatiṣajati ā antam praveṣṭayati
aṇimati sthavimat pravayati atha uttareṇa agniṣṭhām aśrim madhyame guṇe svarum
avagūhati antarikṣasya tvā sānau avagūhāmi iti svarvantam yūpam utsṛjati atha
etam paśum palpūlitam antareṇa cātvāla utkarau prapādya agreṇa yūpam purastāt
pratyak mukham upasthāpayati tam iṣe tvā iti barhiṣī ādāya upākaroti upavīḥ asi
upa u devān daivīḥ viśaḥ prāguḥ uśijaḥ bṛhaspate dhāraya vasūni havyā te
svadantām deva tvaṣṭar vasu raṇva revatī ramadhvam prajāpateḥ jāyamānāḥ imam
paśum paśupate te adya indra agnibhyām tvā juṣṭam upākaromi iti yad devatyaḥ vā
bhavati prajñāte barhiṣī nidhāya adhimanthanam śakalam nidadhāti agneḥ janitram
asi iti vṛṣaṇau anvañcau vṛṣaṇau sthaḥ iti atha araṇī ādatte urvaśī asi āyuḥ asi
purūravāḥ iti atha ete ājya sthālyām samanakti ghṛtena akte vṛṣaṇam dadhāthām
iti atha prajātīḥ vācayati gāyatram chandaḥ anu prajāyasva traiṣṭubham chandaḥ
anu prajāyasva jāgatam chandaḥ anu prajāyasva iti atha āha agnaye mathyamānāya
anubrūhi iti jāte āha jātāya anubrūhi iti praharan āha prahriyamāṇāya anubrūhi
iti praharati bhavatam naḥ samanasau iti prahṛtya abhijuhoti agnau agniḥ carati
praviṣṭaḥ iti atha raśanām ādatte devasya tvā savituḥ prasave aśvinoḥ bāhubhyām
pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām ādade iti tayā akṣṇayā paśum abhidadhāti dakṣiṇam adhyardha
śīrṣam ṛtasya tvā deva haviḥ pāśena ārabhe iti dvi guṇāyai ca tri guṇāyai ca
antau saṃdadhāti dharṣa mānuṣān iti niyunakti atha enam adbhiḥ prokṣati adbhyaḥ
tvā oṣadhībhyaḥ indra agnibhyām tvā juṣṭam prokṣāmi iti yad devatyaḥ vā bhavati
pāyayati apām peruḥ asi iti svāttam cit sa devam havyam āpaḥ devīḥ svadata enam
iti upariṣṭāt prokṣya adhastāt upokṣati sarvatas eva enam medhyam karoti iti
brāhmaṇam udūhya prokṣaṇī dhānam hiraṇya varṇām hariṇīm suvarṇa rajata srajām
candrām hiraṇmayīm lakṣmīm jātavedaḥ mama ā vaha tām me ā vaha jātavedaḥ lakṣmīm
an apagāminīm yasyām hiraṇyam vindeyam gām aśvam puruṣān aham aśva pūrvām ratha
madhyām hasti nāda pramodinīm śriyam devīm upa hvaye śrīḥ mā devī juṣatām kāṃsī
asmi tām tām hiraṇya prāvārām ārdrām jvalantīm tṛptām tarpayantīm padme sthitām
padma padma varṇām varṇām tām iha upa hvaye śriyam candrām prabhāsām yaśasā
jvalantīm śriyam loke deva juṣṭām udārām tām padma nemim śaraṇam pra padye
alakṣmīḥ me naśyatām tvām vṛṇomi āditya varṇe tapasaḥ adhi jātaḥ vanaspatiḥ tava
vṛkṣaḥ atha bilvaḥ tasya phalāni tapasā nudantu māyā antarāḥ yāḥ ca bāhyāḥ
alakṣmīḥ upaitu mām deva sakhaḥ kīrtiḥ ca maṇinā saha prādurbhūtaḥ asmi rāṣṭre
asmin kīrtim vṛddhim dadātu me kṣudh pipāsā malā jyeṣṭhām alakṣmīm nāśayāmi aham
abhūtim asamṛddhim ca sarvān niḥ nuda me gṛhāt gandha dvārām durādharṣām nitya
puṣṭām karīṣiṇīm īśvarīm sarva bhūtānām tām iha upa hvaye śriyam manasaḥ kāmam
ākūtim vācaḥ satyam aśīmahi paśūnām rūpam annasya yaśaḥ mayi śrīḥ śrayatām
kardamena prajāḥ bhūtāḥ mayi sam bhava kardama śriyam vāsaya me kule mātaram
padma mālinīm āpaḥ sravantu snigdhāni ciklīta vasa me gṛhe ni ni ca ca devīm
devīm mātaram mātaram śriyam śriyam vāsaya vāsaya me me kule kule pakvām
puṣkariṇīm puṣṭām piṅgalām padma mālinīm sūryām hiraṇmayīm lakṣmīm jātavedaḥ
mama ā vaha ārdrām puṣkariṇīm yaṣṭīm su varṇām hema mālinīm candrām hiraṇmayīm
lakṣmīm jātavedaḥ mama ā vaha tām me ā vaha jātavedaḥ lakṣmīm an apagāminīm
yasyām hiraṇyam prabhūtam gāvaḥ dāsyaḥ vindeyam puruṣān aham yaḥ ānandam
samāviśat upādhāvan vibhāvasum śriyaḥ sarvāḥ upāśiṣva ciklīta vasa me gṛhe
kardamena prajā sraṣṭā kardamena prajā sraṣṭā sambhūtim gamayāmasi adadhāt
upāgāt yeṣām kāmam sasṛjmahe upāgāt jātavedaḥ punīhi mā rāyaspoṣam ca dhāraya
agniḥ mā tasmāt enasaḥ viśvāt muñcatu aṃhasaḥ acchā naḥ mitra mahas deva devān
agne vocaḥ sumatim rodasyoḥ vīhi svastim su kṣitim divaḥ nṝn dviṣaḥ aṃhāṃsi
duritā tarema tā tarema tava avasā tarema tasya sarpāt siṃdhavaḥ tasya gādham
aśīmahi upapravada maṇḍūki varṣam āvada tāduri madhye hradasya plavasva nigṛhya
caturaḥ padaḥ indrāsomā tapatam rakṣaḥ ubjatam ā tvā vaso havamānāsaḥ indavaḥ
upa stotreṣu dadhire ā naḥ some su adhvaraḥ iyānaḥ atyaḥ na tośate yam svadhāvan
svadhayanti gūrtayaḥ paure chandayase havam mama vrate hṛdayam te dadhāmi mama
cittam anu cittam te astu mama vācam eka vratā juṣasva bṛhaspatiḥ tvā niyunaktu
mahyam aham rudrebhiḥ vasubhiḥ carāmi ā rātri pārthivam rajaḥ pituḥ aprāyi
dhāmabhiḥ divaḥ sadāṃsi bṛhatī vi tiṣṭhase ā tveṣam vartate tamaḥ ye te rātri nṛ
cakṣasaḥ yuktāsaḥ navatiḥ nava aśītiḥ santu aṣṭau uta u sapta saptatiḥ rātrim
pra padye jananīm sarva bhūta niveśanīm bhadrām bhagavatīm kṛṣṇām viśvasya
jagataḥ niśām saṃveśanīm saṃyamanīm graha nakṣatra mālinīm prapannaḥ aham śivām
rātrīm bhadre pāram aśīmahi mama agne varcaḥ vihaveṣu astu stoṣyāmi prayataḥ
devīm śaraṇyām bahvṛca priyām sahasra saṃmitām durgām jātavedase sunavāma somam
śānti artham tat dvijātīnām ṛṣibhiḥ samupāśritāḥ ṛgvede tvam samutpannā
arātīyataḥ ni dahāti vedaḥ ye tvām devi prapadyanti brāhmaṇāḥ havya vāhanīm
avidyāḥ bahu vidyāḥ vā sa naḥ parṣat ati durgāṇi viśvā ye agni varṇām śubhām
saumyām kīrtayiṣyanti ye dvijāḥ tām tārayati durgāni duritā ati agniḥ durgeṣu
viṣame ghore saṃgrāme ripu saṃkaṭe agni cora nipāteṣu duṣṭa graha nivāraṇe duṣṭa
graha nivāraṇi om namaḥ durgeṣu viṣameṣu tvam saṃgrāmeṣu vaneṣu ca mohayitvā
prapadyante teṣām me abhayam kuru teṣām me abhayam kuru om namaḥ keśinīm sarva
bhūtānām pañcamī iti ca nāma ca sā mām samām diśām devī sarvatas parirakṣatu
sarvatas parirakṣatu om namaḥ tām agni varṇām tapasā jvalantīm vairocanīm karma
phaleṣu juṣṭām durgām devīm śaraṇam aham pra padye su tarasi tarase namaḥ su
tarasi tarase namaḥ anīkavantam ūtaye agnim gīrbhiḥ havāmahe sa naḥ parṣat ati
dviṣaḥ pra nūnam jātavedasam samṛta yajñaḥ vai eṣa yat darśapūrṇamāsau kasya vā
aha yakṣyamāṇasya devatāḥ yajñam āgacchanti kasya vā na bahūnām samānam ahar
yajamānānām yaḥ pūrvedyus agnim gṛhṇāti sa śvobhūte devatāḥ abhiyajate mama agne
varcaḥ vihaveṣu astu iti pūrvam agnim gṛhṇāti devatāḥ vai etat pūrvedyus agrahīt
tāḥ śvobhūte abhiyajate barhiṣā vai pūrṇamāse vratam upayanti vatsaiḥ
amāvāsyāyām purā vatsānām apākartoḥ daṃpatī aśnīyātām hastau avanijya dakṣiṇatas
agnim upatiṣṭheta agne vratapate vratam ālapsye iti agniḥ vai devānām vrata
patiḥ brāhmaṇaḥ vrata bhṛt vratapataye eva procya vratam ālabhate agnim hotāram
upa tam huve iti yena haviḥ nirvapsyan syāt tat abhimṛśet devatānām vai eṣa
grahaḥ devatāḥ vai etat agrahīt yunajmi tvā brahmaṇā daivyena iti paridhiṣu
paridhīyamāṇeṣu vadet agneḥ vai eṣa yogaḥ agnim etat yunakti yuktaḥ asmai havyam
vahati asmāsu indraḥ indriyam dadhātu iti iḍāyām upahūyamānāyām vadet iḍāyāḥ vai
eṣa dohaḥ iḍām vai etat duhe atha u indriyam vai iḍā indriyam eva ātman dhatte
ām āśiṣaḥ doha kāmāḥ iti āśiṣaḥ vai doha kāmāḥ yajamānam abhisarpanti tāḥ
dakṣiṇatas yajamāna lokam upatiṣṭhante tāḥ yathā dhenavaḥ a dugdhāḥ apakrāmanti
evam asmāt āśiṣaḥ a dugdhāḥ apakrāmanti yaḥ evam na veda atha yaḥ evam veda
āśiṣaḥ eva duhe sā me satyā āśīḥ devān gamyāt iti prastare prahriyamāṇe vadet
satyām vai etat āśiṣam devān gamayitvā atha varam vṛṇīta etat ha sma vai āha
aupāviḥ jānaśruteyaḥ sahasreṇa iṣṭvā kam u svid atas adhi varam variṣyāmahe iti
sahasreṇa yakṣīya iti ha sma vāva tatas purā āha vi te muñcāmi raśanām vi raśmīn
iti paridhiṣu prahriyamāṇeṣu vadet devatāḥ vai etat svargam lokam gamayitvā
pratiṣṭhāpya vyamauk iṣṭaḥ yajñaḥ bhṛgubhiḥ iti yajñasya vai eṣa dohaḥ yajñam
etat duhe etat ha sma vai āha kapivanaḥ bhauvāyanaḥ kim u sa yajñena yajeta yaḥ
gām iva yajñam na duhīta su dohataraḥ hi goḥ iti sam yajñapatiḥ āśiṣā iti
yajamānaḥ yajamāna bhāgam prāśnāti yajamānaḥ vai yajña patiḥ yajñaḥ yajamāna
bhāgaḥ yat yajamānaḥ yajamāna bhāgam prāśnāti yajñapatau eva yajñam
pratiṣṭhāpayati yadi pravaset samiṣṭa yajuṣā saha juhuyāt agnau eva yajñam
pratiṣṭhāpayati yat haviḥ nirvapsyan agnau niṣṭapati agneḥ eva yajñam nirmimīte
atha yat haviḥ nirvapsyan yajamānāya prāha yajñapateḥ eva adhi yajñam nirmimīte
agniḥ vai bhūyāṃsam pradahati etam vai lokam yajamānaḥ nu atimucyate yat etāḥ
āpaḥ atisṛjyante a chinnam srāvayitavyāḥ adbhiḥ vai etat yajamānaḥ agneḥ ātmānam
antardhatte dvayāḥ vai devāḥ yajamānasya gṛham āgacchanti soma pāḥ anye a soma
pāḥ anye huta adaḥ anye a huta adaḥ anye ete vai devāḥ a huta adaḥ yat brāhmaṇāḥ
etad devatyaḥ eṣa yaḥ purā an ījānaḥ ete vai etasya prajāyāḥ paśūnām īśate te
asya a prītāḥ iṣam ūrjam ādāya apakrāmanti yat anvāhāryam anvāharati tān eva
tena prīṇāti dakṣiṇatas sadbhyaḥ parihartavai āha dakṣiṇāvatā eva yajñena yajate
āhutibhiḥ eva devān huta adaḥ prīṇāti te asmai prītāḥ iṣam ūrjam niyacchanti sat
asi sat me bhūyāḥ iti āśiṣaḥ vai etāḥ tāḥ eva avarunddhe pūrṇam asi pūrṇam me
bhūyāḥ iti pūrṇaḥ ha vai amutra aṅgaiḥ sambhavati sarvam asi sarvam me bhūyāḥ
iti sarvaḥ ha vai amutra aṅgaiḥ sambhavati akṣitam asi akṣitam me bhūyāḥ iti
akṣitaḥ ha vai amutra aṅgaiḥ sambhavati prācyā diśā devāḥ ṛtvijaḥ mārjayantām
iti etāḥ vai yajñasya mṛṣṭayaḥ etāḥ śāntayaḥ tāḥ baijavāpayaḥ vidāmakran teṣām
mṛṣṭaḥ yajñaḥ śāntaḥ abhūt a ghātukaḥ paśupatiḥ paśūn tat yaḥ evam veda mṛṣṭaḥ
eva asya yajñaḥ śāntaḥ bhavati a ghātukaḥ paśupatiḥ paśūn viṣṇuḥ pṛthivyām
vyakraṃsta gāyatreṇa chandasā iti viṣṇu mukhāḥ vai devāḥ asurān ebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ
praṇudya svargam lokam āyan tat viṣṇu mukhaḥ vai etat yajamānaḥ bhrātṛvyam
ebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ praṇudya svargam lokam eti aganma svar iti svargam eva lokam
eti sam jyotiṣā abhūma iti jyotiḥ hi svargaḥ lokaḥ idam aham amuṣya prāṇam
niveṣṭayāmi iti prāṇam eva asya niveṣṭayati ittham paryāvartate evam hi yajñaḥ
paryāvartate atha u amuṣya vai etat ādityasya āvṛtam anu paryāvartate tejaḥ asi
iti āha tejaḥ hi agniḥ sa vai hitvā prajām ca paśūn ca svar eti yat āha sam aham
prajayā sam mayā prajā sam aham paśubhiḥ sam mayā paśavaḥ iti prajāyām ca eva
paśuṣu ca pratitiṣṭhati agne gṛhapate su gṛhapatiḥ aham tvayā gṛhapatinā
bhūyāsam su gṛhapatiḥ tvam mayā gṛhapatinā bhūyāḥ iti a grahaṇau saṃjīryataḥ
sarvam āyuḥ itaḥ na ārtim nītaḥ putrasya nāma gṛhṇāti prajām eva anu samatānīt
sa vai mānuṣam eva abhi upāvartate manuṣyasya hi nāma gṛhṇāti yat āha a chinnaḥ
divyaḥ tantuḥ mā mānuṣaḥ chedi iti divyam ca eva mānuṣam ca samatānīt divyāt
dhāmnaḥ mā chitsi mā mānuṣāt iti ubhau imam lokam jayataḥ saha svarge loke
bhavataḥ yam kāmayeta paśumān syāt iti yaḥ bahu puṣṭaḥ tasya gṛhāt agnim
āhareyuḥ atha yam kāmayeta anna ādaḥ syāt iti tasya bhraṣṭrāt dakṣiṇāgnim
āhareyuḥ eṣa vai agnīnām anna ādaḥ anna karaṇam bhraṣṭram annādyam asmai
avarunddhe tasyāḥ āhutyāḥ puruṣaḥ asṛjyata tatas aviḥ asṛjyata tatas yavaḥ
asṛjyata te vai svar yantaḥ abruvan atas naḥ yūyam prayacchata kena āyatanena
atra eva vetsyatha iti abruvan te vai sapta hotāraḥ nyasīdan aryama gṛhapatayaḥ
mahāhaviḥ hotā āsīt satyahaviḥ adhvaryuḥ acittapājāḥ agnīdh acittamanāḥ upavaktā
anādhṛṣyaḥ ca apratidhṛṣyaḥ ca abhigarāḥ ayāsyaḥ udgātā te vai etam graham
agṛhṇata vidhenāman vidhema te nāma vidheḥ tvam asmākam nāma iti te
trayastriṃśam āyatanam acāyan tena idam samatanvan sapta hotrā ca vai idam
saṃtatam trayastriṃśena ca yat idam deva manuṣyāḥ anyaḥ anyasmai samprayacchate
prāṇaḥ vai daśahotā cakṣuḥ caturhotā śrotram pañcahotā vāc ca ātmā ca saptahotā
agnihotram vai daśahotā darśapūrṇamāsau caturhotā cāturmāsyāni pañcahotā saumyaḥ
adhvaraḥ saptahotā āyuṣe kam agnihotram hūyate sarvam āyuḥ eti yaḥ evam veda
cakṣuṣe kam darśapūrṇamāsau ijyete na cakṣuṣaḥ gṛhe yaḥ evam veda śrotrāya kam
cāturmāsyāni ijyante na śrotrasya gṛhe yaḥ evam veda vāce ca ātmane ca kam
saumyaḥ adhvaraḥ ijyate na vācaḥ na ātmanaḥ gṛhe yaḥ evam veda prajāpatiḥ vai
daśahotā ekaḥ san bhūyiṣṭha bhāj vyāhṛtīnām ekaḥ san bhūyiṣṭhaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam
veda tejase kam pūrṇamās ijyate saumyaḥ vai brāhmaṇaḥ devatayā gāyatra chandāḥ
gāyatraḥ agniḥ sve vāva asmai etat devate sa prasthe akaḥ na asya anyaḥ
yogakṣemasya īśe āyuṣe kam amāvāsyā ijyate svargāya lokāya kam saumyaḥ adhvaraḥ
ijyate eti svargam lokam yaḥ evam veda daśahotrā agnihotram unnītam abhimṛśet
annādyena eva enam arpayanti eti vai eṣaḥ asmāt lokāt yaḥ amum lokam eti agniḥ
āyuḥ tasya manuṣyāḥ āyuḥ kṛtaḥ tena āyuṣā āyuṣmān edhi brahmā āyuḥ tasya
brāhmaṇāḥ āyuḥ kṛtaḥ tena āyuṣā āyuṣmān edhi yajñaḥ āyuḥ tasya dakṣiṇāḥ āyuḥ
kṛtaḥ tena āyuṣā āyuṣmān edhi svarbhānuḥ vai āsuraḥ sūryam tamasā vidhyat tasya
devāḥ tamaḥ apāghnan yat prathamam tamaḥ apāghnan sā aviḥ kṛṣṇā bhavat yat
dvitīyam sā lohinī yat tṛtīyam sā balakṣī yat adhyastāt apākṛntat sā aviḥ vaśā
bhavat te abruvan deva paśum imam kāmāya ālabhāmahai iti atha vai iyam tarhi
ṛkṣā āsīt alomikā te abruvan tasmai kāmāya ālabhāmahai yathā asyām oṣadhayaḥ ca
vanaspatayaḥ ca jāyante iti tām vai tasmai kāmāya ālabhanta tatas asyām
oṣadhayaḥ ca vanaspatayaḥ ca ajāyanta yaḥ prajā kāmaḥ vā paśu kāmaḥ vā syāt saḥ
etām avim vaśām ālabheta pra prajayā ca paśubhiḥ ca jāyate atha u āhuḥ yaḥ
prathamaḥ tamasi apahate sūryasya raśmiḥ yūpasya caṣāle avātanot sā aviḥ vaśā
bhavat iti tat ubhayena eva deva paśuḥ ālabhyate yadi asyāḥ tat janma yadi vā
itaram tat kāmāya kāmāya eva aviḥ vaśā ālabhyate āgneyam ajam ālabheta vāruṇam
petvam vāruṇam petvam bhūti kāmam yājayet āgneyāni vai puruṣasya asthāni vāruṇam
māṃsam āgneyena eva asya āgneyam niṣkrīṇāti vāruṇena vāruṇam bhavati eva
sārasvatīm meṣīm ālabheta yaḥ vācaḥ gṛhīta vāc vai sarasvatī vācā eva asya vācam
bhiṣajyati apannadatī bhavati sarva tvāya an adhiskannā samṛddhyai śvetāḥ malhāḥ
ālabheta brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ āgneyīm bārhaspatyām saurīm vasantā āgneyīm prāvṛṣi
bārhaspatyām śiśire saurīm yat āgneyī tejaḥ tayā avarunddhe yat bārhaspatyā
brahmavarcasam tayā yat saurī rucam tayā trivṛt vāva asmai etat samṛddham
brahmavarcasam dadhāti saṃvatsaram paryālabhyante saṃvatsareṇa vai anāptam
āpyate saṃvatsareṇa eva asmai āptvā tejaḥ brahmavarcasam dadhāti śvetā bhavati
brahmaṇaḥ rūpam samṛddhyai vāyavyām ajām ālabheta sārasvatīm meṣīm adityai ajām
abhiśasyamānam yājayet vāyuḥ vai etasya aślīlam gandham janatāḥ anuviharati yam
abhiśaṃsanti eṣa hi idam sarvam upagacchati yat vāyave vāyuḥ eva asya tam
gandham surabhim akaḥ saḥ asya surabhiḥ gandhaḥ janatāḥ anuvitiṣṭhate vācā vai
etam abhiśaṃsanti yam abhiśaṃsanti vāc sarasvatī yat sārasvatī vācā eva eṣām
vācam śamayati a pratiṣṭhitaḥ vai eṣa yam abhiśaṃsanti iyam vai aditiḥ iyam
pratiṣṭhā yat ādityā asyām eva pratitiṣṭhati indriyeṇa vai eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate
yam abhiśaṃsanti vīryam indriyam vīryam garbhaḥ yat garbhiṇīḥ bhavanti indriyeṇa
eva enam vīryeṇa samardhayanti devāḥ ca vai asurāḥ ca aspardhanta te vai samāvat
eva yajñe kurvāṇāḥ āyan yat eva devāḥ akurvata tat asurāḥ akurvata te na
vyāvṛtam agacchan te devāḥ etam vāmanam paśum apaśyan tam vaiṣṇavam ālabhanta
tatas viṣṇuḥ imān lokān udajayat tatas devāḥ asurān ebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ prāṇudanta
tatas devāḥ abhavan parā asurāḥ yaḥ sapatnavān bhrātṛvyavān vā syāt saḥ etam
vāmanam vaiṣṇavam ālabheta atas vai viṣṇuḥ imān lokān udajayat viṣṇoḥ eva
ujjitim anu imān lokān ujjayati pra ebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ bhrātṛvyam nudate viṣame
iva ālabheta viṣamān iva hi imān lokān devāḥ udajayan nimān eva lokān ujjayati
indraḥ vai vṛtram ahan sa prāṅ apadyata sa padyamānaḥ indram saptabhiḥ bhogaiḥ
paryagṛhṇāt tasmāt viṣvañcaḥ paśavaḥ vyudāyan mūrdhataḥ vaidehīḥ udāyan tasmāt
tāsām puras janma puras okaḥ tāsām jaghanataḥ ṛṣabhaḥ vaidehaḥ anūdait tam
acāyat ayam vāva mā asmāt aṃhasaḥ muñcet iti tam aindram ālabheta āgneyam tu
pūrvam ajam ālabheta sa vai agninā eva vṛtrasya bhogān apidahya atha aindreṇa
indriyam vīryam ātman adhatta yaḥ pāpmanā tamasā gṛhītaḥ manyeta saḥ etam
aindram ṛṣabham ālabheta āgneyam tu pūrvam ajam ālabheta agninā eva pāpmanaḥ
bhogān apidahya atha aindreṇa indriyam vīryam ātman dhatte indraḥ vai valam
apāvṛṇot tatas sahasram udait tasya sahasrasya agratas kubhraḥ udait tasmāt etam
sāhasrī lakṣmīḥ iti āhuḥ yaḥ ca veda yaḥ ca na atha u āhuḥ imam vai eṣa lokam
paśyan abhyudait sa samaiṣat saḥ eṣa samīṣitaḥ kubhraḥ iti tam aindram ālabheta
paśu kāmaḥ aindrāḥ vai paśavaḥ indraḥ paśūnām prajanayitā tam eva bhāgadheyena
upāsarat saḥ asmai paśūn prajanayati sa yadā sahasram paśūn gacchet atha etam
vāmanam vaiṣṇavam ālabheta etasmin vai tat sahasram pratyatiṣṭhat sa tiryaṅ
vyaiṣat tasmāt eṣa tiryaṅ iva vīṣitaḥ etena vai sa tat sahasram paryagṛhṇāt tat
sahasrasya vai eṣa parigṛhītyāḥ avikṣobhāya devāḥ ca vai pitaraḥ ca asmin loke
āsan tat yat kiṃca devānām svam āsīt tat yamaḥ ayuvata te devāḥ prajāpatim eva
upādhāvan sa prajāpatiḥ etau mithunau paśū apaśyat ṛṣabham ca vaśām ca tau
ālabhata vaiṣṇava vāruṇīm tu pūrvām vaśām ālabhata tān vai varuṇena eva
grāhayitvā viṣṇunā yajñena prāṇudata atha aindram deveṣu ālabhata tena eṣu
indriyāṇi vīryāṇi āptvā adadhāt yaḥ sapatnavān bhrātṛvyavān vā syāt saḥ etau
mithunau paśū ālabhete ṛṣabham ca vaśām ca vaiṣṇava vāruṇīm tu pūrvām vaśām
ālabheta varuṇena eva enān grāhayitvā viṣṇunā yajñena praṇudate atha aindreṇa
indriyam vīryam ātman dhatte sāvitram punar utsṛṣṭam ālabheta yaḥ purā puṇyaḥ
san paścā pāpa tvam gacchet savitā vai śriyaḥ prasavitā tam eva bhāgadheyena
upāsarat saḥ enam śriyai prasuvati pāpaḥ vai eṣa purā san paścā śriyam aśnute
yaḥ purā anaḍvān san gacchati yathā eṣa śriyam aśnute evam eva enam śriyam
gamayati oṣadhībhyaḥ vehatam ālabheta prajā kāmaḥ oṣadhīnām vai eṣā priyā etāḥ
vai etām sūtoḥ paribādhante oṣadhayaḥ khalu vai etasya prajām apagūhanti yaḥ
alam prajāyai san prajām na vindate tāḥ eva bhāgadheyena upāsarat tāḥ asmai
prajām punar dadati āpaḥ vai oṣadhayaḥ āpaḥ ha tu eva asat khananti tāḥ asmai
prajām khananti dyāvāpṛthivīye dhenū saṃmātarā ālabheta anna kāmaḥ yat hi asau
varṣati tat asyām pratitiṣṭhati dyāvāpṛthivī vai annasya īśāte te eva
bhāgadheyena upāsarat te asmai annādyam prayacchataḥ sa vatsam vāyave ālabheta
vāyuḥ vai anayoḥ vatsaḥ vāyuḥ ime pradāpayati pratte ha vai ime duhe yaḥ evam
veda aindrīm sūta vaśām ālabheta rājanyam bhūti kāmam yājayet etasyāḥ vai adhi
indraḥ ajāyata sa jāyamānaḥ etam yonim niravartayat sā sūta vaśā bhavat atha u
āhuḥ etat eva sakṛt indriyam vīryam tejaḥ janayitvā na aparam sūtau āśaṃsata sā
sūta vaśā bhavat iti indriyeṇa vai eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yaḥ alam bhūtyai san na
bhavati aindrī bhavati indriyam asmin dadhāti atha yaḥ tam vindet yam sūtvā sūta
vaśā bhavati tam aindram ālabheta tejaskāmaḥ tat eva indriyam vīryam tejaḥ
āpnoti sārasvatīm dhenuṣṭarīm ālabheta yaḥ kṣetre paśuṣu vā vivadeta vāc vai
sarasvatī vācā eva eṣām vācam vṛṅkte dhenuḥ vai eṣā satī na duhe taryam eva eṣām
vācam karoti dyāvāpṛthivīyām dhenum paryāriṇīm ālabheta yaḥ rājanyaḥ abhyardhas
viśaḥ caret dyāvāpṛthivībhyām hi vai eṣa nirbhaktaḥ atha eṣaḥ abhyardhas viśaḥ
carati dyāvāpṛthivī eva enam viśi pratiṣṭhāpayataḥ paryāriṇī bhavati paryāri iva
hi etat rāṣṭram yat abhyardhas viśaḥ carati dyāvāpṛthivī eva enam viśi
pratiṣṭhāpya sa śvas bhūte vatsam vāyave ālabheta vāyuḥ vai anayoḥ vatsaḥ vāyuḥ
imau kṣayau viśam ca pradāpayati prattau ha vai imau kṣayau viśam ca duhe yaḥ
evam veda āgneyam ajam ālabheta saumyam babhrum ṛṣabham piṅgalam bhūti kāmam
yājayet ṛddhyai eva āgneyaḥ indriyeṇa vai eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yaḥ alam bhūtyai
san na bhavati yat saumyaḥ svayā eva asmai devatayā indriyam vīryam āptvā
avarunddhe bhavati eva babhruḥ piṅgalaḥ bhavati somasya rūpam samṛddhyai gomṛgam
vāyave ālabheta abhiśasyamānam yājayet apūtaḥ vai eṣa yam abhiśaṃsanti vāyuḥ vai
devānām pavitram vāyunā eva enam pavitreṇa punāti na iva vai eṣa grāme na araṇye
yam abhiśaṃsanti na iva khalu vai eṣa grāmyaḥ paśuḥ na iva āraṇyaḥ tasmāt asya
eṣa devatayā paśūnām samṛddhaḥ aindrāgnam anusṛṣṭam ālabheta yasya pitā
pitāmahaḥ somam na pibet indriyeṇa vai eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yasya pitā
pitāmahaḥ somam na pibati yat aindraḥ indriyeṇa eva enam vīryeṇa samardhayati
devatābhiḥ vai eṣa vyṛdhyate yasya pitā pitāmahaḥ somam na pibati yat āgneyaḥ
agniḥ vai sarvāḥ devatāḥ devatābhiḥ eva enam samardhayati anusṛṣṭaḥ bhavati
anusṛṣṭaḥ iva hi etasya soma pīthaḥ yasya pitā pitāmahaḥ somam na pibati tasmāt
asya eṣa devatayā paśūnām samṛddhaḥ tvāṣṭram avaliptam ālabheta paśu kāmaḥ
tvāṣṭrāḥ vai paśavaḥ paśavaḥ tvaṣṭā paśūnām prajanayitā tam eva bhāgadheyena
upāsarat saḥ asmai paśūn prajanayati saumāpauṣṇam napuṃsakam ālabheta paṇḍakam
yājayet yatra tu bhūmeḥ jāyeta tat prajijñāseta atra vai etasya jāyamānasya
indriyam vīryam apākrāmat tat eva asmai indriyam vīryam āptvā dadhāti somaḥ ca
vai etasya pūṣā ca jāyamānasya indriyam vīryam ayuvetām iyam vai pūṣā oṣadhayaḥ
somaḥ yat saumāpauṣṇaḥ svayā eva asmai devatayā indriyam vīryam āptvā avarunddhe
bhavati eva yāni an avadānīyāni taiḥ nairṛtaiḥ pūrvaiḥ pracaranti nirṛti gṛhītā
vai eṣā strī yā pum rūpā nirṛti gṛhītaḥ eṣa pumān yaḥ strī rūpaḥ nirṛtyāḥ eva
enam tena muñcati na vai nairṛtya āhutiḥ agnim ānaśe yat aṅgāreṣu juhoti tat
svid agnau juhoti tat na yatra vai adaḥ indraḥ vṛṣaṇaśvasya menā āsīt tat enam
nirṛtiḥ pāpmā agṛhṇāt sa yam pāpmānam apāhata sa napuṃsakaḥ abhavat yaḥ pāpmanā
tamasā gṛhītaḥ manyeta saḥ etam aindram napuṃsakam ālabheta yena eva indraḥ
pāpmānam apāhata tena pāpmānam apahate atha aindreṇa indriyam vīryam ātman
dhatte prajāpatiḥ paśūn asṛjata sa vai etam eva agre napuṃsakam asṛjata tam
paśavaḥ anvasṛjyanta atha u āhuḥ etam eva agre sṛṣṭam tvaṣṭre ca patnībhyaḥ ca
napuṃsakam ālabhata tena prajāḥ asṛjata iti yaḥ prajā kāmaḥ vā paśu kāmaḥ vā
syāt saḥ etam tvaṣṭre ca patnībhyaḥ ca napuṃsakam ālabheta mithunam vai tvaṣṭā
ca patnīḥ ca tvaṣṭāram vai etat mithune apyasrāṭ prajananāya tat mithunam tasmāt
eva mithunāt yajamānaḥ prajayā ca paśubhiḥ ca prajāyate prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ
asṛjata tāḥ enam sṛṣṭāḥ atyamanyanta tāḥ atimanyamānāḥ varuṇena agrāhayat tāḥ
varuṇa gṛhītāḥ kṛṣṇaḥ petvaḥ adhyaskandat tasya anuhāya pādam agṛhṇāt tasya
śaphaḥ prāvṛhyata saḥ eka śiti pād abhavat tam acāyat ayam vāva āsām prajānām a
varuṇa gṛhītaḥ anena imāḥ prajāḥ varuṇāt muñcāni iti tam vāruṇam ālabhata tatas
imāḥ prajāḥ varuṇāt prāmucyanta tat varuṇa pramocanīyaḥ eva eṣa yaḥ jyok āmayāvī
syāt tam etena yājayet varuṇena hi vai eṣa pāpmanā gṛhītaḥ atha etasya jyok
āmayati yat vāruṇaḥ varuṇāt eva enam tena muñcati eka śiti pād bhavati evam iva
hi tasya rūpam āsīt samṛddhyai dvīpe yājayet etāḥ vai pratyakṣam vāruṇīḥ yat
āpaḥ sve vai etat yonau pratyakṣam varuṇam avayajati samantam āpaḥ parivahanti
rakṣasām an anvavāyāya vāruṇam kṛṣṇam petvam ālabheta abhicaran yat vāruṇaḥ
varuṇena eva enam grāhayitvā stṛṇute kṛṣṇaḥ bhavati tamaḥ vai kṛṣṇam mṛtyuḥ
tamaḥ mṛtyunā eva enam grāhayati etat vai pāpmanaḥ rūpam yat kṛṣṇam kṛṣṇaḥ iva
hi pāpmā pāpmanā eva enam abhiṣuvati tam niyuñjyāt paśum badhnāmi varuṇāya rājñe
indrāya bhāgam ṛṣabham kevalaḥ hi gātrāṇi devāḥ abhisaṃviśantu yamaḥ gṛhṇātu
nirṛtiḥ sapatnān iti etābhyaḥ eva enam devatābhyaḥ niryācya mṛtyuḥ vai yamaḥ
mṛtyunā eva enam grāhayati agnaye vaiśvānarāya kṛṣṇam petvam ālabheta samāntam
abhidhrokṣyan saṃvatsaraḥ vai agniḥ vaiśvānaraḥ saṃvatsarāya samamyate
saṃvatsaram eva āptvā a varuṇam kāmam abhidruhyati āśvinam kṛṣṇa lalāmam
ālabheta ānujāvaram yājayet aśvinau vai devānām ānujāvarau aśvinau etasya devate
yaḥ ānujāvaraḥ tau eva bhāgadheyena upāsarat tau enam agram pariṇayataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ
bhavati pāpmānam eva apahate lalāmaḥ bhavati mukhataḥ asmin tejaḥ dadhāti
āśvinam kṛṣṇa lalāmam ālabheta āmayāvinam yājayet aśvinau vai devānām bhiṣajau
aśvinau etasya devate yaḥ āmayāvī tau eva bhāgadheyena upāsarat tau enam
bhiṣajyataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ bhavati pāpmānam eva apahate lalāmaḥ bhavati mukhataḥ asmin
tejaḥ dadhāti chandāṃsi vai yajñāya na atiṣṭhanta sa vaṣaṭkāraḥ abhihṛtya
gāyatryāḥ śiraḥ achinat tasmāt śīrṣṇaḥ chinnāt yaḥ rasaḥ akṣarat tāḥ vaśāḥ
abhavan tat vaśānām vaśā tvam atha u āhuḥ vaśam vai tāḥ akṣaran tāḥ vaśāḥ
abhavan tat vaśānām vaśā tvam iti atha u āhuḥ vasā vai sā āsīt tat vasā vai etāḥ
iti tatas yaḥ prathamaḥ rasaḥ prākṣarat tam bṛhaspatiḥ upāgṛhṇāt sā rohiṇī
bārhaspatyā tatas yaḥ atyakṣarat tam mitrāvaruṇau sā dvi rūpā maitrāvaruṇī tatas
yaḥ atyakṣarat tam viśve devāḥ sā bahu rūpā vaiśvadevī tatas yaḥ atyakṣarat tam
agniḥ ca marutaḥ ca sā pṛśniḥ āgnimārutī atha u āhuḥ kṛṣṇa śabalī iti atha yā
vipruṣā āsan tāni imāni anyāni rūpāṇi tatas yaḥ prathamaḥ drapsaḥ parāpatat tam
bṛhaspatiḥ abhihāya abhyagṛhṇāt saḥ ukṣā abhavat tat ukṣṇaḥ ukṣa tvam atha u
āhuḥ yat devatāḥ anuvyaukṣata saḥ ukṣā abhavat tat ukṣṇaḥ ukṣa tvam iti tam
brāhmaṇaspatyam ālabheta brāhmaṇam bhūti kāmam yājayet brahma vai brahmaṇaspatiḥ
brāhmaṇaspatyaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ devatayā svayā eva asmai devatayā indriyam vīryam
āptvā avarunddhe bhavati eva rohiṇīm bārhaspatyām ālabheta brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ
brahma vai bṛhaspatiḥ bārhaspatyaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ devatayā svayā eva asmai devatayā
āptvā tejaḥ brahmavarcasam dadhāti rohiṇī bhavati brahmaṇaḥ rūpam samṛddhyai
maitrāvaruṇīm dvi rūpām ālabheta paśu kāmaḥ ahorātre vai mitrāvaruṇau ahorātre
anu paśavaḥ prajāyante tau eva bhāgadheyena upāsarat tau asmai paśūn
prajanayataḥ chandasām vai eṣa rasaḥ chandasām eva asmai rasena paśūn dhattaḥ
dvi rūpā bhavati samṛddhyai vaiśvadevīm bahu rūpām ālabheta yasmai kāmāya
kāmayeta sarvāḥ vai etāḥ devatāḥ sarvāḥ vai etat devatāḥ kāmāya bhāgadheyena
upāsarat tāḥ asmai kāmam samardhayanti yad kāmaḥ bhavati chandasām vai eṣa rasaḥ
chandasām eva asmai rasena dadhati bahu rūpā bhavati samṛddhyai āgnimārutīm
pṛśnim ālabheta vṛṣṭi kāmaḥ agniḥ vai itas vṛṣṭim īṭṭe marutaḥ amutas cyāvayanti
ete vai vṛṣṭyāḥ pradātāraḥ tān eva bhāgadheyena upāsarat te asmai vṛṣṭim
prayacchanti chandasām vai eṣa rasaḥ rasaḥ vṛṣṭiḥ chandasām eva asmai rasena
rasam vṛṣṭim ninayanti pṛśniḥ bhavati pṛśni mātaraḥ hi marutaḥ bhaumīm kṛṣṇa
śabalīm ālabheta anna kāmaḥ iyam vai annasya pradātrikā tām eva bhāgadheyena
upāsarat sā asmai annādyam prayacchati na carma api āhareyuḥ anannam vai carma
anannam kṛṣṇam anannena eva anannam apahatya annādyam ātman dhatte yat vai tat
śīrṣṇaḥ chinnāt tejaḥ indriyam vīryam parāpatat sā babhruḥ vaśā bhavat tat eṣā
vaśā annam eva itarāḥ tām brāhmaṇaspatyām ālabheta abhicaran brahma vai
brahmaṇaspatiḥ brāhmaṇaspatyaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ devatayā yāvat eva brahma tena enam
sarveṇa abhicarati tejasā enam pracchinatti stṛṇute eva babhruḥ bhavati
brahmaṇaḥ rūpam samṛddhyai saurīm śvetām ālabheta brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ asau vai
ādityaḥ brahmavarcasasya pradātā tam eva bhāgadheyena upāsarat saḥ asmai
brahmavarcasam prayacchati śvetā bhavati brahmaṇaḥ rūpam samṛddhyai
maitrāvaruṇīm kṛṣṇa karṇīm ālabheta vṛṣṭi kāmaḥ ahorātre vai mitrāvaruṇau
ahorātre anuvarṣati etat vai ahnaḥ rūpam yat śuklam yat kṛṣṇam tat rātreḥ dvi
rūpā bhavati samṛddhyai yaḥ prathamaḥ ekāṣṭakāyām jāyeta yaḥ tam ālapsyamānaḥ
syāt saḥ āgneyam aṣṭākapālam nirvapet agniḥ vai paśūnām yoniḥ svāt eva enān
yoneḥ niṣkrīṇāti ā medhyāt bhavitoḥ agnaye vaiśvānarāya dvādaśa kapālam māsi
māsi nirvapet saṃvatsaraḥ vai agniḥ vaiśvānaraḥ saṃvatsarāt eva enam niṣkrīṇāti
sa yadā medham gacchet atha indrāya abhimāti ghne ālabheta abhimātiḥ vai pāpmā
bhrātṛvyaḥ indriyeṇa eva abhimātim pāpmānam bhrātṛvyam apahate aśvaḥ a vyupta
vahaḥ dakṣiṇā eṣa vai vyāvṛttaḥ pāpmanā pāpmanā eva enam vyāvartayati atha yaḥ
aparasyām ekāṣṭakāyām jāyeta tam evam eva utsṛjya atha indrāya vṛtrature
ālabheta abhimātiḥ vai pāpmā bhrātṛvyaḥ indriyeṇa eva abhimātim pāpmānam
bhrātṛvyam apahatya vṛtratūr eva abhūt svārājyam eva gacchati vṛtratūr iti hi
etam āhuḥ yaḥ svārājyam gacchati śatam a vyupta vahāḥ dakṣiṇā ete vai vyāvṛttāḥ
pāpmanā pāpmanā eva enam vyāvartayati śatam bhavanti śata āyuḥ vai puruṣaḥ śata
vīryaḥ āyuḥ eva vīryam āpnoti devāḥ ca vai asurāḥ ca aspardhanta te abruvan
brahmaṇi naḥ asmin vijayethām iti aruṇaḥ tūparaḥ caitreyaḥ devānām āsīt śyetaḥ
ayaḥ śṛṅgaḥ śyaineyaḥ asurāṇām te asurāḥ utkrodinaḥ acaran arāḍaḥ asmākam
tūparaḥ amīṣām iti tau vai samalabhetām tasya devāḥ kṣura pavi śiraḥ akurvan
tasya antarā śṛṅge śiraḥ vyavadhāya viṣvañcam vyarujat yā āsurī vāc avadat sā
imām prāviśat yā udajayat sā vanaspatīn vanaspatīn tasmāt brāhmaṇaḥ mṛd mayena
na pibet asuryā vācā ātmānam na id saṃsṛjai iti tat yaḥ evam vidvān amṛtpātrapaḥ
bhavati ujjitam eva vācaḥ upaiti tam brāhmaṇaspatyam ālabheta abhicaran brahma
vai brahmaṇaspatiḥ brāhmaṇaspatyaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ devatayā yāvat eva brahma tena enam
sarveṇa abhicarati tejasā enam pracchinatti stṛṇute eva aruṇaḥ tūparaḥ bhavati
evam iva hi tasya rūpam āsīt samṛddhyai devāḥ asurān hatvā ebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ
prāṇudanta te rātrīm prāviśan tān aśvinau anuprāviśatām tau tamaḥ paryagṛhṇāt
tau etam āśvinam añjim ālabhetām tena tamaḥ apāghnātām asau enau ādityaḥ
purastāt jyotiṣā pratyāgacchat saḥ ābhyām tamaḥ adhyapāhan yaḥ pāpmanā tamasā
gṛhītaḥ manyeta saḥ etam āśvinam añjim ālabheta yena eva aśvinau tamaḥ
apāghnātām tena pāpmānam apahate asau enam ādityaḥ purastāt jyotiṣā
pratyāgacchati saḥ asmāt tamaḥ adhyapahanti asau vai ādityaḥ tejobhiḥ vyārdhyata
tatas idam sarvam tamaḥ abhavat sa prajāpatiḥ etān daśa ṛṣabhān apaśyat atha u
āhuḥ indraḥ apaśyat iti tān aindrān ālabhata taiḥ asmin indriyāṇi vīryāṇi āptvā
adadhāt yat lalāmāḥ ālabhyanta mukhataḥ asmin taiḥ tejaḥ adadhāt yat śiti
kakudaḥ upariṣṭāt taiḥ yat śveta anūkāśāḥ paścāt taiḥ tatas vai asau ādityaḥ
sarvatas tejasvī abhavat yaḥ tejaskāmaḥ syāt saḥ etān aindrān ṛṣabhān ālabheta
yat lalāmāḥ ālabhyante mukhataḥ asmin taiḥ tejaḥ dadhāti yat śiti kakudaḥ
upariṣṭāt taiḥ yat śveta anūkāśāḥ paścāt taiḥ sarvatas eva enam tejasvinam
karoti amuṣya enam ādityasya mātrām gamayati prājāpatyam daśamam dvādaśe māse
ālabheta dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaram eva āptvā avarunddhe nava
ālabhyante nava vai prāṇāḥ prāṇāḥ khalu vai puruṣe vīryam prāṇān asmin vīryam
dadhāti daśā ālabhyante daśa akṣarā virāj virāj etāni eva indriyāṇi vīryāṇi
ātman dhitvā iyam virāj asyām eva pratitiṣṭhati atha yasya puroḍāśe amedhyam
āpadyeta kā tatra prāyaścittiḥ ājyena abhighārya apsu antar iti sakṛt eva apsu
hutvā atha āhavanīye ājya āhutī juhuyāt asapatnam purastāt iti etābhyām ṛgbhyām
atha yasya puroḍāśaḥ kṣāmaḥ bhavati kā tatra prāyaścittiḥ saḥ agnaye kṣāmavate
aṣṭākapālam puroḍāśam nirvapet nityāḥ purastāddhomāḥ saṃsthita homeṣu pṛtanā
jitam sahamānam iti madhyatas opya tathā saṃsrāva bhāgaiḥ saṃsthāpayet atha
āhavanīye tābhyām ṛgbhyām atha yasya agnihotram tṛtīye nitya homa kāle
vicchidyeta kā tatra prāyaścittiḥ saḥ agnaye tantumate aṣṭākapālam puroḍāśam
nirvapet nityāḥ purastāddhomāḥ saṃsthita homeṣu tvam agne saprathāḥ asi juṣṭaḥ
hotā vareṇyaḥ tvayā yajñam vitanvate iti madhyatas opya saṃsrāva bhāgaiḥ
saṃsthāpayet asapatnam purastāt iti etābhyām ṛgbhyām atha yasya sāṃnāyyam
vyāpadyeta kā tatra prāyaścittiḥ prātardoham dvaidham kṛtvā tena yajeta atha
āhavanīye ājya āhutim juhuyāt trātāram indram iti etayā ṛcā prātardoham ced
apahareyuḥ sāyaṃdoham dvaidham kṛtvā tena yajeta atha āhavanīye ājya āhutim
juhuyāt trātāram indram iti etayā ṛcā atha ced sarvam eva sāṃnāyyam vyāpadyeta
kā tatra prāyaścittiḥ aindram puroḍāśam māhendram vā sāṃnāyyasya āyatane
pratiṣṭhāpya tena yajeta atha āhavanīye ājya āhutim juhuyāt trātāram indram iti
etayā ṛcā atha yasya havīṃṣi vyāpadyeran kā tatra prāyaścittiḥ ājyasya etāni
nirupya tena yajeta atha āhavanīye ājya āhutim juhuyāt trātāram indram iti etayā
ṛcā atha ced sarvāṇi eva havīṃṣi vyāpadyeran kā tatra prāyaścittiḥ ājyasya etāni
nirupya etayā ājya haviṣā iṣṭyā yajeran iti api hi kīrtitam madhyāḥ tu eva
bhavanti taiḥ yajeta atha āhavanīye ājya āhutim juhuyāt trātāram indram iti
etayā ṛcā atha atas abhyuddṛṣṭāni iti ācakṣate adya sāyam amāvāsyā bhaviṣyati
iti na pratiharaṇāya ca sa syāt atha sa yaḥ anyaḥ brūyāt adarśam ca adya paścāt
iti tam tu kim iti brūyāt atha vā sa syāt eva adhas tām eva prāyaścittim kṛtvā
yajeta iti dvaipāyanaḥ kṛtasya vai prāyaścittiḥ bhavati iti lāṅgaliḥ yena pathā
vaivasvataḥ yamaḥ rājā naḥ yayau agniḥ naḥ tena nayatu prajānan vaiśvānaraḥ
pathikṛt viśvak ṛṣṭiḥ samāpya eva tena haviṣā yat daivatam tat haviḥ syāt atha
anyat haviḥ nirvapet agnaye pathikṛte puroḍāśam indrāya vṛtra ghne puroḍāśam
vaiśvānaram dvādaśa kapālam puroḍāśam nityāḥ purastāddhomāḥ saṃsthita homeṣu
tvam agne saprathāḥ asi yena pathā vaivasvataḥ śāsaḥ itthā mahān asi vaiśvānaraḥ
naḥ ūtaye iti madhyatas opya saṃsrāva bhāgaiḥ saṃsthāpayet mahāpāthikṛti iti
ācakṣate tat āhuḥ na te viduḥ ye tathā kurvanti atha nu katham iti gārhapatya
ājyam vilāya utpūya caturgṛhītam gṛhītvā āhavanīya gārhapatyau antareṇa
ativrajya juhuyāt asau yaḥ udayāt puras vasānaḥ nīlalohitaḥ atha dṛṣṭam a dṛṣṭam
naḥ duṣkṛtam tat svāhā iti evam eva abhyuddṛṣṭe asau yaḥ udayāt paścāt vasānaḥ
nīlalohitaḥ atha dṛṣṭam a dṛṣṭam naḥ duṣkṛtam karat svāhā iti sa yaḥ evam etena
tejasā ājyena yaśasā prīṇāti saḥ asya eṣa dṛṣṭaḥ prāṇān yaśasā prīṇāti atha yaḥ
a hutvā navam prāśnīyāt agnau vā āgamayet kā tatra prāyaścittiḥ saḥ agnaye
vratapataye aṣṭākapālam puroḍāśam nirvapet nityāḥ purastāddhomāḥ saṃsthita
homeṣu agne prāśnāhi prathamaḥ tvam hi vettha yathā haviḥ vanvan haviḥ yathā
devebhyaḥ yajamānam ca vardhaya agniḥ ca deva savitar tvam agne vrata pāḥ asi
idāvatsarāya iti madhyatas opya saṃsrāva bhāgaiḥ saṃsthāpayet yadi anugatam
agnim śaṅkamānāḥ mantheyuḥ mathite agnim adhigaccheyuḥ bhadrāt adhi śreyaḥ prehi
iti vyāhṛtibhiḥ ca mathitam samāropya atha itarasmin punar tvā prāṇaḥ iti
pañcabhiḥ ājya āhutīḥ hutvā yathoktam prākṛtā vṛttiḥ atha yasya agnihotrī gharma
dughā duhyamānā vāśyet kā tatra prāyaścittiḥ aśanā pipāse eva eṣā yajamānasya
saṃprakhyāya vāśyati iti tām tṛṇam api ādayet sūyavasāt bhagavatī iti etayā ṛcā
atha āhavanīye ājya āhutīḥ juhuyāt dhātā dadhātu naḥ pūrṇāḥ iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām
atha yasya agnihotrī gharma dughā vā duhyamānā upaviśet kā tatra prāyaścittiḥ
bhayam vai eṣā yajamānasya prakhyāya upaviśati tasyāḥ ūdhasi uda pātram ninayet
śam naḥ devīḥ abhiṣṭayaḥ iti dvābhyām tām anumantrayate yasmāt bhītā niṣīdasi
tatas naḥ abhayam kṛdhi paśūn naḥ sarvān gopāya namaḥ rudrāya mīḍhuṣe iti atha
enām utthāpayati uttiṣṭha devi adite devān yajñena bodhaya indrāya kṛṇvatī
bhāgam mitrāya varuṇāya ca iti utthitām anumantrayate udasthāt devi adite devān
yajñena bodhaya āyuḥ ca tasya bhūtim ca yajamānam ca vardhaya iti atha āhavanīye
ājya āhutīḥ juhuyāt mā naḥ vidan iti etaiḥ abhayaiḥ raudraiḥ ca sa bhūyas
aśrāmyat bhūyas atapyat bhūyas ātmānam samatapat tasya śrāntasya taptasya
