hotāram brahmāṇam vaṣaṭkāram veda tasya tu eva hutam prāṇaḥ vai agnihotrasya
āśrāvitam apānaḥ pratyāśrāvitam manaḥ hotā cakṣuḥ brahmā nimeṣaḥ vaṣaṭkāraḥ yaḥ
evam veda tasya tu eva hutam sāyaṃyāvānaḥ ca vai devāḥ prātaryāvāṇaḥ ca
agnihotriṇaḥ gṛham āgacchanti tān yat na tarpayet prajayā asya paśubhiḥ
vitiṣṭheran yat tarpayet tṛptāḥ enam prajayā paśubhiḥ tarpayeyuḥ sajūs devaiḥ
sāyaṃyāvabhiḥ iti sāyam saṃmṛśati sajūs devaiḥ prātaryāvabhiḥ iti prātar ye ca
eva devāḥ sāyaṃyāvānaḥ ye ca prātaryāvāṇaḥ tān eva ubhayān tarpayati te enam
tṛptāḥ prajayā paśubhiḥ tarpayanti aruṇaḥ ha sma āha aupaveśiḥ agnihotre eva
aham sāyam prātar vajram bhrātṛvyebhyaḥ praharāmi tasmāt mat pāpīyāṃsaḥ
bhrātṛvyāḥ iti catuḥ unnayati dvis juhoti samidh saptamī sapta padā śakvarī
śākvaraḥ vajraḥ agnihotre eva tat sāyam prātar vajram yajamānaḥ bhrātṛvyāya
praharati bhavati ātmanā parā asya bhrātṛvyaḥ bhavati prajāpatiḥ akāmayata darśa
pūrṇamāsau sṛjeya iti saḥ etam caturhotāram apaśyat tam manasā anudrutya
āhavanīye ajuhot tatas vai sa darśa pūrṇamāsau asṛjata tau asmāt sṛṣṭau
apākrāmatām tau graheṇa agṛhṇāt tat grahasya graha tvam darśa pūrṇamāsau
ālabhamānaḥ caturhotāram manasā anudrutya āhavanīye juhuyāt darśa pūrṇamāsau eva
sṛṣṭvā ārabhya pratanute grahaḥ bhavati darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ sṛṣṭayoḥ dhṛtyai saḥ
akāmayata cāturmāsyāni sṛjeya iti saḥ etam pañcahotāram apaśyat tam manasā
anudrutya āhavanīye ajuhot tatas vai sa cāturmāsyāni asṛjata tāni asmāt sṛṣṭāni
apākrāman tāni graheṇa agṛhṇāt tat grahasya graha tvam cāturmāsyāni ālabhamānaḥ
pañcahotāram manasā anudrutya āhavanīye juhuyāt cāturmāsyāni eva sṛṣṭvā ārabhya
pratanute grahaḥ bhavati cāturmāsyānām sṛṣṭānām dhṛtyai saḥ akāmayata
paśubandham sṛjeya iti saḥ etam ṣaḍḍhotāram apaśyat tam manasā anudrutya
āhavanīye ajuhot tatas vai sa paśubandham asṛjata saḥ asmāt sṛṣṭaḥ apākrāmat tam
graheṇa agṛhṇāt tat grahasya graha tvam paśubandhena yakṣyamāṇaḥ ṣaḍḍhotāram
manasā anudrutya āhavanīye juhuyāt paśubandham eva sṛṣṭvā ārabhya pratanute
grahaḥ bhavati paśubandhasya sṛṣṭasya dhṛtyai saḥ akāmayata saumyam adhvaram
sṛjeya iti saḥ etam saptahotāram apaśyat tam manasā anudrutya āhavanīye ajuhot
tatas vai sa saumyam adhvaram asṛjata saḥ asmāt sṛṣṭaḥ apākrāmat tam graheṇa
agṛhṇāt tat grahasya graha tvam dīkṣiṣyamāṇaḥ saptahotāram manasā anudrutya
āhavanīye juhuyāt saumyam eva adhvaram sṛṣṭvā ārabhya pratanute grahaḥ bhavati
saumyasya adhvarasya sṛṣṭasya dhṛtyai devebhyaḥ vai yajñaḥ na prābhavat tam
etāvacchas samabharan yat saṃbhārāḥ tatas vai tebhyaḥ yajñaḥ prābhavat yat
saṃbhārāḥ bhavanti yajñasya prabhūtyai ātithyam āsādya vyācaṣṭe yajña mukham vai
ātithyam mukhataḥ eva yajñam saṃbhṛtya pratanute ayajñaḥ vai eṣaḥ yaḥ apatnīkaḥ
na prajāḥ prajāyeran patnīḥ vyācaṣṭe yajñam eva akaḥ prajānām prajananāya
upasatsu vyācaṣṭe etat vai patnīnām āyatanam sve eva enāḥ āyatane avakalpayati
prajāpatiḥ akāmayata prajāyeya iti sa tapaḥ atapyata sa trivṛtam stomam asṛjata
tam pañcadaśa stomaḥ madhyataḥ udatṛṇat tau pūrvapakṣaḥ ca aparapakṣaḥ ca
abhavatām pūrvapakṣam devāḥ anvasṛjyanta aparapakṣam anu asurāḥ tatas devāḥ
abhavan parā asurāḥ yam kāmayeta vasīyān syāt iti tam pūrvapakṣe yājayet vasīyān
eva bhavati yam kāmayeta pāpīyān syāt iti tam aparapakṣe yājayet pāpīyān eva
bhavati tasmāt pūrvapakṣaḥ aparapakṣāt kāruṇyataraḥ prajāpatiḥ vai daśahotā
caturhotā pañcahotā ṣaḍḍhotā saptahotā ṛtavaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ prajāḥ paśavaḥ ime
lokāḥ yaḥ evam prajāpatim bahoḥ bhūyāṃsam veda bahoḥ eva bhūyān bhavati
prajāpatiḥ deva asurān asṛjata saḥ indram api na asṛjata tam devāḥ abruvan
indram naḥ janayā iti saḥ abravīt yathā aham yuṣmān tapasā asṛkṣi evam indram
janayadhvam iti te tapaḥ atapyanta te ātman indram apaśyan tam abruvan jāyasva
iti saḥ abravīt kim bhāgadheyam abhijaniṣye iti ṛtūn saṃvatsaram prajāḥ paśūn
imān lokān iti abruvan tam vai mā āhutyā prajanayata iti abravīt tam caturhotrā
prājanayan yaḥ kāmayeta vīraḥ me ājāyeta iti sa caturhotāram juhuyāt prajāpatiḥ
vai caturhotā prajāpatiḥ eva bhūtvā prajāyate jajanat indram indriyāya svāhā iti
graheṇa juhoti ā asya vīraḥ jāyate vīram hi devāḥ etayā āhutyā prājanayan
ādityāḥ ca aṅgirasaḥ ca suvarge loke aspardhanta vayam pūrve suvargam lokam
iyāma vayam pūrve iti te ādityāḥ etam pañcahotāram apaśyan tam purā
prātaranuvākāt āgnīdhre ajuhavuḥ tatas vai te pūrve suvargam lokam āyan yaḥ
suvarga kāmaḥ syāt sa pañcahotāram purā prātaranuvākāt āgnīdhre juhuyāt
saṃvatsaraḥ vai pañcahotā saṃvatsaraḥ suvargaḥ lokaḥ saṃvatsare eva ṛtuṣu
pratiṣṭhāya suvargam lokam eti te abruvan aṅgirasaḥ ādityān kva stha kva vaḥ
sadbhyaḥ havyam vakṣyāmaḥ iti chandaḥsu iti abruvan gāyatriyām triṣṭubhi
jagatyām iti tasmāt chandaḥsu sadbhyaḥ ādityebhyaḥ āṅgīrasīḥ prajāḥ havyam
vahanti vahanti asmai prajāḥ balim ā enam a pratikhyātam gacchati yaḥ evam veda
dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca ṛtavaḥ trayaḥ ime lokāḥ asau ādityaḥ ekaviṃśaḥ etasmin vai
eṣa śritaḥ etasmin pratiṣṭhitaḥ yaḥ evam etam śritam pratiṣṭhitam veda prati eva
tiṣṭhati prajāpatiḥ akāmayata prajāyeya iti saḥ etam daśahotāram apaśyat tena
daśadhā ātmānam vidhāya daśahotrā atapyata tasya cittiḥ sruc āsīt cittam ājyam
tasya etāvatī eva vāc āsīt etāvān yajñakratuḥ sa caturhotāram asṛjata saḥ
anandat asṛkṣi vai imam iti tasya somaḥ haviḥ āsīt sa caturhotrā atapyata saḥ
atāmyat sa bhūḥ iti vyāharat sa bhūmim asṛjata agnihotram darśa pūrṇamāsau
yajūṃṣi sa dvitīyam atapyata saḥ atāmyat sa bhuvaḥ iti vyāharat saḥ antarikṣam
asṛjata cāturmāsyāni sāmāni sa tṛtīyam atapyata saḥ atāmyat sa suvar iti
vyāharat sa divam asṛjata agniṣṭomam ukthyam atirātram ṛcaḥ etāḥ vai vyāhṛtayaḥ
ime lokāḥ imān khalu vai lokān anu prajāḥ paśavaḥ chandāṃsi prājāyanta yaḥ evam
etāḥ prajāpateḥ prathamāḥ vyāhṛtīḥ prajātāḥ veda pra prajayā paśubhiḥ mithunaiḥ
jāyate sa pañcahotāram asṛjata sa haviḥ na avindata tasmai somaḥ tanuvam
prāyacchat etat te haviḥ iti sa pañcahotrā atapyata saḥ atāmyat sa pratyaṅ
abādhata saḥ asurān asṛjata tat asya apriyam āsīt tat durvarṇam hiraṇyam abhavat
tat durvarṇasya hiraṇyasya janma sa dvitīyam atapyata saḥ atāmyat sa prāṅ
abādhata sa devān asṛjata tat asya priyam āsīt tat suvarṇam hiraṇyam abhavat tat
suvarṇasya hiraṇyasya janma yaḥ evam suvarṇasya hiraṇyasya janma veda suvarṇaḥ
ātmanā bhavati durvarṇaḥ asya bhrātṛvyaḥ tasmāt suvarṇam hiraṇyam bhāryam
suvarṇaḥ eva bhavati ā enam priyam gacchati na apriyam sa saptahotāram asṛjata
sa saptahotrā eva suvargam lokam ait triṇavena stomena ebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ asurān
prāṇudata trayastriṃśena pratyatiṣṭhat ekaviṃśena rucam adhatta saptadaśena
prājāyata yaḥ evam vidvān somena yajate saptahotrā eva suvargam lokam eti
triṇavena stomena ebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ bhrātṛvyān praṇudate trayastriṃśena
pratitiṣṭhati ekaviṃśena rucam dhatte saptadaśena prajāyate tasmāt saptadaśaḥ
stomaḥ na nirhṛtyaḥ prajāpatiḥ vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatim eva madhyataḥ dhatte
prajātyai devāḥ vai varuṇam ayājayan sa yasyai yasyai devatāyai dakṣiṇām anayat
tām avlīnāt te abruvan vyāvṛtya pratigṛhṇāma tathā naḥ dakṣiṇā na vleṣyati iti
te vyāvṛtya pratyagṛhṇan tatas vai tān dakṣiṇā na avlīnāt yaḥ evam vidvān
vyāvṛtya dakṣiṇām pratigṛhṇāti na enam dakṣiṇā vlīnāti rājā tvā varuṇaḥ nayatu
devi dakṣiṇe agnaye hiraṇyam iti āha āgneyam vai hiraṇyam svayā eva enat
devatayā pratigṛhṇāti somāya vāsaḥ iti āha saumyam vai vāsaḥ svayā eva enat
devatayā pratigṛhṇāti rudrāya gām iti āha raudrī vai gauḥ svayā eva enām
devatayā pratigṛhṇāti varuṇāya aśvam iti āha vāruṇaḥ vai aśvaḥ svayā eva enam
devatayā pratigṛhṇāti prajāpataye puruṣam iti āha prājāpatyaḥ vai puruṣaḥ svayā
eva enam devatayā pratigṛhṇāti manave talpam iti āha mānavaḥ vai talpaḥ svayā
eva enam devatayā pratigṛhṇāti uttānāya āṅgīrasāya anaḥ iti āha iyam vai uttānaḥ
āṅgīrasaḥ anayā eva enat pratigṛhṇāti vaiśvānaryā ṛcā ratham pratigṛhṇāti
vaiśvānaraḥ vai devatayā rathaḥ svayā eva enam devatayā pratigṛhṇāti tena amṛta
tvam aśyām iti āha amṛtam eva ātman dhatte vayaḥ dātre iti āha vayaḥ eva enam
kṛtvā suvargam lokam gamayati mayaḥ mahyam astu pratigrahītre iti āha yat vai
śivam tat mayaḥ ātmanaḥ eva eṣā parīttiḥ kaḥ idam kasmai adāt iti āha prajāpatiḥ
vai kaḥ sa prajāpataye dadāti kāmaḥ kāmāya iti āha kāmena hi dadāti kāmena
pratigṛhṇāti kāmaḥ dātā kāmaḥ pratigrahītā iti āha kāmaḥ hi dātā kāmaḥ
pratigrahītā kāmam samudram āviśa iti āha samudraḥ iva hi kāmaḥ na iva hi
kāmasya antaḥ asti na samudrasya kāmena tvā pratigṛhṇāmi iti āha yena kāmena
pratigṛhṇāti saḥ eva enam amuṣmin loke kāmaḥ āgacchati kāma etat te eṣā te kāma
dakṣiṇā iti āha kāme eva tat yajamānaḥ amuṣmin loke dakṣiṇām icchati na
pratigrahītari yaḥ evam vidvān dakṣiṇām pratigṛhṇāti anṛṇām eva enām
pratigṛhṇāti atha vitānasya brahmā karmāṇi brahmaveda vid dakṣiṇatas vidhivat
upaviśati vāgyataḥ homān ādiṣṭān anumantrayate mantra anādeśe liṅgavatā iti
bhāgaliḥ prajāpate na tvat etāni anyaḥ iti yuvā kauśikaḥ yathādevatam iti
māṭharaḥ om bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar janat om iti ācāryāḥ pradhāna homa mantrān
purastāddhoma saṃsthita homeṣu āvapanti eke vācayati yajamānam bhṛgu aṅgiraḥ
vidā saṃskṛtam agniḥ āhavanīyaḥ saṃcara vāc yamau brahma vat yajamānasya devatā
haviḥ dakṣiṇāḥ yajurvedāt āgnīdhrasya uttaratas upācāraḥ sphya saṃmārga pāṇeḥ
tiṣṭhataḥ dakṣiṇā mukhasya yathāsvaram astu śrauṣaṭ iti pratyāśrāvaṇam yajamānaḥ
amāvāsyāyām pūrvedyus upavatsyadbhaktam aśnāti aparāhṇe āhavanīya gārhapatya
dakṣiṇāgniṣu mama agne varcaḥ iti samidhaḥ anvādadhāti vibhāgam vratam upaiti
vratena tvam vrata pate iti anaśanam ityādi mama agne varcaḥ iti catasṛbhiḥ
devatāḥ parigṛhṇāti sinīvāli pṛthuṣṭuke iti mantra uktām anu adya naḥ iti
paurṇamāsyām prātar hutvā agnihotram kuhūm devīm yat te devāḥ iti amāvāsyāyām
rākām aham pūrṇā paścāt iti paurṇamāsyām atha brahmāṇam vṛṇīte bhū pate bhuvana
pate bhuvām pate mahataḥ bhūtasya pate brahmāṇam tvā vṛṇīmahe iti vṛtaḥ japati
aham bhū patiḥ aham bhuvana patiḥ aham bhuvām patiḥ aham mahataḥ bhūtasya patiḥ
tat aham manase prabravīmi manaḥ vāce vāc gāyatryai gāyatrī uṣṇihe uṣṇih
anuṣṭubhe anuṣṭubh bṛhatyai bṛhatī paṅktaye paṅktiḥ triṣṭubhe triṣṭubh jagatyai
jagatī prajāpataye prajāpatiḥ viśvebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ om bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar janat om
iti apratiratham ca jīvābhiḥ ācamya ityādi prapadana antam uttaratas agneḥ
dakṣiṇatas aparāgnibhyām prapadya āsādam vīkṣya ahe daidhiṣavyaḥ ityādi ā
dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ samīkṣaṇāt yatra vijānāti brahman apaḥ praṇeṣyāmi iti tatra
praṇaya yajñam devatāḥ vardhaya tvam nākasya pṛṣṭhe svarge loke yajamānaḥ astu
saptarṣīṇām sukṛtām yatra lokaḥ tatra imam yajñam yajamānam ca dhehi om bhūḥ
bhuvaḥ svar janat om praṇaya iti yathāsvaram anujānāti evam sarvatra anujñā
padam ādi antayoḥ praṇītāsu praṇīyamānāsu vācam yacchati ā haviṣkṛtaḥ udvādanāt
yadi vadet vaiṣṇavīm japet āgnīdhraḥ anvāhārya adhiśrayaṇāt vedim parisamuhya
utkara deśe nidadhāti stambayajuṣaḥ dvitīya purīṣe prahṛte avastabhnāti ca araro
divam mā paptaḥ iti bṛhaspate parigṛhāṇa iti vedim parigṛhyamāṇām anumantrayate
āśāsānā saumanasam iti patnīm saṃnahyamānām ghṛtam te agne iti ājye nirupyamāṇe
agnim paristṛṇīhi iti vedim paristṛṇantam yasyām vṛkṣāḥ iti paridhīn
nidhīyamānān ṛṣīṇām prastaraḥ asi iti prastaram āsāditeṣu haviḥṣu uktān
purastāddhomān juhoti abhicāreṣu ābhicārikān saṃsthita homān ca agneḥ manve iti
sāmidhenīḥ anumantrayate prajāpate na tvat etāni anyaḥ iti prājāpatyam āghāram
agnīdh paridhīn ca agnim ca tris tris saṃmṛḍḍhi iti preṣitaḥ āgnīdhraḥ sphyam
agnim ca saṃmārgam antarā kṛtvā paridhīn madhyama dakṣiṇa uttarān tris tris
saṃmārṣṭi agne vāja jit vājam tvā sariṣyantam vāja jitam saṃmārjmi iti
saṃmārgeṇa arvāñcam agnim upavājayati vājam tvā agne jeṣyantam saniṣyantam
saṃmārjmi vājam jaya iti indra imam iti aindram āghāram pravare pravriyamāṇe
vācayet devāḥ pitaraḥ iti tisraḥ grīṣmaḥ hemantaḥ iti prayājān aham jajāna iti
ājyabhāgau yena indrāya iti āgneyam mā vanim mā vācam iti aindrāgnam sāṃnāyyasya
aindram māhendram vā indra imam tvam indraḥ tvam mahendraḥ iti paurṇamāsyām
āgneya agnīṣomīyau antarā upāṃśuyājam agnīṣomīyam asmai kṣatram iti na
amāvāsyāyām avidhānāt ā devānām iti sauviṣṭakṛtam iṣṭe sviṣṭakṛti vācam yacchati
ā anuyājānām prasavāt prāśitram yava mātram adhastāt upariṣṭāt vā abhighāritam
agreṇa adhvaryuḥ pariharati tat sūryasya tvā cakṣuṣā pratīkṣe iti pratīkṣate
devasya tvā savituḥ prasave aśvinoḥ bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām prasūtaḥ praśiṣā
pratigṛhṇāmi iti pratigṛhṇāti tat vyuhya tṛṇāni prāc daṇḍam sthaṇḍile nidadhāti
pṛthivyāḥ tvā nābhau sādayāmi iti agneḥ tvā āsyena ātmā asi ātman ātmānam me mā
hiṃsīḥ svāhā iti anāmikā aṅguṣṭhābhyām dantaiḥ an upaspṛśan prāśnāti prāśitam
anumantrayate yaḥ agniḥ nṛmaṇāḥ nāma brāhmaṇeṣu praviṣṭaḥ tasmin etat su hutam
astu prāśitram tat mā mā hiṃsīt parame vyoman iti mātalyā adbhiḥ mārjayitvā
prāṇān saṃspṛśate vāc me āsan nasoḥ prāṇaḥ cakṣuḥ akṣṇoḥ śrotram karṇayoḥ bāhvoḥ
balam ūrvoḥ ojaḥ jaṅghayoḥ javaḥ pādayoḥ pratiṣṭhā ariṣṭāni me sarva aṅgāni
santu tanūḥ tanvā me saha iti nābhim iḍā eva asmān iti iḍām upahūyamānām
anumantrayate āgnīdhraḥ ṣaḍavattam prāśnāti pṛthivyāḥ tvā dātrā prāśnāmi
antarikṣasya tvā divaḥ tvā iti upa tvā devaḥ iti iḍā bhāgam pratigṛhya indra
gīrbhiḥ iti prāśnanti apaḥ divyāḥ iti tisṛbhiḥ pavitravati mārjayante yajamānaḥ
anvāhāryam antar vedyām prajāpateḥ bhāgaḥ asi ūrjasvān payasvān akṣitaḥ asi
akṣityai tvā mā me kṣeṣṭhāḥ amutra amuṣmin loke iha ca prāṇa apānau me pāhi
samāna vyānau me pāhi udāna rūpe me pāhi ūrj asi ūrjam me dhehi kurvataḥ me mā
kṣeṣṭhāḥ dadataḥ me mā upadasaḥ prajāpatiḥ aham tvayā samakṣam ṛdhyāsam iti
abhimantrya ṛtvigbhyaḥ dadāti dakṣiṇām pratigṛhya kaḥ idam iti uktam saṃpreṣitaḥ
āgnīdhraḥ edhaḥ asi iti samidvatyā samidham ādhāya sakṛt sakṛt paridhīn
saṃmārṣṭi agne vāja vid vājam tvā sasṛvāṃsam vāja jitam saṃmārjmi iti agnim ca
prāñcam vājam tvā agne jigīvāṃsam saṃmārjmi vājam ajaiḥ iti manaḥ jyotiḥ juṣatām
ājyam ariṣṭam yajñam sam imam tanotu bṛhaspatiḥ pratigṛhṇātu naḥ viśve devāsaḥ
iha mādayantām iti anuyājān ye devāḥ divi ṣṭha iti anuvaṣaṭkāram nudasva kāma
iti srucau vipraṇudyamāne anumantrayate sam barhiḥ aktam iti prastaram
prahriyamāṇam saṃsrāva bhāgāḥ iti saṃsrāvam na ghraṃs tatāpa sam varcasā devānām
patnīḥ su gārhapatyaḥ iti patnīsaṃyājān dakṣiṇāgni homān tṛtīyam ulūkhale musale
iti āgnīdhraḥ saṃmārgam agnau praharati yaḥ agnau iti vi te muñcāmi aham viṣyāmi
pra tvā muñcāmi iti patnīm yoktreṇa vimucyamānām anumantrayate vedaḥ svastiḥ iti
vedam vicṛtati samiṣṭa yajuṣaḥ yān āvahaḥ iti ṣaḍbhiḥ saṃsthita homān juhoti
manasaspate iti āsām uttamā praṇītāḥ vimucyamānāḥ sasruṣīḥ iti anumantrayate
yeṣām prayājāḥ iti yajamānam āśāste yat annam iti bhāgam prāśya deva savitar
etat te prāha tat pra ca suva pra ca yaja bṛhaspatiḥ brahmā sa yajñam pāhi sa
yajñapatim pāhi sa mām pāhi sa mām karmaṇyam pāhi iti āha yajamānaḥ uda pātre
añjalau āsikte sam varcasā iti mukham vimārṣṭi antareṇa apara agnī dakṣiṇena
agnim viṣṇukrama ādi īkṣaṇa antam agne gṛhapate iti gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate
yasya uruṣu iti āhavanīyam abhivrajya prāṇa apānau ojaḥ asi iti uktam ayam naḥ
agniḥ iti dvābhyām upasthāya sam yajñapatiḥ āśiṣā iti bhāgam prāśnāti vratāni
vratapataye iti vrata visarjanīm ādadhāti etasmāt yājamānāt ṛte apasiddhiḥ tat
api ślokau vadataḥ pravargyaḥ yājamānāni patnīmantrāḥ ca tat trayam aṅgam ca
yajñe bhavati ṛte ca ebhyaḥ apasidhyati pravargyāt śauryam āpnoti yājamānena ca
āśiṣaḥ patnīmantraiḥ prajām āyuḥ tasmāt tena eva sidhyati iti darśa paurṇamāsau
triṃśatam varṇāni pañcadaśa dākṣāyaṇayajñaḥ paurṇamāsyām paurṇamāsam aparedyus
ca evam amāvāsyāyām saṃvatsaram vā sākaṃprasthāyya ādīni ca etābhyām iṣṭayaḥ
vyākhyātāḥ vyākhyātāḥ atha agnyādheyam vasante brāhmaṇasya grīṣme rājanyasya
varṣāsu vaiśyasya trīṇi parvāṇi iti uktam yadā eva kadācid ādadhyāt śraddhā tu
eva enam na atīyāt uktaḥ brahmaudanaḥ ṛtvijaḥ upasādayati abhimantritam vā
ādadhyāt yaḥ aśvatthaḥ śamī garbhaḥ āruroha tve sacā tam te harāmi brahmaṇā
yajñiyaiḥ ketubhiḥ saha jātavedaḥ bhuvanasya yat retaḥ iha siñca tapasaḥ yat
janiṣyate agnim aśvatthāt adhi havya vāham śamī garbhāt janayan yaḥ mayobhūḥ iti
mantra ukte araṇī gṛhṇantam ādhāsyamānam vācayati vāgyatāḥ jāgrataḥ rātrim āsate
para rātram vā bṛhaspate savitar iti svapataḥ bodhayet uṣasi śāntyudakam karoti
cityā ādibhiḥ ātharvaṇībhiḥ āṅgirasībhiḥ ca cātanaiḥ mātṛnāmabhiḥ vāstoṣpatyaiḥ
anuyojitaiḥ tena agnipadam aśvam snāpayan abhyukṣan śamayati an udite udite vā
ādhāsyamānaḥ ākṛtiloṣṭa iti ādi upasthāna antam yat tvā kruddhāḥ iti
upoddharanti ācāryāḥ āhavanīya dakṣiṇāgnyoḥ lakṣaṇa antam purīṣyaḥ asi viśva
bharāḥ atharvā tvā prathamaḥ niḥ amanthat agne tvām agne puṣkarāt adhi atharvā
niḥ amanthata mūrdhnaḥ viśvasya vāghataḥ tam u tvā dadhyaṅ ṛṣiḥ putraḥ īdhe
atharvaṇaḥ vṛtra haṇam puraṃdaram tam u tvā pāthyaḥ vṛṣā samīdhe dasyu hantamam
dhanaṃjayam raṇe raṇe iti mathyamānam anumantrayate jātam su jātam jātavedasam
iti jātarūpeṇa antardhāya nāsikyena ūṣmaṇā āsyena vā mayi agre iti etayā apānati
aśva pādam lakṣaṇe nidhāpyamānam sam adhvarāya iti anumantrayate rathena agnau
praṇīyamāne aśve anvārabdham vācayati trayodaśyām āgnāvaiṣṇavam ekādaśa kapālam
nirvapet darśa pūrṇamāsau āripsamānaḥ agnāviṣṇū iti pūrvam paurṇamāsam
ārabhamāṇaḥ sarasvatyai ca carum sarasvate dvādaśa kapālam sarasvati vrateṣu
yasya vratam iti ādhānāt vṛddhiḥ ced arvāk saṃvatsarāt rohiṇyām utsṛjya
agnihotram punarvasvoḥ punar ādadhīta om bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar janat om iti oṣadhīṣu
pakvāsu āgrayaṇeṣṭiḥ idāvatsarāya iti purastāddhoma saṃsthita homeṣu āvapeta
agne indra iti āgnendram aindrāgnam ca indra agnī asmān iti yat vidvāṃsaḥ
dyāvāpṛthivī upaśrutyā somaḥ vīrudhām iti vaiśvadeva dyāvāpṛthivīya saumyān
phālgunyām paurṇamāsyām cāturmāsyāni prayuñjīta pūrvedyus vaiśvānara pārjanya
iṣṭiḥ vai agne vaiśvānara abhi kranda stanaya iti vaiśvadeve nirmathyam prahṛtam
bhavatam naḥ samanasau iti anumantrayate agnau agniḥ iti homam evam nirmanthanam
āgneyam saumyam sāvitram sārasvatam pauṣṇam mārutam vaiśvadevam dyāvāpṛthivīyam
agniḥ vanaspatīnām somaḥ vīrudhām savitā prasavānām sarasvati vrateṣu prapathe
pathām marutaḥ parvatānām viśve devāḥ mama dyāvāpṛthivī dātrāṇām iti vājinasya
arvācīnam vasu vidam iti tasya prāṇabhakṣān bhakṣayanti hotṛ adhvaryu brahma
āgnīdhrāḥ pratyakṣam yajamānaḥ mithas samupahūya yat me retaḥ prasicyate yat vā
me apagacchati yat vā jāyate punar tena mā śivam āviśa tena mā vājinam kṛṇu tena
suprajasam kṛṇu tasya te vāji pītasya upahūtaḥ bhakṣayāmi āṣāḍhyām
varuṇapraghāseṣu agnyoḥ praṇīyamānayoḥ agne prehi iti japan eti dakṣiṇam agnim
upaviśati purastāt ativrajya uttare agnau hutvā dakṣiṇe juhoti aticāram pṛṣṭām
patnīm idam āpaḥ pravahata iti mārjayanti pauṣṇa antān pañca aindrāgnam vāruṇam
mārutam kāyam varuṇaḥ apām yaḥ ātma dāḥ iti avabhṛthaḥ somāt kārttikyām
sākamedhāḥ pūrvedyus iṣṭyām agneḥ anīkavataḥ acikradat iti madhyaṃdine
sāṃtapanānām marutām sāṃtapanāḥ idam iti sāyam gṛhamedhinām tigmam anīkam iti
ājyabhāgāt īḍā antā śvas bhūte pūrṇa darvyam pūrṇā darve iti krīḍinām marutām
kṛṣṇam niyānam iti māhendryām ṣaṭ aindrāgna antān māhendram vaiśvakarmaṇam ye
bhakṣayantaḥ iti pitryāyām ājyabhāga antam daivāvṛdh somāya pitṛmate pitṛbhyaḥ
somavadbhyaḥ vā barhiṣadaḥ pitaraḥ upahūtāḥ naḥ pitaraḥ agniṣvāttāḥ pitaraḥ
agnaye kavyavāhanāya iti purastāddhomān dakṣiṇāgneḥ atipraṇīte juhoti dakṣiṇena
agnim atikramya pratyaṅ upaviśati uttareṇa yajamānaḥ āgnīdhraḥ ca astu svadhā
iti pratyāśrāvayati tat api ślokau vadataḥ pitryāyām prāc mukhaḥ brahmā hutvā
homān purogamān gatvā tu dakṣiṇena agneḥ pratyaṅ āsīta karmaṇi āgnīdhraḥ
yajamānaḥ ca uttareṇa tu tau ubhau astu svadhā iti vaktavyam pratyāśrāvaṇam atra
tu iti iḍām avajighrati pariṣikte daivāvṛdh śaṃyu antā vimitāt niṣkrāmantaḥ
japanti ayā viṣṭhā iti prāñcaḥ abhyutkramya ud asya ketavaḥ iti ādityam
upatiṣṭhante dakṣiṇāñcaḥ divam pṛthivīm iti agnīn atha udañcaḥ catuṣpathe
traiyambakam yaḥ agnau iti yajamāna ārya janāḥ savya hasta puroḍāśāḥ dakṣiṇān
ūrūn āghnānāḥ tris prasavyam agnim anupariyanti tryambakam yajāmahe sugandhim
puṣṭi vardhanam urvārukam iva bandhanāt mṛtyoḥ mukṣīya mā amṛtāt iti dakṣiṇa
hasta puroḍāśāḥ pradakṣiṇam mūtayoḥ pramuktayoḥ yaḥ naḥ svaḥ iti japati dakṣiṇa
āvṛtaḥ āvrajanti atha āditya iṣṭiḥ phālgunyām śunāsīryam punaḥprayoge pūrvedyus
pauṣṇa antān pañca vāyavyam śunāsīryam sauryam ekayā ca śunāsīra iha sūryaḥ
cakṣuṣām iti atha paśau vaiṣṇavam pūrṇahomam uru viṣṇo iti arātīyoḥ iti yūpam
vṛścyamānam anumantrayate yat tvā śikvaḥ iti prakṣālyamānam añjate vyañjate iti
abhyajyamānam su āktam me iti ājyamānam gandha pravādābhiḥ anulipyamānam yat te
vāsaḥ iti paridhāpyamānam vanaspate stīrṇam iti barhiṣi āsādyamānam vanaspatiḥ
saha yasyām sadaḥ iti ucchrīyamāṇam dhartā dhriyasva iti pādena avaṭe
nidhīyamānam viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi iti dvābhyām ucchritam samiddhaḥ adya iti prayājān
nārāśaṃsinām devaḥ deveṣu iti dvitīyam ūrdhvāḥ asya iti iṣṭakāpaśau ānaya etam
iti ādi āñjana antam indrāya bhāgam iti yathādevatam yaḥ īśe iti pramucyamānam
anumantrayate nīyamāne pramucyamānahomān juhuyāt pramucyamānaḥ bhuvanasya gopa
paśuḥ naḥ atra prati bhāgam etu agniḥ yajñam trivṛtam sapta tantum devaḥ
devebhyaḥ havyam vahatu prajānan yau te daṃṣṭrau ropayiṣṇū jihmāyete dakṣiṇā sam
ca paśyataḥ anāṣṭram naḥ pitaraḥ tat kṛṇota yūpe baddham pramumucima yat annam a
hrastaḥ tvam abhijuṣṭaḥ parehi indrasya goṣṭham apidhāva vidvān dhīrāsaḥ tvā
kavayaḥ saṃmṛjantu iṣam ūrjam yajamānāya dattvā iti śāsyamāne pradakṣiṇam
āvartante vapāyāḥ jātavedaḥ vapayā iti śaṃbhu mayobhubhyām cātvāle marjayanti
aindrāgnam puroḍāśam āvadānikam ca saṃpreṣite āgnīdhraḥ śāmitrāt aupayajān
aṅgārān hotuḥ purastāt nirvapati hṛdayaśūle upamite apsu te rājan iti japanti
aindrāgnena iṣṭvā kāmyaḥ paśuḥ agniṣṭoma sāmnaḥ hotre ṣoḍaśistotreṇa
atyagniṣṭome ukthye maitrāvaruṇa ādibhyaḥ prasauti tantuḥ asi prajābhyaḥ tvā
prajām jinva revat asi oṣadhībhyaḥ tvā oṣadhīḥ jinva pṛtanāṣāh asi paśubhyaḥ tvā
paśūn jinva iti eteṣām yājyā homān indrāvaruṇā suta pau bṛhaspatiḥ naḥ ubhā
jigyathuḥ iti vayam u tvām apūrvya yaḥ naḥ idam idam purā iti stotriya anurūpau
stotriyasya prathamām śastvā tasyāḥ uttamam pādam dvitīyasyāḥ pūrveṇa saṃdhāya
avasāya dvitīyena dvitīyām śaṃsati tasyāḥ eva uttamam uttareṇa saṃdhāya avasāya
uttamena tṛtīyām evam kākubhānām stotriya anurūpāṇām pragrathanam itas pacchas
śaṃsati pra maṃhiṣṭhāya bṛhate bṛhadraye iti uktha mukham uda prutaḥ na vayaḥ
rakṣamāṇāḥ iti bārhaspatyam sāṃśaṃsikam acchā me indram matayaḥ svar vidaḥ iti
paryāsaḥ iti aikāhikānām uttamayā paridadhāti parayā yajati ṣoḍaśini graham
upatiṣṭhante yaḥ ā babhūva bhuvanāni viśvā yasmāt anyat na param kim cana asti
prajāpatiḥ prajābhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ trīṇi jyotīṃṣi dadhate sa ṣoḍaśī iti hotre
prasauti abhijit asi yukta grāvā indrāya tvā indram jinva iti ṣoḍaśigrahasya
indra juṣasva iti indra ṣoḍaśin ojasvān tvam deveṣu asi ojasvantam mām
āyuṣmantam manuṣyeṣu kṛṇuhi tasya te upahūtasya upahūtaḥ bhakṣayāmi iti
bhakṣayanti dvau dvau trayaḥ chandogāḥ gharma vat sattre atirātre hotṛ ādibhyaḥ
prasauti adhipatiḥ asi prāṇāya tvā prāṇam jinva dharuṇaḥ asi apānāya tvā apānam
jinva saṃsarpaḥ asi cakṣuṣe tvā cakṣuḥ jinva vayaḥ dhāḥ asi śrotrāya tvā śrotram
jinva iti homān aindrān āśvināt āśvinam stotriya anurūpayoḥ prathamāni padāni
punar ādāyam ardharca śasya vat śaṃsati madhyame paryāye madhyamāni uttame
uttamāni prātaḥsavana vat āhāva ukthasaṃpadau asvarau vayam u tvā tat id arthāḥ
vayam indra tvāyavaḥ iti stotriya anurūpau ūrdhvam sarvatra trīṇi sūktāni antyam
pacchas paryāsaḥ yaḥ udṛci iti paridhānīyā apsu dhūtasya iti yājyā madhyame
trivṛt asi trivṛte tvā trivṛtam jinva pravṛt asi pravṛte tvā pravṛtam jinva
svavṛt asi svavṛte tvā svavṛtam jinva anuvṛt asi anuvṛte tvā anuvṛtam jinva iti
abhi tvā vṛṣabhāḥ sute abhi pra go patim girā iti stotriya anurūpau barhiḥ vā
yat su apatyāya iti paridhānīyā pra ugrām pītim iti yājyā uttame ārohaḥ asi
ārohāya tvā āroham jinva prarohaḥ asi prarohāya tvā praroham jinva saṃrohaḥ asi
saṃrohāya tvā saṃroham jinva anurohaḥ asi anurohāya tvā anuroham jinva iti yoge
yoge tavastaram yuñjanti bradhnam aruṣam iti stotriya anurūpau apāḥ pūrveṣām iti
paridhānīyā ūtī śacīvas iti yājyā hotre āśvināya prasauti vasukaḥ asi vasyaṣṭiḥ
asi veṣa śrīḥ asi vasukāya tvā vasyaṣṭyai tvā veṣa śriyai tvā vasukam jinva
vasyaṣṭim jinva veṣa śriyam jinva iti evam catur saṃsthaḥ jyotiṣṭomaḥ
atyagniṣṭoma varjam eṣa somānām prakṛtiḥ vājapeyaḥ śaradi sarvaḥ saptadaśa
hiraṇya srajaḥ ṛtvijaḥ marutvatīyāt bārhaspatya iṣṭiḥ ājyabhāga ādi iḍā antā
yūpam ārohyamāṇaḥ yajamānaḥ āha devasya savituḥ save svargam varṣiṣṭham nākam
ruheyam pṛṣṭhāt pṛthivyāḥ aham iti ārūḍhaḥ yāvat te iti vīkṣate avaruhya bhūme
mātaḥ iti yūpa vāsāṃsi brahmaṇe dadāti tīrtha deśe ratha cakram āruhya aparājitā
abhimukhaḥ aśva rathān īkṣamāṇaḥ āsīnaḥ vājasāma abhigāyati tris āvis maryāḥ ā
vājam vājinaḥ agman devasya savituḥ save svargam arvantaḥ jayema iti tat vaḥ
gāya iti stotriyaḥ abhiplava stotriyān āvapate mādhyaṃdine indra kratum naḥ
ābhara iti stotriyaḥ indra jyeṣṭham ud u tye madhumattamāḥ iti vā kad navyaḥ
atasīnām iti sāmapragāthaḥ ahīna sūktam āvapate tṛtīyasavane yaḥ ekaḥ id
vidayate yaḥ indra soma pātamaḥ iti uktha stotriya anurūpau ūrdhvam ṣoḍaśinaḥ
hotre na ābhuḥ asi saptadaśa prajāpatiḥ asi prajāpataye tvā prajāpatim jinva iti
bṛhaspatisavam pariyajñam eke aptoryāmṇi garbhakāram śaṃsati yuñjanti bradhnam
aruṣam iti stotriyam abhitas āyāhi iti bhinddhi viśvāḥ apa dviṣaḥ iti anurūpam
abhitas ā naḥ yāhi iti vājapeya vat āvāpaḥ mādhyaṃdine yat dyāvaḥ indra te śatam
yat indra yāvataḥ tvam iti stotriya anurūpau abhitas stotriya anurūpau
sāmapragāthāt indra tri dhātu śaraṇam iti sāmapragāthaḥ sukīrti vṛṣākapī sāma
sūktam ahīna sūktam āvapate tṛtīyasavane su rūpa kṛtnum ūtaye śuṣmintamam naḥ
ūtaye iti stotriya anurūpau abhitas stotriya anurūpau śeṣam pṛṣṭhya ṣaṣṭha vat
sa atirātram atirikta uktheṣu hotṛ ādibhyaḥ prasauti ākramaḥ asi ākramāya tvā
ākramam jinva saṃkramaḥ asi saṃkramāya tvā saṃkramam jinva utkramaḥ asi
utkramāya tvā utkramam jinva utkrāntiḥ asi utkrāntyai tvā utkrāntim jinva iti
tam indram vājayāmasi mahāṁ indraḥ yaḥ ojasā iti stotriya anurūpau uttarau vā ā
nūnam aśvinā yuvam tam vām ratham iti sūkte pūrvasya daśamīm dvādaśīm uttaram ca
pacchas madhumatīḥ oṣadhīḥ iti paridhānīyā uttarā yājyā uttarā yājyā agni cit
soma atipūtaḥ soma vāmī sautrāmaṇyā abhiṣicyate utkrāntaḥ śreyasaḥ śraiṣṭhya
kāmasya na an iṣṭa somaḥ ādityā iṣṭiḥ aindraḥ paśuḥ rasa prāśanyāḥ yāḥ babhravaḥ
iti oṣadhībhiḥ surām saṃdhīyamānām vāyoḥ pūtaḥ iti soma atipūtasya pāvyamānām
soma vāminaḥ prāk somaḥ iti vikṛtena adhvaryo adribhiḥ sutam somam pavitre āsṛja
punīhi indrāya pātave iti adhvaryum pāvayantam gṛhīteṣu ājyeṣu kuvid aṅga
yavamantaḥ iti payaḥ grahān gṛhṇantam vapā mārjanāt yuvam surāmam aśvinau iti
catasṛbhiḥ payaḥ surā grahāṇām saurāṇām na bhakṣaṇam āśvinasya eke yam aśvinā
namuceḥ āsurāt adhi sarasvatī asunot indriyāya imam tam śukram madhumantam indum
somam rājānam iha bhakṣayāmi iti punantu mā girau aragarāṭeṣu yat giriṣu iti
śatātṛṇṇām āsicyamānām udīratām iti dve barhiṣadaḥ pitaraḥ upahūtāḥ naḥ pitaraḥ
agniṣvāttāḥ iti pañca japati āśvina sārasvata aindra paśūnām vanaspati yāgāt
abhiṣicyamānam om bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar janat om iti vācayati sāma gānāya preṣitaḥ
bṛhat indrāya gāyata marutaḥ vṛtra hantamam yena jyotiḥ ajanayan ṛtāvṛdhaḥ devam
devāya jāgṛvi iti aindryām bṛhatyām saṃśānāni gāyati sam tvā hinvanti
dhāyitāyibhiḥ sam tvā riṇanti sam tvā śiṣanti sam tvā tatakṣuḥ iti pratipadaḥ
saṃśravase viśravase satya śravase śravase iti nidhanāni saṃjityai vijityai
satya jityai jityai iti kṣatriyasya saṃpuṣṭyai vipuṣṭyai satya puṣṭyai puṣṭyai
iti vaiśyasya sarve nidhanam upayanti barhiḥ homāt avabhṛthaḥ yat devāḥ iti
māsara kumbham plāvyamānam drupadāt iva iti vāsaḥ maitrāvaruṇī āmikṣā iṣṭiḥ
indrāya vayodhase paśuḥ ādityā iṣṭiḥ dūre cit santam iti praṇava antayā tānena
mantra uktam upatiṣṭhante mantra uktam upatiṣṭhante darśa pūrṇamāsau
vyākhyāsyāmaḥ āmāvāsyena haviṣā yakṣyamāṇaḥ ekasyāḥ dvayoḥ vā pūrvedyus
havirātañcanam dohayati api vā purastāt eva dvi ahe tri ahe vā anuguptam dugdham
dohayitvā anuguptena dadhnā ātanakti saṃtatam avicchinnam abhiduhanti ā
upavasathāt yat ahar pūrṇaḥ candramāḥ syāt tām paurṇamāsīm upavaset śvas pūritā
iti vā yat ahar na dṛśyeta tām amāvāsyām śvas na uditā iti vā tatra eṣaḥ atyanta
pradeśaḥ ye kecana paurṇamāsīm amāvāsyām vā dharmāḥ an ārabhya āmnāyante
ubhayatra eva te kriyante yajña upavītī eva daiveṣu karmasu bhavati prācīnāvītī
pitryeṣu prāc nyāyāni udak nyāyāni vā pradakṣiṇam daivāni karmāṇi kuryāt
viparītam pitryāṇi na vihārāt apaparyāvarteta na yajñāṅgena ātmānam
abhipariharet anyam vā uttaratas upacāraḥ vihāraḥ yatra kva ca juhoti iti
codayet adhvaryuḥ eva juhvā ājyena āhavanīye juhuyāt adhvaryum pratīyāt
āgnīdhram dvitīyam yatra kva ca upatiṣṭhate anumantrayate iti codayet yajamānaḥ
eva tat kuryāt eka mantrāṇi karmāṇi ādi pradiṣṭāḥ mantrāḥ bhavanti uttarasya
ādinā pūrvasya avasānam mantra antaiḥ karma ādīn saṃnipātayet atha yatra hrasvaḥ
mantraḥ syāt dīrgham karma karma ādau mantram japet atha yatra dvābhyām juhoti
pañcabhiḥ juhoti iti codayet pratimantram tatra āhutīḥ juhuyāt atha yatra
yajñāṅge karma abhyāvartayet na mantraḥ abhyāvarteta jvalati eva sarvāḥ āhutīḥ
juhuyāt vratam upaiṣyati śākhām acchaiti palāśa śākhām śamī śākhām vā sā yā
prācī udīcī prācī vā udīcī vā bahu parṇā bahu śākhā a pratiśuṣka agrā a suṣirā
tām ācchinatti iṣe tvā iti ūrje tvā iti saṃnamayati anumārṣṭi vā atha enām
āharati imām prācīm udīcīm iṣam ūrjam abhisaṃskṛtām bahu parṇām a śuṣka agrām
harāmi paśu pām aham iti tayā ṣaṣ avara ardhyān vatsān apākaroti vāyavaḥ stha u
pāyavaḥ stha iti yāvatīnām ekā kumbhī dugdham saṃbharet tāvatī parārdhyā mātrā
syāt ekam śākhayā upaspṛśati tayā eva gāḥ prasthāpayati devaḥ vaḥ savitā
prārpayatu śreṣṭhatamāya karmaṇe āpyāyadhvam aghniyāḥ indrāya deva bhāgam iti
mahendrāya iti vā yadi mahendra yājī bhavati ekām śākhayā upaspṛśati prasthitāḥ
anumantrayate śuddhāḥ apaḥ su prapāṇe pibantīḥ śatam indrāya śaradaḥ duhānāḥ
rudrasya hetiḥ pari vaḥ vṛṇaktu iti mahendrāya iti vā yadi mahendra yājī bhavati
paśubandhena yakṣyamāṇaḥ ṣaḍḍhotāram manasā anudrutya āhavanīye sa graham juhoti
sruveṇa yūpa āhutim juhoti uru viṣṇo vikramasva iti etayā yat sthālyām ājyam
pariśiṣṭam tat ca sruvam ca adhvaryuḥ ādatte yat takṣaṇa śastram tat takṣā tām
diśam yanti te ete yūpyāḥ vṛkṣāḥ palāśaḥ khadiraḥ rauhitakaḥ iti bailvam
brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ kurvīta sa nitya kāmaḥ an akṣa saṅgam vṛścet yam kāmayeta a
pratiṣṭhitaḥ syāt iti āroham tasmai vṛścet yam kāmayeta a paśuḥ syāt iti a
parṇam tasmai śuṣka agram vṛścet yam kāmayeta paśumān syāt iti bahu parṇam
tasmai bahu śākham vṛścet pratiṣṭhitam vṛścet pratiṣṭhā kāmasya iti vijñāyate
yaḥ dakṣiṇa āvṛt na tam vṛścet yaḥ udaṅ āvṛt na tam na ghūrṇam yaḥ ṛjuḥ ūrdhva
śalkaḥ yasya ṛjoḥ sataḥ īṣat agram upāvanatam tam vṛścet yaḥ prāṅ vā pratyaṅ vā
udaṅ vā upāvanataḥ tam upaspṛśya japati ati anyān agām iti sruveṇa ājyam ādāya
paryaṇakti devaḥ tvā savitā madhvā anaktu iti oṣadhe trāyasva enam iti oṣadhim
antardadhāti svadhite mā enam hiṃsīḥ iti paraśunā hanti yaḥ prathamaḥ śakalaḥ
parāpatet tam apayamya jānu daghne gulpha daghne vā vṛścati atha enam prāñcam
pravāhayati udañcam vā divam agreṇa mā lekhīḥ antarikṣam madhyena mā hiṃsīḥ iti
vanaspate śata valśaḥ viroha iti āvraścane juhoti sahasra valśāḥ vi vayam ruhema
iti ātmānam pratyabhimṛśati anu agram adgān kalpayati yam tvā ayam svadhitiḥ
tetijānaḥ iti etena eva agrataḥ parivāsayati eka aratni prabhṛtīni pramāṇāni
bhavanti tri aratniḥ vā eva catur aratniḥ vā pālāśaḥ nirūḍhapaśubandha yūpaḥ
atha itare saumyasya adhvarasya iti ekeṣām atha enam na ati sthūlam na ati aṇum
agre aṇīyāṃsam aṣṭa aśrim karoti mūlataḥ uparam a taṣṭam bhavati caṣālam pṛtha
mātram aṣṭa aśrim madhye saṃnatam yāvat uttamam aṅguli kāṇḍam tāvat ūrdhvam
caṣālāt yūpasya atirecayati dvi aṅgulam iti ekeṣām tri aṅgulam iti ekeṣām
avatakṣaṇānām svarum kṛtvā āgnāvaiṣṇavam ekādaśa kapālam nirvapati saptadaśa
sāmidhenyaḥ bhavanti siddham iṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate sā eṣā agni anvādhānasya sthānam
pratyeti na paśu iṣṭyām agnim gṛhṇīyāt iti aparam tasyām saṃsthitāyām śākhām
āhṛtya agreṇa āhavanīyam vedim karoti ratha īṣā mātrī prācī bhavati yuga mātrī
purastāt akṣa mātrī paścāt yat prāk uttarasmāt parigrāhāt tat kṛtvā apareṇa yūpa
avaṭa deśam śamyayā uttaravedim parimimīte purastāt udīcīna kumbām śamyām
nidhāya sphyena abhyantaram udīcīm lekhām likhati vittāyanī me asi iti evam
dakṣiṇatas prācīm tiktāyanī me asi iti evam paścāt udīcīm avatāt mā nāthitam iti
evam uttaratas prācīm avatāt mā vyathitam iti uttarasmāt vedi aṃsāt udañcam
prakramam prakramya tathā eva śamyayā tūṣṇīm cātvālam parimimīte sāvitreṇa
abhrim ādāya parilikhati parilikhitam rakṣaḥ parilikhitāḥ arātayaḥ iti jānu
daghnam khātvā tri vitastam vā purīṣam harati videḥ agniḥ iti uttaravedyām
nivapati siṃhīḥ asi mahiṣīḥ asi iti evam eva dvitīyam harati evam tṛtīyam yaḥ
dvitīyasyām iti dvitīyam harati yaḥ tṛtīyasyām iti tṛtīyam tūṣṇīm caturtham
hṛtvā śamyā mātrīm prathayati uru prathasva uru te yajñapatiḥ prathatām iti
dhruvā asi iti saṃhatya adbhiḥ avokṣati devebhyaḥ śundhasva iti yat prokṣaṇīnām
ucchiṣyet tat dakṣiṇatas uttaravedyām ekasphyām niḥsārya upaninayet āpaḥ ripram
nirvahata iti yam dviṣyāt tam dhyāyet sikatāḥ prakirati devebhyaḥ śumbhasva iti
uttaravedyāḥ antān kalpayati vibhrāj bṛhat pibatu somyam madhu āyuḥ dadhat
yajñapatau a vihrutam vāta jūtaḥ yaḥ abhirakṣatu tmanā prajāḥ piparti bahudhā
virājati iti madhye uttaravedeḥ prādeśa mātrīm catur sraktim uttaranābhim kṛtvā
vedim uttaravedim ca saṃmṛśati catur śikhaṇḍe yuvatī kanīne ghṛta pratīke
bhuvanasya madhye tayoḥ devāḥ adhisaṃvasantaḥ uttame nāke iha mādayantām iti
atha enām pratidiśam parikrāmam prokṣati indraghoṣaḥ tvā vasubhiḥ purastāt pātu
iti etaiḥ mantraiḥ yathārūpam tvaṣṭā tvā rūpaiḥ upariṣṭāt pātu iti upariṣṭāt yat
prokṣaṇīnām ucchiṣyeta iti samānam pūrvedyus agnim praṇayet iti ekam prokṣa
antām parivaset iti aparam āhavanīye idhmam ādīpya saṃpreṣyati agnaye
praṇīyamānāya anubrūhi iti tris anūktāyām prathamāyām idhmam ādāya sikatāḥ
upayamanīḥ kṛtvā udyata homam juhoti yat te pāvaka cakṛma kaccit āgaḥ pūrvaḥ san
aparaḥ yat bhavāsi ghṛtena tvam tanuvaḥ vardhayasva mā mā hiṃsīḥ adhigatam
purastāt svāhā iti śeṣe hutvā prāñcaḥ abhipravrajanti upari agnau dhāryamāṇe
pañca gṛhītena ājyena hiraṇyam antardhāya akṣṇayā uttaravedim vyāghārayati
siṃhīḥ asi sapatna sāhī svāhā iti dakṣiṇe aṃse siṃhīḥ asi su prajā vaniḥ svāhā
iti uttarasyām śroṇyām siṃhīḥ asi rāyaspoṣa vaniḥ svāhā iti uttare aṃse siṃhīḥ
asi āditya vaniḥ svāhā iti dakṣiṇasyām śroṇyām siṃhīḥ asi āvaha devān devayate
yajamānāya svāhā iti madhye bhūtebhyaḥ tvā iti srucam udgṛhya abhitas
uttaravedim pautudravān paridhīn paridadhati viśva āyuḥ asi iti madhyamam dhruva
kṣit asi iti dakṣiṇam acyuta kṣit asi iti uttaram nābhyām saṃbhārān nivapati
gulgulu sugandhi tejanam śvetām ūrṇā stukām yā petvasya antarā śṛṅge śvetasya a
chinna stukasya na a chinna stukasya iti ekeṣām agneḥ bhasma asi agneḥ purīṣam
asi iti etena eva uttaratas upayamanīḥ nivapati yatra abhijānāti sīda hotar sve
loke iti tat saṃbhāreṣu agnim pratiṣṭhāpayati yajña pratitiṣṭha sumatau suśevāḥ
tvā vasūni purudhā viśantu dīrgham āyuḥ yajamānāya kṛṇvan adha amṛtena jaritāram
aṅdhi iti nidhāya upasaminddhe yajñaḥ pratyaṣṭhāt manuṣvat tvā nidhīmahi
manuṣvat samidhīmahi agne manuṣvat aṅgiraḥ devān devāyate yaja iti atra
saptavatyā pūrṇāhutim hutvā atimuktīḥ juhoti atra pūrṇāhutim eke samāmananti
atra barhiḥ ādi karma pratipadyate yadi pūrvedyus agnim praṇayet atha yadi
prokṣa antām parivaset tadānīm eva barhiḥ ādi karma pratipadyate ikṣu śalāke
vidhṛtī āśva vālam prastaram barhiṣi upasaṃnahyati kārṣmarya mayān paridhīn
idhme trayoviṃśati dārum idhmam karoti samānam ā pātrāṇām prayojanāt vasā homa
havanīm dvitīyām juhūm prayunakti pṛṣadājya dhānīm dvitīyām upabhṛtam dve ājya
sthālyau kumbhīm paśu śrapaṇīm kārṣmarya mayyau vapāśrapaṇyau dvi śūlām eka
śūlām ca hṛdayaśūlam svarum svadhitim raśane plakṣa śākhām audumbaram
maitrāvaruṇa daṇḍam yena ca arthī bhavati tatra ye upabhṛtaḥ dharmāḥ ye ca
dhruvāyāḥ pṛṣadājya dhānyām api kriyeran ye sāṃnāyye ukhāyāḥ paśu śrapaṇyām
vapāśrapaṇyoḥ hṛdayaśūle plakṣa śākhāyām iti kriyeran sruva dharmāḥ svadhitau
payaḥ dharmāḥ paśau na praṇītāḥ praṇayati agnīn paristīrya hastau avanijya
pātrāṇi prayujya ulapa rājīm stīrtvā pavitre kṛtvā saṃpreṣyati yajamāna vācam
yaccha iti vāgyataḥ pātrāṇi saṃmṛśati prokṣaṇīnām āvṛtā prokṣaṇīḥ saṃskṛtya
brahmāṇam āmantrya pātrāṇi prokṣya haviṣkṛtā vācam visṛjya tatas uttaram
parigrāham parigṛhṇāti samānam ā saṃpraiṣāt sruva svadhitī ca srucaḥ ca
saṃmṛḍḍhi patnīm saṃnahya ājyena dadhnā ca udehi iti saṃpraiṣa antam namati
samānam ā ājya nirvapaṇāt ājyam nirupya dvitīyasyām ājya sthālyām dadhi
nirvapati tasya ājyena eva kalpaḥ vyākhyātaḥ anyatra adhiśrayaṇāt samānam ā
ājyānām grahaṇāt catuḥ juhvām gṛhṇāti catuḥ upabhṛti pañca gṛhītam pṛṣadājyam
ājyena dadhi saṃsṛjya mahīnām payaḥ asi iti etaiḥ mantraiḥ yathāprakṛti eva
dhruvāyām gṛhṇāti samānam ā srucām sādanāt srucaḥ sādayitvā agreṇa dhruvām vedam
sādayitvā sāvitreṇa abhrim ādāya agreṇa āhavanīyam yūpa avaṭam parilikhati
ardham antarvedi ardham bahirvedi parilikhitam rakṣaḥ parilikhitāḥ arātayaḥ iti
upara saṃmitam khātvā yūpam prakṣālayati yat te śikvaḥ parāvadhīt takṣā hastena
vāsyā āpaḥ tat sarvam jīvalāḥ punantu śucayaḥ śucim iti yavamatībhiḥ
prokṣaṇībhiḥ yūpam prokṣati pṛthivyai tvā iti mūlam antarikṣāya tvā iti madhyam
dive tvā iti agram avaṭe śeṣam avanayati śundhatām lokaḥ pitṛṣadanaḥ iti yavaḥ
asi yavaya asmat dveṣaḥ iti yavam prāsyati barhiḥ avastṛṇāti pitṝṇām sadanam asi
iti su āveśaḥ asi agregāḥ netṝṇām iti yūpa śakalam prāsya abhijuhoti ghṛtena
dyāvāpṛthivī ā pṛṇethām svāhā iti parivīyamāṇāya anubrūhi iti nābhi daghne
madhya deśe vā tri guṇayā pradakṣiṇam tris parivyayati parivīḥ asi pari tvā
daivīḥ viśaḥ vyayantām iti uttaram uttaram guṇam uttamam karoti upānte raśanām
vyatiṣajya antam praveṣṭayati samau antau kṛtvā aṇimati sthavimat pravayati
divaḥ sūnuḥ asi iti svarum ādāya madhyame raśanā guṇe avagūhati uttame sarveṣu
vā antarikṣasya tvā sānau avagūhāmi iti atha enam paśum snāpayanti an aṅga hīnam
a panna dantam ajam loham tūparam dvi rūpam pīvānam iṣe tvā iti barhiṣī ādatte
upavīḥ asi iti plakṣa śākhām yā bahu parṇā bahu śākhā tayā upākuryāt paśu
kāmasya agreṇa yūpam purastāt pratyañcam śākhayā barhirbhyām paśum upākaroti
prajāpateḥ jāyamānāḥ iti dvābhyām upa u devān daivīḥ viśaḥ iti pratipadya
revatīḥ ramadhvam indra agnibhyām tvā juṣṭam upākaromi iti antena agneḥ janitram
asi iti adhimanthana śakalam nidadhāti vṛṣaṇau stha iti prāñcau darbhau urvaśī
asi iti adharāraṇim ādatte purūravāḥ iti uttarāraṇim ghṛtena akte vṛṣaṇam
dadhāthām iti ājya sthālyāḥ bile anakti āyuḥ asi iti araṇī samavadhāya
saṃpreṣyati agnaye mathyamānāya anubrūhi iti tris anūktāyām prathamāyām
pradakṣiṇam tris manthati gāyatram chandaḥ anuprajāyasva iti etaiḥ mantraiḥ jāte
āha jātāya anubrūhi iti prahariṣyan prahriyamāṇāya anubrūhi iti yatra abhijānāti
pra devam deva vītaye iti tat agreṇa uttaram paridhim anupraharati saṃdhinā vā
bhavatam naḥ samanasau iti sruveṇa ājyam ādāya abhijuhoti agnau agniḥ carati
praviṣṭaḥ iti etayā sāvitreṇa raśanām ādāya paśoḥ pāśena dakṣiṇam ardha śīrṣam
abhidadhāti ṛtasya tvā deva haviḥ pāśena ārame iti atha enam purastāt pratyañcam
yūpe niyunakti dharṣa mānuṣān indra agnibhyām tvā juṣṭam niyunajmi iti ye
arvācīnam ekādaśinyāḥ paśavaḥ ālabhyante tān uttaratas yūpasya niyunakti
dakṣiṇatas ekādaśinān atha enam upariṣṭāt prokṣati adbhyaḥ tvā oṣadhībhyaḥ indra
agnibhyām tvā juṣṭam prokṣāmi iti pāyayati apām peruḥ asi iti adhastāt upokṣati
svāttam cit sa devam havyam āpaḥ devīḥ svadata enam iti punar svarum avagūhati
śamitre svadhitim prayacchan āha eṣā te aśriḥ prajñātā asat iti tatas
saṃpreṣyati paryagnaye kriyamāṇāya anubrūhi iti āhavanīyāt ulmukam ādāya
āgnīdhraḥ paryagnikaroti paśum śāmitra deśam cātvālam yūpam āhavanīyam ājyāni
iti paśum eva paryagnikaroti iti ekeṣām paryagnau kriyamāṇe apāvyāni juhoti
prajānantaḥ prati gṛhṇanti pūrve iti pañca tris parītya nidhāya ulmukam tris
punar pratiparyeti yūpāt paśum pramucya vapāśrapaṇībhyām anvārabhete adhvaryuḥ
yajamānaḥ ca anvārabhya āśrāvya saṃpreṣyati upapreṣya hotar havyā devebhyaḥ iti
yatra abhijānāti pra asmai agnim bharata iti tat āhavanīyāt ulmukam ādāya
āgnīdhraḥ pūrvaḥ pratipadyate uttareṇa cātvāla utkarau udañcam paśum nayanti
revatīḥ yajñapatim priyadhā viśata iti nānā prāṇaḥ yajamānasya paśunā iti
adhvaryuḥ yajamānam abhimantrayate uttaratas āgnīdhraḥ ulmukam nimṛdnāti sa
śāmitraḥ bhavati aparasmāt gārhapatyāt āharet nirmanthyam vā kuryāt yābhyām
barhirbhyām paśum upākaroti tayoḥ anyatarat āchyāna artham nidhāya dakṣiṇena
śāmitram anyatarat upāsyati sam asya tanuvā bhava iti tasmin paśum pratyañcam
udīcīna pādam saṃjñapayanti a māyum kṛṇvantam saṃjñapayata iti uktvā parāṅ
āvartate adhvaryuḥ paśoḥ saṃjñapyamānāt pṛṣadājyam avekṣamāṇau āsāte adhvaryuḥ
yajamānaḥ ca iha prajāḥ viśva rūpāḥ ramantām asmin yajñe viśva bhṛtaḥ janitrīḥ
saṃjñapte saṃjñapta homam juhoti yat paśuḥ māyum akṛta iti paśoḥ pāśam
pramuñcati śamitar upetana iti eka śūlayā pāśe upatṛdya cātvāle apāsyati utkare
vā aditiḥ pāśam pra mumoktu iti yadi abhicaret dārum stambam vā abhidadhyāt
arātīyantam adharam kṛṇomi iti patnī ādityam upatiṣṭhate namaḥ te ātāna iti atha
enām prācīm udānayati anarvā prehi iti cātvāle patnī apaḥ avamṛśati āpaḥ devīḥ
śuddhāyuvaḥ iti sa na aramata sa prādravat tasmin ajuhot tasyāḥ āhutyāḥ puruṣaḥ
ajāyata sa na aramata sa prādravat tasmin ajuhot tasyāḥ āhutyāḥ aśvaḥ ajāyata
tasmāt puruṣaḥ ca aśvaḥ ca naktam pratyañcau na su vijñāyete iva sa na aramata
sa prādravat tasmin ajuhot tasyāḥ āhutyāḥ gauḥ ajāyata aviḥ ajāyata ajā ajāyata
yavaḥ ajāyata vrīhiḥ ajāyata etābhyaḥ vai saptabhyaḥ āhutibhyaḥ sapta ime
grāmyāḥ paśavaḥ asṛjyanta sa na aramata sa prādravat tasmin ajuhot tasyāḥ
āhutyāḥ vasantaḥ ajāyata grīṣmaḥ ajāyata varṣāḥ ajāyanta śarad ajāyata hemantaḥ
ajāyata sa trayodaśyām āhutyām udyatāyām abibhet tam pratyaṅ upāpadyata tam
pāṇitaḥ prāviśat tasmāt pāṇyoḥ loma na asti agnidhānam hi etat tasmāt hastābhyām
agniḥ mathyamānaḥ jāyate tasmāt hanyamānaḥ hastau pratigṛhṇāti agnau eva tat
trāṇam icchate agnim vai paśavaḥ anūpatiṣṭhante paśūn agniḥ pra enam paśavaḥ
viśanti pra viśati yaḥ evam veda tām āhutim apsu prāsiñcat tatas śiśiram ajāyata
tasmāt tat krūratamam nahi tat hutāt na a hutāt ajāyata sā āhutiḥ apaḥ dagdhum
upākramata tatas āpaḥ agnaye vajraḥ abhavan tasmāt prokṣan agnim na prāpayet yat
prāpayet hatena yajeta tām āhutim oṣadhīṣu nyadadhāt tasmāt oṣadhayaḥ an
abhyaktāḥ rebhante oṣadhibhyaḥ adhi paśavaḥ paśubhyaḥ adhi prajāḥ tat etat
śiśire ājyam śyāyati agnaye tasmāt śiśire kakṣaḥ upādutyaḥ priyam eva dhāma
agnaye prādāt saḥ asmai annādyam prayacchati anna ādaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda
samāne vai yonau āstām sūryaḥ ca agniḥ ca tatas sūryaḥ ūrdhvaḥ udadravat tasya
retaḥ parāpatat tat agniḥ yoninā upāgṛhṇāt ayasā tat akrūḍayat tat krūḍyamānam
gavi nyadadhāt tat idam payaḥ tasmāt a trapu ayaspātram pratidhuk krūḍayati yat
payasā agnihotram juhoti amum eva tat ādityam juhoti eṣa hi eva agnihotram
anaḍuhaḥ vai payaḥ taṇḍulāḥ asau ādityaḥ anaḍvān yat yavāgvā agnihotram juhoti
amum eva tat ādityam juhoti eṣa hi eva agnihotram cakra vṛttam anyat a cakra
vṛttam anyat yat cakra vṛttam tat asuryam yat a cakra vṛttam tat deva pātram
tasmāt a cakra vṛttām agnihotra tapanīm kurvīta na kṣīreṇa pratiṣiñcet na
udakena yat kṣīreṇa pratiṣiñcet a pratiṣiktam syāt yat udakena śamayet dohane
saṃsrāvam ucchiṣya tena udaka miśreṇa pratiṣiñcet tat na kṣīreṇa pratiṣiktam
bhavati na udakena skannam vāva tat pari ced ākaroti yā sthālī agnihotra tapanī
tayā duhyāt iyam vai sā anayā eva upasīdati tat asya a skannam bhavati adbhiḥ
pratiṣiñcati āpaḥ hi pratiṣecanāya tasthire tat śāntam mithunam āpaḥ ca payaḥ ca
yadi duhyamānā avabhindyāt anyayā sthālyā duhyāt sā eva tatra prāyaścittiḥ yadi
adhiśrīyamāṇam yadi adhiśritam skandet anyām abhiduhya adhiśritya unnīya juhuyāt
sā eva tatra prāyaścittiḥ yadi unnīyamānam yadi unnītam yadi puras upasannam a
hute skandet punar avanīya anyām abhiduhya adhiśritya unnīya juhuyāt sā eva
tatra prāyaścittiḥ yatra skandet tat apaḥ ninayet āpaḥ vai yajñasya niṣkṛtiḥ
adbhiḥ eva enam niṣkaroti pratiṣiktam anyat a pratiṣiktam anyat pratiṣiktam paśu
kāmasya a pratiṣiktam brahmavarcasa kāmasya gharmaḥ vai eṣa pravṛjyate yat
agnihotram yat a pratiṣiktena juhoti brahmavarcasī bhavati yadi payaḥ na vindet
ājyena juhuyāt tat hi apratiṣekyam a paśavyam īśvaram asya aśāntam śucā paśūn
nirdahaḥ pratiṣiktam paśu kāmasya tat śāntam mithunam āpaḥ ca payaḥ ca yadi
payaḥ na vindet yavāgvā juhuyāt tat hi pratiṣekyam śāntam mithunam paśavyam āpaḥ
ca taṇḍulāḥ ca agnihotre vai jāyampatī vyabhicarete yat prācīnam udvāsayet patiḥ
pūrvaḥ pramīyeta yat pratīcīnam udvāsayet jāyā pūrvā pramīyeta saṃprati udīcīnam
udvāsayet sam evam jīryataḥ pūrṇam agre unnayet atha saṃmitam atha saṃmitam atha
saṃmitatamam uttamam anujyeṣṭham eva asya putrāḥ ṛdhnuvanti saṃmitam agre
unnayet atha bhūyas atha bhūyas atha pūrṇam uttamam bhūyaḥ bhūyaḥ eva annādyam
abhyutkrāmati kaniṣṭhaḥ tu asya putrāṇām ardhukaḥ bhavati sarvān samāvat unnayet
yaḥ kāmayeta sarve me putrāḥ samāvat ṛdhnuyuḥ iti sarveṣām vai pitā putrāṇām
ṛddhim kāmayate sarve eva samāvat ṛdhnuvanti na anyaḥ anyam atikrāmati catuḥ
unnayati dvipadaḥ eva asmai paśūn yacchati paśūn me yaccha iti paścāt upasādayet
paśavaḥ vai gārhapatyaḥ paśavaḥ payaḥ paśūnām eva eṣā yatiḥ na paścāt upasādayet
haviḥ vai etat yat agnihotram yajamānaḥ haviḥ haviḥ bhūtam eva yajamānam
apanudate uttarāt upasādayet a pūtam vai etat yat agnihotram agniḥ pavitram yat
samayā agnim harati tena eva enat punāti anu vai eṣaḥ etat dhyāyati yat paścā
adhiśritya puras juhoti yat samayā agnim harati tena eva enam prīṇāti an
anudhyāyinam karoti asmāt vai gārhapatyāt asau pūrvaḥ agniḥ asṛjyata ayam vāva
prajāpatiḥ asau pūrvaḥ agniḥ tat ayam itas ādāya prāṅ anūddrutya ajuhot tasmāt
agnihotram paścā adhiśritya puras juhvati puras eva anyāni havīṃṣi śṛtāni
kurvanti puras juhvati praiyamedhāḥ vai nāma brāhmaṇāḥ āsan te sarvam aviduḥ tat
saha eva aviduḥ te agnihotre eva na samarādhayan teṣām sakṛt ekaḥ agnihotram
ajuhot dvis ekaḥ tris ekaḥ teṣām yaḥ sakṛt ajuhot tam itarau apṛcchatām kasmai
tvam juhoṣi iti ekadhā eva idam iti abravīt prajāpatiḥ prajāpataye eva aham
juhomi iti teṣām yaḥ dvis ajuhot tam itarau apṛcchatām kasmai tvam juhoṣi iti
agnaye ca eva sāyam prajāpataye ca iti abravīt sūryāya ca prātar prajāpataye ca
iti teṣām yaḥ tris ajuhot tam itarau apṛcchatām kasmai tvam juhoṣi iti agnaye
sūryāya prajāpataye iti abravīt tebhyaḥ eva sāyam juhomi tebhyaḥ prātar iti
teṣām yaḥ dvis ajuhot saḥ ārdhnot sa bhūyiṣṭhaḥ abhavat prajayā ati itarau śriyā
akrāmat tasya prajām itarayoḥ praje sajāta tvam upaitām tasmāt dve hotavye
yajuṣā ca manasā ca yām eva saḥ ṛddhim ārdhnot tām ṛdhnoti yadi sāyam a hute
agnihotre pūrvaḥ agniḥ anugacchet agnihotram adhiśritya unnīya agninā pūrveṇa
uddrutya agnihotreṇa anu uddravet āhutyā eva enam cyāvayati yaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bahu
vid syāt saḥ uddharet sarveṇa eva enam brahmaṇā uddharati yat purā dhanam a dāyī
syāt tat dadyāt a cyutena eva enam cyāvayati yadi prātar a hute agnihotre aparaḥ
agniḥ anugacchet anugamayitvā pūrvam mathitvā aparam uddhṛtya juhuyāt sā eva
tatra prāyaścittiḥ yadi tvareta pūrvam agnim anvavasāya tatas prāñcam uddhṛtya
juhuyāt sā eva tatra prāyaścittiḥ jāmi nu tat yaḥ asya pūrvaḥ agniḥ tam aparam
karoti anyatra eva avasāya agnim mathitvā uddhṛtya juhuyāt sā eva tatra
prāyaścittiḥ tatas śvas agnaye tapasvate janadvate pāvakavate iṣṭim nirvapet
yadā vai agniḥ saṃtapyate atha jāyate oṣadhayaḥ pāvakāḥ oṣadhīḥ eva asmai
pāvakāḥ bhāgadheyam apidadhāti na gārham anubudhyate yadā hi eva asmai na
apidadhati atha eṣaḥ anugacchati yau panthānau abhitas tau darśa pūrṇamāsau yā
madhye sṛtiḥ tat agnihotram evam vai agnihotriṇe darśapūrṇamāsine svargaḥ lokaḥ
anubhāti manasā vai imām prajāpatiḥ vedim paryagṛhṇāt agnihotriṇe tatra yat kim
ca dadāti tat barhiṣyam yathā sanneṣu nārāśaṃseṣu dadāti evam eṣa dadāti yat kim
ca dadāti madhye eva yajñasya dyāvāpṛthivī etasya sadaḥ havirdhāne ahorātrāṇi
idhmaḥ diśaḥ paridhayaḥ pruṣvāḥ prokṣaṇīḥ oṣadhayaḥ barhiḥ yajamānaḥ yūpaḥ na
sambhavan vadet paśuḥ eva bhūtvā sambhavati aharahar vai paśavaḥ sambhavantaḥ
atha medhyāḥ na rājanyasya agnihotram asti a vratyaḥ hi sa hanti vratam na
vicchindyāt paurṇamāsīm ca rātrīm amāvasyām ca juhuyāt te hi vratam gopāyati
yāni ahāni na juhuyāt tāni asya brāhmaṇāya agre gṛhe upahareyuḥ agniḥ vai
brāhmaṇaḥ agnau eva tat juhoti tat asya svaditam eṣṭam bhavati vācā vai saha
manuṣyāḥ ajāyanta ṛte vācaḥ devāḥ ca asurāḥ ca te yat manuṣyāḥ avadan tat eva
abhavan te devāḥ ca asurāḥ ca prajāpatim abruvan ime vāva idam abhūvan iti sa
vācaḥ satyam niramimīta bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar iti yat turīyam anṛtam tat manuṣyeṣu
nyadadhāt etat vai vācaḥ anṛtam yat manuṣyāḥ vadanti bhūḥ iti imām asṛjata agnim
rathaṃtaram trivṛtam gāyatrīm bhuvar iti antarikṣam vātam vāmadevyam triṣṭubham
pañcadaśam svar iti divam sūryam bṛhat ekaviṃśam jagatīm bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar agnau
jyotiḥ jyotiḥ agnau iti agnihotram juhuyāt etat vai vācaḥ satyam etat mithunam
etat brahma tena eva juhoti imāḥ eva etat iṣṭakāḥ upadhatte imāḥ eva etat
iṣṭakāḥ upadhāya uttamam nākam rohati uttamaḥ samānānām bhavati yasya evam
agnihotram hūyate vācam yacchet agnihotre unnīyamāne tapasā vai prajāpatiḥ
prajāḥ asṛjata yat na vyāharat tat eva atapyata sṛṣṭiḥ vai etat yat agnihotram
sṛṣṭiḥ etat vratam tāḥ udbhavaḥ stha iti udabhāvayat yarhi bindavaḥ iva syuḥ
tarhi avekṣeta udbhavaḥ stha ud aham prajayā pra paśubhiḥ bhūyāsam iti udbhūtiḥ
vai etat prabhūtiḥ yat agnihotram ud prajayā pra paśubhiḥ bhavati yasya evam
agnihotram hūyate agninā avekṣate prajananam vai etat yat agnihotram agniḥ
prajanayitā pra eva janayati retaḥ vai etat yat agnihotram na su śṛtam kuryāt
retaḥ krūḍayet na u a śṛtam antareṇa eva syāt rudra mṛḍa an ārbhava mṛḍa dhūrte
namaḥ te astu iti hutvā udaṅ uddiśet etāni vai rudrasya krūrāṇi nāmāni taiḥ eṣa
prajāḥ hinasti agnihotre bhāgadheyam icchamānaḥ tāni eva asya pratinudati tāni
śamayati yarhi ayam devaḥ prajāḥ abhimanyeta sajūs jātavedaḥ divā pṛthivyā
haviṣaḥ vīhi svāhā iti dvādaśa rātrīḥ agnihotram juhuyāt yā vai agneḥ
jātavedasaḥ tanūḥ tayā eṣa prajāḥ hinasti agnihotre bhāgadheyam icchamānaḥ tām
eva asya prīṇāti tasyai tat juhoti tat ajāmi āhutyoḥ āgneyī eṣā āgneyī itarā
saṃvatsaram vai etam indhate agnim vaiśvānaram na vai etasya saṃvatsare apyasti
na vaiśvānare yaḥ anāhitāgniḥ yāni dārūṇi te māsāḥ ye sthūlāḥ aṅgārāḥ te ṛtavaḥ
ye aṇīyāṃsaḥ te ardha māsāḥ murmurāḥ ahar rātrāṇi yat suvarṇam jyotiḥ tat
bārhaspatyam yat na suvarṇam na lohitam tat maitram yat lohitam tat vāruṇam yat
sa dhūmam tat vaiśvadevam yatra aṅgāreṣu agniḥ lelāya iva tat asya āsyam āvis
nāma tat brahma tasmin hotavyam mukhena vai aśnāti aṅgāni avati āvis prajāsu
bhavati śvas śvas vasīyān bhavati yasya evam agnihotram hūyate odanapacanaḥ
gārhapatyaḥ āhavanīyaḥ madhya adhidevanam āmantraṇam eṣā vai virāj pañca padā
tām eva āpnoti tām avarunddhe yasya hi eṣā avaruddhā sa manuṣyāṇām śreṣṭhaḥ
bhavati yadi sāyam agnihotrasya kālaḥ atipadyeta doṣā vastoḥ svāhā iti juhuyāt
sā eva tatra āhutiḥ tena asya tat an atipannam bhavati yadi prātar agnihotrasya
kālaḥ atipadyeta divā vastoḥ svāhā iti juhuyāt sā eva tatra āhutiḥ tena asya tat
an atipannam bhavati na svāhākuryāt svāhākāraḥ vai agnihotrasya āhutim yuvate
yarhi vāc pravadet tarhi juhuyāt sa hi agnihotrasya vaṣaṭkāraḥ sajūs agniḥ divā
pṛthivyā iti dyāvāpṛthivī agnim tān eva prīṇāti tān avarunddhe sajūs devena
savitrā iti na hi savituḥ ṛte āhutiḥ asti sajūs pūṣṇā antarikṣeṇa iti paśavaḥ
vai pūṣā paśavaḥ antarikṣam paśūn eva avarunddhe sajūs rātryā indravatyā svāhā
iti rātrīm eva etat abhijuhoti na hi indrāt ṛte āhutiḥ asti devāḥ vai purā
agnihotram ahauṣuḥ tasmāt purā bṛhan mahān ajani sajūs ahnā indravatā svāhā iti
bārhatam vai ahar bārhataḥ sūryaḥ ahar ca eva asya etat sūryaḥ ca abhijitau
abhihutau bhavataḥ ānuṣṭubhī vai rātrī traiṣṭubham ahar rātrīm ca eva etat ahar
ca abhijuhoti agne adābhya juṣasva svāhā iti uttarām āhutim juhoti yathā agnaye
samavadyati evam eva tat apipreḥ agne svām tanvam ayāṭ dyāvāpṛthivī ūrjam asmāsu
dhehi iti tṛṇam aktvā anupraharati saṃsthitiḥ eva eṣā svagākṛtiḥ agnihotrasya
vai eṣaḥ aśāntam anu prajāḥ hinasti yat tṛṇam aktvā anu praharati tena eva enat
śamayati agne gṛhapate juṣasva svāhā iti sruveṇa gārhapatye juhoti yathā patnīḥ
saṃyājayati evam eva tat anu vai eṣaḥ etat dhyāyati yat paścā adhiśritya puras
juhoti yat sruveṇa gārhapatye juhoti tena eva enam prīṇāti an anudhyāyinam
karoti ā asya agnihotrī prajāyām jāyate śvas śvas vasīyān bhavati yasya evam
agnihotram hūyate agnihotre stomaḥ yoktavyaḥ yasya vai agnihotre stomaḥ yujyate
vasīyān bhavati upaprayantaḥ adhvaram iti prajāḥ vai imāḥ upa tāḥ sat sat stomaḥ
tāḥ eva upayunakti asya pratnām anu dyutam iti devāḥ vai pratnam tān eva
prāyukta svargāya upa upa id nu maghavan bhūyas id nu te iti iyam vai upa
svargam eva itvā asyām pratitiṣṭhati yāḥ vai prajāḥ ābhaviṣyantīḥ tāḥ upa tāḥ
eva upayunakti pari te dūḍabhaḥ rathaḥ iti stomam eva etayā yuktam parigṛhṇāti
agniḥ mūrdhā divaḥ kakud iti eṣā mithunā retasvatī paśavyā yā asau dhurām
gāyatrī prathamā sā eṣā gāyatryā upāsthita ubhā vām indra agnī āhuvadhyai iti
sūryaḥ vai indraḥ saḥ agnim naktam praviśati ubhau eva enau saha īṭṭe yā asau
dhurām triṣṭubh prathamā sā eṣā triṣṭubhā upāsthita ayam iha prathamaḥ dhāyi
dhātṛbhiḥ iti agniḥ hi eva asmin loke iha prathamaḥ adhīyata yā asau dhurām
jagatī prathamā sā eṣā jagatyā upāsthita ayam te yoniḥ ṛtviyaḥ iti iyam hi agneḥ
yoniḥ agniḥ sūryasya yā asau dhurām anuṣṭubh prathamā sā eṣā anuṣṭubhā upāsthita
dadhikrāvṇaḥ akāriṣam iti eṣā vai agneḥ paśavyā tanūḥ yā dadhikrāvatī tām eva
asya gṛhṇāti upasthāyukāḥ enam paśavaḥ bhavanti paśuḥ vai agniḥ yathā vai gauḥ
jīryati yathā aśvaḥ yathā puruṣaḥ evam eṣaḥ āhitaḥ jīryati agnyādheyasya ṛgbhiḥ
upastheyaḥ tanvaḥ vai asya etāḥ tābhiḥ eva enam punarṇavam karoti yat chandobhiḥ
upatiṣṭhate taiḥ eva enam punarṇavam karoti yathā agre āhitaḥ evam asya bhavati
upatiṣṭhate yogaḥ eva asya eṣa damaḥ eva asya eṣa yācñaḥ eva asya eṣa yathā
śreyase āhṛtya namasyati evam eva tat agnīṣomīyayā pūrvapakṣe upatiṣṭheta
agnīṣomayoḥ vai etat bhāgadheyam yat paurṇamāsam tābhyām eva enam paridadāti tau
enam an apakrāmantau gopāyataḥ aindrāgnyā aparapakṣe indra agnyoḥ vai etat
bhāgadheyam yat amāvasyā tābhyām eva enam paridadāti tau enam an apakrāmantau
gopāyataḥ agnīṣomāḥ eva enam pūrvapakṣāya paridattaḥ indra agnī aparapakṣāya
saṃpradāyam ha vai enam devāḥ an apakrāmantaḥ gopāyanti yaḥ evam vidvān agnim
upatiṣṭhate kasmai kam agniḥ upasthīyate iti āhuḥ aśitram vai etat agneḥ yat
agnim upatiṣṭhate agnaye eva etat aśitram kriyate sāyam upatiṣṭhate na prātar
tasmāt sāyam atithaye pratyenasaḥ na uta tathā prātar yajñasya yajñasya vai āśīḥ
asti yat agnim upatiṣṭhate agnihotrasya eva etām āśiṣam āśāste prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ
asṛjata saḥ agnim eva agre asṛjata tasmai etat bhāgadheyam akalpayat yat
agnyupasthānam yat agnim upatiṣṭhate svena eva enam bhāgadheyena samardhayati
agniḥ vai prayuktim abhyakāmayata yathā aśvaḥ rathakāmyati yat agnim upatiṣṭhate
pra eva enam yuṅkte kāmam asya ṛdhnoti manuṣyasya id nu yaḥ kāmam ṛdhnoti sa
vasīyān bhavati ṛdhnoti vasīyān bhavati yaḥ evam vidvān agnim upatiṣṭhate upa
iti sambhavati eva etayā agniḥ mūrdhā iti retaḥ eva etayā prasiñcati ubhā vām
indra agnī iti prāṇa apānau vai indra agnī prāṇa apānā eva etayā dadhāti ayam
iha prathamaḥ dhāyi iti garbham eva etayā dadhāti asya pratnām anu dyutam iti
ūdhar eva etayā karoti ayam te yoniḥ ṛtviyaḥ iti janayati ca eva etayā
vardhayati ca kﾱptā ha vai asya prajā jāyate yaḥ evam vidvān agnim upatiṣṭhate
diśaḥ vai na akalpanta na prājñāyanta tatas etām agnaye prācīm diśam arocayan
yat kṛttikāḥ yat kṛttikāsu agnim ādhatte prācyām eva enam diśi ādhatte eṣa vāva
ekaḥ prāṅ avasyati yaḥ āhitāgniḥ pratyañcaḥ anye āgneyam etat nakṣatram yat
kṛttikāḥ yat kṛttikāsu agnim ādhatte sve eva enam nakṣatre ādhatte prajāpateḥ
vai etat śiraḥ yat kṛttikāḥ yat kṛttikāsu agnim ādhatte śīrṣaṇyaḥ mukhyaḥ
bhavati sapta vai kṛttikāḥ sapta śīrṣaṇyāḥ prāṇāḥ śīrṣaṇyāḥ prāṇāḥ indriyāṇi
prāṇān eva indriyāṇi āpnoti puṣṭim āvat bhūyiṣṭham ekam nakṣatram puṣṭim eva
prajāyāḥ paśūnām gacchati rohiṇyām ādheyaḥ rohiṇyām vai etam devāḥ ādadhata tayā
roham arohan tat rohiṇyāḥ rohiṇī tvam rohiṇyām vai etam prajāpatiḥ ādhatta tayā
roham arohat tat rohiṇyāḥ rohiṇī tvam eṣa vai manuṣyasya svargaḥ lokaḥ yat asmin
loke vasīyān bhavati ṛddhyai eva rohiṇyām ādheyaḥ kālakāñjāḥ vai nāma asurāḥ
āsan te iṣṭakāḥ acinvata tat indraḥ iṣṭakām api upādhatta teṣām mithunau divam
ākrametām tatas tām āvṛhat te avākīryanta tau etau divyau śvānau saḥ yaḥ
vyavṛhyata saḥ ayam ūrṇavābhiḥ svaiḥ āntraiḥ saṃtitaṃsati ojaḥ vāva eṣām tat
vīryam ādhatta ojaḥ vīryam bhrātṛvyasya ādhatte yat citrāyām agnim ādhatte tat
etat aindram nakṣatram abhibhūtimat pūrvāsu phalgunīṣu ādadhīta yaḥ kāmayeta
bhagī syām iti bhagasya vai etat nakṣatram bhagī bhavati uttarāsu ādadhīta yaḥ
kāmayeta dāna kāmāḥ me prajāḥ syuḥ iti aryamṇaḥ vai etat nakṣatram eṣaḥ aryamā
yaḥ dadāti dānam imāḥ prajāḥ upajīvanti dāna kāmāḥ asmai bhavanti rājanyasya
ādadhyāt sa hi dānam upajīvati vasantā brāhmaṇena ādheyaḥ vasantaḥ vai
brāhmaṇasya ṛtuḥ sve eva enam ṛtau ādhatte tejaḥ brahmavarcasam upādhatte grīṣme
rājanyena ādheyaḥ grīṣmaḥ vai rājanyasya ṛtuḥ sve eva enam ṛtau ādhatte ojaḥ
vīryam upādhatte śaradi vaiśyena ādheyaḥ śarad vai vaiśyasya ṛtuḥ sve eva enam
ṛtau ādhatte ūrjam paśūn upādhatte somena yajai iti vai agnim ādhatte yasmin eva
kasmin ca ṛtau ādadhīta somena yakṣyamāṇaḥ etat hi avardhayat somena yajate
phalgunī pūrṇamāse ādheyaḥ etat vai ṛtūnām mukham ṛtu mukhe eva enam ādhatte
śiśire ādheyaḥ śiśiram śiśiram vai agneḥ janma prajātam eva enam ādhatte sarvāsu
dikṣu ṛdhnavāni iti vai agnim ādhatte sarvāsu dikṣu agniḥ śiśire sarvāsu eva
dikṣu ṛdhnoti yaḥ śiśire agnim ādhatte pūrṇamāse vā amāvasyāyām vā ādadhīta etat
vai puṇya aham puṇya ahe eva enam ādhatte tasmāt iṣṭyā vā āgrāyaṇena vā paśunā
vā somena vā pūrṇamāse vā amāvasyāyām vā yajeta eṣa vai yajñaḥ yajñam eva etat
prati yajñam ālabhate yat vai ime vyaitām yat amuṣyāḥ yajñiyam āsīt tat imām
abhyasṛjyata uṣāḥ yat ūṣāḥ bhavanti anayoḥ eva enam yajñiye ādhatte prājāpatyāḥ
vai ūṣāḥ śvas śvas bhūyāṃsaḥ bhavanti prajananāya eva ete paśūnām vai etat
priyam dhāma yat ūṣāḥ yat ūṣāḥ bhavanti paśūnām eva priyam dhāma upāpnoti alelet
vai iyam pṛthivī sā abibhet agniḥ mā atidhakṣyati iti abibhet agniḥ haraḥ me
vineṣyati iti ārdrā iva hi iyam āsīt tām devāḥ śarkarābhiḥ adṛṃhan tejaḥ agnau
adadhuḥ yat śarkarāḥ bhavanti imām eva dṛṃhati tejaḥ agnau dadhāti abhimṛtā vai
iyam vṛtreṇa vamriyaḥ tvai tat viduḥ yatra asyāḥ jīvam yajñiyam yat valmīka vapā
bhavati asyāḥ eva enam jīve yajñiye ādhatte āpaḥ vai idam āsan salilam eva sa
prajāpatiḥ varāhaḥ bhūtvā upanyamajjat tasya yāvat mukham āsīt tāvatīm mṛdam
udaharat sā iyam abhavat yat varāha vihatam bhavati asyām eva enam pratyakṣam
ādhatte varāhaḥ vai asyām annam paśyati tasmai iyam vijihīte yat varāha vihatam
bhavati tat eva annam avarunddhe yat tat ādatta tat aditiḥ yat aprathata tat
pṛthivī yat abhavat tat bhūmiḥ yat varāha vihatam bhavati prathate eva prajayā
paśubhiḥ nānā vai paśūnām annāni anyat goḥ annam anyat aśvasya anyat avyāḥ anyat
ajāyāḥ anyat puruṣasya āpaḥ annam yat apaḥ upasṛjati yāvat eva annam tat
avarunddhe pañca ete saṃbhārāḥ pañca vai puruṣe vīryāṇi karoti anayā vīryam
karoti anayā karoti anena yāvat eva vīryam tat āpnoti tat spṛṇoti pañca ete
saṃbhārāḥ pāṅktaḥ yajñaḥ yajñam eva avarunddhe na vai ṛte ūrjaḥ annam dhinoti
ūrj udumbaraḥ yat audumbarāṇi bhavanti anne eva ūrjam dadhāti śamī mayāni
bhavanti mithuna tvāya agnim vai sṛṣṭam prajāpatiḥ tam śamyā agre samainddha yat
śamī mayāni bhavanti svayā eva enam samidhā saminddhe aśvaḥ vai bhūtvā agniḥ
devebhyaḥ apākrāmat sa yatra atiṣṭhat tat aśvatthaḥ samabhavat tat aśvatthasya
aśvattha tvam yat āśvatthāni bhavanti yat eva asya tatra nyaktam tat taiḥ
saṃbharati agniḥ vai manuṣyaiḥ devebhyaḥ apākrāmat tam devāḥ amanyanta ayam vāva
idam bhaviṣyati iti tasya marutaḥ stanayitnunā hṛdayam āchindan sā divyā aśaniḥ
abhavat yat eva asya tatra nyaktam tat taiḥ saṃbharati parṇa mayāni pañcathāni
bhavanti pāṅkta tvāya aṣṭāsu prakrameṣu brāhmaṇena ādheyaḥ aṣṭa akṣarā gāyatrī
gāyatra chandāḥ brāhmaṇaḥ svasya eva enam chandasaḥ prātyenasye ādhatte yathā
pitā putram jinvati evam eva enam svam chandaḥ jinvati ekādaśasu prakrameṣu
rājanyena ādheyaḥ ekādaśa akṣarā triṣṭubh triṣṭubh chandāḥ rājanyaḥ svasya eva
enam chandasaḥ prātyenasye ādhatte yathā pitā putram jinvati evam enam svam
chandaḥ jinvati dvādaśasu prakrameṣu vaiśyena ādheyaḥ dvādaśa akṣarā jagatī
jagat chandāḥ vaiśyaḥ svasya eva enam chandasaḥ prātyenasye ādhatte yathā pitā
putram jinvati evam enam svam chandaḥ jinvati aparimitam avaruṇadhai iti vai
agnim ādhatte aparimite ādheyaḥ aparimitasya avaruddhyai yāvati cakṣuṣā manyeta
tāvati ādadhīta satyam vai cakṣuḥ satye eva enam ādhatte pūrvāhne ādheyaḥ etat
vai puṇya aham puṇya ahe eva enam ādhatte vyuṣṭāyām purā sūryasya udetoḥ ādheyaḥ
etasmin vai loke prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ asṛjata tāḥ prājāyanta prajananāya evam
ādheyaḥ āgneyī vai rātrī aindram ahar yat udite sūrye ādadhīta āgneyāt varṇāt
iyāt yat an udite aindrāt an udite aparaḥ ādheyaḥ udite pūrvaḥ ubhau eva
aindrāgnyoḥ varṇau āpnoti asuryā vai rātrī varṇena śukriyam ahar śukriye ādhatte
naktam vai an uditena divā uditena divā ādhatte yaḥ udite sūrye ādhatte na vai
su viduḥ iva manuṣyāḥ nakṣatram mīmāṃsante iva hi uditena vāva puṇya aham puṇya
ahe ādhatte yaḥ udite sūrye ādhatte sapta te agne samidhaḥ sapta jihvāḥ sapta
ṛṣayaḥ sapta dhāma priyāṇi sapta hotrāḥ anuvidvān sapta yonīṃr āpṛṇasva ghṛtena
iti yāvatīḥ vai agneḥ tanvaḥ etāvatīḥ vai agneḥ tanvaḥ ṣoḍhā sapta sapta tāḥ eva
asya prīṇāti na vitṛṣyati pūrṇayā srucā manasā prajāpataye juhoti pūrṇaḥ
prajāpatiḥ prajāpatim eva āpnoti aṅgirasām tvā devānām vratena ādadhe iti
brāhmaṇena ādheyaḥ ye vai devānām aṅgirasaḥ te brāhmaṇasya pratyenasaḥ agniḥ
vāyuḥ vāc bṛhaspatiḥ tatobandhuḥ asya yajñaḥ tataāyanaḥ yatobandhuḥ eva asya
yajñaḥ yataāyanaḥ tatas enam pratīcchati indrasya tvā marutvataḥ vratena ādadhe
iti rājanyena ādheyaḥ ye vai devānām rājānaḥ te rājanyasya pratyenasaḥ indraḥ
varuṇaḥ dhātā tvaṣṭā tatobandhuḥ asya yajñaḥ tataāyanaḥ yatobandhuḥ eva asya
yajñaḥ yataāyanaḥ tatas enam pratīcchati manoḥ tvā grāmaṇyaḥ vratena ādadhe iti
vaiśyena ādheyaḥ marutaḥ vai devānām viśaḥ te vaiśyasya pratyenasaḥ tatobandhuḥ
asya yajñaḥ tataāyanaḥ yatobandhuḥ eva asya yajñaḥ yataāyanaḥ tatas enam
pratīcchati iḍā vai manau āsīt sā asurān agnim ādadhānān agacchat te āhavanīyam
agre ādadhata atha gārhapatyam atha odanapacanam tān abravīt āptvā śriyam
pratyavārukṣan puṇyāḥ bhaviṣyanti parā tu bhaviṣyanti iti sā devān agnim
ādadhānān agacchat te odanapacanam agre ādadhata atha gārhapatyam atha
āhavanīyam tān abravīt āpan śriyam vi imam lokam achindan puṇyāḥ bhaviṣyanti
prajā tu eṣām na bhaviṣyati iti sā iḍā eva manoḥ ādadhāt sā bravīt tathā te
agnim ādhāsyāmi yathā manuṣyāḥ devān upa prajaniṣyante iti sā gārhapatyam agre
ādadhāt atha odanapacanam atha āhavanīyam anayoḥ lokayoḥ vyavagṛhītyai tatas
manuṣyāḥ devān upa prājāyanta prajananāya evam ādheyaḥ atha u anayoḥ eva lokayoḥ
vyavagṛhītyai prajāpatiḥ vai yat agre vyāharat sa satyam eva vyāharat etat vāva
sa tris vyāharat bhūḥ bhuvar svar iti etat vai vācaḥ satyam yat eva vācaḥ satyam
tena ādhatte bhūṣṇu vai satyam yaḥ evam vidvān etena ādhatte bhavati eva ayam
vai aparaḥ bhūḥ asau pūrvaḥ bhuvar bhūḥ bhuvar iti aparaḥ ādheyaḥ satyasya an
anugatyai bhūḥ bhuvar svar iti pūrvaḥ tat puras sarvam āpyate vāc vai devatām
niravadata nirudita devatā hi vai vāc atha tat sarvam na satyam yat vācā śapate
yat prāśūḥ bhavati yām vai tām vāc devatām niravadata eṣā vāva sā yat etāḥ
vyāhṛtayaḥ etat vai vācaḥ sa devam yat eva vācaḥ sa devam tena ādhatte ayam vai
aparaḥ bhūḥ asau pūrvaḥ bhuvar bhūḥ bhuvar iti aparaḥ ādheyaḥ ubhau eva enau
saha ādhatte eṣa hi etasya yoniḥ etasmāt hi eṣaḥ adhisṛjyate ayam vāva agniḥ yaḥ
ayam antaragni yaḥ asau pūrvaḥ asau ādityaḥ eṣa yaḥ asau amuṣmāt adhisṛjyate yaḥ
asau amuṣmāt adhisṛjyate yat dvitīyam jyotiḥ tat eva tat bhūḥ bhuvar svar iti
pūrvaḥ ādheyaḥ ubhau eva enau saha ādhatte eṣa hi etasya yoniḥ etasmāt hi eṣaḥ
adhi prahriyate yaḥ asau amuṣmāt adhi prahriyate yat tṛtīyam jyotiḥ tat eva tena
āpyate asau vāva eṣa ādityaḥ pratyaṅ ādhīyate tasmāt eṣa sarvāḥ prajāḥ pratyaṅ
agninā vai devāḥ annam adanti pratyak vai annam adyate yat pratyaṅ ādhīyate
annādyāya prācaḥ vai devān prajāpatiḥ asṛjata apācaḥ asurān saḥ asurān brahmaṇā
apānudata agniḥ brahma yat pratyaṅ ādhīyate bhrātṛvyasya apanuttyai imam ardham
agninā pariyanti imam ardham upacaranti devānām eva ardham pariyanti devānām
ardham upacaranti imām diśam abhyāvṛtya juhoti etasyām vai devāḥ diśi yasyām eva
devāḥ diśi tām diśam abhyāvṛtya juhoti rakṣāṃsi havā puronuvāke tapaḥ ugram
atiṣṭhanta tān prajāpatiḥ vareṇa upāmantrayata tāni varam avṛṇīta ādityaḥ naḥ
yoddhā iti tān prajāpatiḥ abravīt yodhayadhvam iti tasmāt uttiṣṭhantam havā tāni
rakṣāṃsi ādityam yodhayanti yāvat astam anvagāt gāyatriyā tāni havā etāni
rakṣāṃsi gāyatriyā abhimantritena ambhasā śāmyanti tat u ha vai ete brahma
vādinaḥ pūrva abhimukhāḥ saṃdhyāyām gāyatriyā abhimantritāḥ āpaḥ ūrdhvam
vikṣipanti tāḥ etāḥ āpaḥ vajrībhūtvā tāni rakṣāṃsi mandeha aruṇe dvīpe
prakṣipanti yat pradakṣiṇam prakramanti tena pāpmānam avadhūnvanti udyantam
astam yantam ādityam abhidhyāyan kurvan brāhmaṇaḥ vidvān sakalam bhadram aśnute
asau ādityaḥ brahma iti brahmā eva san brahma apyeti yaḥ evam veda kūśmāṇḍaiḥ
juhuyāt yaḥ a pūtaḥ iva manyeta yathā stenaḥ yathā bhrūṇa hā evam eṣa bhavati
yaḥ ayonau retaḥ siñcati yat arvācīnam enaḥ bhrūṇahatyāyāḥ tasmāt mucyate yāvat
enaḥ dīkṣām upaiti dīkṣitaḥ etaiḥ satati juhoti saṃvatsaram dīkṣitaḥ bhavati
saṃvatsarāt eva ātmānam punīte māsam dīkṣitaḥ bhavati yaḥ māsaḥ sa saṃvatsaraḥ
saṃvatsarāt eva ātmānam punīte caturviṃśatim rātrīḥ dīkṣitaḥ bhavati
caturviṃśatiḥ ardha māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsarāt eva ātmānam punīte dvādaśa
rātrīḥ dīkṣitaḥ bhavati dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsarāt eva ātmānam punīte
ṣaḍ rātrīḥ dīkṣitaḥ bhavati ṣaṣ vai ṛtavaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsarāt eva ātmānam
punīte tisraḥ rātrīḥ dīkṣitaḥ bhavati tri padā gāyatrī gāyatriyāḥ eva ātmānam
punīte na māṃsam aśnīyāt na striyam upeyāt na upari āsīta jugupseta anṛtāt payaḥ
brāhmaṇasya vratam yavāguḥ rājanyasya āmikṣā vaiśyasya atha u saumye api adhvare
etat vratam brūyāt yadi manyeta upadasyāmi iti odanam dhānāḥ saktūn ghṛtam iti
anuvratayet ātmanaḥ an upadāsāya pañca vai ete mahāyajñāḥ satati pratāyante
satati saṃtiṣṭhante devayajñaḥ pitṛyajñaḥ bhūtayajñaḥ manuṣyayajñaḥ brahmayajñaḥ
iti yat agnau juhoti api samidham tat devayajñaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate yat pitṛbhyaḥ
svadhākaroti api apaḥ tat pitṛyajñaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate yat bhūtebhyaḥ balim harati tat
bhūtayajñaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate yat brāhmaṇebhyaḥ annam dadāti tat manuṣyayajñaḥ
saṃtiṣṭhate yat svādhyāyam adhīyīta ekām api ṛcam yajuḥ sāma vā tat brahmayajñaḥ
saṃtiṣṭhate yat ṛcaḥ adhīte payasaḥ kūlyāḥ asya pitṝn svadhāḥ abhivahanti yat
yajūṃṣi ghṛtasya kūlyāḥ yat sāmāni somaḥ ebhyaḥ pavate yat atharva aṅgirasaḥ
madhoḥ kūlyāḥ yat brāhmaṇāni itihāsān purāṇāni kalpān gāthāḥ nārāśaṃsīḥ medasaḥ
kūlyāḥ asya pitṝn svadhāḥ abhivahanti yat ṛcaḥ adhīte payaḥ āhutibhiḥ eva tat
devān tarpayati yat yajūṃṣi ghṛta āhutibhiḥ yat sāmāni soma āhutibhiḥ yat
atharva aṅgirasaḥ madhu āhutibhiḥ yat brāhmaṇāni itihāsān purāṇāni kalpān gāthāḥ
nārāśaṃsīḥ medaḥ āhutibhiḥ eva tat devān tarpayati te enam tṛptāḥ āyuṣā tejasā
varcasā śriyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena annādyena ca tarpayanti grāme manasā
svādhyāyam adhīyīta divā naktam vā iti ha sma āha śaucaḥ āhneyaḥ uta araṇye
abalaḥ uta vācā uta tiṣṭhan uta vrajan uta āsīnaḥ uta śayānaḥ adhīyīta eva
svādhyāyam tapasvī puṇyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam vidvān svādhyāyam adhīte namaḥ
brahmaṇe namaḥ astu agnaye namaḥ pṛthivyai namaḥ oṣadhībhyaḥ namaḥ vāce namaḥ
vācaspataye namaḥ viṣṇave bṛhate karomi madhyandine prabalam adhīyīta asau khalu
ādityaḥ yat brāhmaṇaḥ tasmāt tarhi tekṣṇiṣṭham tapati tat eṣā abhyuktā citram
devānām udagāt anīkam cakṣuḥ mitrasya varuṇasya agneḥ āprāḥ dyāvāpṛthivī
antarikṣam sūryaḥ ātmā jagataḥ tasthuṣaḥ ca iti sa vai eṣa yajñaḥ sadyas
pratāyate sadyas saṃtiṣṭhate tasya prāk sāyam avabhṛthaḥ namaḥ brahmaṇe iti
paridhānīyām tris anvāha apaḥ upaspṛśya gṛhān eti tatas yat kim ca dadāti sā
dakṣiṇā tasya etasya yajñasya meghaḥ havirdhānam vidyut agniḥ varṣam haviḥ
stanayitnuḥ vaṣaṭkāraḥ yat avasphūrjati saḥ anuvaṣaṭkāraḥ vāyuḥ ātmā amāvāsyā
sviṣṭakṛt yaḥ evam vidvān meghe varṣati vidyotamāne stanayati avasphūrjati
pavamāne vāyau amāvāsyāyām svādhyāyam adhīte tapaḥ eva tat tapyate tapaḥ hi
svādhyāyaḥ iti uttamam nākam rohati uttamaḥ samānānām bhavati yāvantam ha vai
imām vittasya pūrṇām dadat svargam lokam jayati tāvantam lokam jayati bhūyāṃsam
ca akṣayyam ca apa punarmṛtyum jayati brahmaṇaḥ sāyujyam gacchati devāḥ vai
satram āsata ṛddhi parimitam yaśaskāmāḥ te abruvan yat naḥ prathamam yaśaḥ ṛchāt
sarveṣām naḥ tat saha asat iti teṣām kurukṣetram vediḥ āsīt tasyai khāṇḍavaḥ
dakṣiṇa ardhaḥ āsīt tūrghnam uttara ardhaḥ parīṇah jaghana ardhaḥ maravaḥ
utkaraḥ āsīt maravaḥ utkaraḥ teṣām makham vaiṣṇavam yaśaḥ ārchat tat nyakāmayata
tena apākrāmat tam devāḥ anvāyan yaśaḥ avarurutsamānāḥ tasya anvāgatasya savyāt
dhanuḥ ajāyata dakṣiṇāt iṣavaḥ tasmāt iṣu dhanvam puṇya janma yajña janmā hi tam
ekam santam bahavaḥ an iṣu dhanvāḥ na abhidhṛṣṇuvanti saḥ asmayata ekam mā
santam bahavaḥ na abhyadharṣiṣuḥ iti tasya siṣmiyāṇasya tejaḥ apākrāmat tat
devāḥ oṣadhīṣu nyamṛjuḥ te śyāmākāḥ abhavan smayākāḥ vai nāma ete tat smayākānām
smayāka tvam tasmāt dīkṣitena apigṛhya smetavyam tejasaḥ dhṛtyai sa dhanuḥ
pratiṣkabhya atiṣṭhat tāḥ upadīkāḥ abruvan varam vṛṇāmahai atha vaḥ imam
randhayāma yatra kva ca khanāma tat apaḥ abhitṛṇadāma iti tasmāt upadīkāḥ yatra
kva ca khananti tat apaḥ abhitṛndanti vārevṛtam hi āsām tasya jyām apyādan tasya
dhanuḥ vipravamāṇam śiraḥ udavartayat tat dyāvāpṛthivī anuprāvartata yat
prāvartata tat pravargyasya pravargya tvam yat ghram iti apatat tat gharmasya
gharma tvam mahataḥ vīryam apaptat iti tat mahāvīrasya mahāvīra tvam yat asyāḥ
samabharan tat saṃrājñaḥ samrāj tvam tam stṛtam devatāḥ tredhā vyagṛhṇata agniḥ
prātaḥsavanam indraḥ mādhyaṃdinam savanam viśve devāḥ tṛtīyasavanam tena apa
śīrṣṇā yajñena yajamānāḥ na āśiṣaḥ avārundhata na suvargam lokam abhyajayan te
devāḥ aśvinau abruvan bhiṣajau vai sthaḥ idam yajñasya śiraḥ pratidhattam iti
tau abrūtām varam vṛṇāvahai grahaḥ eva nau atra api gṛhyatām iti tābhyām etam
āśvinam agṛhṇan tau etat yajñasya śiraḥ pratyadhattām yat pravargyaḥ tena sa
śīrṣṇā yajñena yajamānāḥ ava āśiṣaḥ arundhata abhi suvargam lokam ajayan yat
pravargyam pravṛṇakti yajñasya eva tat śiraḥ pratidadhāti tena sa śīrṣṇā yajñena
yajamānaḥ ava āśiṣaḥ runddhe abhi suvargam lokam jayati tasmāt eṣaḥ āśvina
pravayāḥ iva yat pravargyaḥ sāvitram juhoti prasūtyai caturgṛhītena juhoti
catuṣpādaḥ paśavaḥ paśūn eva avarunddhe catasraḥ diśaḥ dikṣu eva pratitiṣṭhati
chandāṃsi devebhyaḥ apākrāman na vaḥ bhāgāni havyam vakṣyāmaḥ iti tebhyaḥ etat
caturgṛhītam adhārayan puronuvākyāyai yājyāyai devatāyai vaṣaṭkārāya yat
caturgṛhītam juhoti chandāṃsi eva tat prīṇāti tāni asya prītāni devebhyaḥ havyam
vahanti brahma vādinaḥ vadanti hotavyam dīkṣitasya gṛhe na hotavyam iti yat
juhuyāt haviṣkṛtam yajamānam agnau pradadhyāt yat na juhuyāt yajña paruḥ
antariyāt yajuḥ eva vadet na haviṣkṛtam yajamānam agnau pradadhāti na yajña
paruḥ antareti gāyatrī chandāṃsi atyamanyata tasyai vaṣaṭkāraḥ abhyayya śiraḥ
achinat tasyai dvedhā rasaḥ parāpatat pṛthivīm ardhaḥ prāviśat paśūn ardhaḥ yaḥ
pṛthivīm prāviśat sa khadiraḥ abhavat yaḥ paśūn saḥ ajām yat khādirī abhriḥ
bhavati chandasām eva rasena yajñasya śiraḥ saṃbharati yat audumbarī ūrj vai
udumbaraḥ ūrjā eva yajñasya śiraḥ saṃbharati yat vaiṇavī tejaḥ vai veṇuḥ tejasā
eva yajñasya śiraḥ saṃbharati yat vaikaṅkatī bhās eva avarunddhe devasya tvā
savituḥ prasave iti abhrim ādatte prasūtyai aśvinoḥ bāhubhyām iti āha aśvinau hi
devānām adhvaryū āstām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām iti āha yatyai vajraḥ iva vai eṣā yat
abhriḥ abhriḥ asi nāriḥ asi iti āha śāntyai adhvara kṛt devebhyaḥ iti āha yajñaḥ
vai adhvaraḥ yajña kṛt devebhyaḥ iti vāva etat āha uttiṣṭha brahmaṇaspate iti
āha brahmaṇā eva yajñasya śiraḥ acchaiti praitu brahmaṇaspatiḥ iti āha pretya
eva yajñasya śiraḥ acchaiti pra devī etu sūnṛtā iti āha yajñaḥ vai sūnṛtā acchā
vīram naryam paṅkti rādhasam iti āha pāṅktaḥ hi yajñaḥ devāḥ yajñam nayantu naḥ
iti āha devān eva yajña niyaḥ kurute devī dyāvāpṛthivī anu me maṃsāthām iti āha
ābhyām eva anumataḥ yajñasya śiraḥ saṃbharati ṛdhyāsam adya makhasya śiraḥ iti
āha yajñaḥ vai makhaḥ ṛdhyāsam adya yajñasya śiraḥ iti vāva etat āha makhāya tvā
makhasya tvā śīrṣṇe iti āha nirdiśya eva enat dharati tris harati trayaḥ ime
lokāḥ ebhyaḥ eva lokebhyaḥ yajñasya śiraḥ saṃbharati tūṣṇīm caturtham harati
aparimitāt eva yajñasya śiraḥ saṃbharati mṛtkhanāt agre harati tasmāt mṛtkhanaḥ
karuṇyatamaḥ iyatī agre āsīḥ iti āha asyām eva a chambaṭkāram yajñasya śiraḥ
saṃbharati ūrjam vai etam rasam pṛthivyāḥ upadīkāḥ uddihanti yat valmīkam yat
valmīka vapā saṃbhāraḥ bhavati ūrjam eva rasam pṛthivyāḥ avarunddhe atha u
śrotram eva śrotram hi etat pṛthivyāḥ yat valmīkaḥ a badhiraḥ bhavati yaḥ evam
veda indraḥ vṛtrāya vajram udayacchat sa yatra yatra parākramata tat na
adhriyata sa pūtīka stambe parākramata saḥ adhriyata saḥ abravīt ūtim vai me
adhāḥ iti tat ūtīkānām ūtīka tvam yat ūtīkāḥ bhavanti yajñāya eva ūtim dadhati
agni jāḥ asi prajāpateḥ retaḥ iti āha yaḥ eva rasaḥ paśūn prāviśat tam eva
avarunddhe pañca ete saṃbhārāḥ bhavanti pāṅktaḥ yajñaḥ yāvān eva yajñaḥ tasya
śiraḥ saṃbharati yat grāmyāṇām paśūnām carmaṇā saṃbharet grāmyān paśūn śucā
arpayet kṛṣṇājinena saṃbharati āraṇyān eva paśūn śucā arpayati tasmāt samāvat
paśūnām prajāyamānānām āraṇyāḥ paśavaḥ kanīyāṃsaḥ śucā hi ṛtāḥ lomataḥ
saṃbharati atas hi asya medhyam parigṛhya āyanti rakṣasām apahatyai bahavaḥ
haranti apacitim eva asmin dadhati uddhate sikatā upopte pariśrite nidadhati
śāntyai madantībhiḥ upasṛjati tejaḥ eva asmin dadhāti madhu tvā madhulā karotu
iti āha brahmaṇā eva asmin tejaḥ dadhāti yat grāmyāṇām pātrāṇām kapālaiḥ
saṃsṛjet grāmyāṇi pātrāṇi śucā arpayet arma kapālaiḥ saṃsṛjati etāni vai an
upajīvanīyāni tāni eva śucā arpayati śarkarābhiḥ saṃsṛjati dhṛtyai atha u
śaṃtvāya aja lomaiḥ saṃsṛjati eṣā vai agneḥ priyā tanūḥ yat ajā priyayā eva enam
tanuvā saṃsṛjati atha u tejasā kṛṣṇājinasya lomabhiḥ saṃsṛjati yajñaḥ vai
kṛṣṇājinam yajñena eva yajñam saṃsṛjati pariśrite karoti brahmavarcasasya
parigṛhītyai na kurvan abhiprāṇyāt yat kurvan abhiprāṇyāt prāṇān śucā arpayet
apahāya prāṇiti prāṇānām gopīthāya na pravargyam ca ādityam ca antareyāt yat
antareyāt duścarmā syāt tasmāt na antarāyyam ātmanaḥ gopīthāya veṇunā karoti
tejaḥ vai veṇuḥ tejaḥ pravargyaḥ tejasā eva tejaḥ samardhayati makhasya śiraḥ
asi iti āha yajñaḥ vai makhaḥ tasya etat śiraḥ yat pravargyaḥ tasmāt evam āha
yajñasya pade stha iti āha yajñasya hi ete pade atha u pratiṣṭhityai gāyatreṇa
tvā chandasā karomi iti āha chandobhiḥ eva enam karoti tri uddhim karoti trayaḥ
ime lokāḥ eṣām lokānām āptyai chandobhiḥ karoti vīryam vai chandāṃsi vīryeṇa eva
enam karoti yajuṣā bilam karoti vyāvṛttyai iyantam karoti prajāpatinā yajña
mukhena saṃmitam iyantam karoti yajña paruṣā saṃmitam iyantam karoti etāvat vai
puruṣe vīryam vīrya saṃmitam aparimitam karoti aparimitasya avaruddhyai
parigrīvam karoti dhṛtyai yathāyajus eva etat aśva śakena dhūpayati prājāpatyaḥ
vai aśvaḥ sa yoni tvāya vṛṣṇaḥ aśvasya niṣpad asi iti āha asau vai ādityaḥ vṛṣā
aśvaḥ tasya chandāṃsi niṣpad chandobhiḥ eva enam dhūpayati arciṣe tvā śociṣe tvā
iti āha tejaḥ eva asmin dadhāti vāruṇaḥ abhīddhaḥ maitriyā upaiti śāntyai
siddhyai tvā iti āha yathāyajus eva etat devaḥ tvā savitā udvapatu iti āha
savitṛ prasūtaḥ eva enam brahmaṇā devatābhiḥ udvapati a padyamānaḥ pṛthivyām
āśāḥ diśaḥ āpṛṇa iti āha tasmāt agniḥ sarvāḥ diśaḥ anu vibhāti uttiṣṭha bṛhan
bhava ūrdhvaḥ tiṣṭha dhruvaḥ tvam iti āha pratiṣṭhityai īśvaraḥ vai eṣaḥ andhaḥ
bhavitoḥ yaḥ pravargyam anvīkṣate sūryasya tvā cakṣuṣā anvīkṣe iti āha cakṣuṣaḥ
gopīthāya iyam vai ṛjuḥ antarikṣam sādhu asau su kṣitiḥ diśaḥ bhūtiḥ imān eva
asmai lokān kalpayati atha u pratiṣṭhityai idam aham amum āmuṣyāyaṇam viśā
paśubhiḥ brahmavarcasena paryūhāmi iti āha viśā eva enam paśubhiḥ
brahmavarcasena paryūhati viśā iti rājanyasya brūyāt viśā eva enam paryūhati
paśubhiḥ iti vaiśyasya paśubhiḥ eva enam paryūhati asuryam pātram an āchṛṇṇam
ācchṛṇatti devatrā akaḥ aja kṣīreṇa ācchṛṇatti paramam vai etat payaḥ yat aja
kṣīram parameṇa eva enam payasā ācchṛṇatti chandobhiḥ ācchṛṇatti chandobhiḥ vai
eṣa kriyate chandobhiḥ eva chandāṃsi ācchṛṇatti chṛndhi vācam iti āha vācam eva
avarunddhe chṛndhi ūrjam iti āha ūrjam eva avarunddhe chṛndhi haviḥ iti āha
haviḥ eva akaḥ deva puras cara saghyāsam tvā iti āha yathāyajus eva etat brahman
pracariṣyāmaḥ hotar gharmam abhiṣṭuhi iti āha eṣa vai etarhi bṛhaspatiḥ yat
brahmā tasmai eva pratiprocya pracarati ātmanaḥ anārtyai yamāya tvā makhāya tvā
iti āha etāḥ vai etasya devatāḥ tābhiḥ eva enam samardhayati madantībhiḥ
prokṣati tejaḥ eva asmin dadhāti abhipūrvam prokṣati abhipūrvam eva asmin tejaḥ
dadhāti tris prokṣati tri āvṛt hi yajñaḥ atha u medhya tvāya hotā anvāha
rakṣasām apahatyai an avānam prāṇānām santatyai triṣṭubhaḥ satīḥ gāyatrīḥ iva
anvāha gāyatraḥ hi prāṇaḥ prāṇam eva yajamāne dadhāti santatam anvāha prāṇānām
annādyasya santatyai atha u rakṣasām apahatyai yat parimitāḥ anubrūyāt parimitam
avarundhīta aparimitāḥ anvāha aparimitasya avaruddhyai śiraḥ vai etat yajñasya
yat pravargyaḥ ūrj muñjāḥ yat mauñjaḥ vedaḥ bhavati ūrjā eva yajñasya śiraḥ
samardhayati prāṇa āhutīḥ juhoti prāṇān eva yajamāne dadhāti sapta juhoti sapta
vai śīrṣaṇyāḥ prāṇāḥ prāṇān eva asmin dadhāti devaḥ tvā savitā madhvā anaktu iti
āha tejasā eva enam anakti pṛthivīm tapasaḥ trāyasva iti hiraṇyam upāsyati asyāḥ
an atidāhāya śiraḥ vai etat yajñasya yat pravargyaḥ agniḥ sarvāḥ devatāḥ
pralavān ādīpya upāsyati devatāsu eva yajñasya śiraḥ pratidadhāti a pratiśīrṇa
agram bhavati etat barhiḥ hi eṣaḥ arciḥ asi śociḥ asi iti āha tejaḥ eva asmin
brahmavarcasam dadhāti saṃsīdasva mahāṁ asi iti āha mahān hi eṣaḥ brahma vādinaḥ
vadanti ete vāva te ṛtvijaḥ ye darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ atha kathā hotā yajamānāya
āśiṣaḥ na āśāste iti purastāt āśīḥ khalu vai anyaḥ yajñaḥ upariṣṭāt āśīḥ anyaḥ
anādhṛṣyā purastāt iti yat etāni yajūṃṣi āha śīrṣataḥ eva yajñasya yajamānaḥ
āśiṣaḥ avarunddhe āyuḥ purastāt āha prajām dakṣiṇatas prāṇam paścāt śrotram
uttaratas vidhṛtim upariṣṭāt prāṇān eva asmai samīcaḥ dadhāti īśvaraḥ vai eṣa
diśaḥ anūnmaditoḥ yam diśaḥ anu vyāsthāpayanti manoḥ aśvā asi bhūri putrā iti
imām abhimṛśati iyam vai manoḥ aśvā bhūri putrā asyām eva pratitiṣṭhati an
unmādāya su upasadā me bhūyāḥ mā mā hiṃsīḥ iti āha ahiṃsāyai citaḥ stha
paricitaḥ iti āha apacitim eva asmin dadhāti śiraḥ vai etat yajñasya yat
pravargyaḥ asau khalu vai ādityaḥ pravargyaḥ tasya marutaḥ raśmayaḥ svāhā
marudbhiḥ pariśrayasva iti āha amum eva ādityam raśmibhiḥ paryūhati tasmāt asau
ādityaḥ amuṣmin loke raśmibhiḥ paryūḍhaḥ tasmāt rājā viśā paryūḍhaḥ tasmāt
grāmaṇīḥ sajātaiḥ paryūḍhaḥ agneḥ sṛṣṭasya yataḥ vikaṅkatam bhās ārchat yat
vaikaṅkatāḥ paridhayaḥ bhavanti bhās eva avarunddhe dvādaśa bhavanti dvādaśa
māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaram eva avarunddhe asti trayodaśaḥ māsaḥ iti āhuḥ yat
trayodaśaḥ paridhiḥ bhavati tena eva trayodaśam māsam avarunddhe antarikṣasya
antardhiḥ asi iti āha vyāvṛttyai divam tapasaḥ trāyasva iti upariṣṭāt hiraṇyam
adhinidadhāti amuṣyāḥ an atidāhāya atha u ābhyām eva enam ubhayatas parigṛhṇāti
arhan bibharṣi sāyakāni dhanvā iti āha stauti eva enam etat gāyatram asi
traiṣṭubham asi jāgatam asi iti dhavitrāṇi ādatte chandobhiḥ eva enāni ādatte
madhu madhu iti dhūnoti prāṇaḥ vai madhu prāṇam eva yajamāne dadhāti tris
pariyanti trivṛt hi prāṇaḥ tris pariyanti tri āvṛt hi yajñaḥ atha u rakṣasām
apahatyai tris punar pariyanti ṣaṭ sampadyante ṣaṭ vai ṛtavaḥ ṛtuṣu eva
pratitiṣṭhanti yaḥ vai gharmasya priyām tanuvam ākrāmati duścarmā vai sa bhavati
eṣa ha vai asya priyām tanuvam ākrāmati yaḥ tris parītya caturtham paryeti etām
ha vai asya ugradevaḥ rājaniḥ ācakrāma tatas vai sa duścarmā abhavat tasmāt tris
parītya na caturtham parīyāt ātmanaḥ gopīthāya prāṇāḥ vai dhavitrāṇi a
vyatiṣaṅgam dhūnvanti prāṇānām a vyatiṣaṅgāya kﾱptyai viniṣadya dhūnvanti dikṣu
eva pratitiṣṭhanti ūrdhvam dhūnvanti suvargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai sarvatas
