dhūnvanti tasmāt ayam sarvatas pavate agniḥ tvā vasubhiḥ purastāt rocayatu
gāyatreṇa chandasā iti āha agniḥ eva enam vasubhiḥ purastāt rocayati gāyatreṇa
chandasā sa mā rucitaḥ rocaya iti āha āśiṣam eva etām āśāste indraḥ tvā rudraiḥ
dakṣiṇatas rocayatu traiṣṭubhena chandasā iti āha indraḥ eva enam rudraiḥ
dakṣiṇatas rocayati traiṣṭubhena chandasā sa mā rucitaḥ rocaya iti āha āśiṣam
eva etām āśāste varuṇaḥ tvā ādityaiḥ paścāt rocayatu jāgatena chandasā iti āha
varuṇaḥ eva enam ādityaiḥ paścāt rocayati jāgatena chandasā sa mā rucitaḥ rocaya
iti āha āśiṣam eva etām āśāste dyutānaḥ tvā mārutaḥ marudbhiḥ uttaratas rocayatu
ānuṣṭubhena chandasā iti āha dyutānaḥ eva enam mārutaḥ marudbhiḥ uttaratas
rocayati ānuṣṭubhena chandasā sa mā rucitaḥ rocaya iti āha āśiṣam eva etām
āśāste bṛhaspatiḥ tvā viśvaiḥ devaiḥ upariṣṭāt rocayatu pāṅktena chandasā iti
āha bṛhaspatiḥ eva enam viśvaiḥ devaiḥ upariṣṭāt rocayatu pāṅktena chandasā sa
mā rucitaḥ rocaya iti āha āśiṣam eva etām āśāste rocitaḥ tvam deva gharma deveṣu
asi iti āha rocitaḥ hi eṣa deveṣu rociṣīya aham manuṣyeṣu iti āha rocate eva eṣa
manuṣyeṣu samrāj gharma rucitaḥ tvam deveṣu āyuṣmān tejasvī brahmavarcasī asi
iti āha rucitaḥ hi eṣa deveṣu āyuṣmān tejasvī brahmavarcasī rucitaḥ aham
manuṣyeṣu āyuṣmān tejasvī brahmavarcasī bhūyāsam iti āha rucitaḥ eva eṣa
manuṣyeṣu āyuṣmān tejasvī brahmavarcasī bhavati ruj asi rucam mayi dhehi mayi
ruc iti āha āśiṣam eva etām āśāste tam yat etaiḥ yajurbhiḥ a rocayitvā rucitaḥ
gharmaḥ iti prabrūyāt a rocukaḥ adhvaryuḥ syāt a rocukaḥ yajamānaḥ atha yat enam
etaiḥ yajurbhiḥ rocayitvā rucitaḥ gharmaḥ iti prāha rocukaḥ adhvaryuḥ bhavati
rocukaḥ yajamānaḥ upoṣya paurṇamāsena haviṣā yajate tathā āmāvāsyena dve
paurṇamāsyau amāvāsye ca yām pari astamayam pūrṇaḥ udiyāt yām ca astamite te
paurṇamāsyau śvas na draṣṭā iti yat ahar ca na dṛśyeta te amāvāsye iti
paurṇamāsyām iti amāvāsyāyām iti upadeśāt vyavatiṣṭhante tad saṃyuktāḥ ca śabdāḥ
samānam anyat ubhayatra āgneyaḥ puroḍāśaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ upāṃśuyājaḥ vaiṣṇavaḥ vā
aindrāgnaḥ a saṃnayataḥ dvitīyaḥ amāvāsyāyām aindram sāṃnāyyam saṃnayataḥ
māhendram vā iḍām upahvāsyamānasya dakṣiṇasya pāṇeḥ pradeśinyām anakti uttame ca
parvaṇi madhyame ca vācaspatinā te hutasya prāśnāmi iṣe prāṇāya iti pūrvam
añjanam adhare oṣṭhe nilipyati manasaspatinā te hutasya prāśnāmi ūrje udānāya
iti uttara oṣṭhe uttaram upaspṛśya dakṣiṇena uttara iḍām dhārayan a
prasāritābhiḥ aṅgulibhiḥ a muṣṭi kṛtābhiḥ svayam pañcamam ādāya mukha saṃmitām
dhārayan hṛdaya saṃmitām vā vyākhyātau darśa pūrṇamāsau prakṛtiḥ iṣṭi
paśubandhānām anvayasya prakṛtiḥ iti ākhyā antareṇa ājyabhāgau sviṣṭakṛtam ca
yat ijyate tam āvāpaḥ iti ācakṣate tat pradhānam tad aṅgāni itarāṇi teṣām a
bhinna kāle arthe vibhavaḥ tantra lakṣaṇam tat pradānam uccāvacābhiḥ devatābhiḥ
saṃyujya śrūyate tatra devatā vikāre tad devate yājyā puronuvākye nigama
sthāneṣu ca sā devatā upalakṣyate āvāhane uttame prayāje sviṣṭakṛt nigade
sūktavāke ca ijyamānāḥ devatāḥ nigacchanti tasmāt nigama sthānāni anukrāmantaḥ
ca vikārān vyākhyāsyāmaḥ paurṇamāsī vikāraḥ iti ukte vārtraghnau pratīyāt
amāvāsyā vikāraḥ iti vṛdhanvantau anādeśe vikalpa bhūtau devatātaḥ haviṣṭaḥ vā
saṃnipāte haviṣṭaḥ sāmānyāt niyamaḥ sāptadaśyam ca sāmidhenīnām iṣṭi
paśubandheṣu vacanāt anyat kāmyāsu upāṃśu haviḥ tā anukrāmantaḥ ca vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
śaradi vājapeyaḥ annādya kāmasya vājena yakṣyamāṇaḥ purastāt saṃvatsaram peyaiḥ
yajñakratubhiḥ yajate pānam vai peyāḥ annam vājaḥ pānam vai pūrvam atha annam
tayoḥ ubhayoḥ āptyai dvādaśa agniṣṭomāḥ gotamasya vā caturuttara stomaḥ
vyatyāsam prākṛtena a pariyajñam eke indraḥ ha etena yajñakratunā iṣṭvā
bṛhaspatiḥ ca annādyam āpatuḥ tena annādya kāmaḥ yajeta atha u ha etena vājaḥ
laukyaḥ iṣṭvā sarvān kāmān āpa dīkṣāḥ tisraḥ upasadaḥ sutyam saptadaśam ahar
saptadaśaḥ vai prajāpatiḥ vājapeyaḥ tat enam svena rūpeṇa samardhayati catur
aśraḥ godhūma caṣālaḥ bailvaḥ yūpaḥ saptadaśa aratniḥ saptadaśaḥ vai prajāpatiḥ
vājapeyaḥ tat enam svena rūpeṇa samardhayati saptadaśa agnīṣomīyāḥ teṣām samānam
caraṇam āgneyaḥ aindrāgnaḥ aindraḥ vṛṣṇiḥ sārasvatī meṣī marudbhyaḥ ujjeṣebhyaḥ
vaśā pṛśniḥ pañcamī kratu paśūnām saptadaśa prājāpatyāḥ śyāmāḥ tūparāḥ
lapsudinaḥ upālambhyāḥ savanīyānām tantram paryagnikaraṇa antam brahma sāmnā
ālabhyante adhriguḥ āvarteta stokyāḥ ca pra asmai agnim bharata ūvadhya goham
iti tantram uttamaḥ prayājaḥ parivāpyau ca ūrdhvam pradānam hāriyojanāt
vanaspati prabhṛtīni aṅgāni utkṛṣyeran iṣṭeṣu vā anuyājeṣu sva kālāḥ vā
saptadaśaḥ stomaḥ vairājam ājyam ghṛtastomīyam vā mādhucchandasaḥ praugaḥ annam
vai virāj ghṛtam annam rasaḥ mādhucchandasaḥ praugaḥ annena tat rasam dadhāti
aikāhikam vā pratiṣṭhā vai ekāhaḥ pratiṣṭhityai eva trikadrukeṣu mahiṣaḥ yava
āśiram tuvi śuṣmaḥ iti aticchandasā marutvatīyam pratipadyate prājāpatyam vai
chandaḥ aticchandāḥ prajāpatiḥ vājapeyaḥ tat enam svena rūpeṇa samardhayati ā
tvā ratham yathā ūtaye iti eva pratipadyeta prājāpatyam vai chandaḥ anuṣṭubh
prajāpatiḥ vājapeyaḥ tat enam svena rūpeṇa samardhayati kayā śubhā savayasaḥ
sanīḍāḥ iti marutvatīyam kadvat kayāśubhīyam kaḥ vai prajāpatiḥ vājapeyaḥ tat
enam svena rūpeṇa samardhayati bārhaspatyaḥ naivāraḥ saptadaśa śarāvaḥ
saptadaśaḥ vai prajāpatiḥ vājapeyaḥ tat enam svena rūpeṇa samardhayati saḥ
antareṇa niṣkevalya marutvatīye bṛhaspatisave ca tatra abhiṣicyate prāk
sviṣṭakṛtaḥ tasya pradānam sviṣṭakṛt iḍam ca tat id āsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭham iti
niṣkevalyam yajñaḥ vai bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭhaḥ yajñaḥ u vai prajāpatiḥ vājapeyaḥ tat
enam svena rūpeṇa samardhayati anucara prabhṛti ṣaṣṭhāt tṛtīyasavanam
prājāpatyam vai ṣaṣṭham ahar prajāpatiḥ vājapeyaḥ tat enam svena rūpeṇa
samardhayati viṣuvataḥ vā rohaḥ vai viṣuvān rohaḥ vājapeyaḥ tat enam svena
rūpeṇa samardhayati aikāhikam vā pratiṣṭhā vai ekāhaḥ pratiṣṭhityai eva tatra
purastāt ānobhadrīyasya madhunāḍyau viharet iti paiṅgyam imam mahe vidathyāya
uṣasaḥ pūrvāḥ iti ṛkchas te yadi citravatīṣu agniṣṭoma sāma kuryuḥ tvam naḥ
citraḥ ūtyā agne vivasvat iti stotriya anurūpau pragāthau ūrdhvam ṣoḍaśinaḥ
atirikta ukthyam pra tat te adya śipiviṣṭa pra tat viṣṇuḥ iti stotriya anurūpau
brahma jajñānam prathamam purastāt iti dve venaḥ tat paśyat iti pañca ayam venaḥ
iti vā tam pratnathā iti trayodaśānām uttamām pariśiṣya āhūya dūrohaṇam yathā
viṣuvati uttamām upasaṃśasya yajñaḥ babhūva iti paridhāya prajāpate iti yajati
saptadaśa gavām śatāni dadāti saptadaśa vāsasām saptadaśa yānāni yuktāni rathān
hastinaḥ niṣkān dundubhīn tāni sapta saptadaśāni bhavanti saḥ āptaḥ vājapeyaḥ
vayasaḥ vayasaḥ saptadaśa saptadaśa iti kuruvājapeyaḥ prajāpatiḥ akāmayata
sarvān kāmān āpnuyām sarvāḥ vyaṣṭīḥ vyaśnuvīya iti saḥ etam tri rātram yajña
kratum apaśyat aśvamedham tam āharat tena ayajata tena iṣṭvā sarvān kāmān āpnot
sarvāḥ vyaṣṭīḥ vyāśnuta tathā u eva etat yajamānaḥ yat aśvamedhena yajate sarvān
kāmān āpnoti sarvāḥ vyaṣṭīḥ vyaśnute mahartvigbhyaḥ nirvapati caturaḥ pātrān
añjalīn prasṛtān ca dvādaśavidham dvādaśa vai māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsarasya
eva āptyai atha asmai adhvaryuḥ niṣkam pratimuñcati sāyamāhutau hutāyām
jaghanena gārhapatyam udaṅ vāvātayā saha saṃviśati antarā ūrū a saṃvartamānaḥ
śayīta anena tapasā imam svasti saṃvatsaram samaśnavāmahai iti tam prātarāhutau
hutāyām dadāti atha āgneyam aṣṭākapālam puroḍāśam nirvapati agniḥ vai devānām
mukham mukhataḥ eva tat devān prīṇāti atha pūṣṇe pathikṛte carum nirvapati pūṣā
vai pathīnām adhipaḥ svastyayanam eva tat aśvāya karoti sarva rūpam aśvam javena
sampannam saṃvatsarāya utsṛjanti sarva kāminam anyatra a brahmacaryāt śatam rāja
putrāḥ kavacinaḥ rājanyāḥ niṣaṅgiṇaḥ sūta grāmaṇīnām putrāḥ upavītinaḥ kṣatra
saṃgrahītṝṇām putrāḥ daṇḍinaḥ an āvartayantaḥ aśvam rakṣanti atha savitre
prasavitre savitre āsavitre savitre satya prasavāya iti saṃvatsaram havīṃṣi
savitā vai prasavitā sa me imam yajñam prasuvai iti savitā vai āsavitā sa me
imam yajñam āsuvai iti savitā vai satya prasavaḥ sa me imam yajñam satyena
prasavena prasuvai iti yaḥ imā viśvā jātāni ā devaḥ yātu savitā su ratnaḥ
viśvāni deva savitar sa gha naḥ devaḥ savitā viśva devam na pramiye hotā ca
pāriplavam ācaṣṭe adhvaryo iti āmantritaḥ hoyi hotar iti sarvatra pratiśṛṇoti om
hotar tathā hotar iti ācakṣāṇe anugṛṇāti atha adhvaryuḥ vīṇāgaṇaginaḥ
saṃpreṣyati purāṇaiḥ enam puṇya kṛdbhiḥ rājabhiḥ saṃgāyata iti manuḥ vaivasvataḥ
iti prathame tasya manuṣyāḥ viśaḥ te ime āsate iti gṛhamedhinaḥ upadiśati ṛcaḥ
vedaḥ vedaḥ saḥ ayam iti sūktam nigadet yamaḥ vaivasvataḥ iti dvitīye tasya
pitaraḥ viśaḥ te ime āsate iti sthavirān upadiśati yajurvedaḥ vedaḥ saḥ ayam iti
yājuṣam anuvākam nigadet varuṇaḥ ādityaḥ iti tṛtīye tasya gandharvāḥ viśaḥ te
ime āsate iti yūnaḥ śobhanān upadiśati atharvavedaḥ vedaḥ saḥ ayam iti bheṣajam
nigadet somaḥ vaiṣṇavaḥ iti caturthe tasya apsarasaḥ viśaḥ tāḥ imāḥ āsate iti
yuvatīḥ śobhanāḥ upadiśati āṅgirasaḥ vedaḥ vedaḥ saḥ ayam iti ghoram nigadet
arbudaḥ kādraveyaḥ iti pañcame tasya sarpāḥ viśaḥ te ime āsate iti sarpān sarpa
vidaḥ vā upadiśati sarpa vidyā vedaḥ saḥ ayam iti sarpa vidyām nigadet kuberaḥ
vaiśravaṇaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhe tasya rakṣāṃsi viśaḥ tāni imāni āsata iti selagān pāpa
kṛtaḥ vā upadiśati rakṣaḥ vidyā vedaḥ saḥ ayam iti rakṣaḥ vidyām nigadet asitaḥ
dhānvanaḥ iti saptame tasya asurāḥ viśaḥ te ime āsate iti kusīdinaḥ upadiśati
asura vidyā vedaḥ saḥ ayam iti māyām kāṃcid kuryāt matsyaḥ sāṃmadaḥ iti aṣṭame
tasya udaka carāḥ viśaḥ te ime āsate iti matsyān matsya vidaḥ vā upadiśati
itihāsa vedaḥ vedaḥ saḥ ayam iti itihāsam ācakṣīta tārkṣyaḥ vaipaśyataḥ iti
navame tasya vayāṃsi viśaḥ tāni imāni āsate iti vayāṃsi brahmacāriṇaḥ vā
upadiśati purāṇa vedaḥ vedaḥ saḥ ayam iti purāṇam ācakṣīta dharmaḥ indraḥ iti
daśame tasya devāḥ viśaḥ te ime āsate iti yūnaḥ a pratigrāhakān śrotriyān
upadiśati sāmavedaḥ vedaḥ saḥ ayam iti sāma gāyāt sarvān vedān ācaṣṭe sarveṇa
sarvam āpnavāni iti tat yat punar punar pariplavate tasmāt pāriplavam
ekaviṃśatiḥ yūpāḥ ekaviṃśati aratnayaḥ aṣṭau bailvāḥ daśa khādirāḥ paitudravau
upasthāvānau rājjudālaḥ agniṣṭhaḥ ekaviṃśatiḥ agnīṣomīyāḥ teṣām samānam caraṇam
gotamasya caturuttara stomaḥ sutyānām prathamam ahar tena imam lokam āpnoti
ekaviṃśa stomam dvitīyam ekaviṃśaḥ vai eṣa yaḥ eṣa tapati tat enam svena rūpeṇa
samardhayati etasmāt aśvaḥ nistaṣṭaḥ tat etat ṛcā abhyuditam sūrāt aśvam vasavaḥ
nirataṣṭa iti aśvaḥ gomṛgaḥ ajaḥ tūparaḥ te prājāpatyāḥ gauraḥ gavayaḥ śarabhaḥ
uṣṭraḥ māyuḥ kimpuruṣaḥ iti anustaraṇāḥ paśavaḥ ca ekaviṃśatiḥ ekaviṃśatiḥ
ekaviṃśataye cāturmāsya devatābhyaḥ etāḥ vai sarvāḥ devatāḥ yat cāturmāsya
devatāḥ sarvāsām eva devatānām prītyai alaṃkṛtam aśvam āstavam avaghrāpayanti su
gavyam naḥ iti an avajighrati yajamānam vācayet agreṇa yūpam tiṣṭhantam yat
akrandaḥ iti ekādaśabhiḥ a praṇavābhiḥ samiddhaḥ añjan iti āpriyaḥ adhrigo iti
pariśiṣya mā naḥ mitraḥ iti sūktam uttame ca uttarasya a praṇuvan catustriṃśat
iti purastāt vaṅkrīṇām atha aśvāya upastṛṇanti vāsaḥ adhīvāsam hiraṇyam iti tat
etat ṛcā abhyuditam yat aśvāya vāsaḥ upastṛṇanti adhīvāsam yā hiraṇyāni asmai
iti atha aśvam medhyam ālabhante paryaṅgyān bahūn āraṇyān tat etat ṛcā
abhyuditam atra pūṣṇaḥ prathamaḥ bhāgaḥ eti iti aindrāpauṣṇaḥ śyāmaḥ nābhyām tat
etat ṛcā abhyuditam indrāpūṣṇoḥ priyam apyeti pāthaḥ iti saṃjñaptāya mahiṣīm
upanipātayanti tau adhīvāsena saṃprorṇuvate tau yajamānaḥ abhimethati utsakthyoḥ
ava gudam dhehi arvāñcam añjim ābhara yaḥ strīṇām jīva bhojanaḥ iti tam na
kaścana pratyabhimethati mātā ca te pitā ca te agre vṛkṣasya krīḍataḥ pra tiḍāmi
iti te pitā garbhe muṣṭim ataṃsayat iti enām hotā abhimethati ūrdhvām enām
ucchrayatāt girau bhāram haran iva atha asyai madhyam ejati śīte vāte punan iva
iti brahmā vāvātām yat asyāḥ aṃhubhedyāḥ iti udgātā parivṛktām manyate śūdrā yat
arya jārā na poṣāya dhanāyati iti yat hariṇaḥ yavam atti na puṣṭam bahu manyate
śūdrā yat arya jārā na poṣāya dhanāyati iti adhvaryuḥ pālāgalīm aśva pālānām
samāna jātīyāḥ śatam śatam anucaryaḥ tāḥ pratyabhimethanti yiyapsyataḥ iva te
manaḥ hotar mā tvam vadaḥ bahu ūrdhvam enam yat devāsaḥ lalāmagum śūdraḥ yat
arya jāyāḥ patiḥ iti pratyabhimethane vikāraḥ sadasi brahma vadyam hotā
adhvaryum pṛcchati dvitīyayā pratyāha tṛtīyayā pṛcchati caturthyā pratyāha
pṛcchāmi tvā param antam pṛthivyāḥ iti yajamānam pṛcchati uttarayā pratyāha
subhūḥ svayambhūḥ prathamam antar mahati arṇave dadhe ha garbham ṛtviyam yatas
jātaḥ prajāpatiḥ iti mahimnaḥ puronuvākyā hotā yakṣat prajāpatim iti praiṣaḥ
prajāpate na tvat iti yājyā prājāpatyasya vapayā caritvā tat anu anyāḥ vapāḥ
juhuyuḥ iti ha eke āhuḥ prajāpatim vai anu anyāḥ devatāḥ tat enāḥ yathāyatham
prīṇāti iti aindrāgnasya vā vaiśvadevasya vā kim uta tvareran iti ha sma āha
indrotaḥ śaunakaḥ nānā nānā devatābhiḥ pracareyuḥ saha saha samāna devatābhiḥ a
vyavasthitābhiḥ nānā vyavasthābhiḥ tat enāḥ yathāyatham prīṇāti iti uttarasya
mahimnaḥ yājyā puronuvākye viparyasyet ubhe aikāhikam ca pāṅktam ca ājye
saṃśaṃset yaḥ aikāhike ca pāṅkte ca ājye kāmaḥ tayoḥ ubhayoḥ āptyai ubhau
aikāhikam ca bārhatam ca praugau sampravayet yaḥ aikāhike ca bārhate ca prauge
kāmaḥ tayoḥ ubhayoḥ āptyai mahānāmnyaḥ pṛṣṭham bhavanti sarvam vai tat yat
mahānāmnyaḥ sarvam aśvamedhaḥ sarveṇa sarvam āpnavāni iti yāni pāñcamāhnikāni
niṣkevalya marutvatīyayoḥ sūktāni tāni pūrvāṇi śastvā aikāhikayoḥ nividau
dadhāti pratiṣṭhā vai ekāhaḥ pratiṣṭhityai eva sahasram vā madhyaṃdine chandasaḥ
chandasaḥ catvāriṃśatam catvāriṃśatam marutvatīye te dve aśīti śate saptaviṃśati
śatāni niṣkevalye tat sahasram sarvam vai tat yat sahasram sarvam aśvamedhaḥ
sarveṇa sarvam āpnavāni iti yāni pāñcamāhnikāni vaiśvadeva āgnimārutayoḥ sūktāni
tāni pūrvāṇi śastvā aikāhikeṣu nividaḥ dadhāti pratiṣṭhā vai ekāhaḥ
pratiṣṭhityai eva ukthyam saṃtiṣṭhate tena antarikṣa lokam āpnoti sarva stomaḥ
atirātraḥ uttamam ahar sarvam vai sarva stomaḥ atirātraḥ sarvam aśvamedhaḥ
sarveṇa sarvam āpnavāni iti tena amum lokam āpnoti dvitīyāt ābhiplavikāt śastram
etena ha indrotaḥ śaunakaḥ janamejayam pārikṣitam yājayāṃcakāra tat uta eṣā api
yajña gāthā gīyate āsandīvati dhānya ādam rukmiṇam harita srajam abadhnāt aśvam
sāraṅgam devebhyaḥ janamejayaḥ ete eva pūrve ahanī jyotiḥ atirātraḥ tena
ugrasenam gauḥ tena bhīmasenam āyuḥ tena śrutasenam sarve pārikṣitīyāḥ tat uta
eṣā api yajña gāthā gīyate pārikṣitāḥ yajamānāḥ aśvamedhaiḥ parovaram ajahuḥ
pāpakam karma puṇyāḥ puṇyena karmaṇā iti abhijit tena ha ṛṣabhaḥ yājñaturaḥ īje
tat uta eṣā api yajña gāthā gīyate ṛṣabhe aśvena yajati purā yājñature nṛpe
amādyat indraḥ somena brāhmaṇāḥ ca īpsitaiḥ dhanaiḥ iti viśvajit tena paraḥ
āhṇāraḥ īje vaidehaḥ tat uta eṣā api yajña gāthā gīyate āhṇārasya parasya adaḥ
aśvam medhyam abadhnata hiraṇyanābhaḥ kausalyaḥ diśaḥ pūrṇāḥ amaṃhata iti
mahāvratam atirātraḥ tena ha maruttaḥ āvikṣitaḥ īje tat uta eṣā api yajña gāthā
gīyate marutaḥ pariveṣṭāraḥ maruttasya avasan gṛhe āvikṣitasya agniḥ kṣattā
viśve devāḥ sabhāsadaḥ iti tatas ha asya tad devatāḥ sabhāsadaḥ babhūvuḥ prācī
diś hotuḥ dakṣiṇā brahmaṇaḥ pratīcī adhvaryoḥ udīcī udgātuḥ yat anyat bhūmeḥ
puruṣebhyaḥ ca a brāhmaṇānām svam atra eva hotrakāṇām madhye tu yajeta pañca
paśuḥ viśākha yūpaḥ saṃvatsaram ṛtu paśavaḥ ṣaṭ āgneyāḥ vasante aindrāḥ grīṣme
mārutāḥ pārjanyāḥ vā varṣāsu maitrāvaruṇāḥ śaradi bārhaspatyāḥ hemante
aindrāvaiṣṇavāḥ śiśire prajāpatiḥ aśvamedhena iṣṭvā puruṣamedham apaśyat tasya
yat an āptam aśvamedhena āsīt tat sarvam puruṣamedhena āpnot tathā u eva etat
yajamānaḥ yat puruṣamedhena yajate yat asya an āptam aśvamedhena bhavati tat
sarvam puruṣamedhena āpnoti sarvam āśvamedhikam upajanaḥ ca atha agnaye kāmāya
dātre pathikṛte iti havīṃṣi agniḥ vai kāmaḥ devānām īśvaraḥ sarveṣām eva devānām
prītyai agniḥ vai dātā saḥ eva asmai yajñam dadāti agniḥ vai pathikṛt saḥ eva
enam punar yajña patham apipāthayati brāhmaṇam kṣatriyam vā sahasreṇa śatā
aśvena avakrīya saṃvatsarāya utsṛjanti sarva kāminam anyatra a brahmacaryāt
tathā ca eva anurakṣanti atha anumataye pathyāyai svastaye aditaye iti
saṃvatsaram havīṃṣi sāvitraiḥ viparyāsam pāriplavīyaiḥ nārāśaṃsāni anumatyā
anumataḥ anena yajñena yajai iti vāc vai pathyā svastiḥ svastyayanam eva tat
yajñe yajamānāya karoti iyam vai aditiḥ pratiṣṭhā vai aditiḥ asyām eva enam tat
adīnāyām antatas pratiṣṭhāpayanti atha atas sāmayācārikān dharmān vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
dharma jña samayaḥ pramāṇam vedāḥ ca catvāraḥ varṇāḥ brāhmaṇa kṣatriya vaiśya
śūdrāḥ teṣām pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ janmataḥ śreyān a śūdrāṇām a duṣṭa karmaṇām upāyanam
veda adhyayanam agnyādheyam phalavanti ca karmāṇi śuśrūṣā śūdrasya itareṣām
varṇānām pūrvasmin pūrvasmin varṇe niḥśreyasam bhūyaḥ upanayanam vidyā arthasya
śrutitaḥ saṃskāraḥ sarvebhyaḥ vedebhyaḥ sāvitrī anūcyate iti hi brāhmaṇam
tamasaḥ vai eṣa tamaḥ praviśati yam a vidvān upanayate yaḥ ca a vidvān iti hi
brāhmaṇam tasmin abhijana vidyā samudetam samāhitam saṃskartāram īpset tasmin ca
eva vidyā karma antam a vipratipanne dharmebhyaḥ yasmāt dharmān ācinoti saḥ
ācāryaḥ tasmai na druhyet kadācana sa hi vidyātaḥ tam janayati tat śreṣṭham
janma śarīram eva mātā pitarau janayataḥ vasante brāhmaṇam upanayīta grīṣme
rājanyam śaradi vaiśyam garbha aṣṭameṣu brāhmaṇam garbha ekādaśeṣu rājanyam
garbha dvādaśeṣu vaiśyam atha kāmyāni saptame brahmavarcasa kāmam aṣṭame
āyuṣkāmam navame tejaskāmam daśame annādya kāmam ekādaśe indriya kāmam dvādaśe
paśu kāmam ā ṣoḍaśāt brāhmaṇasya an atyayaḥ ā dvāviṃśāt kṣatriyasya ā
caturviṃśāt vaiśyasya yathā vrateṣu samarthaḥ syāt yāni vakṣyāmaḥ atikrānte
sāvitryāḥ kāle ṛtum traividyakam brahmacaryam caret atha upanayanam tatas
saṃvatsaram udaka upasparśanam atha adhyāpyaḥ atha yasya pitā pitāmahaḥ iti an
upetau syātām te brahma ha saṃstutāḥ teṣām abhyāgamanam bhojanam vivāham iti ca
varjayet teṣām icchatām prāyaścittam yathā prathame atikrame ṛtuḥ evam
saṃvatsaraḥ atha upanayanam tatas udaka upasparśanam pratipūruṣam saṃkhyāya
saṃvatsarān yāvantaḥ an upetāḥ syuḥ saptabhiḥ pāvamānībhiḥ yat anti yat ca
dūrake iti etābhiḥ yajuḥpavitreṇa sāmapavitreṇa āṅgiraseṇa iti api vā
vyāhṛtībhiḥ eva atha adhyāpyaḥ atha yasya prapitāmaha ādi na anusmaryate
upanayanam te śmaśāna saṃstutāḥ teṣām abhyāgamanam bhojanam vivāham iti ca
varjayet teṣām icchatām prāyaścittam dvādaśa varṣāṇi traividyakam brahmacaryam
caret atha upanayanam tatas udaka upasparśanam pāvamāni ādibhiḥ atha gṛhamedha
upadeśanam na adhyāpanam tatas yaḥ nirvartate tasya saṃskāraḥ yathā prathame
atikrame tatas ūrdhvam prakṛti vat upetasya ācārya kule brahmacāri vāsaḥ
aṣṭācatvāriṃśat varṣāṇi pādūnam ardhena tribhiḥ vā dvādaśa avarārdhyam na
brahmacāriṇaḥ vidyā arthasya para upavāsaḥ asti atha brahmacarya vidhiḥ ācārya
adhīnaḥ syāt anyatra patanīyebhyaḥ hita kārī guroḥ a pratilomayan vācā adhas
āsana śāyī na anudeśyam bhuñjīta tathā kṣāra lavaṇa madhu māṃsāni a divāsvāpī a
gandha sevī maithunam na caret utsanna ślāghaḥ aṅgāni na prakṣālayīta
prakṣālayīta tu aśuci liptāni guroḥ a saṃdarśe na apsu ślāghamānaḥ snāyāt yadi
snāyāt daṇḍa vat jaṭilaḥ śikhā jaṭaḥ vā vāpayet itarān mauñjī mekhalā trivṛt
brāhmaṇasya śakti viṣaye dakṣiṇa āvṛttānām jyā rājanyasya mauñjī vā ayaḥ miśrā
āvī sūtram vaiśyasya sairī tāmalī vā iti eke pālāśaḥ daṇḍaḥ brāhmaṇasya
naiyyagrodha skandha jaḥ rājanyasya bādaraḥ audumbaraḥ vā vaiśyasya vārkṣaḥ
daṇḍaḥ iti a varṇa saṃyogena eke upadiśanti vāsaḥ śāṇī kṣauma ajināni kaṣāyam ca
eke vastram upadiśanti māñjiṣṭham rājanyasya hāridram vaiśyasya hāriṇam aiṇeyam
vā kṛṣṇam brāhmaṇasya kṛṣṇam ced an upastīrṇa āsana śāyī syāt rauravam
rājanyasya basta ajinam vaiśyasya āvikam sārvavarṇikam kambalaḥ ca brahma
vṛddhim icchan ajināni eva vasīta kṣatra vṛddhim icchan vastrāṇi eva ubhaya
vṛddhim icchan ubhayam iti hi brāhmaṇam ajinam tu eva uttaram dhārayet a nṛtta
darśī sabhāḥ samājān ca a gantā a janavāda śīlaḥ rahaḥ śīlaḥ guroḥ udācāreṣu a
kartā svairi karmāṇi strībhiḥ yāvat artha saṃbhāṣī mṛduḥ śāntaḥ dāntaḥ hrīmān
dṛḍha dhṛtiḥ a glāsnuḥ a krodhanaḥ anasūyuḥ sarvam lābham āharan gurave sāyam
prātar amatreṇa bhikṣā caryam caret bhikṣamāṇaḥ anyatra apapātrebhyaḥ abhiśastāt
ca paśūn strīṇām pratyācakṣāṇānām samāhitaḥ brahmacārī iṣṭam dattam hutam prajām
paśūn brahmavarcasam annādyam vṛṅkte tasmāt u ha vai brahmacāri saṃgham carantam
na pratyācakṣīta api ha eṣu evaṃvidhaḥ evaṃvrataḥ syāt iti hi brāhmaṇam na
anumānena bhaikṣam ucchiṣṭam dṛṣṭa śrutābhyām tu bhavat pūrvayā brāhmaṇaḥ
bhikṣeta bhavat madhyayā rājanyaḥ bhavat antyayā vaiśyaḥ tat samāhṛtya
upanidhāya ācāryāya prabrūyāt tena pradiṣṭam bhuñjīta vipravāse guroḥ ācārya
kulāya taiḥ vipravāse anyebhyaḥ api śrotriyebhyaḥ na ātma prayojanaḥ caret
bhuktvā svayam amatram prakṣālayīta na ca ucchiṣṭam kuryāt aśaktau bhūmau
nikhanet apsu vā praveśayet āryāya vā paryavadadhyāt antardhine vā śūdrāya
proṣitaḥ bhaikṣāt agnau kṛtvā bhuñjīta bhaikṣam haviṣā saṃstutam tatra ācāryaḥ
devatā arthe āhavanīya arthe ca tam bhojayitvā yat ucchiṣṭam prāśnāti haviḥ
ucchiṣṭam eva tat yat anyāni dravyāṇi yathālābham upaharati dakṣiṇāḥ eva tāḥ saḥ
eṣa brahmacāriṇaḥ yajñaḥ nitya pratataḥ na ca asmai śruti vipratiṣiddham
ucchiṣṭam dadyāt yathā kṣāra lavaṇa madhu māṃsāni iti etena anye niyamāḥ
vyākhyātāḥ śrutiḥ hi balīyasī ānumānikāt ācārāt dṛśyate ca api pravṛtti kāraṇam
prītiḥ hi upalabhyate pituḥ jyeṣṭhasya ca bhrātuḥ ucchiṣṭam bhoktavyam dharma
vipratipattau abhojyam sāyam prātar uda kumbham āharet sadā araṇyāt edhān āhṛtya
adhas nidadhyāt na astamite samidh hāraḥ gacchet agnim iddhvā parisamūhya
samidhaḥ ādadhyāt sāyam prātar yathopadeśam sāyam eva agni pūjā iti eke
samiddham agnim pāṇinā parisamūhet na samūhanyā prāk tu yāthākāmī na agni udaka
śeṣeṇa vṛthākarmāṇi kurvīta ācāmet vā pāṇi saṃkṣubdhena udakena eka pāṇau
arjitena ca na ācāmet svapnam ca varjayet atha ahar ahar ācāryam gopāyet dharma
artha yuktaiḥ karmabhiḥ sa guptvā saṃviśan brūyāt dharma gopāyam ājūgupam aham
iti pramādāt ācāryasya buddhi pūrvam vā niyama atikramam rahasi bodhayet a
nivṛttau svayam karmāṇi ārabheta nivartayet vā atha yaḥ pūrva utthāyī jaghanya
saṃveśī tam āhuḥ na svapiti iti sa yaḥ evam praṇihita ātmā brahmacārī atra eva
asya sarvāṇi karmāṇi phalavanti avāptāni bhavanti yāni api gṛhamedhe niyameṣu
tapaḥ śabdaḥ tad atikrame vidyā karma niḥsravati brahma saha apatyāt etasmāt
karta patyam an āyuṣyam ca tasmāt ṛṣayaḥ avareṣu na jāyante niyama atikramāt
śruta ṛṣayaḥ tu bhavanti kecid karma phala śeṣeṇa punar saṃbhave yathā
śvetaketuḥ yat kiṃca samāhitaḥ brahma api ācāryāt upayuṅkte brahma vat eva
tasmin phalam bhavati atha u yat kiṃca manasā vācā cakṣuṣā vā saṃkalpam dhyāyati
āha abhivipaśyati vā tathā eva tat bhavati iti upadiśanti guru prasādanīyāni
karmāṇi svastyayanam adhyayana saṃvṛttiḥ iti atas anyāni nivartante
brahmacāriṇaḥ karmāṇi svādhyāya dhṛk dharma ruciḥ tapasvī ṛjuḥ mṛduḥ sidhyati
brahmacārī sadā mahāntam apararātram utthāya guroḥ tiṣṭhan prātarabhivādam
abhivādayīta asau aham bho iti samāna grāme ca vasatām anyeṣām api vṛddhatarāṇām
prāk prātarāśāt proṣya ca samāgame svargam āyuḥ ca īpsan dakṣiṇam bāhum śrotra
samam prasārya brāhmaṇaḥ abhivādayīta uraḥ samam rājanyaḥ madhya samam vaiśyaḥ
nīcais śūdraḥ prāñjalim plāvanam ca nāmnaḥ abhivādana pratyabhivādane ca
pūrveṣām varṇānām udite tu āditye ācāryeṇa sametya upasaṅgrahaṇam sadā eva
abhivādanam upasaṃgrāhyaḥ ācāryaḥ iti eke dakṣiṇena pāṇinā dakṣiṇam pādam
adhastāt abhi adhimṛśya sa kuṣṭhikam upasaṃgṛhṇīyāt ubhābhyām eva ubhau
abhipīḍayataḥ upasaṃgrāhyau iti eke sarva ahṇam su yuktaḥ adhyayanāt anantaraḥ
adhyāye tathā guru karmasu manasā ca anadhyāye āhūtādhyāyī ca syāt uttiṣṭhet
tūṣṇīm vā na apaparyāvarteta guroḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya apeyāt na prekṣeta nagnām
striyam oṣadhi vanaspatīnām ācchidya na upajighret upānahau chatram yānam iti ca
varjayet na smayeta yadi smayeta apigṛhya smayeta iti hi brāhmaṇam na upajighret
striyam mukhena na hṛdayena prārthayet na akāraṇāt upaspṛśet rajasvalaḥ rakta
dat satya vādī syāt iti hi brāhmaṇam yām vidyām kurute gurau te api asya ācāryāḥ
ye tasyām guroḥ vaṃśyāḥ yān anyān paśyataḥ asya upasaṃgṛhṇīyāt tadā tu ete
upasaṃgrāhyāḥ guru samavāye bhikṣāyām utpannāyām yam anubaddhaḥ tad adhīnā
bhikṣā samāvṛttaḥ mātre dadyāt mātā bhartāram gamayet bhartā gurum dharma
kṛtyeṣu vā upayojayet kṛtvā vidyām yāvatīm śaknuyāt veda dakṣiṇām āharet
dharmataḥ yathāśakti viṣama gate tu ācārye ugrataḥ śūdrataḥ vā āharet sarvadā
śūdrataḥ ugrataḥ vā ācārya arthasya āharaṇam dhārmyam iti eke dattvā ca na
anukathayet kṛtvā ca na anusmaret ātma praśaṃsām para garhām iti ca varjayet
preṣitaḥ tat eva pratipadyeta śāstuḥ ca anāgamāt vṛttiḥ anyatra anyatra
upasaṃgrahaṇāt ucchiṣṭa aśanāt ca ācārya vat ācārya dāre vṛttiḥ tathā samādiṣṭe
adhyāpayati vṛddhatare ca sabrahmacāriṇi ucchiṣṭa aśana varjam ācārya vat ācārya
putre vṛttiḥ samāvṛttasya api etat eva sāmayācārikam eteṣu yathā brahmacāriṇaḥ
vṛttam mālī ālipta mukhaḥ upalipta keśa śmaśruḥ aktaḥ abhyaktaḥ veṣṭitī
upaveṣṭitī kāñcukī upānahī pādukī udācāreṣu ca asya etāni na kuryāt kārayet vā
svairi karmasu ca yathā danta prakṣālana utsādana avalekhanāni iti tad dravyāṇām
ca na kathayet ātma saṃyogena ācāryaḥ snātaḥ tu kāle yathāvidhi abhihṛtam āhūtaḥ
abhyetaḥ vā na pratisaṃharet iti eke uccaistarām na āsīta tathā bahu pāde
sarvatas pratiṣṭhite śayyā āsane ca ācarite na āviśet yānam uktaḥ adhvani
anvārohet sabhā nikaṣa kaṭa svastarān ca na an abhibhāṣitaḥ gurum abhibhāṣeta
priyāt anyat vyupatoda vyupajāva vyabhihāsa udāmantraṇa nāmadheya grahaṇa
preṣaṇāni iti guroḥ varjayet āpadi artham jñāpayet saha vasan sāyam prātar an
āhūtaḥ gurum darśana arthaḥ gacchet viproṣya ca tat ahar eva paśyet ācārya
prācārya saṃnipāte prācāryāya upasaṃgṛhya upasaṃjighṛkṣet ācāryam pratiṣedhet
itaraḥ lupyate pūjā ca asya sakāśe muhur ca ācārya kulam darśana arthaḥ gacchet
yathāśakti adhihastyam ādāya api danta prakṣālanāni iti tasmin guroḥ vṛttiḥ
putram iva enam anukāṅkṣan sarva dharmeṣu an apacchādayamānaḥ su yuktaḥ vidyām
grāhayet na ca enam adhyayana vighnena ātma artheṣu uparundhyāt an āpatsu
antevāsī an antevāsī bhavati vinihita ātmā gurau anaipuṇam āpadyamānaḥ ācāryaḥ
api an ācāryaḥ bhavati śrutāt pariharamāṇaḥ aparādheṣu ca enam satatam
upālabheta abhitrāsaḥ upavāsaḥ udaka upasparśanam adarśanam iti daṇḍāḥ
yathāmātram ā nivṛtteḥ nivṛttam carita brahmacaryam anyebhyaḥ dharmebhyaḥ
anantaraḥ bhava iti atisṛjet śrāvaṇyām paurṇamāsyām adhyāyam upākṛtya māsam
pradoṣe na adhīyīta taiṣyām paurṇamāsyām rohiṇyām vā viramet ardhapañcamān
caturaḥ māsān iti eke nigameṣu adhyayanam varjayet ānaḍuhena vā śakṛt piṇḍena
upalipte adhīyīta śmaśāne sarvatas śamyāprāsāt grāmeṇa adhyavasite kṣetreṇa vā
na anadhyāyaḥ jñāyamāne tu tasmin eva deśe na adhīyīta śmaśāna vat śūdra patitau
samāna āgāre iti eke śūdrāyām tu prekṣaṇa pratiprekṣaṇayoḥ eva anadhyāyaḥ tathā
anyasyām striyām varṇa vyatikrāntāyām maithune brahma adhyeṣyamāṇaḥ malavat
vāsasā icchan saṃbhāṣitum brāhmaṇena sambhāṣya tayā sambhāṣeta sambhāṣya tu
brāhmaṇena eva sambhāṣya adhīyīta evam tasyāḥ prajā niḥśreyasam antar śavam
antar cāṇḍālam abhinirhṛtānām tu sīmni anadhyāyaḥ saṃdarśane ca araṇye tat ahar
āgateṣu ca grāmam bāhyeṣu api satsu saṃdhau anustanite rātrim svapna paryāntam
vidyuti upavyuṣam yāvatā vā kṛṣṇām rohiṇīm iti śamyāprāsāt vijānīyāt etasmin
kāle vidyotamāne sa pradoṣam ahar anadhyāyaḥ dahre apararātre stanayitnunā
ūrdhvam ardharātrāt iti eke gavām ca avarodhe vadhyānām ca yāvatā hanyante
pṛṣṭha ārūḍhaḥ paśūnām na adhīyīta ahar rātrau amāvāsyāsu cāturmāsīṣu ca
vairamaṇaḥ guruṣu aṣṭākyaḥ aupākaraṇaḥ iti tri ahāḥ tathā saṃbandheṣu jñātiṣu
mātari pitari ācārye iti dvādaśa ahāḥ teṣu ca udaka upasparśanam tāvantam kālam
anubhāvinām ca parivāpanam na samāvṛttāḥ vaperan anyatra vihārāt iti eke atha
api brāhmaṇam riktaḥ vai eṣaḥ an apihitaḥ yat muṇḍaḥ tasya etat apidhānam yat
śikhā iti satreṣu tu vacanāt vapanam śikhāyāḥ ācārye trīn ahar rātrān iti eke
śrotriya saṃsthāyām a parisaṃvatsarāyām ekām sabrahmacāriṇi iti eke śrotriya
abhyāgame adhijigāṃsamānaḥ adhīyānaḥ vā anujñāpya adhīyīta adhyāpayet vā guru
saṃnidhau ca adhīhi bho iti uktvā adhīyīta adhyāpayet vā ubhayatas
upasaṃgrahaṇam adhijigāṃsamānasya adhītya ca adhīyāneṣu vā yatra anyaḥ vyaveyāt
etam eva śabdam utsṛjya adhīyīta śva gardabha nādāḥ salāvṛkī ekasṛka ulūka
śabdāḥ sarve vāditra śabdāḥ rodana gīta sāma śabdāḥ ca śākhā antare ca sāmnām
anadhyāyaḥ sarveṣu ca śabda karmasu yatra saṃsṛjyeran chardayitvā svapna antam
sarpiḥ vā prāśya pūti gandhaḥ śuktam ca ātma saṃyuktam pradoṣe ca bhuktvā
prodakayoḥ ca pāṇyoḥ preta saṃkﾱptam ca annam bhuktvā sa pradoṣam ahar
anadhyāyaḥ ā ca vipākāt a śrāddhena tu paryavadadhyāt adhyātmikān yogān
anutiṣṭhet nyāya saṃhitān a naiścārikān ātma lābhāt na param vidyate tatra ātma
lābhīyān ślokān udāhariṣyāmaḥ svayambhuve brahmaṇe viśva goptre namaskṛtvā
mantra dṛgbhyaḥ tathā eva vivakṣuḥ asmi ṛgvidhānam purāṇam purā dṛṣṭam ṛṣibhiḥ
mantra dṛgbhiḥ mantrebhyaḥ mantra dṛgbhyaḥ ca samāmnāya anupūrvaśas karmaṇām ṛṣi
dṛṣṭānām vidhim provāca śaunakaḥ ṛṣibhiḥ vividhāḥ mantrāḥ dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa
prayojanāḥ prayojanāya ca uddiṣṭāḥ tasmin tasmin pradarśitāḥ nānā arthāni ca
karmāṇi śānti puṣṭi āśrayāṇi ca siddhayaḥ ca tapaḥ mūlāḥ śraddadhānasya kurvataḥ
stuti ādayaḥ ye vikārāḥ pradiṣṭāḥ tathā arthavādāḥ ṛkṣu sūkteṣu ca eva tu tān
śṛṇuṣva ucyamānān āyuḥ svargaḥ draviṇam sūnavaḥ ca caturvidham proktam āśāsyam
agre anye kāmāḥ śataśas sampradiṣṭāḥ saṃstuvadbhiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ devatāḥ ca siddhāḥ
mantrāḥ vidhinā brāhmaṇasya phalam yacchanti vidhivat prayuktāḥ satyam teṣām
sādhanam saṃyamaḥ ca śamaḥ titikṣā anasūyā damaḥ ca tasmāt dvijaḥ praśānta ātmā
japa homa parāyaṇaḥ tapasi adhyayane yuktaḥ bhavet bhūta anukampakaḥ kṣatriyaḥ
bāhu vīryeṇa taret āpadam ātmanaḥ dhanena vaiśya śūdrau tu japa homaiḥ
dvijottamaḥ tapasā svargam āpnoti tapasā vindate mahat tapaḥ yuktasya sidhyanti
karmāṇi niyata ātmanaḥ vidveṣaṇam saṃvananam viṣa ghnam roga nāśanam yena yena
artham ṛṣiṇā yad artham devatāḥ stutāḥ sa sa kāmaḥ samṛddhaḥ ca teṣām teṣām
tathā tathā tāni karmāṇi vakṣyāmi vidhānāni ca karmaṇām puraścaraṇam ādau tu
karmaṇām siddhi kārakam svādhyāya abhyasanasya ādau prājāpatyam caret dvijaḥ
keśa śmaśru loma nakhān vāpayitvā āplutaḥ śuciḥ tiṣṭhet ahani rātrau tu śuciḥ
āsīta vāgyataḥ satya vādī pavitrāṇi japet vyāhṛtayaḥ tathā oṃkāra ādyāḥ tu tāḥ
japtvā sāvitrīm ca tad iti ṛcam āpaḥ hi stha iti sūktam tu śuddhavatyaḥ
aghamarṣaṇam śaṃvatyaḥ svastimatyaḥ ca pāvamānyaḥ tathā eva ca sarvatra etat
prayoktavyam ādau ante ca karmaṇām ā sahasrāt ā śatāt vā daśa antam athavā japet
oṃkāram vyāhṛtīḥ tisraḥ sāvitrīm athavā ayutam tarpayitvā adbhiḥ ācāryān ṛṣīn
chandāṃsi devatāḥ prapadyeta virūpākṣam raudram mantra gaṇam japan anāryaiḥ na
ca bhāṣeta na śūdraiḥ na api garhitaiḥ na rajasvalayā nāryā patitaiḥ na
antyajaiḥ nṛbhiḥ na deva brāhmaṇa dviṣṭaiḥ na ācārya guru nindakaiḥ na mātṛ pitṛ
vidviṣṭaiḥ na avamanyeta kaṃcana maṅgala ācāra yuktaḥ syāt tris ahnaḥ abhyupayan
apaḥ ante dvādaśa rātrasya sthālīpākam prakalpayet agnaye ca atha somāya tṛtīyām
ca tayoḥ saha vaiśvadevīm ca raudrīm ca juhuyāt uttare tatas avasānasya pataye
tathā anumataye api ca dhanvantaraye iti anyā gandharva apsarasām api daśamī
brāhmaṇaspatyā parā tu brahmaṇe smṛtā sarasvatyai tathā viṣṇoḥ antyā
sauviṣṭakṛtī api ājya āhutayaḥ eva ādau sthālīpāke hute punar hutvā agnim
tarpayet viprān śuciḥ bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ tatas śeṣam vidhānena śuciḥ bhuñjīta
vāgyataḥ kṛcchrāṇām eṣa sarveṣām vidhiḥ uktaḥ anupūrvaśas prājāpatya
atikṛcchrasya tathā sāṃtapanasya ca parākasya ca kṛcchrasya vidhiḥ cāndrāyaṇasya
ca ekena śuddhim āpnoti dvābhyām pāpaiḥ pramucyate tribhiḥ sidhyanti mantrāḥ ca
mucyate ca upapātakaiḥ caturbhiḥ bhrūṇahatyāyāḥ tathā eva ayājya yājanāt
pañcabhiḥ pātakaiḥ sarvaiḥ duṣkṛtaiḥ ca pramucyate taptakṛcchreṇa sarvāṇi pāpāni
pratibādhate cāndrāyaṇam saha ādi antam ebhiḥ kṛcchraiḥ samam smṛtam tribhiḥ
cāndrāyaṇaiḥ pūtaḥ brahma lokam samaśnute aṣṭābhiḥ devatāḥ sākṣāt paśyeta vara
dāḥ tathā chandāṃsi daśabhiḥ jñātvā sarvān kāmān samaśnute tri aham prātar tri
aham sāyam tri aham adyāt a yācitam tri aham param cana aśnīyāt prājāpatyam
caran dvijaḥ ekaikam grāsam aśnīyāt tri ahāṇi trīṇi pūrvavat tri aham ca
upavaset antyam atikṛcchram caran dvijaḥ go mūtram gomayam kṣīram dadhi sarpiḥ
kuśa udakam eka rātra upavāsaḥ ca kṛcchraḥ sāṃtapanaḥ smṛtaḥ etam eva tri ahaiḥ
yuktam mahāsāṃtapanam viduḥ upavāsaḥ tu sapta aham śiśusāṃtapanam smṛtam mṛtyoḥ
ātmānam niṣkrīṇāti sarvān kāmān avāpnoti paśubandhasya yajña kratoḥ ṣaṣ ṛtvijaḥ
āgnīdhraḥ brahmā ca brahmāṇau hotā maitrāvaruṇaḥ ca hotārau adhvaryuḥ
pratiprasthātā ca adhvaryū sūryam te iti manasā anudrutena anuvākena hutvā
āgnāvaiṣṇavam ekādaśa kapālam anvārambhaṇīyām nirvapati api vā āgnāvaiṣṇavyā ṛcā
āhavanīye caturgṛhītam juhoti śeṣam kṛtvā avasthāpya āhavanīyam uru viṣṇo
vikramasva iti āhavanīye sruveṇa āhutim juhoti huta śeṣam sruvam ca ādāya takṣṇe
śastram pradāya gacchanti palāśaḥ bilvaḥ rohitakaḥ khadiraḥ ca yūpa vṛkṣāḥ
pālāśaḥ nirūḍhapaśubandhasya atas anye saumya adhvarasya tān tryavara ardhān
atītya yaḥ same bhūmyai svāt yoneḥ rūḍhaḥ ṛjuḥ ūrdhva śākhaḥ bahu parṇaḥ bahu
śākhaḥ a pratiśuṣka agraḥ avraṇaḥ pratyaṅ upanataḥ tam ati anyān agām iti
upasthāya tam tvā juṣe iti spṛṣṭvā devaḥ tvā savitā madhvā anaktu iti sruveṇa
gulpha mātre paryajya oṣadhe trāyasva enam iti ūrdhva agram barhiḥ antardhāya
svadhite mā enam hiṃsīḥ iti pradakṣiṇam an akṣa saṅgam vṛścet yaḥ prathamaḥ
śakalaḥ parāpatet tam api āharet divam agreṇa iti prāc agram udak agram vā
nipātayet vanaspate śata valśaḥ viroha iti āvraścane hiraṇyam nidhāya paristīrya
abhijuhoti sahasra valśāḥ iti ātmānam pratyabhimṛśati yam tvā ayam iti mūlāt
agra antam śākhāḥ prahāpayati a chinnaḥ rāyaḥ su vīraḥ iti pañca aratnau agram
parivṛścati catur aratnau tri aratnau vā saha upareṇa yūpam saṃcakṣīta aṣṭa
aśrim a sthūlam an aṇum go puccha vat ānupūrvyeṇa agrataḥ aṇīyāṃsam viśiṣṭa
agniṣṭhā aśrimat aṣṭa dvi prādeśa uparam yūpam takṣayati eṣām eva avatakṣaṇānām
svarum karoti adhimanthana śakalam ca yūpasya eva agrataḥ ādāya aṣṭa aśri pṛtha
mātram madhye saṃnatam caṣālam karoti dvi aṅgulam tri aṅgulam vā ūrdhvam caṣālāt
yūpasya atirecayati atirikte caṣālam saṃdhāya atiriktam prakāśayati vedam kṛtvā
agreṇa āhavanīyam nirūḍhapaśubandhasya ṣaḍbhiḥ aratnibhiḥ prācīm caturbhiḥ
paścāt tiraścīm tribhiḥ purastāt tiraścīm darśapūrṇamāsa vat a saṃnatām vedim
karoti a parigṛhīte uttarasmin parigrāhe vedi agre yūpa avaṭāya deśam śiṣṭvā
uttaravedim śamyayā parimimīte pratidiśam udīcīna agrām vā śamyām nidhāya
vittāyanī me asi iti caturbhiḥ pratimantram udīcyau prācyau ca sphyena lekhāḥ
abhyantaram parilikhati uttaravedi aṃsam uttareṇa prakrame dvayoḥ triṣu vā
uttaravedi vat tūṣṇīm cātvālam parilikhati devasya tvā iti abhrim ādāya
parilikhitam iti tris pradakṣiṇam parilikhya videḥ agniḥ nabhaḥ nāma iti tri
vitastam khanati agne aṅgiraḥ iti abhrim nidhāya yaḥ asyām pṛthivyām asi iti
pāṃsūn ādāya āyuṣā nāmnā ihi iti hṛtvā yat te anādhṛṣṭam nāma yajñiyam iti
uttaravedyām nivapati videḥ agniḥ iti dvitīyam khātvā agne aṅgiraḥ iti abhrim
nidhāya yaḥ dvitīyasyām iti dvitīyam ādāya pūrvavat nivapati tathā tṛtīyam
tṛtīyasyām iti viśeṣaḥ tūṣṇīm caturtham siṃhīḥ asi mahiṣīḥ asi iti uttaravedim
kṛtvā uru prathasva iti prathayati dhruvā asi iti sphyena śamyayā vā saṃhanti
devebhyaḥ śundhasva iti adbhiḥ avokṣya devebhyaḥ śumbhasva iti sikatābhiḥ
anuprakīrya yat te krūram yat āsthitam iti uttareṇa uttaravedim prokṣaṇīḥ
ninayati punar eva tābhiḥ avokṣet iti eke āpaḥ ripram nirvahata iti uttaratas
dakṣiṇatas vā sphyena ekasphyām ullikhya apaḥ ripram nirvahata iti uttaravedyām
prokṣaṇī śeṣam ninayet vibhrāj iti uttaravedyāḥ paryantān ākalpya catur śikhaṇḍe
yuvatī kanīne iti uttaravedim vedim ca yugapad saṃmṛśati uttaravedi madhye
caturdiśam prādeśa mātrīm madhyama aṅgula ucchritām uttaranābhim kalpayet
indraghoṣaḥ tvā vasubhiḥ purastāt pātu iti etaiḥ yathārūpam pradakṣiṇam pariyan
pratidiśam uttaravedim prokṣati upariṣṭāt ca prokṣaṇī uccheṣam pūrvavat
dakṣiṇatas uttaravedyai ninayet yadi dvi ahaḥ paśuḥ audumbarībhiḥ śākhābhiḥ
channām uttaravedim kalpayet āhavanīye agni praṇayanīyān idhmān ādīpya agnaye
praṇīyamānāya anubrūhi iti saṃpreṣya dīptān idhmān śarāve uddhṛtya sikatā
pūritena pātreṇa upayamya idhmam ca udyamya jānu daghne agnau dhāryamāṇe yat te
pāvaka iti śiṣṭe agnau udyata homam juhoti prathamāyām tris anūktāyām hṛtvā
uttaravedim prāpya juhvām pañca gṛhītam gṛhītvā hiraṇyam nidhāya uttaravedim
pañca gṛhītena vyāghārayati siṃhīḥ asi sapatna sāhī svāhā iti dakṣiṇe aṃse
siṃhīḥ asi su prajā vaniḥ svāhā iti uttarasyām śroṇyām siṃhīḥ asi rāyaspoṣa
vaniḥ svāhā iti dakṣiṇasyām śroṇyām siṃhīḥ asi āditya vaniḥ svāhā iti uttare
aṃse siṃhīḥ asi āvaha devān devayate yajamānāya svāhā iti madhye bhūtebhyaḥ tvā
iti srucam udgṛhṇāti hiraṇyam ca pautudravān paridhīn ādāya viśva āyuḥ asi iti
tribhiḥ mantraiḥ pūrvavat uttaravedim paridadhāti śukla ūrṇā stukā petvasya
antarā śṛṅge yat roma etān saṃbhārān agneḥ bhasma asi iti sakṛt eva uttaranābhau
nyupya ūrṇāvantam iti ucyamāne agne bādhasva yajña pratitiṣṭha iti dvābhyām
saṃbhāreṣu jvalantam agnim abhyādadhāti agneḥ kulāyam asi iti dakṣiṇatas
upayamanīḥ sikatāḥ nivapati manuṣvat tvā nidhīmahi iti upasamidhya agniḥ yajñam
nayatu prajānan iti catasraḥ atimuktīḥ hutvā sapta te iti pūrṇāhutim juhoti ayam
atra āhavanīyaḥ yasmāt eṣa praṇīyate sa gārhapatyaḥ āhavanīyam gārhapatyam
anvāhāryapacanam ca anvādhāya idhmābarhiṣī saptadaśa sāmidhenyaḥ āśvavālaḥ
prastaraḥ aikṣavī vidhṛtī kārṣmarya mayāḥ paridhayaḥ agnīn paristīrya pātra
sādane vaiśvadeva vat pātrāṇi āsādayati sruva svadhitī veda samavatta dhānī
dviguṇām dvi vyāyāmām triguṇām tri vyāyāmām ca raśane dve dvi śūla eka śūlā ca
dve kārṣmarya mayyau vapāśrapaṇyau kumbhīm hṛdayaśūlam plakṣa śākhām svarum
audumbaram maitrāvaruṇa daṇḍam āsya antam cubuka antam vā prathama parāpātitam
śakalam araṇī suvarṇa śakalāni yena ca arthaḥ pavitre kṛtvā yajamāna vācam
yaccha iti saṃpreṣya vāgyataḥ pātrāṇi saṃmṛśya prokṣiteṣu vācam visṛjate
parigṛhīte uttarasmin parigrāhe ājyena dadhnā ca udehi iti saṃnamya saṃpreṣyati
pātra saṃmārjana kāle sruva anantaram sruva vat svadhitim saṃmārṣṭi vaiśvadeva
vat ājya sādana antam kṛtvā devasya tvā iti abhrim ādāya ardham antarvedi ardham
bahirvedi sarvatas prādeśa saṃmitam yūpa avaṭam tris pradakṣiṇam parilikhitam
iti parilikhati agnīdh yūpa avaṭam khana upara saṃmitam dvi aṅgulena tri
aṅgulena catur aṅgulena vā uparam atikhanatāt iti saṃpreṣyati yathā uparam na
āvirbhavati tathā khanati āgnīdhraḥ adhvaryuḥ agreṇa avaṭam yūpam prāc agram
sthāpayitvā yat te śikvaḥ parāvadhīt iti yūpam prakṣālayati yavamatīḥ prokṣaṇīḥ
āhṛtya yūpa agre caṣālam saṃdhāya pṛthivyai tvā iti tribhiḥ mantraiḥ yūpasya
mūla madhya agrāṇi prokṣati śundhatām lokaḥ pitṛṣadanaḥ iti yūpa avaṭe prokṣaṇīḥ
ninīya yavaḥ asi iti yavam prahṛtya pitṝṇām sadanam asi iti avaṭe prāc agram
barhiḥ avastṛṇāti su āveśaḥ asi iti prathama parāpātitam śakalam adhas tvakkam
avadhāya ghṛtena dyāvāpṛthivī āpṛṇethām svāhā iti hiraṇyam nidhāya sruveṇa
abhijuhoti devaḥ tvā savitā madhvā anaktu iti agreṇa āhavanīyam a niruptena
ājyena yajamānaḥ prācyām pratyak mukhaḥ tiṣṭhan yūpa śakalena anakti caṣālam
unmucya tena eva mantreṇa yūpa agram anakti aindram asi iti caṣālam abhyajya su
pippalābhyaḥ iti tam pratimucya yūpāya ajyamānāya anubrūhi iti saṃpreṣya devaḥ
tvā savitā madhvā anaktu iti sruveṇa agniṣṭhām aśrim saṃtatam abhighārayati
yāvat uparam na uparam anakti anakti iti eke raśanā deśe yūpam sarvatas tris
parimṛśati añjana prabhṛti yajamānaḥ yūpam na utsṛjati yāvat parivyayati ud
divam stabhāna iti yūpam ucchrayan yūpāya ucchrīyamāṇāya anubrūhi iti
saṃpreṣyati te te dhāmāni iti yūpam avaṭe avadadhāti viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi iti dvābhyām
agniṣṭhām aśrim āhavanīya agninā sa diśam kalpayati brahma vanim tvā iti
pradakṣiṇam purīṣeṇa an āvis uparam paryūhya brahma dṛṃha iti maitrāvaruṇa
daṇḍena paritas dṛṃhati unnambhaya pṛthivīm iti apaḥ pariṣiñcati devasya tvā iti
triguṇām raśanām ādāya idam viṣṇuḥ vicakrame iti sa pāṇyā raśanayā yūpam tris
unmārṣṭi tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam iti yūpa agram paśyet raśanām adbhiḥ saṃmṛśya
tris saṃbhujya madhyamena guṇena madhye nābhi daghne vā yūpam parivyayan yūpāya
parivīyamāṇāya anubrūhi iti saṃpreṣya parivīḥ asi iti tris pradakṣiṇam parivīya
sthavimat aṇīyasi pravayati divaḥ sūnuḥ asi iti svaru śakalam ādāya antarikṣasya
tvā iti uttame guṇe agniṣṭhām uttareṇa avagūhati madhyame dvayoḥ vā kūṭa karṇa
kāṇa khaṇḍa khañja ghṛṣṭa vaṇḍa śloṇa sapta śapha varjam panna dantam yūthyam
mātṛ pitṛ bhrātṛ sakhimantam su palpūlitam paṭṭa ānītam cātvāla utkarau antareṇa
nītvā yūpam agreṇa purastāt pratyak mukham avasthāpya iṣe tvā iti barhiṣī ādāya
upavīḥ asi iti plakṣa śākhām upa u devān iti yajuṣā prajāpateḥ jāyamānāḥ imam
paśum iti ṛgbhyām ca tābhyām tayā ca paśum upaspṛśan indra agnibhyām tvā juṣṭam
upākaromi iti yathā devam upākaroti su rakṣite barhiṣī nidhāya plakṣa śākhām ca
prajānantaḥ pratigṛhṇanti iti upākṛtya pañca juhoti agnim manthati mathitvā
upākuryāt iti eke agneḥ janitram asi iti avaśiṣṭam śakalam ādāya apareṇa
āhavanīyam barhiṣi nidhāya tasmin vaiśvadeva vat darbhau nidadhāti tathā araṇī
ca ādāya ājya sthālyāḥ bile abhyajya ghṛtena akte iti abhimantrya āyuḥ asi iti
prajanane pramantham saṃdhāya agnaye mathyamānāya anubrūhi iti saṃpreṣyati tris
anūktāyām vaiśvadeva vat agni praharaṇa antam karoti yadi mathyamānaḥ na jāyeta
tad sthāne hiraṇyam vyāhṛtībhiḥ juhuyāt agnau agniḥ iti prahṛtya abhihutya
devasya tvā iti dviguṇām raśanām ādāya tad agreṇa paśoḥ dakṣiṇam bāhum unmṛjya
ṛtasya tvā deva haviḥ pāśena ārabhe iti dakṣiṇe pūrva pāde ardha śirasi ca
pratimucya dharṣa mānuṣān iti purastāt pratyak mukham udak mukham vā yūpe paśum
niyunakti adbhiḥ tvā oṣadhībhyaḥ prokṣāmi iti prokṣati apām peruḥ asi iti apaḥ
pāyayitvā svāttam cit iti adhastāt upokṣati sarvatas eva enam medhyam karoti iti
vijñāyate veda nidhāna ādi srucyam āghārya udaṅ atikramya sam te prāṇaḥ iti
paśoḥ dakṣiṇe ardha śirasi juhvā samajya sam yajatraiḥ aṅgāni iti kakudi sam
yajñapatiḥ āśiṣā iti bhasadi makhasya śiraḥ asi iti pratipadya hotāram vṛtvā
āśrāvya pratyāśrāvite mitrāvaruṇau praśāstārau praśāstrāt iti maitrāvaruṇam
vṛṇīte asau mānuṣaḥ iti asya nāma gṛhṇāti asmai daṇḍam dadyāt a vakraḥ a
vidhuraḥ bhūyāsam iti gṛhṇāti jīvati paśau ekādaśa prayājān yajati āśrāvya
pratyāśrāvite adhvaryuḥ samidbhyaḥ preṣya iti maitrāvaruṇam prati prathamam
prayājam saṃpreṣyati preṣya iti uttarān hotā yakṣat iti asau hotāram codayati
caturthe prayāje prāpte ardham samānīya aṣṭame sarvam samānayate iṣṭe daśame
ekādaśāya ājyam avaśinaṣṭi tān yajamānaḥ ādyaiḥ anumantraṇaiḥ caturaḥ anumantrya
caturthasya anumantraṇena duraḥprabhṛtīn trīn uttamena itarān udaṅ atikramya
adhvaryuḥ ghṛtena aktau iti juhvā svaru svadhitī anakti tris svarum sakṛt
svadhiteḥ ekām aśrim ghṛtena aktau paśum trāyethām iti svaru svadhitibhyām paśum
samanakti śamitar eṣā te aśriḥ prajñātā astu iti ādiśya śamitre svadhitim
prayacchati yathāpūrvam svarum avaguhya paryagnaye kriyamāṇāya anubrūhi iti
saṃpreṣyati āgnīdhraḥ āhavanīyāt ulmukam ādāya pari vāja patiḥ iti tris
pradakṣiṇam ṣaṭ paryeti paśum śāmitra deśam cātvālam yūpam āhavanīyam ājyāni ca
ye badhyamānam anubadhyamānāḥ iti tribhiḥ apāvyaiḥ juhoti apisṛjya āhavanīye
ulmukam tris punar yathetam pratiparyeti pramucya paśum āśrāvya pratyāśrāvitaḥ
upapreṣya hotar havyā devebhyaḥ iti saṃpreṣyati adhrigum hotā anuvakti revatīḥ
yajñapatim iti adhvaryu yajamānau vapāśrapaṇībhyām barhirbhyām plakṣa śākhayā ca
paśum anvārabhete nānā prāṇaḥ iti yajamānam abhimantrayate pra asmai agnim
bharata iti ucyamāne tat ulmukam punar ādāya āgnīdhraḥ prathamaḥ antareṇa
cātvāla utkarau udaṅ atikrāmati uro antarikṣa iti antareṇa cātvāla utkarau udak
mukham paśum nayanti prājahitāt ulmukam ādāya āgnīdhraḥ niṣkrāmati iti eke
uttareṇa cātvālam śāmitra āyatanam tasmin ulmukam ādhāya śāmitram uttareṇa
atikrāmati udīcīnāṁ asya padaḥ nidhattāt iti ucyamāne sam asya tanuvā bhava iti
upākaraṇa barhiṣoḥ anyatarat dakṣiṇena śāmitram prāc agram udak agram vā
nyasyati ūvadhya goham pārthivam khanatāt iti ucyamāne ūvadhya goham khanati
tasmin barhiṣi paśum pratyak śirasam udīcīna pādam saṃjñapayanti a māyum
kṛṇvantam saṃjñapayata iti saṃpreṣya yathetam parāñcaḥ āvartante iha prajāḥ
viśva rūpāḥ ramantām iti pṛṣadājyam avekṣamāṇāḥ parāñcaḥ āsate indrasya bhāgaḥ
suvite dadhātana iti adhvaryuḥ yadi rauti paśuḥ tam abhimantrayate svar vid asi
iti caturaḥ mantrān saṃjñapyamāne yajamānaḥ japati nānā prāṇaḥ iti adhvaryuḥ yat
paśuḥ māyum akṛta iti saṃjñapte saṃjñapta homam juhoti śamitāraḥ upetana iti
paśum abhyupayan aditiḥ paśum pramumoktu iti saṃjñaptāt pāśam pramuñcati tam eka
śūlayā ādāya arātīyantam adharam kṛṇomi iti imām diśam nirasyati namaḥ te ātāna
iti patnī ādityam upatiṣṭhate anarvā prehi iti pratiprasthātā pūrṇapātreṇa saha
patnīm udānayati antareṇa cātvāla utkarau udaṅ patnīm niṣkrāmayati āpaḥ devīḥ
iti niṣkrāntām adhvaryuḥ apaḥ avamarśayati vāc te āpyāyatām iti etaiḥ
yathāliṅgam anupūrvam patnī paśoḥ prāṇān āpyāyayati adhvaryuḥ vā abhiṣiñcati yā
te prāṇān iti hṛdayam abhimṛśati tān eva prāṇān punar saṃmṛśati iti eke nābhiḥ
te āpyāyatām iti nābhim meḍhram te āpyāyatām iti meḍhram pāyuḥ te āpyāyatām iti
pāyum śuddhāḥ caritrāḥ iti sampragṛhya caturaḥ pādān prakṣālayati śam ahobhyām
iti anu pṛṣṭham śeṣam ninayati dakṣiṇatas vā uttānam paśum āvartya dakṣiṇena
nābhim dvi aṅgule tri aṅgule vā vivarte avaśiṣṭam upākaraṇa barhiṣoḥ anyatarat
oṣadhe trāyasva enam iti prāc agram nidadhāti svadhite mā enam hiṃsīḥ iti
svadhitinā tiryak ācchinatti agram ādāya su rakṣitam nidadhāti mūlam lohitena
aktvā rakṣasām bhāgaḥ asi iti imām diśam nirasyet idam aham rakṣaḥ adhamam tamaḥ
nayāmi iti tat savyena padā ātiṣṭhet tau pāṇi pādau prakṣālya apaḥ upaspṛśya iṣe
tvā iti vapām utkhidya ghṛtena dyāvāpṛthivī prorṇvāthām iti vapayā dvi śūlām
vapāśrapaṇīm prorṇoti ūrje tvā iti eka śūlayā upastṛṇāti vapā yathā vistīrṇā
bhavati devebhyaḥ śundhasva iti tām prokṣya devebhyaḥ śumbhasva iti svadhitinā
vapām unmṛjya devebhyaḥ kalpasva iti abhimantrya a chinnaḥ rāyaḥ su vīra iti tām
adhastāt utkṛntati śamitā vapoddharaṇam muṣṭinā apidadhāti yāvat vapām juhoti
vapām adbhiḥ abhyukṣya pratyuṣṭam iti śāmitre pratitapya namaḥ sūryasya saṃdṛśe
iti ādityam upasthāya śāmitrāt eka ulmukam ādāya āgnīdhraḥ pūrvam gacchati anvak
adhvaryuḥ vapāśrapaṇībhyām vapām dhārayan uru antarikṣam iti gacchati yajamānaḥ
vapāśrapaṇī punar anvārabheta upa tvā agne dive dive iti tisṛbhiḥ āgnīdhraḥ
adhvaryuḥ yajamānaḥ ca āhavanīyam upayanti tatas ulmukam apisṛjya āhavanīyasya
antame aṅgāre vapām nigṛhya vāyo vīhi stokānām iti su rakṣitam chinna agram
adhastāt vapāyāḥ antame aṅgāre prāsyati antarā yūpam āhavanīyam ca
pratiprasthātā vapām āhṛtya dakṣiṇatas udak mukhaḥ vapām śrapayati tvām u te
dadhire havya vāham iti vapām sruveṇa abhijuhoti prādurbhūteṣu stokeṣu
stokebhyaḥ anubrūhi iti saṃpreṣyati juṣasva saprathastamam iti stokīyāḥ hotā
pratipadyate śyenīm su śṛtām vapām kṛtvā su pippalāḥ oṣadhīḥ kṛdhī iti
uttaravedi śroṇyām dakṣiṇasyām barhiṣi plakṣa śākhāyām nidhāya prayutā dveṣāṃsi
iti vapāśrapaṇyau pravṛhati ghṛtavatīm adhvaryo srucam iti ucyamāne juhū
upabhṛtau ādāya atyākramya āśrāvya pratyāśrāvite svāhākṛtibhyaḥ preṣya iti
saṃpreṣyati vaṣaṭkṛte hutvā pratyākramya prayāja śeṣeṇa dhruvām pṛṣadājyam ca
sakṛt sakṛt abhighārya vapām abhighārayati na upabhṛtam paśau ājyabhāgau kṛtvā
juhvām upastīrya hiraṇya śakalam nidhāya kṛtsnām vapām avadyati upariṣṭāt
hiraṇyam avadhāya abhighārya indra agnibhyām chāgasya vapāyāḥ medasaḥ anubrūhi
iti saṃpreṣyati āśrāvya pratyāśrāvite indra agnibhyām chāgasya vapām medaḥ
prasthitam preṣya iti saṃpreṣyati maitrāvaruṇaḥ hotāram codayati prāk vapā homāt
svāhā devebhyaḥ iti pūrvam parivapyam hutvā vaṣaṭkṛte jātavedaḥ vapayā gaccha
devān iti vapām hutvā devebhyaḥ svāhā iti uttaram parivapyam hutvā pratyākramya
vapoddharaṇam abhighārayati svāhā ūrdhva nabhasam iti āhavanīye viṣūcyau
vapāśrapaṇyau praharati saṃsrāveṇa abhihutvā srucau anyatra sādayati atra varam
dadāti yajamānaḥ tisraḥ vā dakṣiṇāḥ gāyatram praugam kuryāt iti āhuḥ tejaḥ vai
brahmavarcasam gāyatrī tejasvī brahmavarcasī bhavati iti auṣṇiham praugam kuryāt
iti āhuḥ āyuḥ vai uṣṇih āyuṣmān bhavati iti ānuṣṭubham praugam kuryāt iti āhuḥ
kṣatram vai anuṣṭubh kṣatrasya āptyai iti bārhatam praugam kuryāt iti āhuḥ śrīḥ
vai bṛhatī śrīmān bhavati iti pāṅktam praugam kuryāt iti āhuḥ annam vai paṅktiḥ
annavān bhavati iti traiṣṭubham praugam kuryāt iti āhuḥ vīryam vai triṣṭubh
vīryavān bhavati iti jāgatam praugam kuryāt iti āhuḥ jāgatāḥ vai paśavaḥ paśumān
bhavati iti tat u gāyatram eva kuryāt brahma vai gāyatrī brahma etat ahar
brahmaṇā eva tat brahma pratipadyate tat u mādhuchandasam madhu ha sma vai
ṛṣibhyaḥ madhuchandāḥ chandati tat madhuchandasaḥ madhuchandaḥ tvam atha u annam
vai madhu sarvam vai madhu sarve vai kāmāḥ madhu tat yat mādhuchandasam śaṃsati
sarveṣām kāmānām avaruddhyai sarvān kāmān avarundhe yaḥ evam veda tat vā
aikāhikam rūpa samṛddham bahu vā etasmin ahani kiñca kiñca vāraṇam kriyate
śāntyai eva śāntiḥ vai pratiṣṭhā ekāhaḥ śāntyām eva tat pratiṣṭhāyām antatas
pratitiṣṭhanti pratitiṣṭhati yaḥ evam veda yeṣām ca evam vidvān etat hotā
śaṃsati asat su me jaritar sa abhivegaḥ satyadhvṛtam iti śaṃsati satyam vai etat
ahar satyavat rūpa samṛddham etasya ahnaḥ rūpam tat u vāsukram brahma vai
vasukraḥ brahma etat ahar brahmaṇā eva tat brahma pratipadyate tat āhuḥ atha
kasmāt vāsukreṇa etat marutvatīyam pratipadyate iti na ha vai etat anyaḥ
vasukrāt marutvatīyam udayacchat na vivyāca iti tasmāt vāsukreṇa eva etat
marutvatīyam pratipadyate tat aniruktam prājāpatyam śaṃsati aniruktaḥ vai
prajāpatiḥ prajāpateḥ āptyai sakṛt indram nirāha tena aindrāt rūpāt na
pracyavate piba somam abhi yam ugra tardaḥ iti śaṃsati ūrvam gavyam mahi gṛṇānaḥ
indra iti mahadvat rūpa samṛddham etasya ahnaḥ rūpam tat u bhāradvājam
bharadvājaḥ ha vai ṛṣīṇām anūcānatamaḥ dīrghajīvitamaḥ tapasvitamaḥ āsa saḥ
etena sūktena pāpmānam apāhata tat yat bhāradvājam śaṃsati pāpmanaḥ apahatyai
anūcānaḥ dīrgha jīvī tapasvī asāni iti tasmāt bhāradvājam śaṃsati kayā śubhā
savayasaḥ sanīḍāḥ iti śaṃsati ā śāsate prati haryanti ukthā iti uktham vai etat
ahar ukthavat rūpa samṛddham etasya ahnaḥ rūpam tat u kayāśubhīyam etat vai
saṃjñānam santani sūktam yat kayāśubhīyam etena ha vai indraḥ agastyaḥ marutaḥ
te samajānata tat yat kayāśubhīyam śaṃsati saṃjñātyai eva tat u āyuṣyam tat yaḥ
asya priyaḥ syāt kuryāt eva asya kayāśubhīyam marutvāṁ indra vṛṣabhaḥ raṇāya iti
śaṃsati indra vṛṣabhaḥ iti vṛṣaṇvat vai indrasya rūpam aindram etat ahar etasya
ahnaḥ rūpam tat u vaiśvāmitram viśvasya ha vai mitram viśvāmitraḥ āsa viśvam ha
asmai mitram bhavati yaḥ evam veda yeṣām ca evam vidvān etat hotā śaṃsati
janiṣṭhāḥ ugraḥ sahase turāya iti nivid dhānam aikāhikam rūpa samṛddham bahu vai
etasmin ahani kiñca kiñca vāraṇam kriyate śāntyai eva śāntiḥ vai pratiṣṭhā
ekāhaḥ śāntyām eva tad pratiṣṭhāyām antataḥ pratitiṣṭhanti pratitiṣṭhati yaḥ
evam veda yeṣām ca evam vidvān etat hotā śaṃsati tāḥ parāc vacanena saptanavatiḥ
bhavanti sā yā navatiḥ tisraḥ tāḥ triṃśinyaḥ virājaḥ atha yāḥ sapta atiyanti yā
eva eṣā praśaṃsā sā āptyasya tasyāḥ eva tāḥ tris prathamayā tris uttamayā eka
śatam bhavanti pañca aṅgulayaḥ catuṣparvāḥ dve kakṣasī dos ca akṣaḥ ca
aṃsaphalakam ca sā pañcaviṃśatiḥ pañcaviṃśāni itarāṇi hi aṅgāni tat śatam ātmā
eka śatatamaḥ yat śatam tat āyuḥ indriyam vīryam tejaḥ yajamānaḥ eka śatatamaḥ
āyuṣi indriye vīrye tejasi pratiṣṭhitaḥ tāḥ triṣṭubham abhisaṃpadyante
traiṣṭubhaḥ hi madhyandinaḥ tat āhuḥ kim preṅkhasya preṅkha tvam iti ayam vai
preṅkhaḥ yaḥ ayam pavate eṣa hi eṣu lokeṣu preṅkhate iti tat preṅkhasya preṅkha
tvam ekam phalakam syāt iti āhuḥ ekadhā hi eva ayam vāyuḥ pavate asya rūpeṇa iti
tat tat na ādṛtyam trīṇi phalakāni syuḥ iti āhuḥ trayaḥ vai ime trivṛtaḥ lokāḥ
eṣām rūpeṇa iti tat tat na ādṛtyam dve eva syātām dvau vai imau lokau addhātamau
iva dṛśyete yaḥ u ene antareṇa ākāśaḥ saḥ antarikṣa lokaḥ tasmāt dve eva syātām
audumbare syātām ūrj vai annādyam udumbaraḥ ūrjaḥ annādyasya avaruddhyai
madhyataḥ udbhṛte syātām madhyataḥ vai prajāḥ annam dhinoti madhyataḥ eva tat
annādyasya yajamānam dadhāti ubhayyaḥ rajjavaḥ bhavanti dakṣiṇāḥ ca savyāḥ ca
dakṣiṇāḥ vai ekeṣām paśūnām rajjavaḥ savyāḥ ekeṣām tat yat ubhayyaḥ rajjavaḥ
bhavanti ubhayeṣām paśūnām āptyai dārbhyaḥ syuḥ darbhaḥ vai oṣadhīnām apahata
pāpmā tasmāt dārbhyaḥ syuḥ aratni mātre upari bhūmeḥ preṅkhaḥ syāt iti āhuḥ
etāvatā vai svargāḥ lokāḥ saṃmitāḥ iti tat tat na ādṛtyam prādeśa mātre syāt iti
āhuḥ etāvatā vai prāṇāḥ saṃmitāḥ iti tat tat na ādṛtyam muṣṭi mātre syāt etāvatā
vai sarvam annādyam kriyate etāvatā sarvam annādyam abhipannam tasmāt muṣṭi
mātre eva syāt purastāt pratyañcam preṅkham adhirohet iti āhuḥ etasya rūpeṇa yaḥ
eṣa tapati purastāt hi eṣa imān lokān pratyaṅ adhirohati iti tat tat na ādṛtyam
tiryañcam adhirohet iti āhuḥ tiryañcam vai aśvam adhirohanti tena u sarvān kāmān
avāpnavāma iti tat tat na ādṛtyam anvañcam adhirohet iti āhuḥ anūcīm vai nāvam
adhirohanti nauḥ vā eṣā svarga yānī yat preṅkhaḥ iti tasmāt anvañcam eva
adhirohet chuvukena upaspṛśet śukaḥ ha evam vṛkṣam adhirohati saḥ u vayasām
annādatamaḥ iti tasmāt chuvukena upaspṛśet bāhubhyām adhirohet evam śyenaḥ
vayāṃsi abhiniviśate evam vṛkṣam saḥ u vayasām vīryavattamaḥ iti tasmāt
bāhubhyām adhirohet asyai pādam na ucchindyāt preṅkham hotā adhirohati
audumbarīm āsandīm udgātā vṛṣā vai preṅkhaḥ yoṣā āsandī tat mithunam mithunam
eva tat uktha mukhe karoti prajātyai prajāyate prajayā paśubhiḥ yaḥ evam veda
atha annam vai preṅkhaḥ śrīḥ āsandī annam ca eva tat śriyam ca anvadhirohataḥ
bṛsīḥ hotrakāḥ samadhirohanti sa brahmakāḥ samutsṛpya vai oṣadhi vanaspatayaḥ
phalam gṛhṇanti tat yat etasmin ahani sarvaśas samadhirohanti iṣam eva tat ūrjam
annādyam adhirohanti ūrjaḥ annādyasya avaruddhyai vaṣaṭkṛtya avarohet iti āhuḥ
tat tat na ādṛtyam a kṛtā vai sā apacitiḥ yām a paśyate karoti nigṛhya bhakṣam
avarohet iti āhuḥ tat tat na ādṛtyam a kṛtā vai sā apacitiḥ yām adhyṛṣṭāya
karoti pratikhyāya bhakṣam avarohet eṣā vai apacitiḥ yām paśyate karoti tasmāt
pratikhyāya eva bhakṣam avarohet prāṅ avarohet prāk vai deva retasam prajāyate
tasmāt prāṅ avarohet avarohet mahāvratasya pañcaviṃśatim sāmidhenyaḥ ekaviṃśatau
prāk upottamāyāḥ samidhā agnim iti catasraḥ vaiśvakarmaṇaḥ ṛṣabhaḥ
upālambhanīyaḥ upāṃśu ājya prauge viśvajitaḥ hotrāḥ caturviṃśāt īṅkhayantīḥ
apasyuvaḥ iti ca brāhmaṇācchaṃsī āvapeta prātaḥsavane tīvrasya abhivayasaḥ asya
pāhi iti mādhyandine trikadrukeṣu mahiṣaḥ yava āśiram iti stotriyaḥ ā indra yāhi
upa naḥ parāvataḥ indrāya hi dyauḥ asuraḥ anamnata pra u su asmai puroratham iti
atas anurūpaḥ caturviṃśāt marutvatīyasya ātānaḥ asat su me jaritar sa abhivegaḥ
piba somam abhi yam ugra tardaḥ kayā śubhā savayasaḥ sanīḍāḥ marutvāṁ indra
vṛṣabhaḥ raṇāya janiṣṭhāḥ ugraḥ sahase turāya iti marutvatīyam sthite
marutvatīye hotā visaṃsthita saṃcareṇa niṣkramya āgnīdhrīye tisraḥ ājya āhutīḥ
juhoti audumbareṇa sruveṇa anu mām indraḥ anu mām bṛhaspatiḥ anu somaḥ anu vāc
devī āvīt anu mām mitrāvaruṇau iha āvatām anu dyāvāpṛthivī pūrva hūtau ādityāḥ
mā viśve avantu devāḥ sapta rājānaḥ ye uda abhiṣiktāḥ vāyuḥ pūṣā varuṇaḥ somaḥ
agniḥ sūryaḥ nakṣatraiḥ avatu iha mā nu pitaraḥ mā viśvam idam ca bhūtam pṛśni
mātaraḥ marutaḥ su arkāḥ ye agni jihvāḥ uta vā yajatrāḥ te naḥ devāḥ su havāḥ
śarma yacchata iti dakṣiṇe mārjālīye daśa sruci uttamām caturgṛhītam pūrvam
avadāya uttaratas agneḥ upanidhāya viharaṇa prabhṛti madhyandine mārjālīyaḥ
jāgaritaḥ bhavati tasmin parivṛte juhoti prāc dvāre vā udak dvāre vā prāc udak
dvāre vā agniḥ iva an ādhṛṣyaḥ pṛthivī iva suṣadā bhūyāsam antarikṣam iva an
āpyam dyauḥ iva an ādhṛṣyaḥ bhūyāsam sūryaḥ iva aprati manaḥ iva apūrvam vāyuḥ
iva śloka bhūḥ bhūyāsam ahar iva svam rātriḥ iva priyaḥ bhūyāsam gāvaḥ iva
punarbhuvaḥ mithunam iva marīcayaḥ bhūyāsam āpaḥ iva rasaḥ oṣadhayaḥ iva rūpam
bhūyāsam annam iva vibhu yajñaḥ iva prabhuḥ bhūyāsam brahmā iva loke kṣatram iva
śriyām bhūyāsam yat agne eṣā samitiḥ bhavāti iti atra vibhajātha vītha iti trīṇi
an anvṛcam atra tiṣṭhan ādityam upatiṣṭhate paryāvṛtte pradakṣiṇam āvṛttyā etaiḥ
ca eva a svāhākāraiḥ ehi eva idam madhu idam madhu imam tīvra sutam piba idam
madhu idam madhu iti ca preṣyāḥ saṃśāsti pūrṇa kumbhāḥ tisraḥ avamāḥ ṣaḍ uttamāḥ
imam dhiṣṇyam uda kumbham ca tris pradakṣiṇam parivrajātha dakṣiṇaiḥ pāṇibhiḥ
dakṣiṇān ūrūn āghnānāḥ ehi eva idam madhu idam madhu iti vadatyaḥ upākṛte stotre
traidham ninaya atha atra uttare ca mārjālīye śeṣam antarvedi iti pradakṣiṇam
agnim niṣkramya agreṇa yūpam purastāt pratyak mukhaḥ tiṣṭhan agneḥ śiraḥ
upatiṣṭhate namaḥ te gāyatrāya yat te śiraḥ iti tena eva yathetam pratyetya
dakṣiṇam udak mukhaḥ pakṣam namaḥ te rāthantarāya yaḥ te dakṣiṇaḥ pakṣaḥ iti
apareṇa agni puccham atikramya prāc mukhaḥ uttaram namaḥ te bṛhate yaḥ te
uttaraḥ pakṣaḥ iti paścāt prāṅ puccham namaḥ te bhadrāya yat te puccham yā te
pratiṣṭhā dakṣiṇatas pucchasya ātmānam namaḥ te rājanāya yaḥ te ātmā iti
yathetam sadaḥ prasarpati purastāt preṅkhaḥ upakﾱptaḥ bhavati sthūṇe rajjū
vīvadhaḥ iti etat prakṣālya tīrthena prapādya uttareṇa āgnīdhrīyam parivrajya
pūrvayā dvārā sadaḥ sarvān dhiṣṇyān uttareṇa audumbarāṇi kāṣṭhāni preṅkhasya
bhavanti pālāśāni miśrāṇi vā trīṇi phalakāni ubhayatas taṣṭāni dve vā sūcyaḥ ca
tāvatyaḥ iṣu mātraḥ prāṅ preṅkhaḥ nimuṣṭikaḥ tiryaṅ udak agraḥ prāc agrābhyām
sūcībhyām samutaḥ dakṣiṇa uttare sthūṇe nikhāya abhitas hotṛṣadanam vīvadham
atyādadhāti āsya saṃmitam kartuḥ kuṣṭhāsu chidrāṇi preṅkhasya bhavanti
rajjubhyām ūrdhvam udvayati dakṣiṇatas dakṣiṇayā uttaratas savyayā dārbhye tri
guṇe syātām savya dakṣiṇe pañca vyāyāme dviguṇe vīvadhe tris pradakṣiṇam
paryasya ūrdhva granthim niṣṭarkyam badhnāti śākhābhiḥ bṛsībhiḥ vā paryṛṣanti a
prakampi catur aṅgulena eṣa vibhūmaḥ preṅkhaḥ syāt muṣṭi mātreṇa vā dakṣiṇatas
udāhitataraḥ samaḥ vā pada mātre dhiṣṇyāt niṣṭhite preṅkhe hotā vāṇam audumbaram
śata tantum ubhābhyām parigṛhya uttaratas upohate yathā vīṇām saptabhiḥ
chandobhiḥ catur uttaraiḥ sthānāni asya ūrdhvam udgṛhṇīyāt daśabhiḥ vā gāyatreṇa
tvā chandasā udūhāmi auṣṇihena tvā ānuṣṭubhena tvā bārhatena tvā pāṅktena tvā
traiṣṭubhena tvā jāgatena tvā vairājena tvā dvaipadena tvā atichandasā tvā iti
chandāṃsi anukramya sthānānām anuparikramaṇam audumbaryā ārdrayā śākhayā sa
palāśayā mūla deśena vāṇam tris ūrdhvam ullikhati prāṇāya tvā apānāya tvā
vyānāya tvā ullikhāmi iti anyebhyaḥ api kāmebhyaḥ punar api na tu ullikhāmi iti
brūyāt atha enam sa śākham chandogebhyaḥ prayacchati bhūtebhyaḥ tvā iti paśca
arddhe phalake pāṇī pratiṣṭhāpayati prāṇam anu preṅkhasva iti prāñcam preṅkham
praṇayati vyānam anu vīṅkhasva iti tiryañcam apānam anu īṅkhasva iti abhyātmam
bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar iti japati prāṇāya tvā iti prāñcam eva vyānāya tvā iti
tiryañcam apānāya tvā iti abhyātmam vasavaḥ tvā gāyatreṇa chandasā ārohantu tān
anu ārohāmi iti paśca arddhe phalake aratnī pratiṣṭhāpayati atha pūrvam phalakam
nānā pāṇibhyām abhipadyeta yathā ahiḥ srapsyan madhyamam chubukena upaspṛśet
dvayoḥ vā saṃdhim rudrāḥ tvā traiṣṭubhena chandasā ārohantu tān anu ārohāmi iti
dakṣiṇam sakthi atiharati ādityāḥ tvā jāgatena chandasā ārohantu tān anu ārohāmi
iti savyam viśve tvā devāḥ ānuṣṭubhena chandasā ārohantu tān anu ārohāmi iti
samārohati paścāt svasya dhiṣṇyasya dakṣiṇam pādam prāñcam pratiṣṭhāpayati atha
savyam yadā itaraḥ śrāmyet atha itaram yadā itaraḥ atha itaram na ubhau vibhūmau
kuryāt kūrcān hotrakāḥ samārohanti brahmā ca audumbarīm āsandīm udgātā yadi
kasmaicid avaśya karmaṇe jigamiṣet ādiśya pālam prāṅ avaruhya caritvā tam artham
evam eva a japayā āvṛtā ārohet rohitena ānaḍuhena uttara lomnā carmaṇā pihitaḥ
syāt tasya daśasu paścāt chidreṣu daśa daśa tantryaḥ baddhāḥ syuḥ mauñjyaḥ
dārbhyaḥ vā triṣu iti śāṇḍilyaḥ catustriṃśat madhyame trayastriṃśatau abhitas
iti purastāt ekaikaśas tāḥ traidham vibhajya bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar iti etābhiḥ pṛthak
uttarottarī udūhet tam abhimṛśet vadaḥ vada vadāvadī vadaḥ vada uruḥ pṛthuḥ
sugaḥ sugantvaḥ karmaḥ karaṇaḥ karaḥ karasyuḥ abhīṣāh ca abhīṣāhī ca abhimāti
haḥ ca abhimāti hā ca sāsahiḥ ca sahīyān ca sahasvān ca sahamānaḥ ca udvayāḥ ca
bṛhat vayāḥ ca sa vayāḥ ca bṛhat vayāḥ ca aindrīm vācam bṛhatīm viśva rūpām
śatāyuṣīm pravada deva vāṇa iti śithilān tantūn āyacchet ebhiḥ naḥ vāṇa
tantubhiḥ śatam rāddhīḥ iha āvada arātsma sarve atārṣma jīvāḥ jyotiḥ aśīmahi iti
vāc sarvam manaḥ jyotiḥ mānaḥ bhadraḥ iti japitvā vādayet indreṇatayā iṣīkayā
vetasa śākhayā ca sa palāśayā mūlataḥ yā svayam vakrā sā indraṇatā prāṇāya tvā
iti ūrdhvam ullikhet apānāya tvā iti avāñcam vyānāya tvā iti tris saṃlikhya
udañcam vāṇam prohet brāhmaṇam uktvā imam ullikhan āsva iti āhata dundubhīn
pravadantu vīṇāḥ iti brūyāt alābuvīṇām vakrā kapiśīrṣṇyau ca pūrvasyām dvāri
bahiḥsadasam vakrā kapiśīrṣṇyau dundubhīn ca pratimantrayeta yaḥ vakrāyām
kapiśīrṣṇyām dundubhau ca yat ca vādyam ghoṣaḥ yaḥ mahataḥ mahān tena naḥ
rāddhim āvada iti mahāvīṇā piśīlavīṇe ca aparasyām antar iti gautama śāṇḍilyau
bahis iti dhānaṃjayyaḥ alābuvīṇā piśīlavīṇe ca pratimantrayeta alābuvīṇā piśīlī
ca yam mantram adhijagmatuḥ tena idam upagāyatām te sāma mahayiṣyataḥ iti
paścimena upagātṝn dve dve ekaikā patnī kāṇḍavīṇām picchorām ca vyatyāsam
vādayet upamukham picchorām vādanena kāṇḍamayīm tāḥ apaghāṭilāḥ iti ācakṣate tāḥ
pratimantrayeta yām patnī apaghāṭilām mṛdukam vādayiṣyati sā arātim apabādhatām
dviṣantam taijanitvac iti sarvam anuvīkṣamāṇaḥ japet ākrandāḥ ulūlayaḥ prakrośāḥ
yat ca ceṣṭati sarvā satrasya sā rāddhiḥ tathā idam sāma gīyate iti japet eva
suparṇaḥ asmi garutmān pra imām vācam vadiṣyāmi bahu kariṣyantīm bahu kariṣyan
svargam ayiṣyantīm svargam ayiṣyan mām imān yajamānān iti sarvatra brahmā
dakṣiṇatas udak mukhaḥ kuryāt homebhyaḥ anyat pākayajñāḥ iti ācakṣate eka agnau
yajñān teṣām hoṣyan su tūṣṇīm upaviśet hute yathārtham syāt śūlagave ca balīn
hriyamāṇān anugacchet nidhīyamānānām dakṣiṇatas sthitvā nihiteṣu apaḥ upaspṛśya
an avekṣam pratyāvrajet tūṣṇīm pākayajñe dakṣiṇām om iti vā pratigṛhṇīyāt paśuḥ
eva paśoḥ dakṣiṇā pūrṇapātram sthālīpākasya ubhayoḥ yathotsāham vā na vitānam
pṛṣṭhatas kurvīta yena yajñāṅgena saṃyujyeta tat abhyāvarteta karma ādiṣu
sarveṣu adhvaryu saṃpraiṣam āgamayet pūrvayā ca dvārā anādeśe praviśet
agnyādheye dakṣiṇayā dvārā prapadya cātuṣprāśyam nirvapsyatsu tūṣṇīm upaviśet
nirupte yathārtham syāt tat uddhariṣyatsu evam eva tat ced an ṛtvigbhiḥ
prāśayeyuḥ taṇḍulān ādāya apavidhyeyuḥ atha anyān nidadhīran ādhāsyamānasya
araṇyoḥ prattayoḥ yathārtham syāt pūrvāhṇe dakṣiṇena agni āyatanāni gatvā yatra
agnim manthiṣyantaḥ syuḥ tad dakṣiṇatas nirastaḥ parāvasuḥ iti dakṣiṇā tṛṇam
nirasyet ā vasoḥ sadane sīdāmi iti upaviśet bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar bṛhaspati brahmā
aham mānuṣaḥ om iti etena upaviśet yajuṣā iti yatra syāt agnim hriyamāṇam
anugacchet nihite yajuṣā upaviśet atra prathamam iti śāṇḍilyaḥ dvitīyam iti
dhānaṃjayyaḥ jāte rāthantaram gāyet vāmadevyam hriyamāṇe bṛhat nihite sarvāṇi
tṛceṣu manasā vācā gāyet iti hi ukte kim anyat vācā pratīyeta atha api gānam eva
adhvaryave vidhīyate na manasā iti api vā rahasyāni eva manasā gāyet na hi
araṇye geyānām gānam grāme vidyate iti prathama uttamayoḥ sthāne vāravantīya
yajñāyajñīye iti lāmakāyanaḥ pūrve kalpe bhūyāṃsi iti śāṇḍilyaḥ samidham
prasthānīyām anumantrayeta deva savitar etat te yajñam prāhuḥ bṛhaspataye
brahmaṇe tena yajñam ava tena yajñapatim tena mām ava manaḥ jyotiḥ juṣatām
ājyasya bṛhaspatiḥ yajñam imam tanotu ariṣṭam yajñam sam imam dadhātu viśve
devāsaḥ iha mādayantām iti upāṃśu pratiṣṭhā iti uccais bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar
bṛhaspatiḥ brahmā aham mānuṣaḥ iti upāṃśu om iti uccais sarva anumantraṇena vā
vimuktāsu praṇītāsu samidhaḥ ādadhyāt yathā avabhṛthāt udetya etat sarva iṣṭīnām
brahmatvam samāne ahani eka āsane na punar yajuṣā upaviśet iti śāṇḍilyaḥ
agnyādheya iṣṭiṣu prathamāyām yajuṣā upaviśet uttamāyām samidhaḥ ādadhyāt iti
gautamaḥ pṛthak iṣṭiṣu iti dhānaṃjayyaḥ cātuṣprāśyam ca prāśnatsu dhenum dadyāt
brahmaṇe adhvaryave ca agnipadam dhanuḥ hotre vatsatarīḥ brahmaṇe anaḍuhaḥ
adhvaryave sarve trivargāḥ paṣṭhauhīm āgnīdhrāya sarvebhyaḥ aśva ratham kuṇḍale
ca evam eva dhenum agnipadam ca śāṇḍilyaḥ dhenum anaḍvāham vatsatarīm vatsataram
ajam pūrṇapātram iti tat prathamāyām iṣṭau dadyāt tathā uttarayoḥ anyatra ājya
pūrṇapātrābhyām varaḥ saptamaḥ dakṣiṇānām trayodaśaḥ vā pañcaviṃśaḥ vā etat
vājasaneyakam agnyādheya antān kurvate pūrṇāhutim akṣa abhihomam iṣṭīḥ iti
mithunau dakṣiṇā anvārambhaṇīyāyām iṣṭau vājina āśvina gharmāṇām ṛtvikṣu
upahavam iṣṭvā prāṇabhakṣam bhakṣayet pratyakṣa bhakṣam sve yajñe yat me retaḥ
prasicyate yat vā me apigacchati yat vā jāyate punar tena mā śivam āviśa tena mā
vājinam kuru tasya te vāji pītasya upahūtaḥ upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi iti vājinasya
iti ṛtūnām tvā vājinām vājinam bhakṣayāmi iti vā ubhābhyām vā ubhābhyām vā
brahmā ha vai idam agre āsīt padārtha vivṛttiḥ tasya tejaḥ rasaḥ atyaricyata sa
brahmā samabhavat sa tūṣṇīm manasā adhyāyat tasya yat manaḥ āsīt sa prajāpatiḥ
abhavat tasmāt prājāpatyām manasā juhvati manaḥ hi prajāpatiḥ tasya dyauḥ śiraḥ
āsīt uraḥ antarikṣam madhyam samudraḥ pṛthivī pādau sa vai idam viśvam bhūtam
asṛjata tasya sāma upajīvanam prāyacchat upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda tat
yaḥ asau kruṣṭatamaḥ iva sāmnaḥ svaraḥ tam devāḥ upajīvanti yaḥ avareṣām
prathamaḥ tam manuṣyāḥ yaḥ dvitīyaḥ tam gandharva apsarasaḥ yaḥ tṛtīyaḥ tam
paśavaḥ yaḥ caturthaḥ tam pitaraḥ ye ca aṇḍeṣu śerate yaḥ pañcamaḥ tam asura
rakṣāṃsi yaḥ antyaḥ tam oṣadhayaḥ vanaspatayaḥ yat ca anyat jagat tasmāt āhuḥ
sāma eva annam iti sāma hi eṣām upajīvanam prāyacchet upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ
evam veda tasya ha vai etasya sāmnaḥ ṛc eva asthīni svaraḥ māṃsāni stobhāḥ
lomāni yaḥ ha vai sāmnaḥ svam yaḥ suvarṇam veda svam ca ha vai sāmnaḥ suvarṇam
ca bhavati svaraḥ vāva sāmnaḥ svam tat eva suvarṇam yaḥ ha vai sāmnaḥ pratiṣṭhām
veda prati ha tiṣṭhati asmin ca loke amuṣmin ca vāc vāva sāmnaḥ pratiṣṭhā yat
etat vāc iti ṛc eva sā ṛci sāma pratiṣṭhitam sa yadā gāyatram bṛhatyām gāyati
bārhatam jagatyām jāgatam triṣṭubhi sama tām ca āpadyate tasmāt etat sāma iti
āha samā u ha vai asmin chandāṃsi sāmyāt iti tat sāmnaḥ sāma tvam te devāḥ
prajāpatim upādhāvan te abruvan katham nu vayam svargam lokam iyāma iti tebhyaḥ
etān yajña kratūn prāyacchat etaiḥ lokam eṣyatha iti taiḥ svargam lokam āyan
svargam lokam eti yaḥ evam veda teṣām ahīyanta ajāḥ pṛśnayaḥ vaikhānasāḥ
vasurociṣaḥ ye ca a pūtāḥ ye ca kāma īpsvaḥ te abruvan katham nu vayam svargam
lokam iyāma iti tebhyaḥ etat svādhyāya adhyayanam prāyacchat tapaḥ ca etābhyām
svargam lokam eṣyatha iti tābhyām svargam lokam āyan svargam lokam eti yaḥ evam
veda yaḥ evam veda atha atas trīn kṛcchrān vyākhyāsyāmaḥ haviṣyān prātarāśān
bhuktvā tisraḥ rātrīḥ na aśnīyāt atha aparam tri aham naktam bhuñjīta atha
aparam tri aham na kaṃcana yācet atha aparam tri aham upavaset tiṣṭhet ahani
rātrau āsīta kṣipra kāmaḥ satyam vadet anāryaiḥ na sambhāṣeta raurava yaudhājaye
nityam prayuñjīta anusavanam udaka upasparśanam āpohiṣṭhīyābhiḥ atha udaka
tarpaṇam namaḥ ahamāya mohamāya maṃhamāya dhūnvate tāpasāya punarvasave namaḥ
namaḥ mauñjyāya aurmyāya saumyāya śamyāya śivāya namaḥ namaḥ pārāya supārāya
mahāpārāya pāradāya pāravindāya namaḥ namaḥ puruṣāya supuruṣāya mahāpuruṣāya
madhyamapuruṣāya uttamapuruṣāya brahmacāriṇe namaḥ namaḥ iti etat eva āditya
upasthānam etāḥ eva ājya āhutayaḥ dvādaśa rātrasya ante sthālīpākam śrapayitvā
tābhyaḥ devatābhyaḥ juhuyāt agnaye svāhā somāya svāhā agnīṣomābhyām indra
agnibhyām indrāya viśvebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ brahmaṇe prajāpataye agnaye sviṣṭakṛte
iti atha u brāhmaṇa tarpaṇam etena eva atikṛcchraḥ vyākhyātaḥ yāvat sakṛt
ādadīta tāvat aśnīyāt abbhakṣaḥ tṛtīyaḥ sa kṛcchrātikṛcchraḥ prathamam caritvā
śuciḥ pūtaḥ karmaṇyaḥ bhavati dvitīyam caritvā yat kiṃcid anyat mahāpātakebhyaḥ
pāpam kurute tasmāt pramucyate tṛtīyam caritvā sarvasmāt enasaḥ mucyate atha
etān trīn kṛcchrān caritvā sarveṣu vedeṣu snātaḥ bhavati sarveṣu deveṣu jñātaḥ
bhavati yaḥ ca evam veda yaḥ ca evam veda atha atas svādhyāya adhyayanasya kāmam
uktvā upakrāmet ante vā trīn kṛcchrān caritvā pūtaḥ bhavati agnim pratiṣṭhāpya
agni abhāve tu udakam ādityam vā upasamādhāya darbhān upastīrya darbheṣu āsīnaḥ
prāk kūleṣu udak kūleṣu vā dakṣiṇena pāṇinā darbha muṣṭim gṛhītvā prathamam
trivargam nava kṛtvas gāyet evam sadā prayuñjānaḥ agnyādheyam avāpnoti indrāya
pavate madaḥ iti pavamāna havīṃṣi etena kalpena suvar mahāḥ suvar mayāḥ iti
etābhyām darśa pūrṇamāsau etena eva kalpena bhṛtya atithi śeṣa bhojī kāle dārān
upeyāt yathāśakti ca atithibhyaḥ dadyāt api udakam antatas evaṃvrataḥ yat indra
aham yathā tvam iti ete sadā prayuñjīta suvar mahāḥ suvar mayāḥ iti ete ca
parvaṇi tathā ha asya agnihotram a viluptam sadā hutam sa darśa pūrṇamāsam
bhavati karma ante agnim pratiṣṭhāpya vrīhi yavān taṇḍulān tris prakṣālya
juhuyāt agnaye svāhā somāya pavitravate varuṇāya dhanvantaraye manasā
prājāpatyām brahmaṇe agnaye sviṣṭakṛte iti paścāt atha atas pāñcarātrikāṇām
vrīhi yavau bhojanam a sauhityam ante tu agni ādiḥ uktaḥ kalpaḥ kāmyānām ca a
vipratiṣedhaḥ tam indram vājayāmasi iti caturvargeṇa cāturmāsyāni avāpnoti asya
preṣa iti pāśukāni trātāram indram yajāmahe iti etābhyām paśubandham payaḥ
vrataḥ etena kalpena bṛhat indrāya gāyata iti caturvargeṇa sautrāmaṇyau
sautrāmaṇyau atha atas sāptarātrikāṇām bhaikṣam payaḥ vā vratam eke bhaikṣa
arthāya eva grāmam praviśet na anyatra svādhyāyāt vācam utsṛjet adhas śayīta na
apaḥ abhyaveyāt ante tu agni ādiḥ uktaḥ kalpaḥ kāmyānām ca a pratiṣedhaḥ
īṅkhayantīḥ iti daśatam rathantaram ca vāmadevyam ca etāni anusavanam
prayuñjānaḥ agniṣṭomam avāpnoti yajñāḥ yajñāḥ vaḥ agnayaḥ iti catur vargeṇa
atyagniṣṭomam namaḥ te agne ojase iti daśatā ukthyam punānaḥ soma dhārayā iti
vargeṇa ṣoḍaśinam pari itas siñcata sutam iti vargeṇa atirātram payaḥ vrataḥ
etena kalpena tisraḥ vācaḥ udīrate iti vargeṇa vājapeyam māsam etena kalpena vaḥ
indram kṛvim yathā iti daśatā aptoryāmāṇam māsam caturthe kāle bhuñjānaḥ ā
juhota haviṣā marjayadhvam iti daśatā dvādaśa aham saṃvatsaram etena kalpena
abodhi agniḥ iti daśatam rathantaram ca vāmadevyam ca bṛhat ca vairājam ca
mahānāmnyaḥ ca revatyaḥ ca etāni anusavanam prayuñjānaḥ gavāmayanam avāpnoti
rājana rauhiṇābhyām tāpaścite payaḥ vrataḥ etena kalpena somaḥ pavate janitā
matīnām iti catur vargeṇa cāturmāsyāni saumikāni avāpnoti saṃvatsaram aṣṭame
kāle bhuñjānaḥ grāmyam annam pra tu drava iti daśatam āvartayan naimiśīyam
dvādaśa saṃvatsaram avāpnoti āgneyam aindram pāvamānam iti etena kalpena catvāri
varṣāṇi prayuñjānaḥ śata saṃvatsaram avāpnoti sarvam prayuñjānaḥ sahasra
saṃvatsaram avāpnoti an aśnan saṃhitā sahasreṇa vā pṛṣṭha upatāpa śata sahasreṇa
vā prathamaḥ tri vargaḥ sāvitryam gāyatram mahānāmnyaḥ ca eṣā amṛtā nāma saṃhitā
etayā vai devāḥ amṛta tvam āyan amṛta tvam eti yaḥ evam veda idam hi anu ojasā
iti prathama uttame tvām idā hyas naraḥ sa pūrvyaḥ mahīnām purām bhinduḥ yuvā
kaviḥ upaprakṣe madhumati kṣiyantaḥ pavasva soma madhumāṁ ṛtāvā su rūpa kṛt
rāhasam mādhucchandasam eṣā mādhucchandasī nāma saṃhitā etayā vai devāḥ svargam
lokam āyan svargam lokam eti yaḥ evam veda ā vaḥ rājā tat vaḥ vargaḥ ājyadohāni
devavratāni ca eṣā raudrī nāma saṃhitā etām prayuñjan rudram prīṇāti idam viṣṇuḥ
prakṣasya vṛṣṇaḥ pra kāvyam uśanā iva bruvāṇaḥ iti vārāham antyam puruṣavrate ca
eṣā vaiṣṇavī nāma saṃhitā etām prayuñjan viṣṇum prīṇāti adardar suṣvāṇāsaḥ ā tu
naḥ iti vargāḥ mṛjyamānaḥ su hastya iti prathama ṣaṣṭhe ca eṣā vaināyakī nāma
saṃhitā etām prayuñjan vināyakam prīṇāti ā mandaiḥ indra haribhiḥ ā naḥ viśvāsu
havyam pra senānīḥ iti vargāḥ pavitram te iti dve eṣā skandasya saṃhitā etām
prayuñjan skandam prīṇāti yat vai u viśpatiḥ sanāt agne akṣan amīmadanta hi abhi
tri pṛṣṭham krān samudraḥ kanikranti iti dve eṣā pitryā nāma saṃhitā etām
prayuñjan pitṝn prīṇāti āsya daghne udake tiṣṭhan etat triḥsapta kṛtvas gāyet
etat sarva vācogata saṃmitam etena sarvān kāmān avāpnoti yaḥ ca evam veda yaḥ ca
evam veda atha yasyāḥ jātāni pramīyeran nyagrodha śuṅgām śara mūlam ca utthāpya
tat ahar trivṛtam kārayet maṇim agnim pratiṣṭhāpya āvṛtā hutvā maṇim nidhāya
abodhi agniḥ iti etena abhijuhuyāt sahasra kṛtvas śata avaram tṛtīye garbha māsi
nidadhyāt ājya śeṣam mekhalāyām maṇim dhārayet pumāṃsam ha janayati jātasya
kaṇṭhe avasajet kumāram ājya śeṣam prāśayet sarvāṇi srotāṃsi tarpayet abhyañjīta
ahar ahar tatas ūrdhvam upayukte punar prayogaḥ śatam varṣāṇi jīvati jarayā eva
visraṃsate atha yaḥ rakṣasā gṛhītaḥ syāt aśani hatasya vṛkṣasya idhmaḥ śuklāyāḥ
goḥ sarūpa vatsāyāḥ anyasyāḥ vā ājyam bailvam maṇim utthāpya tat ahar trivṛtam
kārayet maṇim agnim pratiṣṭhāpya āvṛtā hutvā maṇim nidhāya indra tri dhātu
śaraṇam iti etena abhijuhuyāt sahasra kṛtvas śata avaram tam maṇim kaṇṭhena
śirasā vā dhārayan muñcate rakṣasā yat vai u viśpatiḥ iti ca etat sadā
prayuñjīta svasti ha asya bhavati āmayāvī kaumbhyam ghṛtam viśvāḥ pṛtanāḥ
abhibhūtaram naraḥ iti etena abhijuhuyāt sahasra kṛtvas śata avaram jīva iti ca
asya nidhanam kuryāt etena eva sadā prāśnīyāt mucyate āmayāvī ā naḥ mitrāvaruṇa
iti ca etat sadā prayuñjīta svasti ha asya bhavati svasti ha asya bhavati atha
yat asya rujet śam naḥ devī rahasyena ghṛtam abhigīya abhyañjyāt śāmyati ha
dvika ādyena vā udakam pāyayet śītābhiḥ adbhiḥ abhiṣecayet somam rājānam sanāt
agne agnim hotāram iti etāni ca enam abhiśrāvayet śāmyati ha śaṅkhapuṣpīm
sarpasugandhām ca utthāpya tat ahar trivṛtam kārayet maṇim agnim pratiṣṭhāpya
āvṛtā hutvā maṇim nidhāya carṣaṇī dhṛtam iti vargeṇa abhijuhuyāt sahasra kṛtvas
śata avaram tam maṇim kaṇṭhena śirasā vā dhārayataḥ na sarpa bhayam bhavati
kayānīyāyām ca sarpasāma sadā prayuñjīta svasti ha asya bhavati śvetapuṣpām
bṛhatīm utthāpya tat ahar trivṛtam kārayet maṇim agnim pratiṣṭhāpya āvṛtā hutvā
maṇim nidhāya mā u su tvā vāghataḥ ca na iti etena abhijuhuyāt sahasra kṛtvas
śata avaram tam maṇim kaṇṭhena śirasā vā dhārayataḥ na śastra bhayam bhavati
yatas indra bhayāmahe iti ca etat sadā prayuñjīta svasti ha asya bhavati
śvetapuṣpam arkam utthāpya tat ahar trivṛtam kārayet maṇim agnim pratiṣṭhāpya
āvṛtā hutvā maṇim nidhāya svāśirām arkeṇa abhijuhuyāt sahasra kṛtvas śata avaram
tam maṇim kaṇṭhena śirasā vā dhārayan bahu annaḥ bhavati dīrghatamasaḥ arkaḥ
arkaśiraḥ arkagrīvāḥ iti ca etāni prayuñjānaḥ sarvatra annam labhate sam anyāḥ
yanti indhanam prayuñjānaḥ na pipāsayā mriyate iṣṭāhotrīyam prayuñjānaḥ na apsu
mriyate acodasaḥ iti tṛtīyam prayuñjīta na enam yakṣmā gṛhṇāti tvam imāḥ oṣadhīḥ
iti etat sadā prayuñjānaḥ na gareṇa mriyate sam te payāṃsi iti pūrveṇa prathamam
grāsam graset uttareṇa nigiret viṣam api asya annam bhavati na enam hiṃsati na
enam hiṃsati karavīra daṇḍam utthāpya devavrataiḥ abhijuhuyāt anugāna śastena
hasta gatena yatra kva ca gacchati sarvatra ha asya svasti bhavati tena nagaram
vā nigamam vā grāmam vā goṣṭham vā āgāram vā manasā dhyāyan parilikhet na atra
aniṣṭāḥ praviśanti pratibhaye adhvani devavratam ādyam gītvā madhyamam āvartayet
gate adhvani uttamam samāpayitvā viramet udyata śastrān śatrūn dṛṣṭvā
devavratāni manasā dhyāyan na enam hiṃsanti a mānuṣe bhaye kayānīyā tṛtīyam
āvartayet na enam hiṃsanti adhvānam abhyutthitaḥ ā mandraiḥ iti vargam gītvā an
apekṣamāṇaḥ vrajet svasti ardha caritaḥ punar aiti na adhvani ca pramīyate anyaḥ
vā enam anugāyet kadācana starīḥ asi iti etena ca enam abhiśrāvayet arddha sāmni
pradakṣiṇam āvartayet samāpya an avekṣamāṇaḥ paras vrajet svasti ardha caritaḥ
punar aiti na adhvani ca pramīyate eṣā u uṣāḥ apūrvyā iti saṃviśan sadā
prayuñjīta ākālam svastyayanam udite yat adya kad ca vṛtrahan iti ākālam
svastyayanam mūla phalaiḥ upavasatham kṛtvā māsam upavaset araṇye nistāntavaḥ
muniḥ yā rauhiṇī vā pauṣī vā paurṇamāsī syāt tat ahar udyantam ādityam
upatiṣṭheta ud vayam tamasaḥ pari iti etena tatas ūrdhvam tad vrataḥ tad bhakṣaḥ
catvāri varṣāṇi prayuñjānaḥ jarā mṛtyū jahāti jarā mṛtyū jahāti yuñjate manaḥ
iti āhavanīye juhoti manasā vai prajāpatiḥ yajñam atanuta tatas vācā tatas
karmaṇā manasā eva etat yajamānaḥ yajñam vitatya tatas vācā tatas karmaṇā karoti
devasya vaḥ savituḥ prasave iti abhrīḥ ādatte savitṛ prasūtaḥ eva enāḥ
devatābhiḥ ādatte catasraḥ ādatte catasraḥ vai diśaḥ digbhyaḥ pravargyaḥ
saṃbhriyate digbhyaḥ eva pravargyam saṃbharati vānaspatyāḥ bhavanti
vanaspatibhiḥ vai pravargyaḥ saṃbhriyate vanaspatibhiḥ eva pravargyam saṃbharati
uttiṣṭha brahmaṇaspate iti uttiṣṭhati bṛhaspatiḥ vai brahmaṇaspatiḥ bṛhaspatiḥ
eva bhūtvā uttiṣṭhati upa prayantu marutaḥ sudānavaḥ iti sudānavaḥ vai marutaḥ
āraṇyāḥ araṇye pravargyaḥ saṃbhriyate araṇye eva āraṇyam karoti praitu
brahmaṇaspatiḥ iti pratitiṣṭhati bṛhaspatiḥ vai brahmaṇaspatiḥ bṛhaspatiḥ eva
bhūtvā pratitiṣṭhati ā devī etu sūnṛtā iti vāc vai devī sūnṛtā vācā pravargyaḥ
saṃbhriyate vācā eva pravargyam saṃbharati aśchāḥ vīram naryam paṅkti rādhasam
iti yajñaḥ vai vīraḥ naryaḥ paṅkti rādhāḥ devebhyaḥ eva yajñam saṃbharati devī
dyāvāpṛthivī devayajane anu me maṃsāthām iti ime vai mahāvīrāt saṃbhriyamāṇāt
abibhītām tejasā nau uddhakṣyati iti sa bṛhaspatiḥ abravīt yuvayoḥ bhāgadheyam
iti tatas enam anvamanyatām ṛtasya ṛdhyāsam adya makhasya śiraḥ iti saṃbharati
yajñasya eva śiraḥ saṃbharati tris harati triṣatyāḥ hi devāḥ samantam abhrīḥ
pariśrayati rakṣasām parāṇuttyai prajāpateḥ vai prajāḥ sisṛkṣamāṇasya tasya
tejaḥ yajñiyam apākrāmat tat imām prāviśat tat varāhaḥ bhūtvā anvavindat iti ati
agre āsīḥ iti yat varāha vihatam bhavati asyāḥ eva tejaḥ yajñiyam saṃbharati
devīḥ vamriyaḥ asya bhūtasya prathama jāḥ iti vamriyaḥ vai asya bhūtasya
prathama jāḥ tāḥ vai etat viduḥ yatra asyāḥ jīvam yajñiyam yat valmīka vāpanām
saṃbharati asyāḥ eva jīvam yajñiyam saṃbharati indraḥ vai yat vṛtram ahan tasya
ojaḥ vīryam apākrāmat tat oṣadhīḥ prāviśat te pūtīkāḥ abhavan indrasya ojaḥ asi
iti yat pūtīkānām saṃbharati indrasya eva ojaḥ vīryam saṃbharati prajāpateḥ
tanūḥ asi iti ajām duhanti prajāpateḥ vai eṣā priyā tanūḥ yat ajā yat ajām
duhanti prajāpateḥ eva priyām tanvam saṃbharati madhu tvā madhunā karotu iti
apaḥ upasṛjati madhu vai etat madhunā saṃyauti madhavyaḥ bhavati makhasya śiraḥ
asi iti piṇḍam upādatte yajñaḥ vai makhaḥ yajñasya eva śiraḥ karoti yajñasya
pade sthaḥ iti avabādhate yajñasya eva pade karoti gāyatraḥ asi iti prathamam
ādhim ādadhāti tejaḥ vai brahma gāyatrī tejaḥ eva brahma yajamāne dadhāti
traiṣṭubhaḥ asi iti dvitīyam ādhim ādadhāti ojaḥ vai vīryam triṣṭubh ojaḥ eva
vīryam yajamāne dadhāti jāgataḥ asi iti tṛtīyam ādhim ādadhāti paśavaḥ vai
jagatī paśūn eva yajamāne dadhāti makhaḥ asi iti makham eva enam karoti makhasya
rāsnā asi iti rāsnām karoti yajñaḥ vai makhaḥ yajñāya eva enam karoti prādeśa
mātraḥ bhavati etāvat vai mukham mukham devānām agniḥ mukhena saṃmitaḥ upariṣṭāt
pātraḥ bhavati devatānām tṛptyai tṛpyati prajayā paśubhiḥ upa enam soma pīthaḥ
namati yaḥ evam veda sūryasya harasā śrāya iti ātape nidadhāti amuṣya eva enam
ādityasya tejasā tapati pūrvam pūrvam sādayati imān eva lokān rohati vṛṣṇaḥ
niṣpad asi prājāpatyam iti aśva śakāni vyāharati prājāpatyaḥ vai aśvaḥ rūpeṇa
eva enam samardhayati devānām tvā patnīḥ vṛṣṇaḥ aśvasya niṣpadā dhūpayantu iti
aśva śakaiḥ dhūpayati prājāpatyaḥ vai aśvaḥ yajñaḥ prajāpatiḥ sayoni tvāya
arciṣe tvā śociṣe tvā harase tvā iti śamī śākhāḥ abhyādadhāti tejaḥ vai agniḥ
tejaḥ śamī śākhāḥ tejasi eva tejaḥ dadhāti mitrasya carṣaṇī dhṛtaḥ iti
upatiṣṭhate mitrāya eva enam karoti devaḥ tvā savitā udvapatu iti sāvitrā
udvapati prasūtyai a vyathamānaḥ pṛthivyām āśāḥ diśaḥ āpṛṇa iti tasmāt agniḥ
sarvāḥ diśaḥ vibhāti uttiṣṭha bṛhan bhava ūrdhvaḥ tiṣṭha dhruvaḥ tvam iti
dṛṃhati eva enam idam aham amum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram tejasā
brahmavarcasena samardhayāmi iti brāhmaṇam tejaḥ vai brahma gāyatrī tejasā eva
enam brahmavarcasena samardhayati yadi abhicaret idam aham amum āmuṣyāyaṇam
amuṣyāḥ putram tejasā brahmavarcasena vyardhayāmi iti tejaḥ vai brahma gāyatrī
tejasā brahmavarcasena vyardhayati idam aham amum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram
ojasā vīryeṇa samardhayāmi iti rājanyam ojaḥ vai vīryam triṣṭubh ojasā eva enam
vīryeṇa samardhayati yadi abhicaret idam aham amum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram
ojasā vīryeṇa vyardhayāmi iti ojaḥ vai vīryam triṣṭubh ojasā eva enam vīryeṇa
vyardhayati idam aham amum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram ūrjā paśubhiḥ samardhayāmi
iti vaiśyam paśavaḥ vai jagatī ūrjā eva enam paśubhiḥ samardhayati yadi
abhicaret idam aham amum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram ūrjā paśubhiḥ vyardhayāmi
iti paśavaḥ vai jagatī ūrjā eva enam paśubhiḥ vyardhayati idam aham mām tejasā
brahmavarcasena ojasā vīryeṇa prajayā paśubhiḥ annādyena samardhayāmi iti ātmā
vai brahmavarcasī ātmānam eva tejasā brahmavarcasena ojasā vīryeṇa prajayā
paśubhiḥ annādyena samardhayati ṛjave tvā sādhave tvā su kṣityai tvā iti
yathāyajus aparam aparam sādayati imān eva lokān pratyavarohati sūryasya tvā
cakṣuṣā anvīkṣe iti avekṣate yat vai idam manuṣyāṇām cakṣuṣā prekṣeta pradahet
cakṣuḥ andhāḥ prajāḥ jāyeran sūryasya eva enam cakṣuṣā anvīkṣate śchṛṇattu tvā
vāc iti payasā āśchṛṇatti vāc vai gāyatrī enam āśchṛṇatti śchṛṇattu tvā ūrj iti
annam vai ūrj annādyena eva enam āśchṛṇatti śchṛṇattu tvā payaḥ iti paśavaḥ vai
payaḥ paśubhiḥ eva enam āśchṛṇatti śchṛṇattu tvā rasaḥ chṛṇattu tvā haviḥ
chṛṇattu tvā somaḥ chṛṇattu tvā yajñaḥ chṛṇattu tvā brahma chṛṇattu tvā
prajāpatiḥ iti yathāyajus
